story:
Multiplayer Demo Available!

Download the Multiplayer demo on PC & OSX at http://www.zedabsolution.com/download (If you would like to be a part of the early Linux builds and help us test compatibility and functionality, please email us at info@zedabsolution.com


For a ton of information on the game, screenshots & other good things, visit www.zedabsolution.com and don't forget to vote for us on our official Steam Greenlight page and perhaps follow us on our @zedabsolution Twitter account. Thank you!


The Story (So Far...)

Meet ZED - a battle hardened seraphim warrior. Banished from the holy land, ZED vies for his salvation the only way that’s left; by competing in the Tournament of the Accord. Possessing the corpses of fallen kin, he must survive the brutal gauntlet, and work his way through progressively challenging and terrifying realms. Only by collecting the souls of the damned can he earn his way back into the Gods good graces. ZED’s only chance at redemption is to defeat the soldiers of Legion, but he is not left to his own devices. Build a massive arsenal, wield unique powers, and give special blessings to ZED’s armor in order to help him reclaim absolution.


Sounds great! What's next?

ZED takes elements from many styles of gameplay and melds them into a one of kind experience. At first glance, ZED is a top down throwback arcade shooter in the same vein as Robotron 2048 and SmashTV - albeit brought into the 21st century. But ZED has many layers beyond classics such as these, and brings many elements of gameplay you find in RPG, ISO, and FPS games. A few noticeable features of ZED include:

  • Multi-Platform Support 
  • Multiple Breathtaking 3D environments to battle Legion through
  • Full multiplayer support
  • A massive arsenal of equippable weapons and upgrades 
  • Multiple unique special powers and armor blessings 
  • Balanced Difficulties for new to experienced players
  • A full leveling system for players and weapons 
  • Oculus Rift Support (OMG HOW)







Platforms

We are currently supporting Windows, OSX, and will support Linux for release. We have hopes of being able to launch to DLC consoles as well, but that will largely be dependant on the success of the game.

Partners

We are working with Unity3D for our game engine, Photon Cloud by Exit Games for the Cross Platform Multiplayer Servers, and Buddy's core API platform for our user accounts and management.



Planning, Production & Features

You will be able to purchase weapons, items, upgrades and talents by spending Soul Tokens. You can earn Soul Tokens by finishing off foes.


Currently we have 6 environments with a focus on another six plus and accompanying online game modes for each. Secret paths & traps, dangers and greatness will cross your path.

ZED features over 100 ranks that can be unlocked as you gain souls for your salvation. Your ability to use weapons also improves with use. The more you use the pistol, the better your host gets with the pistol. While it may start out a little slow, you will be churning over hordes with a pistol faster than an assault rifle.

(Preview of the Specials you can purchase in the Armory)

Unlike traditional top-down arcade shooters, ZED features a large arsenal of weapons you can equip and modify before you enter the arena. ZED can carry up to 4 into battle, and they can easily be quick-swapped when you find yourself in trouble. As you earn souls, you might opt to upgrade the specs of your trusty pistol with mods like laser sight for increased accuracy, or fire-rate modification to deal out more damage. On the other hand, you might want to save your hard-earned souls for an automatic shotgun, which when combined with an increased gauge modification, can deliver a wide range of gibbing pleasure.


(Preview of the Blessings you can purchase in the Armory)

There are over 30 weapons currently implemented, including railguns, axes, flamethrowers, smg’s, assault rifles, and tons more to keep you armed to the teeth!  Each weapon features its own stats, including fire-rate, critical hit chance, damage per-second, and accuracy - all of which can be improved with leveling and upgrade selection. In addition to being able to throw grenades, Legion’s ghouls also drop a huge variety of powerups, ranging from spinning balls of fire to the stoppage of time.





(Sample of the Powerups you can attain from fallen foes)

Yes - multiplayer. Yes - it’s awesome.


We currently support full co-op gameplay in ZED - which brings a whole new experience to the gameplay. While Legion’s soldiers do get more challenging as more players join, each player can bring individual powers, blessings, and weapons to the arena to create any number of gameplay styles for battling evil. You can blast through a crowd of creatures with your GLX5000 after your confederate pulls them in close for intense melee combat. Stack critical hits for massive damage, or build up your health and regeneration to keep running longer. 


While co-op is currently fully supported we have plans to add deathmatch, capture the flag, and domination modes before release.


 

 

OST (Official Sountrack)

We are having the entire game scored with an original soundtrack along with a huge variety of bonus tracks added onto the official soundtrack pack. The OST is being composed by Дмитрий Демиденко - Dimitry Demidenko. A composer from Minsk, Belarus.

https://soundcloud.com/zed-absolution/


Occulus Rift Support!

A lot of people are excited, while a lot of others are confused as to how we plan on implementing the Oculus rift into our game experience. Since we don’t have one yet, and haven’t been able to definitively measure the pros and cons of different implementations, the general idea is that you will have control of what you, and ZED, are looking at. We are both very excited about the Oculus rift so I guarantee it will be getting a good amount of attention on this end.

 

That's great! Who are you?

We have 20 years combined experience in Design & Production of games, web, mobile, and video. That said, there are only 2 of us. It has been a labor of love for gaming and great game experiences, and hopefully one you will be able to share with us. Because there are only two of us, you probably already know the answer to the question below: 

 

 

Why are you fundraising?

To be honest, ZED will be released no matter what. We have dedicated countless hours and nights to developing this game, so come hell or high water, this game will be completed. That said, this funding will make that happen in a timely manner, and get additional features that we simply can’t tackle without more resources.

 

We launched ZED on Steam Greenlight October 2012 and found that there was an overall love for the style of game we are trying to build. We have been taking everything the community has had to say about it and are constantly making it better. We're hoping to find the support and community involvement to make this project a success, not only in our eyes, but to you the end user. So what will the funding go towards? We want to be 100% transparent with what these funds will be used for. There are a few things that we must cover in some way, so these items will take priority:

 

    • Rewards for backers
    • Software licensing costs
    • Server costs for multiplayer and player management
    • Once these costs are covered, we will be using our successful funding for the following:
    • SFX and soundtrack development
    • 3D modeling and animation support
    • Additional programming & server support
    • Platform licensing costs

 

We have been thinking about Stretch Goals as well. We have a rough outline of things we would like to implement into the game. We are basing what comes first on campaign funding and community voting. These are subject to change.

 

 

What do I get out of this?

Not only will you get an amazing gaming experience, we are offering the following rewards:

BETA ACCESS (Digital Item)
To show our support we are offering any backer who pledges 15$ or above a limited Beta Access key that will come available on Desura. This is different from our global multiplayer. You will be added to a list to get the entire full game beta before launch!




IN GAME VISUAL HELM (Digital Item)
An awesome way to show your support!

 

OST DOWNLOAD (Digital Item)
A digital link to download the OST when the game launches.



FACTION T-SHIRTS Physical Item)
We have faction T-Shirts available sizes range from S-XXXL.



FACTION DOG TAGS (Physical Item)
Rep your faction of choice or collect both, ILLINARI and LEGION.(Physical Item)
Each mini poster is signed and sent with love.




COLLECTIBLE CARDS (Physical Item)
Gotta collect them all!







GAME AND DEVELOPER DIARY PACK (Physical Item)
Game and Developer Diary Book



ABSOLUTE EDITION COLLECTORS BOX (Physical Item)
Everything we have to offer, and then some.

-------

Can we help other ways?

The next best way to help ZED which is just as helpful as monetary backing is social sharing. Please follow us on Twitter and Like us on Facebook if you use any of these social platforms and pass them along to friends or family :)



We could use your Vote! If you are a Steam user please take a moment and check out our official Steam Greenlight page.

That's all for now folks!, Thank you for your support!
 

Risks and Challenges

We've tried to do as much as we can to show the community how dedicated we are at what we do. We both love making games and aside from the possibility of not fulfilling our Indie Gogo Campaign, we would still find some way of finishing it on our own.

Working with contractors can sometimes be difficult with Time Zones and project management. Luckily we have both experience in studio environments as well as working from home, learning some of the best tricks to successful projects, like running daily scrum.

If we don't make our goal we are set to fixed funding. Which means if we don't raise our entire goal all the funds will be refunded to the backers registered on I/G.

story:
Active parents that care and play with their children grew up to have higher IQs. 

- Office on Child Abuse and Neglect, 2006

 

Children with active FATHERS were 43% more likely to earn A's in school. 

- U.S. Department of Education, 2006

 

est. 25 million children living without an active fatherly role were 3 times more likely to be poor, abuse drugs, experience health, emotional, behavioral issues & engage in criminal behaviors. 

- www.fatherhood.gov / NRFC

 

 

Studies show that active parenting; especially from fathers positively affects the social, behavioral, psychological and cognitive outcomes of children.


What would you say if our diaper bag

  • Could help you become a better parent?
  • Create more positive experiences with your children?
  • Help you make diaper changes easier?
  • Help organize children supplies for you?
  • Allow you to continue using it for your daily tasks even after the kids have outgrown the diaper bag stage?

 

Latest version of Marlin - 3rd prototype (above)

- As Featured In -


Why Marlin?

We all know that parenthood can be challenging and we are not talking about the bees and flowers yet.

So we set out to design a diaper bag that is better than anything else available.

Here are six reasons we think our diaper bag would really help make parenthood easier; especially for fathers!

 

1. Diaper change process

Handling poop-filled diapers & a screaming baby isn’t a cup of tea. 

We have streamlined the diaper change process into the bag design, making it a quick and seamless process.

No more digging inside diaper bags, no more fumbling with wet wipes, nappy creams, diapers and poop! 

Get the job done within a minute!


EZ-Diaper mat - just pull to use & splash resistant! (above)

 


Front diaper pocket for quick access (above)

 

 

EZ-Access pockets for wet wipes & rash cream (above)

 

 

 

2. Know where everything is

No idea where mummy packed their favourite toys and the kids are screaming their heads off?

Everything you need has their specific compartments and organizers in our diaper bag,

this means you know where they are, every time!

Wide mouth opening & organizer packs (above)


 

 

 

3. Kids outgrow, Marlin doesn’t

Your kids have finally moved out of pre-school stage and the typical diaper bag goes into storage.

Marlin doesn’t just make parenthood easier; it makes your work + play easier too!


 



Shoe pack (above)

Work Pack (above)



Morph to photographer mode (above)

 

 


4. Convenience + Speed

Every possible scenario during your parenthood has been thought through in the design process of our diaper bag - Marlin .

 Everything you’ll ever need from a first aid kit,

toys to coins for ice cream can be easily accessed.  

Better be safe than sorry. Keep a first aid kit handy! (above)

Keep snacks cool with Marlin's thermal pack (above)

"Handy Pouch" for convenience stuff like coins, keys, cards (above)

No more misplaced keys (above)

Dual-Bungee wide mouth side pockets

EZ- pouch for "peace-keeping supplies" i.e. crayons, toys (above)

 

 

 

5. Trendy & Unisex Design

Crafted with high strength fabrics combined with pebble-grained leather trimming

means looking sleek and composed, even with screaming children!

Convert Marlin into a messenger bag, backpack and a carry all in a heartbeat.


Look good for work & no one would even notice Marlin is a diaper bag.

 

 

6. Built Tough + Comfort

We designed Marlin from materials often found in military equipment:

  • Water resistant zippers
  • Durable metal hardware
  • Pebble grained leather trimmings.
  • Air meshed & cell foam shoulder pads
  • Soft cotton wide detachable sling strap.
  • Reinforced sewing at high stress points.
  • Splash resistant & “Ripstop” honeycomb nylon
  • Smooth shoulder pads with no hard attachments


Durable metal hardware (above)

 

Smooth shoulder straps for kiddo's comfort during carrying (above)

 

 

 


 

 

SPECIFICATIONS


 

Time Line


TESTIMONIALS

 

Jeff Jude & Family, Educators - Ministry of Education , 3 kids

An impressive thought up design for a diaper bag which caters to the IMMEDIATE needs of a modern "on the go" parents!


Andy, Deputy secretary general - Singapore manual & mercantile workers' union , 1 kid

A multi-functional diaper bag that would be great for a day or oversea trip!


Kuanlin, Commercial pilot - Silkair , 2 kids

Very functional and stylish bag. Sturdy and organized. Great bag!


Vern, Entrepreneur - CKC uniforms , 2 kids

Awesome bag! Well organized, no more stacking &  digging inside the bag searching for stuffs!   Love how I can use it for my daily work too!

 

 

 

STRETCH GOALS

Help us unlock these stretch goals by sharing Marlin with your friends & family.

 

1.    Improved Interior Fabric - $28,000

Although our current dura-brite nylon is pretty tough; who would complain about upgrades?  With the increase in orders, we could achieve economies of scale and get an upgraded interior fabric at the same cost!


2.    Different Colors / Fabric   - $38,000

Prefer Marlin to be more lady like? Or prefer a color to match your flaming orange Lamborghini? 

Help us reach this stretch goal by sharing with your friends and we’ll unlock another 2 colors / fabric types! 


(colors swatches displayed are only for illustration, actual swatches would be shared in a later survey poll.)


3.    XTRA LARGE - $50,000

Love the features but you are the size of the Hulk or have quadruplets?  No worries!  Help us reach this stretch goal by sharing with your friends and we’ll design a XTRA LARGE Marlin!


   

5.    Leather Version - $60,000

We’ve crafted with leather and fabrics since 2006.  We love the smell and feel of exquisite leather and I’m sure most of you would do as well.


 

PERKS

A personalized gift always means more.
We will monogram your desired initials on premium leather.

Life always seems easier when there is humor.
Perk yourself up with these random meaningful handcrafted key fobs.

 

REFERRAL CONTEST

Want a FREE marlin?  Share our campaign with as many friends as you can, & you might just get one FREE!

Understand more here. 

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683-How-To-Participate-In-A-Referral-Contest


 



A big thank you for checking out our Marlin and for your help in making it a reality.

Even if you can't support us with a pledge,

contribute to our project by spreading the word on social media.

Like, or Follow us!

 

Follow us on Facebook:

www.Facebook.com/Feb29Bags

 

 

Download media kit:

http://www.myfeb29.com/bestdiaperbag/marlinmediakit.rar

 

Questions? e-mail us:

indiegogo@myfeb29.com

 


 

 

Thank you

Thank you to all of my friends, family, and backers who have supported and encouraged me throughout this whole process. I could not have done this without you!  I would also like to thank the following people who have helped me throughout my campaign:

Video: http://www.Toku.Asia - One of the best video guys (skills & ethics) I've ever encountered!

Support: ms.Artisan; mother nature's skincare - Effective natural skincare made in Singapore!

Graphic Design & Photography: http://www.edenq.asia

Model: Chris Bucko - Amazing talent that can pretty much take on any role you throw at him!

Alpha testers & advisors:

Kuanlin & Tareen

Andy & Family

Vern Tat Ng & Family

Jeff Jude & Family

Yee Qing Xiang

Dr Donny Soh - Qlipp

Grey Tan - Tinymos

  , 1 kidA multi-functional diaper bag that would be great for a day or oversea trip! 

Kuanlin, Commercial pilot - Silkair
    
  , 2 kids
Very functional and stylish bag. Sturdy and organized. Great bag! Vern, Entrepreneur - CKC uniforms
    
  , 2 kidsAwesome bag! Well organized, no more stacking &  digging inside the bag searching for stuffs!   Love how I can use it for my daily work too! 
 
 
 
STRETCH
  GOALS
Help us  unlock these stretch goals by sharing Marlin with your friends & family.
 
1.   
Improved Interior Fabric - $28,000

Although our current dura-brite  nylon is pretty tough; who would complain about upgrades?  With the increase in orders, we could achieve  economies of scale and get an upgraded interior fabric at the same cost!

 
2.   
Different Colors / Fabric   - $38,000

	Prefer Marlin to be more lady like? Or prefer a  color to match your flaming orange Lamborghini? 
  Help us reach this stretch goal by sharing with your friends and we’ll  unlock another 2 colors / fabric types! 


(colors swatches displayed are only for illustration, actual swatches would be shared in a later  survey poll.)

3.   
XTRA LARGE - $50,000
Love  the features but you are the size of the Hulk or have quadruplets?  No worries!   Help us reach this stretch goal by sharing with your friends and we’ll  design a XTRA LARGE Marlin!



 
   

5.   
Leather Version - $60,000

We’ve crafted with leather and fabrics  since 2006.  We love the smell and feel  of exquisite leather and I’m sure most of you would do as well.


 
PERKS
      


   A personalized gift always means more.
    
  We will monogram your desired initials on premium leather.

 Life always seems easier when there is humor.
 Perk yourself up with these random meaningful handcrafted key fobs.

 
  
REFERRAL CONTEST
Want a FREE marlin?  Share our campaign with as many friends as you can, & you might just get one FREE!


Understand more here. 
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683-How-To-Participate-In-A-Referral-Contest


 
A
big thank you for checking out our Marlin and for your help in making it a
reality. 
Even if you can't support us with a pledge, 
contribute to our project
  by spreading the word on social media. 
Like, or Follow us!


 

Follow us on Facebook:
www.Facebook.com/Feb29Bags
  Download media kit:
http://www.myfeb29.com/bestdiaperbag/marlinmediakit.rar
 
Questions? e-mail us:
indiegogo@myfeb29.com
   
Thank you
Thank you to all of my friends,  family, and backers who have supported and encouraged me throughout this whole  process. I could not have done this without you!  I would also like to thank the following  people who have helped me throughout my campaign:
Video: http://www.Toku.Asia  - One of the best video guys (skills & ethics) I've ever encountered! 
Support: ms.Artisan; mother nature's skincare - Effective natural skincare made in Singapore!
Graphic Design & Photography: http://www.edenq.asia
Model: Chris Bucko - Amazing talent that can pretty much take on any role you throw at him!
Alpha testers & advisors:
Kuanlin & Tareen
Andy & Family
Vern Tat Ng & Family
Jeff Jude & Family
Yee Qing Xiang

story:
As seen on

www.launchingnext.com

About us

Hello! My name is Alexander and I work as a sales representative. My job is to represent the firm as well as myself in the best possible way and create lasting connections. I've found that the best way to do this is by being unique and that's why me and my friend Spiros decided to create Special Business Cards.

Forget the boring simplicity of the paper business card. When you meet someone for the first time you want to "sell" your personality in the best possible way.  Special Business Cards will provide you "finesse", except from the gently surprise you'll give to someone, we also think those cards are nice conversation starters! So... What we actually have in mind is to give to a simple business card some "class" and some other uses: 

  1. Giving an idea of your uniqueness and originality
  2. Conversation starter
  3. Giving Information

Our idea was to design an uncommon business card that will excite anyone.
For this, we chose to use 3 gentle kinds of wood and also Dark Plexiglass!  


Alder Wood

Oak Wood

Teak Wood

Dark Plexiglass

What We Need & What You Get

So, to make our vision become a reallity we need 

10.000$

With this contribution we plan to:

  • Get a supply of the finest quallity alder,oak and teak wood.
  • Get a supply of the best quallity Plexiglass.
  • Buy all the necessary equipment for the job : Laser engraving machine, press machine for the wood, necessary software.
We offer many perks in which you get to choose:
  • The kind of wood you would like to get, or the plexiglass.
  • One of our three graphic designs.
  • The ammount of the cards you want.
  • The "extra" packages we offer.
  • A "Thank you for your support" card.
  • A place for your name on our website on "Our Supporters" section.


Here you can see our 3 designs

Professional...

Looking very impressive...

Around 1,5mm thick / 3mm for Plexiglass


Risks & Challenges

We allready established relationships with our suppliers, they are "ready to roll" when we'll be. Of course that doesn't mean that everything should or definitely will run like a clock, some challenges could arise, but we will try to do our best to solve upcoming problems and stay on track with our timeline!



Other Ways You Can Help

Hey, do not forget to spread a word arround... If you like our idea, please help others know about us! :-)

story:
INTRODUCING GECO MARKII


Meet the Geco Mark II. The world's first action camera that can be mounted onto any pair of glasses.

 *patent pending


GECO IN THE PRESS


WHAT IS THE GECO?

The Geco Mark II is the world's smallest HD action cam that can be mounted to any pair of glasses for a first person point of view.   Weighing in at just below 18 grams, it will be the smallest action camera in the world and with the price point that we are striving toward, the most affordable.

It's simple, hands-free and records in 720p!

 

HOW GECO WILL CHANGE THE MARKETPLACE

Putting the Geco into production will set the benchmark for micro action cams and will be a new form factor in the action cam industry, allowing for a unique viewing angle that captures the moment as if it was through the eyes of the person filming it.

 

HOW IT ALL BEGAN

We self-funded this project from the beginning, developing numerous prototypes, conducting tests and analyzing feedback for the past year. Through this, we developed key relationships with electronic component suppliers all around the world to source the highest quality components. We developed the Geco concept in-house by using 3D printers and 3rd party components. Crowdfunding will enable us to make our product more affordable- bringing the retail price down to $120- making it one of the most affordable action cams on the market.

 

WHAT YOU GET 

With each Geco Mark II you will receive:

  • A Standard Mini USB Cable

  • Various High Tensile Strength Elastic Mounts for Different Size Glasses

  • A Waterproof Case (including a universal Tripod Screw and our specialized mounting solution for Underwater Goggles.)

  • Velcro Mounting Strips for Flexible Mounting Options

  • A Pivoting Action Mount with Double Sided Tape

We currently use a 3D printer for the shells of our prototypes and 3rd party components for the electronics, but this method is proving to be expensive and time consuming. The Indiegogo pledges will be used to manufacture the Geco on a mass scale allowing us to keep the price low while still maintaining a high quality product.

 

THE DREAM WE HAVE

Our goal is to create an action cam that can be used by everyday people :

  • The Lifeblogger

  • The Student

  • The Youtuber

  • The Chef etc.

Our dream is to make the Geco as powerful as possible while still keeping it affordable, and with your help we can make this dream a reality.

The idea was to create an action cam that you can use hands-free but once we started testing the product, the outcome became much more profound. The footage not only lets you re-live the experience but also capture the emotion of the moment allowing the viewer to enjoy the moment as if they were there.

 

TECH SPECS

  • Viewing angle: 100 degrees

  • Resolution: 720p @ 30 frames per second

  • Video format: .mov

  • Video encoding: H.264

  • Battery life: Approximately 60 minutes

  • Battery type: Lithium Polymer

  • Capacity: 300mAh 

  • Memory Type: Removable Micro SD class 4 or above

  • Connectivity: Universal USB port ( Mac & Windows)

THE LENS

The lens we decided on is much larger than the average 808 lens, but due to the quality and unique angle, we decided to go with it. The lens boasts a 100 degree angle of view that is the perfect combination of fisheye and traditional angles. The lens allows for a beautiful fish-eye effect on close-up shots and wider spanning shots at a distance.

 

USABILITY

We used a single tactile push-in button that  powers up the camera and starts recording simultaneously. This button mechanism allows the user to distinguish between whether the camera is recording or not without needing visual confirmation.

Step 1: Press Button to start recording

Step 2: Record footage

Step 3: Press button to stop recording

 

 

FITS ANY PAIR OF GLASSES

 Over the last year, we developed many different mounting options including clamps, clips and glues, but they were all limited to the size of glasses to which they could be attached to. We stumbled upon the concept of using elastics while watching kids play with Lego. The elastics were lightweight and could stretch to amazing lengths without snapping or being distorted and could still keep a firm grip on an object.

 

WHAT STAGE ARE WE AT?

We started with reverse engineering old cellphone cameras and micro security cams and created our 1st working model out of wood.

The initial design derived from reverse engineering an 808 cam

Final prototype

We developed the shaped body after investing in a 3D printer and created our 1st actual Geco. We have already made integral connections with the best suppliers in the world, who are ready to start production as soon as our goal is reached.

We will soon start development on:

  • Package Design

  • Alternative Mounting Options for Stretch Goals                             


GECO IN ACTION


 

FAQ'S

Q. Do You Ship to All Countries?

A. Yes, the $10 shipping fee applies to anywhere worldwide.

 

Q. Will the Camera Put Strain on my Glasses?

A. We have tested hundreds of frames and are confident that the Geco will not alter the axis of your glasses. This is, of course, reliant on the assumption that your glasses are correctly sized for your face. In our tests, the heavier the frames, the more stable they are with the Geco attached.

 

Q. Is the Waterproof Case Safe for Saltwater, Freshwater and Chlorine?

A. Yes, the waterproof case can be used in all 3 cases.

 

Q. Does the Geco Work on Internal or External Batteries?

A.  The Geco has a built in rechargeable Lithium Polymer battery and can be charged with the USB cable included.

 

Q. Is the Geco Durable?

A. The Geco itself is made out of robust ABS plastic but we have included a safety case that is both waterproof and shockproof.

 

Q. Is It Compatible with Windows and Mac?

A. Yes the Geco is compatible with all operating systems- the format it records in is .mov H.264 encoding.

 

Q. I'm having difficulty making my contribution.

A. Our email address is gecocam@gmail.com. Please feel free to contact us for any assistance.

 

Q. How Long Will Shipping Take?

A. Shipping times vary, depending on where in the world you are. For more information please contact us.

 

LIKE AND SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN


Help us reach our goal and back our campaign so we can make the Geco as affordable as possible without sacrificing quality.

The more people that hear about our campaign, the more likely we are to get the Geco into production. Even if you can't afford to back us, something as simple as a "like" means the world to us!

 

Geco. Capture the Moment.

*campaign image credit to www.htxt.co.za

story:
MESHABLE - Essential Watches with Steel Mesh Straps & Swiss movement


Meshable watches combine latest urban culture with timeless design, minimalist essentials with maximum accuracy, and high quality with affordability.

Our brand contains a very simple idea; everything we do, should be Meshable. Which is why every watch will have a steel mesh strap. 
We always loved those mesh straps. But as we started looking for watches with a simple, timeless (but at the same time fresh) design, as well as an affordable price, we were disappointed with what was available. So there was only one thing we could do. Create our own watch.

Now, after a year of sketching out designs, researching and experimenting with different materials, building, testing prototypes and finally working with various suppliers and manufacturers, we are ready to proudly offer our watches exclusively on Indiegogo!


The Design Process

After having a clear idea of how our brand should look like, we started designing our watch with a few major goals in mind:

  • Style (urban culture with a timeless look)
  • Uniqueness (beeing individual with originality)
  • Versatility (wearable with casual and dress outfits)
  • Affordability

And most importantly, a watch we would personally love to wear! So, we hit the sketch pad and designed one watch after another. We created a few 3D models by ourselves. That took us a few months, because we always aimed for more, always wanted that perfect watch that fits to everything we could imagine. Until we got it. For us the perfect Meshable. 

We finally had something to show suppliers and manufacturers. We talked to many of them! We had to make sure, that we find someone who understands our vision and is able to deliver the high quality demands we have.

Now we have a great partner on our side, who enables us to have the best materials and components: Stainless steel case and mesh strap, Sapphire crystal, PVD plating and Swiss quartz movement! 

Because we wanted our watch to fit both, women and men, we decided to keep the case size reasonable. Not too large for a dress watch and not too small for a casual. So we went for a 41mm case diameter. But of course we wanted to keep it slim too, and achieved 9mm thickness. That's what makes it a great fit for all.

As for style, we took our inspiration from different trends worldwide, and especially from the urban culture. We closely looked at people, streets, buildings and clothes and noticed that everything was becoming more minimalist and straight to the point. It´s a trend, but we believe, that it was always there. Minimalist is timeless. Less is more.

This is also why we concentrated on essentials. We even went so far, that we decided our watch should show the precise time and only what day of the week it is. No more, no less.

After listening to the advice and feedback of our closest family and friends, we are now proud and excited to offer a product that grew from our love and dream of creating a timeless watch, based on minimalist principles.


The Final Design

You can choose between 2 colors:

  • The Silver
  • The Black

Specifications

  • Case diameter: 41 mm
  • Case thickness: 9 mm
  • Sapphire crystal (scratch resistant)
  • PVD coated stainless steel case & caseback
  • PVD coated 20 mm stainless steel mesh strap
  • Swiss movement (ISA Swiss 9232)  with a small days register
  • 5 ATM (50 m) water resistant

What Next?

Now that we finalized the first batch of fully functional prototypes, that fulfill all of our goals we wish to go into full production. To do so, we need to make a large order. We chose Indiegogo to help us and make our dream come true. Of course, we need and truly want to reward the Indiegogo Community by helping us fund this project. 

By joining us, you'll not only be one of the first people worldwide to own a Meshable watch, you will also get a heavy discount off the proposed retail price of 200€.

Last but not least, the first 225 backers will receive a limited founders edition. We really hope, that you share our love for this great watch and get involved and join us!

Case Back of the Limited Founders Edition.


The Schedule

Our manufacturing partner and our packaging partner are just wating for us to give them a go. So everything is ready to start production and will do so immediately after our Indiegogo campaign ends.



Risks and challenges

At this point, we are at the very final stages of our project and have overcome many of the hurdles and difficulties related to the design and manufacturing process. We have a great partner and a strong support team working closely alongside us.

While we do not foresee any major problems, we understand that there is always the possibility of small delays and setbacks in the coming months. Transparency is the key for us and we will notify all backers of our progress with regular updates.


About Meshable

Meshable was created by Mina Baldauf and Nemanja Vucicevic. Two product and fashion design lovers with a graphic design and marketing background. They both met in an ad agency where they worked together, and are now an engaged couple.

Mina Baldauf studied international business economics and worked in various digital, design and ad agencies since 2010. Her portfolio range is filled with high quality and worldwide known brands. She has extensive experience in project management and business relations. And above all, her passion for design and fashion is huge.

Nemanja Vucicevic made his communication design graduation in 2006 with a focus on product design. Since then, he worked for many known design studios and ad agencies all over the world. He handled a lot of big and renowned brands over the last 8 years. He has created concepts, ideas and products and brought them into life through film, photography and graphic design on a high level.

Last but not least, the first 225 backers will receive a limited founders edition. We really hope, that you share our love for this great watch and get involved and join us!


Case Back of the Limited Founders Edition.

  

The Schedule 
Our manufacturing partner and our packaging partner are just wating for us to give them a go. So everything is ready to start production and will do so immediately after our Indiegogo campaign ends.






Risks and challenges

At this point, we are at the very final stages of our project and have overcome many of the hurdles and difficulties related to the design and manufacturing process. We have a great partner and a strong support team working closely alongside us.
While we do not foresee any major problems, we understand that there is always the possibility of small delays and setbacks in the coming months. Transparency is the key for us and we will notify all backers of our progress with regular updates.


About Meshable

Meshable was created by Mina Baldauf and Nemanja Vucicevic. Two product and fashion design lovers with a graphic design and marketing background. They both met in an ad agency where they worked together, and are now an engaged couple.
Mina Baldauf studied international business economics and worked in various digital, design and ad agencies since 2010. Her portfolio range is filled with high quality and worldwide known brands. She has extensive experience in project management and business relations. And above all, her passion for design and fashion is huge.
Nemanja Vucicevic made his communication design graduation in 2006 with a focus on product design. Since then, he worked for many known design studios and ad agencies all over the world. He handled a lot of big and renowned brands over the last 8 years. He has created concepts, ideas and products and brought them into life through film, photography and graphic design on a high level.

story:
11月22日日本で発売! スクロールし最後まで読んでください。




Around the world, theft of smartphones is on the rise and personal safety is always foremost in our minds. With this Indiegogo campaign, we’re starting  the pushback to reclaim your safety, and security of your iPhone. While Halo is the first smartphone case designed to prevent theft, it also incorporates invaluable features to enhance your iPhone, including a battery boost, external speaker, ergonomic grip and styling, and more.  After successfully crowdfunding the resources for initial concept and design in April 2013, our team has spent the past six months developing and prototyping the Halo for iPhone and we’re excited to share it with you.




The Halo Ring is the world’s first proximity-based alarm for phone theft prevention. You decide on the distance to set via the Halo app, and the Halo Ring will trigger an alarm capable of producing 115 decibels when separated from your device.

Designed to provide security for everyday use, Halo minimizes the risk of theft and provides you protection when you need it most.

The Halo Ring will also protect against damage to your device from an accidental drop.




Halo’s standard alarm may also be triggered by briefly holding the emergency button in the event you need to draw attention to yourself. Or, you can set up personalized alarms like “Help” or "Emergency”, which you can trigger with your own, secret, gesture control.  Simultaneously, video recording can be triggered, a text message with GPS coordinates and a pre-set, personalized message can be sent to designated emergency contacts.





Halo boasts a 20mm speaker so you can improve the iPhone’s audio output.




A silent, subtle LED alert system advises you of incoming calls and push notifications.




When you’ve been out and about all day, Halo has you covered with a extra battery boost to increase your iPhone’s usage by an estimated 40 percent.





Shane Smith, CEO, and Karen Griffith, Design Strategist and co-founder, continue a history of innovation in a partnership that started in London in the 1990’s, spanning software platforms, email services, research products and investor communications.  Karen and Shane have both been directors of a company listed on London Stock Exchange.  They are supported by an expert team of technical and design professionals that make up the Halo Family.





Gesture control and alarms
Activation and de-activation:
There are two primary activation methods: by gesture, to quickly activate a customized alarm; or by pressing the emergency button, for occasions when your phone is concealed in a pocket or bag and you may not wish to reveal it. Once activated, only you know how to de-activate it.
Ø  Record motion alarm activation gestures for customized alarms
Ø  Record motion alarm de-activation gestures
Ø  Choose emergency button activation for standard alarm (e.g. two short presses; or one long press)
Ø  Choose emergency button de-activation for standard alarm
Ø  Enable de-activation by fingerprint
Ø  Enable de-activation by PIN

Recording/selecting alert:
Ø  Record custom voice alert
Ø  Download pre-recorded alert

Configuring the Halo Ring:
Ø  Set maximum permissible distance for Halo Ring
Ø  Enable de-activation by return of Halo Ring within proximity
Ø  Enable de-activation by fingerprint
Ø  Enable de-activation by PIN

Audio play-out:
This feature is great for social listening.
Ø  Tilt left to increase volume
Ø  Tilt right to decrease volume

Power management:
The Halo case and your iPhone charge together, through the single lightning connector located at the base of the Halo – so it’s always charged when you need it.  If your phone battery is exhausted, you can use Halo as a back-up.
Ø  Activate battery boost to iPhone

Push notifications:
Associate four currently-enabled push notifications with LED’s. Example: 
Email – Red
Skype – Blue
Line – Green
iMessage – White

Personal safety controls:
Ø  Enable video recording when alarm is activated
Ø  Send image files to nominated recipients when video activated
Ø  Capture GPS location when alarm activated
Ø  Pre-define phone numbers to send emergency message
Ø  Record customized message associated with each phone number
Ø  Enable each phone number to receive GPS location, image files

Case design:
In addition to the software features, the case is designed to be held comfortably and securely. Combined with robust and high quality materials, the Halo protects your glass screen when placed face-down, and the case takes the brunt of the shock on those occasions when dropping is unavoidable.

We’ve had great feedback on the project so far and hope you like it too. Thanks for your time and please check out the pledges on our page. We look forward to sending you your very own Halo iPhone case in Summer 2014.





We’ve put together the best team possible to design, build and deliver this advanced product on time and on target. The primary risks and challenges are in manufacturing logistics. For example, there might be unforeseen problems with tooling and equipment. We may also face unexpected delays in obtaining the necessary certifications. These challenges are common to all projects involving new technology, dedicated manufacturing and mass distribution. While there may be manufacturing and production delays outside of our control, we promise timely and transparent communication throughout the process.





Spread the word for a chance to win a Halo every day of this campaign.

     Step 1 - Make sure you're logged into Indiegogo
     Step 2 - Share this campaign on Twitter, Google+,
                 or another network using the tool under our video
                 at the top of this page.

And that's it! The person who sends the most visitors to our page will be the winner for that day. We will announce the winner for the previous day at noon EST on our Facebook page. 





Why not give your loved ones peace of mind and security. Order the Halo iPhone case now and we will send a gift certificate personalized for the recipient in time for Christmas.


 




世界中で、スマートフォーンの盗難が増えてきていて個人の安全は常に我々の心で一番です。このIndiegogoキャンペーンで我々はあなたの安全やiPhoneの安全を取り戻すプッシュバックを開始します。ハローは盗難を奉仕するためにデザインされた初めてのスマートフォーン用ケースですが、バッテリーの長持ち、外部スピーカー、エルゴノミクスグリップ、スタイリング等を含んでいてiPhoneを強化し計り知れないほど貴重な特徴を取り入れます。2013年4月に最初の概念とデザインの為の資源を上手く人から集めた後、我々のチームはiPhoneの為のハローの原型を作るのに過去6か月間費やしました。そして我々はあなたに共有することに興奮しています。




ハローリングは、世界初の電話窃盗防止のためのアラームです。あなたは、ハローアプリによってセットする距離を決定します。そして、あなたの装置から切り離されるとき、ハローリングは115デシベルのアラームを起動させます。

普段用の安全を提供するためにデザインされたはろーは窃盗のリスクを少なくし、あなたが最も必要とするとき保護を提供します。

ハローリングは偶然の落下からも装置を保護します。



ハローのスタンダードアラームはあなたが自分自身に注意をひく必要がある場合、非常用のボタンを短く保持することによって引き起こされるかもしれません。もしくは、”ヘルプ”や”非常事態”のような個人化されたアラームを設定することもできます。そしてそれは、自分自身、秘密、ジェスチャーコントロールで引き起こされることが出来ます。同時に、ビデオ録画が引き起こされます。GPSによるテキスト・メッセージも調和します。そして、予め設定され、個人化されたメッセージは指定された緊急連絡先へ送信する事が出来ます。




ハローは20ｍｍのスピーカーが鳴ります。だからiPhoneの音声出力を改善する事が出来ます。



静か、巧妙なLED警報システムは、あなたに着信とプッシュ通知を知らせます。



あなたが終日出かける時、ハローは特別な充電器に変換する事が出来、
あなたのiPhoneの充電を最大40%増加させます。




CEOであるシェーンスミスとデザイン戦略家のカレングリフィンや共同創設者はソフトウェアプラットホーム、電子メールサービス、研究製品や投資家とのコミュニケーションについて、1990年代にロンドンで始めて今も革新の歴史は続いています。カレンとシェーンは、ロンドン証券取引所でリストされる会社の責任者でした。ハローの家族を作る技術的でデザインのプロ専門家チームで、彼らは支えられます。




ジェスチャーコントロールとアラーム
起動と停止:
2つの主要な起動方法があります: カスタマイズされたアラームをすくに起動するためのジェスチャー; 非常用ボタンを押すことによって、電話中ポケットやカバンにあることを画し明らかにしません。一旦起動すると、あなただけが停止するやり方を知っています。
  • カスタマイズされた警報によりレコードモーションアラーム起動のジェスチャー 
  • レコードモーションアラーム停止のジェスチャー 
  • 標準的なアラームの為に緊急ボタンの起動を選択する (例 2人の低いプレス; 1つの長いプレス) 
  • 標準的なアラームの為に緊急ボタンの停止を選択する 
  • 指紋によって停止を可能とする 
  • PINによって停止を可能にする

Recording/selecting alert:
  • Record custom voice alert
  • Download pre-recorded alert

ハローリングの構成:
  • ハローリングの最大許容距離を設定する 
  • 近くでハローリングのリターンによって停止を可能にする 
  • Enable de-activation by fingerprint 
  • PINによって停止を可能にする

オーデオが尽きた:
この特徴は社会的に聞くのに良いです。
  • 左への傾きはボリュームを増します 
  • 右への傾きはボリュームを減らします

パワーマネージメント:
ハローケースやIPhoneはハローのベースに位置している単電コネクターを通してチャージします。- だからあなたが必要なときいつでもチャージされます。もしあなたの電話のバッテリーを使い果たしたら、あなたはバックアップとしてハローを使用する事が出来ます。
  • iPhoneの為にバッテリーの増加を起動させる 

プッシュ通知:
4つの現在可能なプッシュ通知をLEDと結び付けてください。例:
電子メール – 赤
スカイプ – 青
ライン – 緑
iMessage – 白

個人安全コントロール:
  • アラームが起動している時ビデオの録画を可能とします 
  • ビデオが起動している時候補者に指名された写真ファイルを送ります 
  • アラームが起動している時GPSの場所をとらえます 
  • 緊急メッセージを送信するために電話番号を前定義します 
  • 電話番号と関連したカスタマイズされたメッセージの録画 
  • GPSの場所や写真ファイルを受け取るために番号を電話出来ます 


ケースのデザイン:

ソフトウエア機能に加えてケースは気持ちよく確実に持たれるように設計されています。強くて高品質材料と結合され、表を下にして置かれるとき、ハローはあなたのガラスのスクリーンを保護します。そして、落とすことが避けられないとき、ケースにショックが被ります。

我々はこれまでのプロジェクトにすばらしいフィードバックを頂いています。あなたが好きになることを望んでいます。時間を割いてくださってありがとうございます。我々のページ上で誓約を確認してください。我々は、2014年夏にあなたに独自のハローiPhoneケースを送ることを楽しみにします。




我々は時間やターゲットに関して先進の製品を設計、構築、届けるために最高のチームにまとめ上げました。主要な危険と挑戦は、ロジスティックスを捏造する際にあります。例えば、道具と器材に関する思いがけない問題があるかもしれません。我々は、必要な証明を得るのに予想外の遅れに直面もするかもしれません。新技術、献身的製造と大規模な配布を含んでいるすべてのプロジェクトについての挑戦は共通しています。製造がある場所や生産の遅れはあるけれど、我々はプロセスを通してタイムリーで明確なコミュニケーションを約束します。




今からキャンペーンが終わるまで、我々はキャンペーンのページIndiegogo上で最も新しい支持者にハローiPhoneケースを無料で渡します。短銃です。どのように参加するか:

     ステップ1  –  我々のIndiegogoページへ行ってください:
     ステップ2  –  Indiegogoにログインしてください - それは、我々が何人あなた
                        の共有したリンクをたどるかについての追跡をすることができる
                        唯一の方法です!
     ステップ3  –  ツイッター、フェイスブック、google+上でページを共有して
                       ください。さもなければ、あなたはビデオの正しいリンクを使う
                       必要があります。

そして、それです! 我々のページに大部分の訪問客を増やした人がその日の間の勝者です。我々は、フェイスブックのページ上で昼のESTに前日の勝者を発表します。 




あなたの大切な人へ心をこめてセキュリティへの気遣いを送りませんか。今ハローiPhoneケースを注文いただくと、クリスマスに間に合うようにカスタマイズしたギフト券をお送りいたします。


 
誓約レベル1
ハロー支持者
 $5
世界中で起こっているスマートフォーンの窃盗と戦うための支持を示してください。そしてハローチームから排他的なアップデートやハロースティッカーのパック受け取ってください。
 
誓約レベル2
Early Bird
 $25
特別なearly bird場所でハローiPhoneケースを受け取ります。 - - $99のRRPからかなりの割引で。標準的な色が利用可能です: 黒、白、クロム。
 
誓約レベル3
標準的なハローiPhoneケース
 $49
$99のRRPからかなりの割引でハローiPhoneケースを手に入れてください。標準的な色が利用可能です: 黒、白、クロム
 
誓約レベル4
クリスマスギフト券
 $55
Gift a Halo iPhone Case to your loved ones at Christmas and we'll provide a personalized gift certificate to be redeemed as soon as the Halo is on general release in Summer 2014. Available in standard colors: black, white and chrome.
 
誓約レベル5
限定版
 $99
限定版を受け取ります。特別な色がハローiPhoneケースで利用可能です。あなたはハローチームから排他的なアップデートを受け取り、ハロースティッカーやティーシャツを受け取ります。限定版の色は利用可能です: ピンクと金
 
誓約レベル6
家族パック
 $125
家族や友達を3つのハローiPhoneケースで安全に保ってください。標準的な色が利用可能です: 黒、白、クロム
 
誓約レベル7
私の電話は私の生活
 $175
始めの2年間無料でハローアップグレードを受け取る事が出来ます。いつもiPhone安全装置を最新の状態にしておいてください。標準的な色が利用可能です: 黒、白、クロム
 
誓約レベル8
エリートユーザー
 $500
CADの限定版引き出しと共に1か月前にハローiPhoneケースの限定版を手に入れてください; そして製品を高めることを支援するエリートユーザーグループの一員になってください。
 
誓約レベル9
VIP
 $10,000
私たちは世界中のどこでもあなたに会いに飛んでいきます。あなたは限定版のハローiPhoneケースを受け取るためにロンドンにいるハローチームに会います。私たちはあなたに3日間のホテル代を支給します。そしてあなたはロンドンの歴史的な道や遺跡を見る事が出来ます。

静か、巧妙なLED警報システムは、あなたに着信とプッシュ通知を知らせます。

あなたが終日出かける時、ハローは特別な充電器に変換する事が出来、あなたのiPhoneの充電を最大40%増加させます。



CEOであるシェーンスミスとデザイン戦略家のカレングリフィンや共同創設者はソフトウェアプラットホーム、電子メールサービス、研究製品や投資家とのコミュニケーションについて、1990年代にロンドンで始めて今も革新の歴史は続いています。カレンとシェーンは、ロンドン証券取引所でリストされる会社の責任者でした。ハローの家族を作る技術的でデザインのプロ専門家チームで、彼らは支えられます。







ジェスチャーコントロールとアラーム
起動と停止:
2つの主要な起動方法があります: カスタマイズされたアラームをすくに起動するためのジェスチャー; 非常用ボタンを押すことによって、電話中ポケットやカバンにあることを画し明らかにしません。一旦起動すると、あなただけが停止するやり方を知っています。


カスタマイズされた警報によりレコードモーションアラーム起動のジェスチャー 


レコードモーションアラーム停止のジェスチャー 


標準的なアラームの為に緊急ボタンの起動を選択する (例 2人の低いプレス; 1つの長いプレス) 


標準的なアラームの為に緊急ボタンの停止を選択する 


指紋によって停止を可能とする 


PINによって停止を可能にする


Recording/selecting alert:

Record custom voice alert


Download pre-recorded alert


ハローリングの構成:


ハローリングの最大許容距離を設定する 


近くでハローリングのリターンによって停止を可能にする 


Enable de-activation by fingerprint 


PINによって停止を可能にする



オーデオが尽きた: 
この特徴は社会的に聞くのに良いです。


左への傾きはボリュームを増します 


右への傾きはボリュームを減らします



パワーマネージメント:
ハローケースやIPhoneはハローのベースに位置している単電コネクターを通してチャージします。- だからあなたが必要なときいつでもチャージされます。もしあなたの電話のバッテリーを使い果たしたら、あなたはバックアップとしてハローを使用する事が出来ます。

iPhoneの為にバッテリーの増加を起動させる 


プッシュ通知:
4つの現在可能なプッシュ通知をLEDと結び付けてください。例:


電子メール
– 赤


スカイプ
– 青


ライン
– 緑


iMessage
– 白




個人安全コントロール:


アラームが起動している時ビデオの録画を可能とします 


ビデオが起動している時候補者に指名された写真ファイルを送ります 


アラームが起動している時GPSの場所をとらえます 


緊急メッセージを送信するために電話番号を前定義します 


電話番号と関連したカスタマイズされたメッセージの録画 


GPSの場所や写真ファイルを受け取るために番号を電話出来ます 



ケースのデザイン:ソフトウエア機能に加えてケースは気持ちよく確実に持たれるように設計されています。強くて高品質材料と結合され、表を下にして置かれるとき、ハローはあなたのガラスのスクリーンを保護します。そして、落とすことが避けられないとき、ケースにショックが被ります。我々はこれまでのプロジェクトにすばらしいフィードバックを頂いています。あなたが好きになることを望んでいます。時間を割いてくださってありがとうございます。我々のページ上で誓約を確認してください。我々は、2014年夏にあなたに独自のハローiPhoneケースを送ることを楽しみにします。


我々は時間やターゲットに関して先進の製品を設計、構築、届けるために最高のチームにまとめ上げました。主要な危険と挑戦は、ロジスティックスを捏造する際にあります。例えば、道具と器材に関する思いがけない問題があるかもしれません。我々は、必要な証明を得るのに予想外の遅れに直面もするかもしれません。新技術、献身的製造と大規模な配布を含んでいるすべてのプロジェクトについての挑戦は共通しています。製造がある場所や生産の遅れはあるけれど、我々はプロセスを通してタイムリーで明確なコミュニケーションを約束します。

今からキャンペーンが終わるまで、我々はキャンペーンのページIndiegogo上で最も新しい支持者にハローiPhoneケースを無料で渡します。短銃です。どのように参加するか:
     ステップ1  –  我々のIndiegogoページへ行ってください: 
     ステップ2  –  Indiegogoにログインしてください - それは、我々が何人あなた                        の共有したリンクをたどるかについての追跡をすることができる                        唯一の方法です!

     ステップ3  –  ツイッター、フェイスブック、google+上でページを共有して                       ください。さもなければ、あなたはビデオの正しいリンクを使う                       必要があります。



そして、それです! 我々のページに大部分の訪問客を増やした人がその日の間の勝者です。我々は、フェイスブックのページ上で昼のESTに前日の勝者を発表します。 

あなたの大切な人へ心をこめてセキュリティへの気遣いを送りませんか。今ハローiPhoneケースを注文いただくと、クリスマスに間に合うようにカスタマイズしたギフト券をお送りいたします。 






誓約レベル1
ハロー支持者
$5


世界中で起こっているスマートフォーンの窃盗と戦うための支持を示してください。そしてハローチームから排他的なアップデートやハロースティッカーのパック受け取ってください。

 

誓約レベル2
Early Bird
$25

特別なearly bird場所でハローiPhoneケースを受け取ります。 - - $99のRRPからかなりの割引で。標準的な色が利用可能です: 黒、白、クロム。
 

誓約レベル3
標準的なハローiPhoneケース
$49

$99のRRPからかなりの割引でハローiPhoneケースを手に入れてください。標準的な色が利用可能です: 黒、白、クロム
 

誓約レベル4
クリスマスギフト券
$55

Gift a Halo iPhone Case to your loved ones at Christmas and we'll provide a personalized gift certificate to be redeemed as soon as the Halo is on general release in Summer 2014. Available in standard colors: black, white and chrome.
 

誓約レベル5
限定版
$99

限定版を受け取ります。特別な色がハローiPhoneケースで利用可能です。あなたはハローチームから排他的なアップデートを受け取り、ハロースティッカーやティーシャツを受け取ります。限定版の色は利用可能です: ピンクと金
 

誓約レベル6
家族パック
$125

家族や友達を3つのハローiPhoneケースで安全に保ってください。標準的な色が利用可能です: 黒、白、クロム
 

誓約レベル7
私の電話は私の生活
$175


始めの2年間無料でハローアップグレードを受け取る事が出来ます。いつもiPhone安全装置を最新の状態にしておいてください。標準的な色が利用可能です: 黒、白、クロム

 

誓約レベル8
エリートユーザー
$500

CADの限定版引き出しと共に1か月前にハローiPhoneケースの限定版を手に入れてください; そして製品を高めることを支援するエリートユーザーグループの一員になってください。
 

誓約レベル9
VIP
$10,000

私たちは世界中のどこでもあなたに会いに飛んでいきます。あなたは限定版のハローiPhoneケースを受け取るためにロンドンにいるハローチームに会います。私たちはあなたに3日間のホテル代を支給します。そしてあなたはロンドンの歴史的な道や遺跡を見る事が出来ます。

story:
Our Obsession should be your obsession

SB Watches is devoted to designing the most attractive and high-quality timepieces on the market.  Every detail has been carefully scrutinized in order to bring you an amazing product that looks sexy & tasteful without sacrificing quality.
Our newest addition to the SB Metropolis collection is named "Minimal" for its attention to clean lines & a stunning dial.  The Metropolis collection is designed by artist, Fredi Brodmann, known for his brilliant and humorous cartoons.  Each watch design is led by Brodmann's eccentric and thought-provoking vision. In this new design, Brodmann is saying, "Let's get rid of the clutter on our wrists and go back to basics."  

What We Need & What You Get

Funding details:

  • We are seeking funding of $20,000 to get this new SB MINIMAL design manufactured.
  • We are giving backers the opportunity to purchase an SB Minimal watch with a white dial or black dial at the Indiegogo special rate of $145 for a rubber strap (retail price will be $395), $195 with a leather strap (retail price will be $445), or $245 for a polished stainless steel bracelet (retail price will be $595).
  • Backers can also give $10 and receive a 10% off coupon for our store at www.sbwatches.com.
  • All watches will be shipped to backers by the end of September, 2016.
  • If goal is not reached, each backer will receive their money back & no watches will be produced using crowd funds.


The Reason

We want you to love our watches as much as we do.  We want you to help our company thrive.  Please help us with these simple things :

  • Write Facebook posts, tagging our website or this campaign.  Include pictures.  Show off your SB watch once you have it!
  • Once you get your watch, show it off on Instagram.  Tag the website and us (@universalwatchco).
  • Have a blog?  Write a review of our product!  We'd love to get your feedback. We also encourage writing product reviews on our website!

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge is getting the word out for our products and website.  We encourage all of our customers to help out along the way with Facebook & Instagram posts, as well as tweets and blog reviews.  

As experts in the watch industry for over 30 years, we are certain we have developed a winning brand of watches that is unlike any other.

Each watch...

  • has a 42mm wide, 9mm thick brushed & polished nickel-free stainless steel case
  • has a Scratch-resistant sapphire crystal
  • is equipped with a Ronda 715 Swiss quartz movement
  • is Water-Resistant to 165 feet (50 Meters)
  • Includes a 2-year warranty

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign through social media even if you don't contribute. Let's please get the word out there on this fabulous brand of watches!

story:
A limited edition box containing three different and innovative views on the work of Pritzker laureate architect Álvaro Siza Vieira

 

Siza Vintage is a limited edition box, measuring 25x35x5cm (approx. 9.8”x13.8”x2”), containing three views on the earlier work of Pritzker laureate architect Álvaro Siza Vieira, through photography, text and illustration.

Fifteen buildings were photographed for this edition and each box includes:

·  Fifteen 20x30cm photos (approx. 7.9”x 11.8”) by Rui Pedro Bordalo;   

·  Fifteen short chronicles by João Forjaz Mendes

·  One serigraphed illustration by Alex Gozblau

Each text and photo set will be carefully and individually packed, as will the serigraphed illustration.

Materials used

The boxes will be produced in Fedrigoni Materica Gesso 360grs cardboard.

The texts will be printed in Fedrigoni Arcoprint 300grs paper;

The photos will be printed in Fedrigoni 250grs photographic semigloss paper;

The illustration will be serigraphed in Fedrigoni Savile Row Plain White 250grs paper;

The individual containers will be made in Fedrigoni Golden Star K Extra White paper.

We care about the environment, so the whole production process is FSC certified, from the paper to the printers...

Who are we?

Rui is a portuguese freelance photographer, whose work has centered on the sociological side of urban space and the transformative power of architecture.

To fund his photographic exploits he's had several jobs, from being a stock manager, to baker, to commercial agent.

João is an architect working mostly on architectural heritage building renovations, including collaborating on a project for a building placed in a UNESCO World Heritage site, while researching the relationship between urban processes and the way we imagine, inhabit and use cities.

Why did we set up this campaign? What do you get out of this?

We both love architecture and passionately believe architectural debate would be much richer if everyone chipped in.

A few months ago we started working on this project, our interest stemming from the lack of debate on architecture, urban spaces and quality of life regarding architectural design open to the general public. Architects still revel on the obscurity of their technical terminology and profit from the lack of accountability on their design options.

The economic situation in Portugal, a country under IMF scrutiny and severe austerity measures also pushed us to pursue the creation of a box that could raise awareness on the quality of portuguese architects, at a time when most offices are working with the bare minimum staff, at least the lucky ones who weren´t forced to close due to lack of work.

Why Siza Vieira, might you ask? Why not start with a lesser known architect? We studied in his buildings, we used his chairs as students, we were children when Chiado burnt down, we used his swimming pools, we saw contemporary art in his museums...we have a deep emotional attachment to his work, albeit a critical and judgmental one.

From that point until inviting Alex Gozblau, an italian born illustrator living in Portugal, to collaborate with us just seemed like the next logical step. His immense body of work has been featured in several newspapers, magazines, movies, books and gallery exhibitions.

We challenged him because of his diametrically opposite graphic style to that of Siza Vieira.

As much as we'd like this idea to go forward, we need money, that's the truth of it.


Even after getting the support of italian fine papers producer Fedrigoni, who liked our idea and the project we presented to them, we need funding to print, build, store and distribute the boxes to retailers.

Is it a lot of money? Yes, but with good reason.

From the get-go we've been following two tenets: the boxes will have to be a very high quality product that conveys our degree of steadfastness, but sold at a price that will not make them accessible only to the wealthy.

The only way to do this is to have a print of 2.500 boxes, to get some economies of scale, but that costs money to start with.

This campaign also serves the purpose of giving a chance to people who live outside of Portugal to buy the boxes at a fraction of the price they would in a retail store near them.

If the projected retail price in Portugal is €50 (approx. $68), in other countries the price would shoot to upwards of €200 (approx. $272) to cover the shipping costs, taxes and the retailer's profit, which usually stands at around 30% of the final price.

We're not only offering the Siza Vintage boxes with a discount, or even the chance to get a signed copy of one of the boxes (and by signed, we mean you’ll get a personal and probably schmaltzy thank you note), we're also giving you the chance of visiting one of the photographed buildings with us, at a date that is convenient to you.

Once there, we will take all the time in the world to explain exactly what the building is, it's design principles and in what way it has shaped our views on architecture, but only as long as you share your thoughts with us. We want you to be a part of this process.

In the end, you’d be helping a small team get off to a great start in a country with a tough economic climate, bringing good architecture into the discussion on how we live and in what ways design can improve your life.

We’re so adamant on the success of this campaign, we won’t get anything if our goal isn’t reached. This is a way for us to commit seriously to a shipping date, and to treat our valued friends with the respect they deserve.

Yes, when you help us you’re no longer a customer, you’re a friend.

Will you make a difference?

Yes! A resounding, no-doubt-about-it, one hundred percent surefire yes.

Even if you can’t contribute with any money, the simple act of sharing our project with your friends means a great deal to us.

We’ve always imagined Siza Vintage to be the start of a project that would divulge the tremendous amount of artistic talent Portugal has to offer, from illustrators to architects to photographers and writers, but we have to take baby steps, and get a sure footing before thinking ahead.

Just remember that each contribution you make will be employed into creating a sustainable, profitable and collaborative platform that ensures the discussion on architecture remains on the public eye.

Payment and postage options

This campaign will accept payments through credit card or Paypal.

If you buy a perk that includes a Siza Vintage box, please remember to add €4,10 (if you live in Portugal) or €7 (if you live somewhere else in the World) to your payment to cover the packaging and shipping costs.

If you buy one of the three box packs, you'll have to add €9 (if you live in Portugal) or €16 (if you live somewhere else in the World) to your payment to cover the packaging and shipping costs.

story:
Hello, My name is Pavlo and I'm creator of OKTIE wooden accessories. How does I start doing it? All started summer 2014 when my friend professional wedding photographer (as I am) asked me to help him with wedding shots he made to complete them in short time. Groom on that pictures had an excellent wooden bow tie, I haven't seen wooden bow ties before and it's impressed me so I desired one to myself, but I couldn't find that tie anywhere so I tried to made it on my own. In a process I added some few thins from My self and create absolute new and unique bowtie (it presented in my store as OKTIE 1 ). That tie impressed few of my closest friend and I made as a gift for them some new ties. After a while people started ask me about my ties and making orders - so I decide to make a production and sale my product. All that time I was making all the wood works and my mother helped me with sewing works on bowties, so family business started.

My first workshop was located at my apartments balcony, there was no space at all but I worked there for a two years.

At the end of 2016 my girlfriend Ira decided to try herself in my workshop and she like it so she start to make woman's accessories line that I newer have time to do. Now she creating a create wood-resin jewelry. Our workshop based in a small apartment, for a first time it was on a balcony, but wither came and I moved it to the kitchen, working with wood in the small apartment creating a huge mess and noise for the neighbors so in closest future we want to move into the normal shop place.

Now we trying to collect money for that purpose. We using only Eco clean and friendly materials. We purchase our wood only from authorized sellers. We use mostly Ash and Oak wood but we like to experiment time after time. We always have a new bright ideas and willing to create something spectacular new to make you happy. 

We creating big amount of wooden bow ties for any taste, from Basic simple flat forms to gorgeous 3D realistic bow ties.   

 

Our wooden resin jewelry is a very unique and specific product. It's impossible to made two copies of something each new piece will be unique and special. After campaign end we will ask you about your size and specify what form you wish.  Each piece goes with gift wooden box that can be custom engraved for you.

 

This is us - OKTIE team and we proud of our products. We love our work and hope You will love it as well.

I have my inspiration from all that I see in this world, some forms, shapes, characters and many other things. But most of all I inspiring from working process.

– Pavlo

FOLLOW US

                    

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Where can I see more photos?

- Visit our blog page by this link or follow us on Instagram.

What size bow tie is?

- Bow tie dimensions general 12x6x0.5 cm (4.8x2.5x0.3 in). Neck part is adjustable and can fit any size from 30cm round (12 in) to 60cm (24 in).

How do I choose the size/style of my reward?

When our campaign ends, we’ll send you a form to specify your reward preferences in regards to size or color, as well as additional information on shipping destination. 

What about shipping fees?

All shipping is free for this campaign. 

Who is responsible for duties/VAT/custom charges?

Backers will be responsible for any applicable custom or duties.

What is the meaning of "OKTIE" in your name?

OKTIE - is a shorten from Oak Tie. That name was proposed by our friend designer that made our logo. Our first wooden bow ties was made from Oak wood only.

Risks & Challenges

We working over two year all over the world selling our stuff and have a high level of trust. Each shipping have it's tracking number and for now no a single order was lost.

We will start to shipping orders right after campaign ends.

Lastly, if anything unexpected happens, we will be sure to let you know right away, with full transparency in mind! You will be updated about the progress of your rewards with regular updates after the campaign.

story:
www.projectonegeometry.com

Who?

Hi, we are Dalston and Ben, creators and founders of Project One Geometry. Project One Geometry is built on the idea that everyone is enticed to one or more geometrical shapes and sizes. We strive to create products of great aesthetic appeal with practical usability in our modern world. Our aim is to keep geometries simple and elegant so that it captivates and functions sensibly.

Brief Background

We're from Singapore, a tiny but busy country. Both of us are graduates from Singapore Polytechnic, School of Architecture and the Built Environment (Ben) and School of business (Dalston). 

This is also the year of our 21st, which would mark the beginning of a new chapter in the army 3-4 months from now. Yes, we are soldiers soon-to-be who would be serving our mandatory national service for 2 years!  

Why we have started this campaign?

Well, after graduating, we had about 5 -6 months of free time before serving the army. Couldn't figure out what to do yet, we had decided to work on this wallet project which was brainstormed 3 years ago. 

The PIG Wallet is designed to be an elegant Hard Case Wallet to be held on the hands. Sure it can be kept in the pockets, but never the back pockets because sitting on an unaligned upright posture as a result of a bulk beneath your butt could lead to back ache and complications. Always empty your back pockets when seated. 

If all goes well, we would develop similar products in future, preferably 2 years later, after our respective national services end. 

What We Need & What You Will Get

  • First, we need to customize a mold for plastic injection molding at a cost of at least USD$ 10 000
  • Then, we need to ensure that at least 3500 orders are made to fulfill the minimum requirements of bulk manufacturing here in Singapore.
  • All products and quality checks are proudly done in Singapore
  • We have created an 'All-or Nothing'  fixed funding model because this project can only be truly realized by reaching the required funds. 
  • Taking into account of delivery service and packaging charges on our part, we try our best to keep the PIG Wallet affordable
  • Funds will be returned to backers if the project is unable to reach its goal.
  • At present, we offer only Gray or Black PIG Wallets. More colours will come if funds allow :).

The Impact

If this project is realized, we look forward to creating more products that are similar in nature, but differing in its respective functions. E.g Water bottles, etc..

Helping us to spread the word means the world to us. We cherish every contributor's effort! Thanks for walking with us on this journey, we will make it fruitful.


  • Holds most currencies; USD, SGD, RM, IDR.
  • Does not hold HKD. Maximum height tolerance for currency is 75mm/7.5cm


*Important: Thickness might vary (+1 to 2 mm/ +0.1 to 0.2 cm) according to what is ideal for manufacturing a tough hard case wallet. 

*Texture might differ in the event when infringing of any patent holders' copyright do occur. 

* We will do our best to produce high quality hard case wallet with quality finish as close as possible to the rendered images of the PIG wallet.

* PIG Wallets are made through plastic injection molding for a tougher and more durable hard case wallet.

story:
FlexyMate - The Story

FlexyMate is a smart "HANDS FREE" device that can be bent and twisted into any position for holding your SmartPhone, GPS, camera, torch, cup or other items.

My name is Peter Glas. I am the inventor of the FlexyMate product.

One day, after noticing how many people with Smartphones were holding them for long periods of time - watching movies and Skyping,  I thought: "wouldn't it be great if there was a device that allowed people to use their phones hands free". After discovering there was nothing on the market that could accommodate the various uses of a Smartphone I invented one myself. It is called the FlexyMate.

Having sought a company to manufacture, I ordered a pallet to see if they would sell. Needless to say they went in a very short time. One of the greatest surprises for me was the variety of uses people found for FlexyMate.  It is has been used by golfers, car drivers, smartphone users, disabled persons, mechanics, photographers, cyclists and even those wanting to take "SELFIES"

The market has been fully tested in the hands of real users including those with disabilities  The product has also sold well in retail environments such as golf shops, cycle shops and camera shops. We have also sold the products for use in cars to hold
phones and GPS devices.

FlexyMate -  Media Coverage

FlexyMate Applications

Note: FlexyMate is NOT suitable for IPads/Mini IPads or Tablets







Chloe's Story

Testimonial from Chloe's Mother - Debbie

"We met with Peter yesterday (he was kind enough to come out to our house) & found Flexymate to be the perfect solution !

Not only could it hold Chloe's cup or drink bottle but it can also hold her Ipod.

We did some brainstorming between us & found so many different ways to attach it to her chair. Along the way we also discovered it can hold her remote control in her bedroom allowing her to independently use her tv/dvd player.

The look on Chloe's face when she found she could open & close her own drink bottle was priceless. She also had a frozen coke on a trip through the drive-thru last night, this is something she hasn't been able to do & has always wanted to, she was so proud of herself !!!

Not a big deal for most people but to us and Chloe it was huge.


I can see this opening up a whole new world of capabilities & independence for Chloe not only at home but also at School.

You don't realise how many uses it actually has as we are constantly discovering new ones & have only had it for 24 hours so far !

I am also venturing out with my little gang (all four of them) to the shops today & I am excited to use the FlexyMate for my very demanding little toddler. He likes to hold mummy's iPhone but I am always afraid he will drop it. Today, I am able to attach it to the trolley or his pram & know that whilst he is being quietly entertained my precious iPhone is safe.

I have a lot of friends with kids with special needs & I know that this will help a lot of children particularly with Autism as their Mum's are constantly asking what they can do to prevent a meltdown whilst out in public. Their children are quite distracted when using an iPod but can't be trusted with one as it is usually the first thing they throw when distressed. This would be the perfect solution !

I am more than happy to speak to you further as I really do believe this product could help so many people from all different walks of life. From the young, to the disabled, to the elderly & everyone in general.

I found Peter to be incredibly dedicated & devoted to improving other people's lives.

The FlexyMate is very reasonably priced, making it very accessible to people in low income situations" - Debbie, Chloe's Mother

What We Need & What You Get

We are very excited about the potential for FlexyMate. We feel it will help so many people - everyone from those simply wanting a hands free holder for their iPod or other device, to those with special needs like Chloe. Our first consignment has now completely sold out and our initial customers loved the product. However, we are unable to fund the purchase of the necessary minimum quantities now required by the factory i.e 5000 Units.

This is why we decided to create a campaign on Indiegogo and offer attractive perks to Indiegogo subscribers. Our normal retail price is $29.99 and our perks offer substantial savings on FlexyMate.

Other Ways You Can Help

We are a  family business in Australia and we would really appreciate any help you can give us to spread the word about FlexyMate. Also, by ordering FlexyMate you are participating in the worthy donation programs mentioned in our perk offers. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to tell your friends

That’s would be very much appreciated and thank you in advance.

story:
Introducing the Magnetie - a uniquely designed neck tie that features reversible patterns, stain resistant coating and a patent-pending magnetic design that stylishly keeps your tie in place.

At Corso, we produce premium goods for busy professionals. As busy professionals ourselves, we are very mindful of producing premium products that hopefully make your life a little easier. 

Our latest project involves a simple accessory that we wear often but lacks functionality, the neck tie. We decided to give this 17th century creation a shakeup, one that could lend itself to the busy working professionals of today. 

 

Corso Products Have Been Featured In:

Timeline

We have worked with our manufacturer to assure that the Magnetie will be completed and ready to ship in time for Father's Day. 

We have some experience delivering ahead of schedule! If you check out our Mindful Notebook campaign, we delivered a full month ahead of schedule to our backers. 

Mindful Notebook Campaign - Delivered a Full Month Ahead Of Schedule

 

Proudly Partnered With:

 

We The People Store is the only chain physical stores in the world to exclusively support, promote and retail products made possible with the power of crowdfunding. They have 5 stores in Singapore and are developing stores in the USA and the rest of the world. They have spaces in the store dedicated to live-crowdfunding campaigns where creators can display their prototypes and engage with customers, turning them into backers. An online to offline initiative.

Risks and challenges

At Corso, we have an extensive background of delivering products to backers in a timely and organized manner.

This being said, there are always risks when creating a product and delivering. In the case that something outside of our control happens during the Magnetie process, we believe in being fully transparent with you about timelines and updates.

If there are ever concerns or questions. you can always reach out to us directly and we will gladly respond!
