story:
ODIO, Social Speakers

  

Odio, partage de la musique

Until now, all the audio devices have been created to make the audio for one person only. Now we offer you , through a patent pending solution, to listen with your friends to the same music.

So this is the first speaker where everybody listen the same music

  

Tous les systèmes de reproduction de la musique sont conçus pour une seule personne. Voici le premier hautparleur qui est réalisé pour que tous vos amis entendent la même chose que vous.

This has been invented by Jean-Marc to simplify listening to music. No hassle, good music.

 

In comparison, this is how our competitors are making the music for you, only one person can listen nicely to the music

  

Ce concept a été inventé par Jean-Marc pour simplifier l’écoute de la musique. Facile pour juste écouter la musique et oublier le reste. Tous ceux qui sont autour de l’ODIOCUBE entendent la même qualité de musique.

Le résultat des autres : une seule personne écoute, les autres bof…

Remember: Bad sound kills good music. And ruin your evening too....

  

Une petite photo prise en Suède: traduction libre: un mauvais son tue la bonne musique, et rends votre soirée aussi pénible.. !

 

The idea is mature and all people who listen to the prototype love it, are impressed and ready to buy. Why cannot we make it?

   Toutes les personnes qui ont écouté notre prototype fonctionnel sont enthousiastes et voudrait l’acheter… Pourquoi n’est-il pas disponible?

Next step is to produce it

  

Nous devons le produire

What is common between this Odio speaker and Dyson vacuum cleaner?

We have ask the same company to make and produce the plastic and electronics: VS-Industry, Now to realize it, we need to create molds.

Your contributions is needed for that, to be able to manufacture and send to you speakers which are simple, innovative and share your music with your friends.

You are part of the ODIO revolution, making simple sharing of good music.

  

Nous avons sélectionné V-S Industry qui produit entre autre l’aspirateur Dyson. Nous sommes prêts avec eux mais votre contribution est nécessaire pour financer les moules de fabrication. Alors nous pourrons vous envoyer les odio-cubes qui sont simples, innovants et vous permettront d’écouter la musique avec vos amis, comme jamais vous ne l’avez fait… !

Alors vous serez au cœur de la révolution Odio, faire de la musique un plaisir simple à partager.

Non Docking Speaker

As we want to make it simple, and also long lasting, we do not provide a dock but the universal 3mm stereo plug. So you can use the device with your phone (any OS) , with your PC or with your MP3 player.

This project is a revolution in using the music, in the simplicity and your contribution will help to do this project live. You can help the creator to finalize this product which is the first one that he is doing alone. He has but several project on the market for big brands like Philips (USB sound card, USB speakers, LivingColors).

The team is ready to make it happen, we are just missing you.

  

L’équipe est prête , nous n’attendons plus que vous.

Votre contribution permettra le lancement du produit. C'est un financement fixe, ce qui veut dire que si nous n'arrivons pas à l'objectif vous serez automatiquement remboursé.

Help us

If you are not able to make those perks for us, could you tweet or become fan of our facebook page? In this social speaker, the smallest contribution is wonderful for us.

   Si vous n'avez pas la possibilité d'acheter un cube, faites passer autour de vous, la moindre contribution à beaucoup d'importance pour nous

Powerfull

The odio-cube has 6 drivers and the total real power is 6 x 10W. So a total of 60W, it means that you can do a small party in your room...!

Audio

80Hz to 20kHz  : Clever arrangement of 6 speakers give you a total bandwidth. The bottom speaker is a Sub-woofer with a bass reflex tuned to give you enough bass

Clarity

We like to provide you with clear and precise sound. So you can listen any music and ear all details.

Size

The product measure less then 4 inches and it is cubic. It is always nice to see the impression of people who hear it, the quality and impression is so good for a so small cube.

  

Puissance

Ce que vous recevrez c’est un cube odio de 60W : 6x 10W de puissance réelle. Assez pour faire une soirée chez vous.

Qualité audio

Au niveau qualité audio notre produit va de 80hz a 20Khz, grâce à la disposition des haut-parleurs, et de notre algorithme de distribution spatial, vous aurez une réponse audio stéréo dans toute la pièce. Le caisson de grave intégré (en dessous) avec son Bass reflex vous donnera des basses comme jamais vous ne l’aurez dans un petit cube de 10 cm.

Dimension

Le cube fait 9 centimètre de coté, l'adaptateur se range entre les pieds, et donc il est facilement transportable. La musique partout et pour tous avec vous

In comparison, this is how our competitors are making the music for you, only one person can listen nicely to the music

 

Ce concept a été inventé par Jean-Marc pour simplifier l’écoute de la musique. Facile pour juste écouter la musique et oublier le reste. Tous ceux qui sont autour de l’ODIOCUBE entendent la même qualité de musique.
Le résultat des autres : une seule personne écoute, les autres bof…









Remember: Bad sound kills good music. And ruin your evening too....

 

Une petite photo prise en Suède: traduction libre: un mauvais son tue la bonne musique, et rends votre soirée aussi pénible.. !




 




The idea is mature and all people who listen to the prototype love it, are impressed and ready to buy. Why cannot we make it?

 
Toutes les personnes qui ont écouté notre prototype fonctionnel sont enthousiastes et voudrait l’acheter… Pourquoi n’est-il pas disponible?



Next step is to produce it

 

Nous devons le produire




What is common between this Odio speaker and Dyson vacuum cleaner?
We have ask the same company to make and produce the plastic and electronics: VS-Industry, Now to realize it, we need to create molds.
Your contributions is needed for that, to be able to manufacture and send to you speakers which are simple, innovative and share your music with your friends.
You are part of the ODIO revolution, making simple sharing of good music.

 

Nous avons sélectionné V-S Industry qui produit entre autre l’aspirateur Dyson. Nous sommes prêts avec eux mais votre contribution est nécessaire pour financer les moules de fabrication. Alors nous pourrons vous envoyer les odio-cubes qui sont simples, innovants et vous permettront d’écouter la musique avec vos amis, comme jamais vous ne l’avez fait… !
Alors vous serez au cœur de la révolution Odio, faire de la musique un plaisir simple à partager.









Non Docking Speaker




As we want to make it simple, and also long lasting, we do not provide a dock but the universal 3mm stereo plug. So you can use the device with your phone (any OS) , with your PC or with your MP3 player.
This project is a revolution in using the music, in the simplicity and your contribution will help to do this project live. You can help the creator to finalize this product which is the first one that he is doing alone. He has but several project on the market for big brands like Philips (USB sound card, USB speakers, LivingColors).


The team is ready to make it happen, we are just missing you.


 

L’équipe est prête , nous n’attendons plus que vous.
Votre contribution permettra le lancement du produit. C'est un financement fixe, ce qui veut dire que si nous n'arrivons pas à l'objectif vous serez automatiquement remboursé.




Help us




If you are not able to make those perks for us, could you tweet or become fan of our facebook page? In this social speaker, the smallest contribution is wonderful for us.

 
Si vous n'avez pas la possibilité d'acheter un cube, faites passer autour de vous, la moindre contribution à beaucoup d'importance pour nous








Powerfull
The odio-cube has 6 drivers and the total real power is 6 x 10W. So a total of 60W, it means that you can do a small party in your room...!
Audio
80Hz to 20kHz  : Clever arrangement of 6 speakers give you a total bandwidth. The bottom speaker is a Sub-woofer with a bass reflex tuned to give you enough bass
Clarity
We like to provide you with clear and precise sound. So you can listen any music and ear all details.
Size
The product measure less then 4 inches and it is cubic. It is always nice to see the impression of people who hear it, the quality and impression is so good for a so small cube.

 

Puissance
Ce que vous recevrez c’est un cube odio de 60W : 6x 10W de puissance réelle. Assez pour faire une soirée chez vous.
Qualité audio
Au niveau qualité audio notre produit va de 80hz a 20Khz, grâce à la disposition des haut-parleurs, et de notre algorithme de distribution spatial, vous aurez une réponse audio stéréo dans toute la pièce. Le caisson de grave intégré (en dessous) avec son Bass reflex vous donnera des basses comme jamais vous ne l’aurez dans un petit cube de 10 cm.
Dimension
Le cube fait 9 centimètre de coté, l'adaptateur se range entre les pieds, et donc il est facilement transportable. La musique partout et pour tous avec vous

story: -

WHO ARE WE?

Disruptive innovation meets science

We are a group of super passionate designers, engineers and thinkers who have worked on lots of amazing apps and are creating the best one yet! 
 
Based in Sydney, we are making the ultimate geosocial jobhunting tool. Show off the awesome things you've done to other professionals, investors and colleagues and find the ultimate job. 
 
Answer a video interview, learn new skills and find jobs around you on the map!

What We Need & What You Get

We want this app to disrupt the entire way you think of getting a job so we've flipped it on it's head. The job is no longer the 'prize'. YOU are the prize.

We've already designed the site and the app and have started buillding it:

  • We need a handful of cash to keep us crazy cofounders alive while we make this platform a reality
  • Help us out and get full kudos on the credits page of our site, you will have a bonafide startup to your name to tell everyone you know!
  • Even if we don't reach our goal, all funds will go towards design finalisation, development and marketing

The Impact

The contribution from you nice folk out there will make the difference between getting this up and running within 4 months and getting it up and running in a year

  • You will have the rare opportunity to be a valued early adopter, fully credited for your contribution
  • The founders have already created many websites and apps for others, now it's time to put their brilliance to the most amazing project ever

We need your help to make this happen and we will be forever greatful to each and everyone of you! YOU ROCK!

Other Ways You Can Help

So you want to help but you're wallet was lost, you're allergic to online transactions or you're saving your money for that Manhatten shaped cornflake on Ebay. Here's what you can still do:

  • Share this with your friends, family, colleagues, funny waiter, teacher, weird guy at your bus stop!
  • Go to our website at www.skoutme.co and request an invite when we go live!

 

Let's get SkoutMe off the ground!

story:
The 'Caliper Slide View' watch and circular slide rule

In 2016 the ‘Caliper View’ watch was launched on Kickstarter. The design was based on the look and feel of precision tools from the 50s and 60s. The same aesthetic theme inspires this new project: another beautifully made mechanical device. 

The lower crown controls the slide rule under the crystal

The circular slide rule allows you to multiply and divide numbers. You can also set it up as a handy conversion tool for units of measure or currencies. 

The Caliper circular steel slide rule

Every watch includes a 3 inch (8 cm) circular steel slide rule. To ensure you can make the best use of both slide rules, we're including instructions. After all, using a slide rule has become a lost art.

 

In the Media:

"Caliper has already shipped its minimalist watches after a few successful Kickstarter campaigns and I’m really pleased with this one. It’s very rare to find a unique timepiece with a unique complication." Read More>>  

- John Biggs, Tech Crunch

 

 "The movable internal bezel dominates and defines the watch, and I have to say, it is pretty cool." Read More >>

- The Time Bum

 

"Get more out of your timepiece when you wear the Caliper Slide Rule Mechanical Watch. This watch features an impressive tool: an integrated slide rule." Read More >>

- Ashley, The Gadget Flow

 

"A clever design and striking timepiece in its own right have made this a thoroughly impressive construction in our opinion here at The Coolector and for those of you that demand more than the norm from your watches, this will be right up your street." Read More>>

- Leo Davie, The Coolector

 

"They plan on shipping in February 2018 but I saw a working model complete with circular slide rule and was very impressed." Read More>>

- John Biggs, Wrist Watch Review

Using a Circular Slide Rule

With a bit of practice, you'll find it a useful tool. 

 

Example: Multiply 35 times 6  

To multiply two numbers, align the first number to the arrow at 1. Find the second number on the same ring as the arrow and read across to find the result.

Multiply 35 times 6

Example: Divide 450 by 6  

To divide a number by another number, align the two numbers to each other. Read the result across from the arrow on the ring with the number you are dividing by – the ring with the denominator.

Divide 450 by 6

Conversion factors on the rear of the steel slide rule

Inspiration

Caliper Timepieces harken back to the era of precision instrumentation - when the inner mechanics of our most important tools and devices were crafted for accuracy, dependability and longevity. Caliper Timepieces are a tribute to all that came before the planned obsolescence of the consumer age.

Technical instruments before the age of electronics

 Prototype Versions

We have developed two prototype versions of the Caliper Slide View. The A1O features a black case and black interior slide rule with a dark, semi transparent watch face and an orange second hand:

Version A1O

The Caliper Slide View D1B features black case and white interior slide rule with a dark, semi transparent watch face and an blue second hand:

Version D1B

 

Proposed Additional Versions

Based on feedback from backers and others, we are developing three more options. These three are proposed designs that may evolve slightly so we would love to hear your feedback and suggestions.  

Version B3O features a brushed stainless steel case and band. The face is a crisp opaque white face with black markers. We’ve included a set of common conversion factors on the face in a circle.

Version B3O

 Version B4O is a stainless steel watch with a white slide rule and clear glass watch face. The hands will be white with lume and the hour and minute markers will be black over clear glass.

Version B4O

Version D2B is a black case version with a white slide rule and a set of conversion factors printed on the glass face in two blocks at 3 and 9.

Version D2B

Steel circular slide rule with conversion factors on reverse side

Technical Specifications

The Caliper Slide View is a sophisticated machine. Our aim has been to develop the best watch and slide-rule that we could offer at a retail price under US$500. Kickstarter backers will be able to get it for substantially less.

We've selected the Japanese made Miyota 82S0 as the movement for the Slide View. This is a reliable and well-regarded movement. A key feature of this little machine is that it has an 'open heart' - the balance wheel and escapement are visible from the front. The movement is purely mechanical and requires no battery. It is self-winding, which means that the motion of your daily activities provides the power to keep it running. 

The case is milled from a very high quality steel know as 316L. The black surface is applied to the steel using a process called IP (ion plating) which is a form of PVD (physical vapor deposition). It's a very tough coating that is chemically bonded to the steel. The watch is designed to be water resistant up to 10 atmospheres of static pressure. 

The glass on the front - the crystal - is sapphire which is will prevent it from getting scratched. We've also included glass on the back to show the inner workings. The watch face at first appears to be a simple dark grey surface, but you soon discover that it is made of dark glass and that you can see the movement ticking away underneath.

The Caliper Slide View utilizes screw-down crowns. This feature will make the watch more secure and robust - in that the crowns will be screwed into the case while not in use. For the slide rule, it will also ensure that the scale is not accidentally moved – a crucial factor if you’ve set up your watch for currency or unit conversion.

Screw Down Crowns

Caliper Slide View Dimensions - Units are 1/100 mm

  • Case milled from 316L steel  
  • Black surface applied as ion plating (IP)
  • Sapphire scratch resistant glass  
  • Glass on back of case  
  • Semi-transparent watch face 
  • Case diameter 43mm  
  • Case thickness 13mm  
  • Water resistant to 10 ATM (100m)  
  • Screw down crowns
  • Miyota 82S0 movement  
  • Manual and self-winding  
  • 21 Jewels  
  • 21,600 vibrations per hour  
  • 40+ hours of running time

Caliper Slide View packaging

Timeline

The Caliper Slide View has been in development for over a year and we have gone through a series of three functional prototypes. We've subjected our prototypes to rigorous testing and daily use. We're ready for a full production run.

We anticipate that we will be able to deliver watches to backers in early 2018.

Risks and challenges

As this is our second watch project, we are familiar with the risks involved in launching a new watch:

The project timeline is subject to delay for various reasons: 
- The availability of movements can be an issue. We will endeavor to to reserve an adequate number of movements as soon as we know the project will be funded. 
- Manufacturing delays of other parts can be an issue. We have added contingency time to the project and we will keep all our backers updated of production progress. 
- Flaws may be discovered during our quality control phase. We will inspect and test every watch before we forward them to backers. If issues are found, there may be some delay before deficiencies are rectified.

The slide rule is a new design feature for us. To ensure that it works well, we have evolved the design through three stages of functional prototypes and subjected them to rigorous testing.

We will be offering a three year warranty on these watches. We will stock a significant quantity of spare parts and replacement units for use in supporting this warranty.

story:
SHORT SUMMARY

My name is Katty and I am a designer based in London. I have launched an accessories label called Katty Janneh. I am here on Indiegogo, to raise £7000 to take my first collection to market.

 I design and create millinery and accessories with a modern elegance, using colour and different embellishments to make my designs distinctive, bringing a sense of occasion to everyday wear. My target market is designer fashion. My previous stockist was Selfridges london in my former self as a milliner

I also offer a bespoke millinery service from my London studio. Ideal for special occasions such as Weddings, Royal Ascot, Melbourne Cup and catwalk accessories

  

WHAT I NEED…AND WHAT YOU GET!

I am going for fixed funding…all or nothing. The funding is going towards 2 main areas to bring my first accessories collection to market for the upcoming Autumn & Winter 2015/6 buying season ( yes really!...your favourite shops are already planning what they want to sell you next winter!)

Below is the budget for the money raised;

If I do not raise my target, i will be unable to complete the collection, And I would miss the season. Finances are low, there are no savings, so I would have to take a break and work full time for 6 months to a year, to generate funds to get a collection together. I would lick my wounds, learn the lessons from this pitch and find my way forward.

THE PERKS

I have a range of Perks to appeal to my target clients;


                              

The Six Week Millinery Courses

I have been teaching millinery for beginners since 2002, privately and at local FE colleges and at now defunct Make Lounge. I am based in within a lovely set of preserved Victorian work yard studios called Pullens Yards. 

The course is suitable for beginners, it will be beneficial if you do have hand sewing experience.

Using model millinery methods, you will be taught how to block, sew & trim your very own hat. (Materials will be extra approx. £15-20)

Dates & Times; 19:00 – 21:30

Wednesdays 21/01/2015 - 25/02/2015 4 places available

Wednesdays 04/03/2015- 08/04/2015 4 places available

Tuesdays 14/04/2015- 19/05/2015 4 places available

Tuesdays 23/06/2015 – 28/07/2015 4 places available

                          


The Weekend Millinery Workshops

An intensive 2-day workshop in the studio to make your own hat. Materials, lunch and tools for use will be supplied. Class is kept small for maximum tuition. Hand sewing ability is required.

Dates & times, Saturdays & Sundays 10:00 – 17:00

21st -22nd March 2015. 2 places available

4th – 5th April 2015. 2 places available

           


           'Wire'                                  'Bow tie'                                                    'Fia'  

                               


£15 Pledge; a Wool felt brooch in 3 styles and a choice of 7 colours.

    

                    'Orca'                                      'Calla'                                       'Cara'

For £30 (rrp £56) you will receive a silk flower brooch in a choice of 5 colours

                                   



£110 (rrp from £239) this is the ‘Paisley’ Newsboy Cap. In wool with a ‘ladder’ panel of twisted wool and leather strips. The above combination is camel wool tweed with olive green leather.

Other combinations;

                                                 




This is the Porkpie Hat. A hand blocked Hat with a grosgrain band, and finished with a studded bow. 

                                 

 

                                                          

‘Nancy’ Beret.

 A hand blocked wool felt beret, covered with veiling and finished off with leopard print ribbon bows.

                                         

 

For the discerning bride who wants an heirloom piece that sets off her bridal ensemble on her special day. These pieces are handmade in the studio. Set on combs with an elastic as an additional alternative. Colours available: White, Ivory, Cream.

                                                

-EMMALINE; a teardrop shape headpiece in silk crepe de chine, with a satin middle panel trimmed with pearl beads. Finished with veiling and a figure 8 bow. IVORY ONLY

                                               

- ALISA; a teardrop shape headpiece in silk satin with a handmade silk flower set within a figure 8 bow. 

                                    

PLEASE NOTE: IF YOU HAVE FINE HAIR, A COMB WILL NOT WORK FOR YOU. THE PIECE CAN BE SET ON A HAIRBAND AS AN ALTERNATIVE. YOU WILL BE ASKED TO CONFIRM YOUR PREFERENCE.

Other perks will be brought into the campaign to introduce the other accessories! 

Please do follow the campaign to keep updated.


THE IMPACT

The impact will be immediate if the target is reached. The money will enable me to move faster, get like Nike and just.do.it !

It will also validate my designs, I am introducing different accessories and this is the first showcase. To have a successful campaign will prove that there is a space in the market, and that my accessories can fill it.

As the elves decided to stay with the shoemaker, I need to have help in the studio. I have spent the last 18 months planning and restructuring. I did a business course at Doug Richard's School for Creative Startups, built a new website and have sourced production for the range of new soft caps.

Wearing all these different ‘hats’ for the business, I cannot continue to do everything alone, it slows my progress and it is not something I can maintain long term.

Being able to take on a Fashion Marketing/Promotion intern will give me the space I need to focus on producing quality.

I am experienced in Luxury Retail and Education and have worked with interns before. I can give constructive and creative direction in order to achieve the desired results. I prefer working with someone in the Studio rather than a virtual assistant as I remember how much interning benefitted me.

Your input contributes to the next part of the journey and demonstrates your belief in my ability to achieve my goals and turn Katty Janneh into a successful British accessories label.

The Charme Beret.

                                     


RISKS AND CHALLENGES

I am not new to production as previous work has been sold in Selfridges when I focused solely on millinery, so I am aware of what it entails.

Over time, with my employment experiences, I have honed my organisational & communication skills in order to negotiate and sell to reach my targets.

With over 10 years of teaching millinery, I have learnt about different learning & processing styles, and am able to adapt & react quickly to situations.

Being able to take on an assistant will be a massive help in the studio.

Negative issues that could arise include; material unavailable, late delivery, production communication. It may not be simple to resolve but, the end has to be reached so I will revisit, revise to make that happen as smoothly as possible.

I will maintain regular contact to keep everyone abreast of developments and allay any concerns.

                                                         

I am an alumni of Cockpit Arts, a social enterprise that is a creative incubator for talented designer-makers. I was based at the Deptford studios when I practiced as a milliner. My main stockists was Selfridges London. and I also did commissions for Lucia Silvers State of Grace, Marc Powell Tailoring & Matthew Williamson.

A huge thank you to my media partners showing support for my campaign.

www.modernshows.com, 

www.shade7publishing.com 

www.iamsociable.com

Other Ways You Can Help

Spreading the word about my campaign would be really helpful. I appreciate it could take a bit of time, so any time you are willing to give would be a huge boost!

You may not decide to make a pledge for your own reasons, but please believe me when I say that helping in this way is just.as.helpful.

Emailing your contacts, posting on your linkedin groups, Google +, Blogging, Pinterest,Facebook, whatever social media you like to use, the more people who know, the more interest I can generate. 

This would be an awesome thing to do and I would be extremely grateful.

Thank you for reading,

Katty

 I design and create millinery and accessories
with a modern elegance, using colour and different embellishments to make my
designs distinctive, bringing a sense of occasion to everyday wear. My target
market is designer fashion. My previous stockist was Selfridges london in my former self as a milliner
I also offer a bespoke
millinery service from my London studio. Ideal for special occasions such as
Weddings, Royal Ascot, Melbourne Cup and catwalk accessories  
WHAT
I NEED…AND WHAT YOU GET!
I am going for fixed funding…all
or nothing. The funding is going towards 2 main areas to bring my first
accessories collection to market for the upcoming Autumn & Winter 2015/6
buying season (
yes really!...your favourite shops are already planning what they want to sell
you next winter!)
Below is the budget for the
money raised;If I do not raise my target, i will be unable to complete the collection, And I
would miss the season. Finances are low, there are no savings, so I
would have to take a break and work full time for 6 months to a year, to
generate funds to get a collection together. I would lick my wounds, learn the
lessons from this pitch and find my way forward.THE PERKS
I have a range of Perks to
appeal to my target clients;                              The Six Week Millinery CoursesI have been teaching millinery for beginners since 2002, privately and at local FE colleges and at now defunct Make Lounge. I am based in within a lovely
set of preserved Victorian work yard studios called Pullens Yards. The course
is suitable for beginners, it will be beneficial if you do have hand sewing
experience.
Using model millinery methods,
you will be taught how to block, sew & trim your very own hat. (Materials will be extra
approx. £15-20)
Dates & Times; 19:00 –
21:30Wednesdays 21/01/2015 - 25/02/2015 4 places available
Wednesdays 04/03/2015-
08/04/2015 4 places available
Tuesdays 14/04/2015- 19/05/2015
4 places available
Tuesdays 23/06/2015 –
28/07/2015 4 places available
                          
The Weekend
Millinery Workshops
An intensive 2-day workshop in
the studio to make your own hat. Materials, lunch and tools for use will be
supplied. Class is kept small for maximum tuition. Hand sewing ability is
required.
Dates & times, Saturdays
& Sundays 10:00 – 17:00
21st -22nd March 2015. 2 places available
4th – 5th
April 2015. 2 places available
                      'Wire'                                  'Bow tie'                                                    'Fia'  

                               
£15 Pledge; a Wool felt brooch in 3 styles and a choice of 7 colours.

    
                    'Orca'                                      'Calla'                                       'Cara'
For £30 (rrp £56) you will receive a silk flower brooch in a choice of 5 colours

                                   



£110 (rrp from £239) this is
the ‘Paisley’ Newsboy Cap. In wool with a ‘ladder’ panel of twisted wool and
leather strips. The above combination is camel wool tweed with olive green
leather.
Other combinations;

                                                 






This is the Porkpie Hat. A hand blocked Hat with a grosgrain band, and finished with a studded bow. 

                                  

                                                          
‘Nancy’ Beret.



 A hand blocked wool felt beret, covered with
veiling and finished off with leopard print ribbon bows.

                                          
For the discerning bride who
wants an heirloom piece that sets off her bridal ensemble on her special day. These pieces are
handmade in the studio. Set on combs with an elastic as an additional
alternative. Colours available: White, Ivory, Cream.


                                                
-EMMALINE; a teardrop shape
headpiece in silk crepe de chine, with a satin middle panel trimmed with pearl
beads. Finished with veiling and a figure 8 bow. IVORY ONLY

                                               
- ALISA; a teardrop shape
headpiece in silk satin with a handmade silk flower set within a figure 8 bow. 
                                    
PLEASE NOTE: IF
YOU HAVE FINE HAIR, A COMB WILL NOT WORK FOR YOU. THE PIECE CAN BE SET ON A
HAIRBAND AS AN ALTERNATIVE. YOU WILL BE ASKED TO CONFIRM YOUR PREFERENCE.
Other perks will be brought into the campaign to introduce the other accessories! 
Please do follow the
campaign to keep updated.



THE IMPACT
The impact will be immediate if
the target is reached. The money will enable me to move
faster, get like Nike and just.do.it !
It will also validate my
designs, I am introducing different accessories and this is the first showcase.
To have a successful campaign will prove that there is a space in the market,
and that my accessories can fill it.
As the elves decided to stay
with the shoemaker, I need to have help in the studio. I have spent the last 18
months planning and restructuring. I did a business course at Doug Richard's
School for Creative Startups, built a new website and have sourced production
for the range of new soft caps.
Wearing all these different
‘hats’ for the business, I cannot continue to do everything alone, it slows my
progress and it is not something I can maintain long term. 
Being able to take on a Fashion
Marketing/Promotion intern will give me the space I need to focus on producing
quality. 
I am experienced in Luxury
Retail and Education and have worked with interns before. I can give
constructive and creative direction in order to achieve the desired results. I
prefer working with someone in the Studio rather than a virtual assistant as I
remember how much interning benefitted me.
Your input contributes to the next
part of the journey and demonstrates your belief in my ability to achieve my
goals and turn Katty Janneh into a successful British accessories label.

The Charme Beret.
                                     

RISKS
AND CHALLENGES
I am not new to production as
previous work has been sold in Selfridges when I focused solely on millinery,
so I am aware of what it entails.
Over time, with my employment
experiences, I have honed my organisational & communication skills in order
to negotiate and sell to reach my targets. 
With over 10 years of teaching
millinery, I have learnt about different learning & processing styles, and
am able to adapt & react quickly to situations.
Being able to take on an
assistant will be a massive help in the studio.
Negative issues that could
arise include; material unavailable, late delivery, production communication.
It may not be simple to resolve but, the end has to be reached so I will revisit,
revise to make that happen as smoothly as possible.
I will maintain regular contact
to keep everyone abreast of developments and allay any concerns.

                                                         
I am an alumni of Cockpit Arts, a social enterprise that is a creative incubator for talented designer-makers. I was based at the Deptford studios when I practiced as a milliner. My main stockists was Selfridges London. and I also did commissions for Lucia Silvers State of Grace, Marc Powell Tailoring & Matthew Williamson.

A huge thank you to my media partners showing support for my campaign.www.modernshows.com, 
www.shade7publishing.com 
www.iamsociable.com
Other Ways You Can Help
Spreading the word about my campaign would be really helpful. I appreciate it could take a bit of time, so any time you are willing to give would be a huge boost!
You may not decide to make a pledge for your own reasons, but please believe me when I say that helping in this way is just.as.helpful.
Emailing your contacts, posting on your linkedin groups, Google +, Blogging, Pinterest,Facebook, whatever social media you like to use, the more people who know, the more interest I can generate. 
This would be an awesome thing to do and I would be extremely grateful.
Thank you for reading,
Katty

story:
Who are we?

Few years ago, my wife and I started a profesional painting studio which delivers high quality products for those who want miniatures painted on high level.

Through out last year we started thinking about starting our own scenic bases line for wargames miniatures and after this is acomplished even our own miniatures.

We are implementing this idea for past three months and we gained dozens of happy customers around the world.

What we need and what we offer?

We offer you high quality resin scenic bases for most of the popular minaiture wargames systems. Our bases are made from high quality resin using vacuum technology.

At the moment we have dozen designs ready and this number grows by each day thanks to our hard work. To encourage you to cooperate with us, we will make competitions through out the whole campaign and the prizes will be our resin scenic bases. To be up to date on this topic and with all the news we encourage you to check out our Facebook profile. At the moment we need further funding to finish projects and to buy materials needed for further castings, hence we started this campaign.

Phases of the camaign.

A successful campaign will be divided into four stages. 

I: During this phase we will gather funds, work on new designs and will held competitions for you.

II: After succesfull first phase, we will finish the sets, which were made during this campaign, in about two to four weeks (depending on goals achieved)

III: Everyone who will support us will receive a list of ready products on which he/she can spend their miniCoins.

IV: Shipping of parcels.

We want to finish the whole process in 4 - 6 weeks starting from the end of the campaign.

What are the miniCoins and shipping:

Each backer paying appropriate amount during this campaign will receive from us wirtual currency called "miniCoins" to be used for buying bases from our offer. Shipping costs are always $ 7.00 no matter the amount of bought bases. 


                We welcome you to check our designs, bases presented here were painted to medium level to reflect their real value without any exaggerations. Bases you'll receive will be unpainted.




Stretch Goals

Stretch Goals

story:
126 Million children around the world are in school, yet lack basic literacy skills. This is due to the fact that in many parts of the world, students do not have access to their own textbooks, and if they do, they are most likely very outdated and have to be shared with many other students. 

After seeing this lack of textbooks and school supplies firsthand on a service trip to the Dominican Republic, we decided to build a brand dedicated to solving this problem. 

Pan aims to bring you comfortable and timeless clothing, while providing textbooks and school supplies to classrooms in underfunded areas of the world. 

Every time you wear a Pan shirt, know that you provided 5 children with their first textbook. Feel Good, Do Good. 

 

 Ladies, this tee will be your new best friend. Simple and timeless design makes our original tee versatile in all situations.

SUPER COMFORTABLE: Our 100% Wash Slub Cotton is light to keep you cool all summer long.

UNIQUE: You want your tee to be yours right? Our unique garment-dying process ensures that the patterns for no two tees will be the same.

DETAILS: Blind-hem, durable stitching, split hemline, and scooped neckline. We took care of the details to make sure your shirt looks great all day long, and will last for years to come.

GENUINE LEATHER PATCH: Keep it real. 

RESPONSIBLE: We want kids in school, not factories. Our manufacturers pay living wages, and are free of child labor.

RELAXED FIT: You're relaxed, your shirt should be too. 

Crafted from our unique tri-blend fabric of polyester, cotton and rayon. Our signature tee is a perfect go-to tee from the streets of Manhattan to the rolling hills of the Appalachian. 

STAY COOL: We used a Tri-blend fabric made from a unique blend of polyester, cotton and rayon to keep you cool on those summer nights. 

SUPER SOFT: Our unique fabric stretches 4 ways, and gets softer with each wash.

DETAILS: Bound self neckband and blind hem stitching. Don't worry, we took care of the details for you.  

GENUINE LEATHER PATCH: Like I said, we took care of the details. 

RESPONSIBLE: We want kids in school, not factories. Our manufacturers pay living wages, and are free of child labor.

TAILORED FIT: Wear it from the gym to the bar. Look good every step of the way. 

Classic vintage sweater is a must in every self-respecting fashion guru’s closest and we got you covered. Love your boyfriend’s sweater? Well, our women's sweater is tailor made from the same uber-soft fabric as our men's sweater. AND it is designed to form to your body.  

FABRIC: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester. 

SUPER SOFT: Our French Terry fabric makes this sweater super soft. It may just become your new favorite sweater. 

DETAILS: Split hem, v-notch, classic vintage seams, ribbing at neckline, arm cuffs and hem. Let us worry about the details. 

GENUINE LEATHER PATCH: It's still here. 

RESPONSIBLE: We want kids in school, not factories. Our manufacturers pay living wages, and are free of child labor.

CLASSIC FIT: Still a little relaxed, but designed to fit you!

 Three words. Comfort, durability, style. Do we have to say anymore?

FABRIC: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester

SUPER SOFT: Our French Terry fabric makes this sweater super soft. Trust us, it's better than your old high school football team hoodie. 

DETAILS: Split hem, v-notch, classic vintage seams, ribbing at neckline, arm cuffs and hem. Don't worry, we got the details. 

GENUINE LEATHER PATCH: Yep, still here.

RESPONSIBLE: We want kids in school, not factories. Our manufacturers pay living wages, and are free of child labor.

CLASSIC FIT: Just like you want a sweater to fit. 

  •  If all students in low-income areas left school with basic reading skills, 171 Million people would be lifted out of poverty. This would be a 12% decrease in total poverty. ¹
  • The cost of 250 million children not learning the basics is equivalent to a loss of US$129 billion per year. ²
  • If all girls had secondary education, child marriage would drop by 64%. ³

story:
ZL HYPOFLECT (to reflect from below) brings a new standard in reflective technology. ZL’s proprietary process applies high performance reflective prints onto high quality fabrics. The result - superior technical apparel for even the most extreme situations.

Hypoflect features our unique monogram print. No longer will you need to wear unexciting monochrome fluorescent reflectives to stay safe!

Hypoflect provides 360° visibility from any light source from a distance, yet remains semi transparent during the day, meaning your ZL garment is the most versatile piece of clothing you will own. Look hyper cool during the day, but be hyper safe during the night.

The durability of Hypoflect has been field tested extensively during the 2 years of prototyping, where we took our products to the most extreme of conditions, making sure they won’t let you down.

Our garments are made for the outdoors. Specifically engineered to be breathable, as well as to keep in the heat, our heat ceramic technology regulates body temperature.

Run, cycle, train, hike or commute - your jacket will keep you ventilated.

Winter Camo

Rain shouldn’t keep you from doing what you want to do. Our garments have a water repellent coating to prevent absorption of rainwater, yet also retain breathability, ensuring your comfort from start to finish.

Blue Vortex

We know that you need your jacket to be lightweight for everyday wear, yet durable enough to stand the test of time. We cannot emphasize the ZL quality enough. Our ZL jackets are built with top of the line, industry leading components and materials, whilst also being equipped with our Hypoflect material of the future.

 

Winter Camo Exo

Winter Camo

Winter Camo Exo

 

Left - Navy / Right - Black

Grey Atlas Hoodie

All of these properties are designed for the materials to work in unison with our HYPOFLECT technology to provide the ultimate premium reflective clothing. Our products are made to assist you in a variety of activities, both active and casual.

 

Our key goal when starting this journey was to create an active jacket with a fashion-forward design and emphasis on the quality of the materials and components.

We have created a brand new reflective that is levels ahead of any on the market.

Hypoflect reflects a major breakthrough in this material technology. We have made the brightest and most eye catching garments, that can be seen from over 200 feet away. Not only have we created an active jacket with modern fashion influence, we also created an extremely safe and durable reflective material that will ultimately help save lives.

In 2017 there were 5,977 pedestrians and 783 bicyclists killed in crashes with motor vehicles in the US alone. Together these vulnerable road users account for a growing share of total US traffic fatalities: in 2017 pedestrians and cyclists accounted for 18.2 percent of traffic fatalities (an increase of 32% over the 10 year period prior).

Lighting conditions are a major factor - for example three quarters of pedestrian fatalities in the US occur in dark conditions.

This is one of the major reasons why we decided to start this project. With the steady growth in population, the roads are only getting more congested. We hope that our materials can keep our customers safe, making our journey worthwhile.

 

For the past 80+ years, reflective design hasn't seen any change. Most of you may be familiar with 3M reflective. You may have seen it on everything from fashion wear to construction jackets, and everything in between. It was first created in 1937 and since then, it hasn't been innovated. This type of reflective is mass produced and used by just about every company when incorporating reflectives. 3M had the first breakthrough in reflective technology, ZL has what would be considered the second real breakthrough. We have have created a brand new reflective that hasn't been done or seen until now.

 

 We are here to change that. As a London-based company, we inspire to set the bar even higher within modern fashion while also applying an advanced twist. We take everything a few steps further. You may be familiar with us from our previous Kickstarter - our Z-Liner High Performance Honeycomb insoles. We ended our campaign over 1000% funded and have been rolling ever since! We are a team that make design and quality our utmost importance. If it’s ZL, expect advanced, expect premium.

 In 2014 we started developing our newest in-house technology, “Hypoflect” (to reflect from under). It was a project aimed at creating a new type of medium that could be used on any garment or material of our choice. We wanted to create the future of reflectives. Until now, there’s a reason why previous reflectives are a one-piece, one color material.

 It is difficult to apply both patterns and ink onto a material and have them both be transparent at the same time. It was impossible until we made the breakthrough in 2018. After 4 years of testing and prototyping, and many roadblocks along the way, we finally cracked the case. Nearly 5 years from the start of our journey, we are finally ready for our global release. We’re excited - and we hope you are too! Please join us on our journey...

 

Risks and challenges

We launched our first crowdfunding campaign 11 months ago and with the support of the crowdfunding community, we were able to make it a roaring success! We are no longer crowdfunding newbies and have thoroughly enjoyed and learned so much from our first campaign, from the manufacturing over 3000 individual items to fulfillment to over 50 countries with our Z-Liner Insoles and we truly learned a lot! Our team has been working closely with our manufacturing partners and logistics companies, to ensure we get your new ZL garments to you as soon as possible without any delays. We work side by side with our manufacturing partners and oversee the use of our proprietary technology and quality control in the production of our jackets. We do not envisage any delays or hiccups. With that being said, we do realize things don't always go as planned. If we do foresee the unlikely scenario of delays to your pledges, we promise to communicate with transparency and work day and night to ensure your expectations are met and disruptions are reduced to a minimum!

We are no longer crowdfunding newbies and have thoroughly enjoyed and learned so much from our first campaign, from the manufacturing over 3000 individual items to fulfillment to over 50 countries with our Z-Liner Insoles and we truly learned a lot! Our team has been working closely with our manufacturing partners and logistics companies, to ensure we get your new ZL garments to you as soon as possible without any delays. We work side by side with our manufacturing partners and oversee the use of our proprietary technology and quality control in the production of our jackets. We do not envisage any delays or hiccups. With that being said, we do realize things don't always go as planned. If we do foresee the unlikely scenario of delays to your pledges, we promise to communicate with transparency and work day and night to ensure your expectations are met and disruptions are reduced to a minimum!

story:
A couple AMAZING Reviews, and ACTUAL accounts of inWatch Z:

http://www.getdatgadget.com/inwatch-z-smartwatch-wants-replace-smartphone/

Senior XDA Developer and Genius "Lokifish Marz" said this:

"inWatch Z is still the best standalone smartwatch I played with so far. More up to date than the Z1 Rock, a better fit on the wrist than the Pine, superior construction to the EC309, lighter and slimmer and better battery life than the TrueSmart, better design than the ZGPAX S5."   June 2014

Soulja Boy and his NEW inWatch Z!

Baron Davis and his NEW inWatch Z!

Mack Wilds and his NEW inWatch Z!


Some call it a smart watch. We call it a revolution.  

inWatch Z combines the luxury and design of an elegant watch with the brilliant technology of a high end smart phone.  The result is nothing less than incredible. Your true all in one device is finally here.  Meet Z!

Click here to jump to the specs!

Let's Talk About Hardware
UI, Software and Platform
About inWatch
Key Specifications & Features
Perks Explored
Why Z?
InWatch Z in Action
Meet the Team
InWatch Z and the Competition

About Z

Wouldn’t it be nice if your watch could do more? What if it could do way more? The one device movement is here and it is ﬁnally possible to stay connected without a phone in your pocket or purse. inWatch Z is a sleek, stylish smart watch but has a full-featured smart phone tucked inside as well. An HD camera, bone conductivity speaker and 1.2 GHz dual-core A7 processor make this device a true all-in-one wearable. While it doesn't need a phone to be smart, Z pairs perfectly with one and can also function as a companion device. Z is “tech meets fashion” without the usual compromises.   

Let's Talk Hardware


• We started by deciding what the ideal proportion of the display would be in order to deliver high functionality but avoid a cumbersome form factor. We decided on a 240X240 semi-transparent TFT. It adjusts screen luminance automatically base on the ambient light, making Z easily viewable in full sunlight. Day or night, inWatch Z has your back.

• The 28nanometer ARM Cortex A7 dual core 1.2GHz processor provides the computing power for Z. Nanometer technology connects circuits at a microscopic level providing 50% higher speed, 50% reduced energy consumption when switching on & off, a technical framework for power saving and the perfect system optimization. Performance and power dissipation in a smaller package allows more standby time so your watch will be running when you need it.

• inWatch Z supports Multi network 3G coverage as well as WIFI, Bluetooth and GPS. Control your stereo or jump online at the coffee shop without using minutes. Put any SIM card in the watch to activate YOUR network. No new contract, no new expense. 

• 720p HD video recording capabilities allow you to create true and lasting video. The 5MP camera also takes crisp stills with the tap of a finger. Record every remarkable moment to share with your family and friends.

• Z has performance 3D hardware graphic processing (MALI-400MP) for GPU visualization. It stores and protect the graphic resources which maximize the function of CPU and GPU to ensure the speed of web surfing and application performance stays as high as possible.

• MiraVision is the most advanced image display technology available for mobile devices. Its software and hardware offers the same degree of clarity and sharpness as DTV image processing on a small screen. Power efficiency has been addressed and boosted through the Ambient-Light Adaptive Luma (AAL) technology, which intelligently adjusts the panel backlight in response to the ambient light intensity and the displayed contents to simultaneously optimize battery life and viewing experience.

• The bone conduction system is your “invisible speaker”. It lets you hear the phone clearly even in a noisy environment by touching the speaker to your temple. You can also turn almost any surface into a speaker by just pressing it against the watch clasp. 

• inWatch Z includes a nine axis sensor, gravity, terrestrial magnetism and gyroscopic sensor all in one. It collects pulse, pedometer and calories burned data so you can develop good habits and keep a record for healthier living.Z can display the weather, temperature, elevation and other area data in real-time, putting environment data and your performance info at your fingertips.

• Z has a width of 1.5", a height of 2.3" and a thinness of just .5"


UI, Software and Platform


The user interface for inWatch Z is designed around Google’s recently announced Android Wear platform. This will allow users to query online services and control other Android-powered devices using simple voice commands. It also improves Z’s ﬁtness tracking abilities and enhances how that collected data is shown to the user. Z comes packed with great software but can also download apps from the Google Play store so you can add all your favorites right to your wrist. To complete the device, inWatch has included a sapphire crystal face and ceramic back cover, features usually only seen in luxury watches. They protect Z and compliment the durable aluminum body nicely. It is scratch, impact and splash resistant, making it a clear choice for those looking to join the one device movement.


About

inWatch is a fashion/tech company with the right direction and a lot of momentum. The day Neo Wang formed inWatch in 2012 was the start of a long-term commitment to smart watch development as well as joint problem solving within the wearable tech ecosystem.  As of 2014, the company is popular throughout Asia, Neo is a regular speaker at wearable tech conferences and inWatch has been presented with the honor of Best Chinese Annual Hardware Product in the 3rd Annual ChinaBang Awards of 2013.  

We now bring this quality, innovation and elegance to the US market with the launch of inWatch USA and the inWatch Z!

We've built a great team focused on providing a voice for inWatch and creating an opportunity to share our product and philosophy with the rest of the world. This company is dedicated to changing the way people see the phrase “Made in China”. Our products are proudly crafted in Shenzhen and our international team will always be available to answer your questions, hear your suggestions and ensure your experience with inWatch Z is a positive one.


Key

Specifications & Features:

-Width = 1.5" Height =2.3" Thinness = .5"

-ARM Cortex A7 Dual Core Processor @1.2GHz

-Sapphire Crystal Face

-5 MP Camera & 720 HD Video Capture

-Customized Androidwear UI

-Bone Conductivity Speaker

-Ceramic Back Cover

-1GB Ram/4GB Storage Capacity

-Cloud Services



Gallery And Info

Below are informative pictures and information about inWatch Z.  We will add to this section on a regular basis.  Continue to check back for even more exciting info on Z.

MiraVision: This advanced image display technology offers the same degree of clarity and sharpness as DTV image processing on a small screen with amazing image quality. The crystal clarity is unlike anything you have experienced in a smart watch.  Below is a picture of Z(Right), and the other guys(Left) out in the Sun.  As you can see, the MiraVision technology makes the Z a clear winner in terms of visibility.

The Bundle: Below is a picture of your new Z with matching Bluetooth headset.  Z will also come with Charging/USB Cable, and Power Clasp.

Each Z watch purchased will have a personalized message engraved on the ceramic back cover.  From anniversary info to business names, imagine all of the cool things that your Z will say. 

My cat Blue prefers black on black.  She's got this look she is going for you see...
Your contributions go towards the materials for Z, a customized Android Wear UI, beta testing and a western version of the cloud services. Yet, there is so much more.  By backing our campaign, you are not just funding this one project.  inWatch Z stands in defiance of the companion devices that have dominated the wearables market.  Supporting its development supports the one device movement and takes a step towards technology better complimenting our lives.

A Photo with Z's 5MP Shooter!


All About The Perks

Perks! The greatest thing about our Perks is that they not only get you directly in the loop about Z, they get you involved in changing the future of wearable technology.  We designed our perks with many contribution amounts to involve everyone, from just $1 & up it is easy to play a roll in the success of Z.  Our bundles are created to give more & save more, the larger the bundle, the bigger the savings.  With Early Bird Specials, you can be rewarded by snagging a Z before they are sold in retail, and at a special price.  We will continue to update our perks as the campaign continues, so check back often to explore the deals.


Why Z?  Why Now?

With the release of Z, we hope to close the book on the companion device chapter.  The one device movement has arrived and ushers in a era of true stand alone smart watches.  inWatch is dedicated to being a catalyst in this movement.  We will use this campaign as a forum to have a discussion with wearables users everywhere.  As a small, agile company we are uniquely suited to adapt to suggested change.  Please join our conversation and let your voice be heard.  One never knows where that next great idea will come from. 


inWatch Z In Action

We want you to see what you are getting and to be familiar & comfortable with your new device.  Now is your chance to see inWatch Z in action, real footage, real tasks, right now.  Please let us know if there is anything you would like to see Z do and we will do our best to show it to you right here! We will be adding to this section throughout the campaign so check back to see more of what Z can do.

inWatch Z Menu/Notifications Bar!

inWatch Z Home Screen Customization!

inWatch Z Bone Conductivity Speaker!
 inWatch Z Playing Music!

inWatchZ Watching Movies!

inWatch Z LIVE Video Shoot!

All of the inWatch Z's Clock Faces W/more to come!


MiraVision on inWatch Z vs the others.  Apples to Apples!


Sending an Email from inWatch Z!


inWatch Z Surfing the web!


inWatch Z taking Pictures and Video!


Scratch Test of the Sapphire Crystal Face.  Z Passes!


Meet The Team


Neo Wang

Founder, CEO of inWatch. 

Serial entrepreneur Neo Wang is the original founder and CEO of inWatch Tech Ltd.  He was born into an architecture family, but is not following in his fathers foot steps by becoming a architect.  After returning form University in Germany, he began a ten year stint working in the Fashion & Electronics industry seeking out his own passions.  During his 6 years studying in Germany, Neo was greatly influenced by his fellow peers in the German Culture.  High spirits and rigorous approach were just a couple of the characteristics Neo took with him.  After several years of diligence, Neo's success story is now here.

Simon Lin

Co-founder, CTO of inWatch. 

Simon has been working for Ruili group of China; Former product manager of Cosun Group, former general manager of Leasin Tech Mobile Phone division and former GM of Chenxinying Tech.  His vast experience brings unique insight and great achievement in hardware development. He is responsible for the overall management of the technical department, and technical communication with suppliers and partners of inWatch.

Jack Pan

Vice President of R&D for inWatch. 

Jack achieved his Masters Degree of intelligent control from Guangxi University of Science and Technology.  He has been working as an R&D Engineer and Product Director for the Southern Navigation institute of China.  As the vice president of R&D for inWatch, he’s responsible for the management of every project.

Xiang Lu

Vice President of Business Relations for inWatch.

Lu had been working in Internet industry for more than 10years.  As a serial entrepreneur, he has participated in many Entrepreneurship programs with Neo. Now he takes charge of managing the clients and business partners of inWatch.

Simon Wang

Software VP of inWatch.  Simon Wang has more than 10 years experience in IT and the Internet industry.  His career started with Neusoft where he was responsible for the R&D of Vehicle Mounted Systems and Exchange Boards. Then he worked for Tencent, where he was responsible for product development and project management of the QQ browser project.  Now Simon Wang is responsible for the Software product design and Planning in inWatch. 

Lucius Luo

Marketing VP of inWatch.  Lucius has more than 14 years experience in the Internet marketing industry.  He has been working for famous enterprises such as Sohu and Alibaba in China.  He’s experienced in Marketing and Management and is now responsible for marketing promotion and brand marketing in inWatch. 

Terry Dong

Technology VP of inWatch - Leader of Beijing branch.  Terry had been working for Microsoft, Dangdan and China online.  He has more than 9 years R&D and Management experience, he is also able to design large-scale Internet system architectures. Now he is responsible for the management of technology research department of inWatch.

ShumaoXie

Director of Industry & Design for inWatch.  As a -Red Dot Design- award winner, Shumao Xie has a brilliant eye for style. He’d been involved in organizing and has participated in industrial design exhibitions such as Foshan-Shunde exhibition, Shenzhen Cultural Expo and Dalian Design exhibition.  Now he is responsible for the management of industry design at inWatch.

The rest of the team - SZ & BJ:


inWatch Z And The Competition


There Are So Many Ways You Can Help

Make sure to stay informed about our campaign, make sure to help us spread the word.  The contributions help greatly and word of mouth helps as well!  Tell your hundreds of FB friends to tell their hundreds of FB friends.  Tweet your thousands, and re-tweet again.  Use the Indiegogo share button to share what you know.  Inwatch Z is coming and not only is it an extremely important product to back, it is a fun one too.  From all of us at inWatch to all of you that are backing inWatch, Thank you from the bottom of our hearts.

-inWatch

story: Da wir einen fixen Zielbetrag gewählt haben, besteht für dich absolut kein Risiko!
story_txt: Da wir einen fixen Zielbetrag gewählt haben, besteht für dich absolut kein Risiko!

story:
Hi Indiegogo,

We'll keep this simple. We're Flux, a new smartwatch company here to change the game. We're tired of the smartwatches on the market today that aim to imitate our smartphones rather than compliment their functionality, quickly becoming overly complicated and lacking all style.

So, we came together to create the perfect modern smartwatch. A smartwatch that focused on simplifying our unique modern lifestyles, while still looking incredible.

Now we are finally proud to introduce the Flux Luxury Smartwatch.

Everything a smartwatch should be, and nothing it shouldn’t.

STYLE

We didn’t want the Flux to look like another boring smart watch, we wanted it to have style. So we gave it the looks of a vintage luxury watch with real functional analogue watch hands.

We also wanted the Flux to be customizable, so we give the buyer the option of three different watch case colors as well as three different strap styles to choose from. All watch straps have a quick release function, allowing you to switch between watch straps in seconds, and even add your own.

Perhaps most importantly, we wanted the Flux to be tough. We started by giving the Flux a rugged brushed stainless-steel case. Next, we replaced the classic glass watch face with scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Finally, we sealed the Flux, making it IP67 water resistant.

Next, we focused on giving the flux simple smart functionality

SMART FUNCTIONALITY

We focused on adding smart functionality that simplifies and enhances our modern lifestyles.So we started by giving the Flux a groundbreakingly vibrant E-ink display under the watch hands.

Our e-ink technology is extremely power efficient, lasting 30 days in full use off a single charge.  

Next, we focused on the basis of every smartwatch: notifications. Again, we kept it simple. The Flux vibrates and displays unique E-ink icons for calls, texts, emails, alarms, and calendar events.

The Flux is a perfect combination of simple smart watch functionality and style, but we weren’t done.

We wanted the Flux to fit YOUR unique modern lifestyle. So we broke it down and gave the Flux 4 modes to compliment your modern life.

01. Business

We added Business mode to help you stay organized and on-time. In business mode the Flux syncs with your smartphone calendar to display the times off upcoming events or appointments directly on the watch face.

02. Sports

We added sports mode to help you stay healthy and crush your fitness goals. Set your daily step goal in the flux app and see your progress on the watch face as you move throughout the day. We also added a heart rate monitor to the Flux allowing the user to get an accurate reading with just the click of a button.

03. Casual Mode

We wanted to add a mode that was all about style, so we created casual mode. Displaying all notifications, counting seconds on the watch face, and digitally displaying the date or time, casual mode gives the Flux a minimal modern stylish design.

04. Power Saving

When you want to get away from it all, we created power saving mode. Power saving mode turns off all smart notifications, transforming the watch into an elegant analogue timepiece, and extending the battery life to 6 months.

Price

We wanted to the Flux to be affordable, so we cut out the middle man and maximized our production efficiency to bring the Flux to you for just $100, a quarter of the price of other leading smartwatches on the market.

 

The Flux is the perfect everyday smartwatch.

Thank you, Indiegogo, for helping us bring our watch to the market!

All watch straps have a quick release function, allowing you to switch between watch straps in seconds, and even add your own.Perhaps most importantly, we wanted the Flux to be tough. We started by giving the Flux a rugged brushed stainless-steel case. Next, we replaced the classic glass watch face with scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Finally, we sealed the Flux, making it IP67 water resistant.Next, we focused on giving the flux simple smart functionalitySMART FUNCTIONALITYWe focused on adding smart functionality that simplifies and enhances our modern lifestyles.So we started by giving the Flux a groundbreakingly vibrant E-ink display under the watch hands.Our e-ink technology is extremely power efficient, lasting 30 days in full use off a single charge.  Next, we focused on the basis of every smartwatch: notifications. Again, we kept it simple. The Flux vibrates and displays unique E-ink icons for calls, texts, emails, alarms, and calendar events.The Flux is a perfect combination of simple smart watch functionality and style, but we weren’t done.We wanted the Flux to fit YOUR unique modern lifestyle. So we broke it down and gave the Flux 4 modes to compliment your modern life.01. BusinessWe added Business mode to help you stay organized and on-time. In business mode the Flux syncs with your smartphone calendar to display the times off upcoming events or appointments directly on the watch face.02. SportsWe added sports mode to help you stay healthy and crush your fitness goals. Set your daily step goal in the flux app and see your progress on the watch face as you move throughout the day.  We also added a heart rate monitor to the Flux allowing the user to get an accurate reading with just the click of a button.03. Casual ModeWe wanted to add a mode that was all about style, so we created casual mode. Displaying all notifications, counting seconds on the watch face, and digitally displaying the date or time, casual mode gives the Flux a minimal modern stylish design.04. Power SavingWhen you want to get away from it all, we created power saving mode. Power saving mode turns off all smart notifications, transforming the watch into an elegant analogue timepiece, and extending the battery life to 6 months.PriceWe wanted to the Flux to be affordable, so we cut out the middle man and maximized our production efficiency to bring the Flux to you for just $100, a quarter of the price of other leading smartwatches on the market. The Flux is the perfect everyday smartwatch.Thank you, Indiegogo, for helping us bring our watch to the market!

story:
Who talks about us...





Romeow’s Story

We all would like to spend more time with our pets but our daily business doesn't always allow us this time.

But if there are moments in which our presence is indispensible, in others  we can fortunately use technology to be there for our furry friends.

This is also my story, explained Alessandro, Romeow’s creator. 

“Often I am forced to be away for a couple of days for work commitments. Until today the choice was either to leave my cat in a boarding house, from which he would always return stressed, or to leave him at home alone, but with the worry that the automatic food dispenser would not work or that Holly, my cat, would not eat.

I knew that my worry  was shared by the most pet owners, that's why the idea of Romeow, in order to improve our frenetic life and our pet life”.


The System

Romeow is the first system, made in Italy, made to remotely manage the feeding of our pets.

Thanks it you and your pet will feel in constant contact each other.


Our Romeow is composed of a dispenser, a smartphone app and 2 bowls included.  

The dispenser, connected to your home WIFI, has inside a water and a dry food storage, a web cam and a speaker system.  


Through its intuitive application, your are able to control and program Romeow via smartphone or tablet.

With just two click, you can decide when and how much to refill your pet’s bowls: just right now or for the next days.


How It Works

Let’s see our pet!

Romeow allows you to see and check out your pet and its bowls. With its grand angle eye, the integrated webcam, it’s possible to see at any moment if the bowls are full or they have been emptied and therefore if your beloved pet has been eating.

The possibility to see how your pet eats, is the first way to understand if it is healthy and it’s an easy way to delete our anxiety when we are out of home.


Let’s schedule the diet!

The app is designed to easily control and set your Romeow.

If an unexpected meeting at work, keep us longer in the office, the app allows us fill the bowls in few seconds from the meeting room without your boss noticing.

But of course, you can also plan in advance. Just setting in the calendar app, when the food and water should be dispensed, Romeow will take care of it and you will be calm and you’ll be also free to program a weekend off.

Let’s talk with it!

Romeow has a voice, your voice! We have add a speaker system to the dispenser to let you call your pet and him hear the owner’s voice when the meal is served.

Trough your smartphone mic you can send an instant vocal message to the Romeow or you can set it as default message when Romeow refill the dry food bowls.

Your furry friend, maybe, will not answer you but it'd feel you closer when it’s alone at home.


The Device Specs


CAPACITY

Romeow has a food capacity of 1,8 kilos, and a water capacity of 2,5 litres. The internal containers are made from food-grade plastic to preserve the quality of the food and the water for a long.

THE BOWLS

The bowls are set in a groove so that they remain in the correct position for refilling and resisting the impetuosity of your little beast when they are hungry. The bowls and the dispensers are completely removable and washable.

ELECTRONIC PART

The computer and electronics of the device are protected in a compartment that is inaccessible to your furry friend.

ITALIAN DESIGN

The minimalist profile and retro style of ROMEOW make it an everyday object that can fit into the most diverse environments with an unmistakable elegance.



Each piece comes assembled by technicians and artisans, making every ROMEOW unique, just like your four-legged friend.

The design is discreet, clean, and refined, just like the traditional Italian design of the 50's and 60's that became famous around the world.

(You can choose your finishes among different colors and woods. OPT)


Easy set up


Fund Romeow Project


Additional Elements 



Referral Program

Earn 1 FREE Romeow when you refer 5 Romeow purchases!

(Limited to earning 5 FREE Romeow.)

How it works:

  1. Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here.
  2. Then, visit this page on Indiegogo and look below the main video to share and copy your unique URL.
  3. Copy your unique URL link to post around the Internet and save it for later by clicking the "Link" icon or begin sharing on social media by simply clicking the "Facebook" or "Twitter" buttons with your URL pre-loaded.
  4. When you click on any share tool on the campaign page, then you’ll automatically get a post or tweet that’s ready-to-go with your personal URL.

How to track your results:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  3. Select the “My Profile” option.
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
  5. Count the number of funders.

Team


Timing


Technical Details

visit our page on www.romeow.net

story:
Live stream of 2014 european championship finals in frankfurt

EUF and the tournament directors Robert Pesch and Heiko Karpowski want to livestream the eucf in frankfurt. Because we think that costs should not be covered by the players but by the spectators, we are organizing a crowdfunding.

To cover the final day with 3 finals we need to collect 2000 Euro.

To cover saturday and the final day with 3 finals we need to collect 4000 Euro.

Coverage will be done by frisbeesport.playo.tv,  who covered the last two eucf as well with 5 cameras and a native speaking and ultimate experieced commentator.


Spend 3 Euro as a spectator and you will get a free ticket for the hole event. (worth 5 Euro)

Spend 40 Euro as a team and you will get 20 free tickets for the hole event.

Spend 300 Euro as a company and you will get two 20sec. commercialspots. at each covered game (you have to produce the spots).

story:
If so, then we've got the perfect accessory!

Say goodbye to stress-sweating over dips with our "GameStonk" tieback headbands.

 

These bad boys are made with high-quality milk fibre and are designed to keep apes and ants looking like ten million bucks. No matter how smooth or wrinkled your brain, each headband is 2" x 43" and weighs approx. 1.4 oz (or 6cm x 110cm and 40g for Europoors), ensuring a perfect fit for everyone.

PLEASE NOTE!! Wearing a GameStonk headband does NOT make you a cat.

In anticipation of your support, we're already drafting some amazing stretch goal items for you.

From memes to original artwork, we want to help you express YOUR love for the stock with a full line of GameStonk gear!

Stickers are 10cm and shirt designs are sized at A3.

Our original designs will be available on both stickers and t-shirts, allowing you to choose how you tell hedge funds and Wall Street what you think of them!

 

 

Once you've picked your standard pledge on the sidebar and proceed with your order, you'll be able to add on any of our unlocked designs and merch.

Please note that due to limitations on Indiegogo, you can only pick each add-on once. We have included multiple add-ons for different quantities of the same items, so please order carefully!

 

Before ordering one of our designs, check out the sizing chart below to ensure your shirt will fit perfectly.

Caution: Gravitational differences on the moon may also affect the fit of your shirt.

 

Who We Are

This campaign is being run by Sugar Cube Productions, a UK-based promotional product company. The pandemic has hit the company hard, so I’ve decided to focus on creating products for a community that I cherish.

I’ve been a part of the subredditWallStreetsBetsNew since January and am a moderator for their Discord. Since joining, I’ve bonded with incredible members of the community and have learned more about the financial market in the last four months than I have over the past five years!

Being invested in the community and the stock, I began noticing comments about the iconic DFV headband and how people wished they could own something similar yet more original. The one wrinkle in my brain went to work and, with the help of some incredible apes, we came up with this line of meme stock gear!

Why Crowdfunding?

Selling a product costs money, time, and space. By crowdfunding, we can create the exact amount that's demanded. This ensures that we won't run out of stock or have any leftover product, all while minimizing shipping costs by supplying everything in one order.

When these factors are in place, we can offer you a high-quality product at a lower price!

This is an ALL OR NOTHING campaign.  If we don't hit the goal then you won’t be charged for your order, but we also won't be able to afford to send you this iconic gear!

Sourcing + Order Fulfillment

We utilize factories in both China and the United Kingdom to provide our items, depending on quantities and complexities. We have worked with all of our suppliers before, and know that they provide high-quality items. However, due to the pandemic and the uncertain geopolitical climate, production and shipping to our warehouse might take longer than anticipated.

International orders may be subjected to import duties. There are new EU VAT laws on the way, and we're not sure how they'll affect things. We will try to minimize any additional import costs, but you will be responsible for any additional fees.

Help Spread The Word

If you like the campaign and want to help make it a reality then please help out by sharing the link to fellow apes on social media. You can find some files to help you here https://www.dropbox.com/sh/rwvp1y4kfx4b44t/AACzQ8eKCNTsFZVVwEqqZt3Pa

 

Brain-Wrinkling Resources

Join our favourite SubReddits:

https://www.reddit.com/r/Wallstreetbetsnew

https://www.reddit.com/r/Superstonk/

Join Us On Discord:
https://discord.com/invite/wallstreetbetsnew

Watch Us on Twitch:
https://www.twitch.tv/wallstreetbetsnew

 

Have an idea you'd like to see?

Just contact user 'Pinch of Salt' on the WSBN Discord, or contact our executive designer directly on Reddit.
