https://www.reddit.com/r/Wallstreetbetsnewhttps://www.reddit.com/r/Superstonk/Join Us On Discord:https://discord.com/invite/wallstreetbetsnewWatch Us on Twitch:https://www.twitch.tv/wallstreetbetsnew Have an idea you'd like to see?Just contact user 'Pinch of Salt' on the WSBN Discord, or contact our executive designer directly on Reddit.

story:
Our detailed designs are inspired from the ancient architecture and magical energy of the historic city of Geneva, Switzerland. The charm and history of this fabulous city lead us to create our glamorous yet classical watch designs.

 

Our watches are assembled and tested in Geneva, Switzerland under the close supervision of local watchmakers and swiss designers. This allowed us to create watches of impeccable quality with fabulous designs at an excellent price.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

To ensure the highest quality product, our team found a way to offer Swiss designed watches with the same premium materials and quality guarantee as other luxurious brands - but at a far more affordable price.

                                

 

 

 

 

                                                    THE PERKS : 

 

 

                     

 

 

 

QUALITY AND SPECIFICATIONS : 

Darkshield 39 mm

size:40 mm 

Swiss Ronda Movement

quartz H/M/S date 

case: CERAMIC 

caseback: engraved 

glass: sapphire

Nato strap buckle BLACKOUT 

water proof ft328 / 100m / 10 Atm 

2 year warranty 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
     
 

 
 
If you decide to purchase more then one of our watches, we will send you our famous Black Box where you can fit up to four different models. Here is an example of watch choices :
 
 
 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

    

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We are beginners on Kickstarter, but, along with our manufacturers, we have years of experience in the industry! We are aware our project is complex and that there are always unforeseen issues, but we have anticipated and planned for potential risks and have built a rock-solid production and delivery plan.

Our production is quite advanced and you can be very confident about our capacity to provide high-quality products on time. We spent over 2 years designing, developing, and receiving finalized samples.

We have very skillful and professional suppliers and do not anticipate delays to our timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterwards.

Thanks for all the support! We are excited to take this next step with you, the Kickstarter community!

story:
KARACUS BRAND AS SEEN ON TV!

 KARACUS IS THE LATEST HOT TRENDING BRAND IN FASHION WEARABLES AND SMART DEVICES WITH MANY HAPPY CUSTOMERS WORLDWIDE BRINGING FORTH MOST EXCITING TECH INNOVATIONS WITH SUPERIOR CREATIVITY DESIGN AND FUNCTIONS AS WE GENERATE NEW TRENDS 

 

 

OVERVIEW

WHY JUST CHANGE STRAPS WHEN YOU CAN CHANGE ENTIRE SMART WATCH DESIGN!

For some years wearables have been playing a key role in our lives in providing useful phone notification and fitness tracking data on our wrist. Though smart watches have become a trend, the growth rate is not what was initially projected to be since it all began. The major drawback issue with adaptability to an electronic smart watch as per the user has always been its form factor and aesthetics. To overcome this issue the concept of strap changing came into play which almost all brands followed. Though if we view a smart watch, the majority 70% of the onlookers vision falls on the bezel and not the strap, hence if we think about it, it does not really solve the problem. A watch is an important element of fashion and function in our daily lives. On different occasions, people wear different styles. If a suitable watch is needed for every occasion, it will be an economic burden for consumers and waste of resources. The proposed application of replaceable chassis lets the user have the ability to change not only the strap but also the bezel design in its entirety as one unit in terms of aesthetic, material, structural and mechanical design thereby completely changing its appearance. In terms of economic stand point it also lets the user switch to a completely new design watch reducing the cost to half as compared to purchasing a completely new design watch product.

THE AMALGAM OF MODERNITY, TECHNOLOGY AND STYLE! 

Besides being the world's first chassis switchable smart watch, the Karacus Switch is a featured packed smart watch latest in technology with many smart functions for the user providing various phone notifications and fitness tracking data on your wrist.

 

 

 

THIS IS JUST THE BEGINNING AS WE PLAN TO KEEP PRODUCING MANY AND WHOLE NEW COLLECTION OF EXQUISITE CHASSIS DESIGNS TO SWITCH YOUR STYLE! A REVOLUTION HAS BEGUN JOIN THE MOVEMENT!

 

SOME CAD BEZEL DESIGNS CURRENTLY IN R&D FOR NEXT LINE OF CHASSIS PLANNING TO UTILIZE MATERIALS SUCH AS WOODEN, CERAMIC, TITANIUM, LEATHER AND MANY MORE! 

 

HOW IT WORKS

Part A of the product is the universal electronic module. It is made of matte finish metallic casing enclosing all electronic components of the smart watch. Part B are the various design chassis which are the bezel attached to straps as a single unit in its entirety. The universal module is taken and inserted into the chassis from the bottom end and pushed in upwards motion until its fixed. The inner walls of the chassis bezel consists of silicone strip padding. Due to the interference between the matte finish of the universal module and the silicone strip, compression and frictional forces come into play. Due to these forces the universal module is securely fastened and does not fall down and neither can it fall outwards due to the bezel material blockage at the top end. The universal module can be easily removed from the chassis by pressing the screen from the top side thereby ensuring easy insertion and extraction when changing the chassis.

 

 

EASILY INSERT ELECTRONIC MODULE INTO CHASSIS

 

EASILY EXTRACT ELECTRONIC MODULE TO REPLACE CHASSIS DESIGN

 

USER INTERACTION
The Karacus Switch smart watch is sold as a sports edition base product as a complete unit with electronic module assembled with sports chassis. It all starts as a sports smart watch ensuring the user receives necessary functions at hand with black matte finish super sporty looking polycarbonate bezel and soft silicone straps with a design inspired from a sports car! repelling dust and sweat for sports activities, built for performance. For wearing the Switch smart watch on different occasions, the user may purchase various chassis designs as per their liking separately as individual products thereby ensuring the consumer has the right looking watch for the right occasion. Not just that, but at half the cost of purchasing a new design watch product!

 

 

 

 

 

 

HANDS ON DEMONSTRATION VIDEO

 

 

FUNCTIONS

STYLIZE WITH 25 WATCH FACES!

 

RECEIVE INCOMING AND MAKE OUTGOING CALLS WHEN SWITCH SMART WATCH IS BLUETOOTH CONNECTED TO YOUR PHONE

 

QUICK GLANCE READ SMS AND ALL PHONE APP NOTIFICATION MESSAGES LIKE WHATSAPP, FACEBOOK, SKYPE, ETC.

 

PEDOMETER TRACKING STEPS, DISTANCE AND CALORIES BURNT ALL ON YOUR WRIST GIVING STATISTICS AND STORING DATA 

 

HEART RATE MONITOR AND BLOOD PRESSURE READING FUNCTION ANYTIME ANYWHERE

 

SLEEP MONITOR LETS YOU TRACK SLEEP PATTERNS WITH STATISTICAL DATA IN APP

 

LISTEN TO YOUR QUICK CUSTOM PLAYLIST OF 100+ SONGS STORED IN TF CARD OF WATCH WITH ANY PAIRED BLUETOOTH HEADPHONES AND GO FOR A RUN OR SIMPLY PLAY MUSIC ON WATCH SPEAKER BLUETOOTH CONNECTED TO YOUR PHONE

 

TALK TO SIRI OR GOOGLE ON YOUR WATCH WHEN BLUETOOTH CONNECTED TO YOUR PHONE, ASK TODAY'S WEATHER, NEWS, SPORTS OR ANY QUESTION IN YOUR MIND TO YOUR PERSONAL ASSISTANT ON YOUR WRIST

 

MOUNT YOUR PHONE ON A TRIPOD OR SIMPLY LEAN IT AGAINST THE WALL AND REMOTE CAPTURE PHOTOS FROM YOUR WATCH 

 

7 DAYS BATTERY LIFE ON SINGLE CHARGE

 

IP65 RATING RESISTANT TO DUST, SWEAT AND WATER SPLASH PROVIDING PROTECTION TO DEVICE FROM EXTERNAL FACTORS

 

 

 

What is Karacus, what's the message and what makes it unique?

"Bold", "innovative", "enterprising" & "determined" were the main traits we wanted in a brand name symbolizing what we stand for. We wanted to pursue a name of a celestial body, a world of smart technology smart future with such values. "KARACUS" is a fictitious name of such a world derived from Roman and Greek phonetic origins as most celestial bodies are. We are bold to try something new and do things differently, innovative to use our superior creativity and skills showcasing unique innovations with out of the box thinking, enterprising taking on new ventures with passion and zeal to set milestones in technological advancements and determined to push all the limits and boundaries in pursuit of innovation and trend generation. "Karacus is for all those people who posses such qualities, are bold enough to try something new , not afraid to do things differently and who are NOT a trend seeker BUT a trend generator! Together we set new trends and it all starts with you!"

 

ABOUT US

We are developers of wearable technology, Bluetooth and smart device products and our sole USP is introduction of the most unique or world's first exclusive category type products ensuring smart innovation is the key to the benefit of the consumers and providing cost effective solutions. We try to solve the daily consumer issues with products that are never addressed by problem solving through product concept generation, industrial design and engineering and ensuring a perfect balance between strong creativity and essential technical possibility. We ensure during the cycle of product development that each concept has a unique utility and function over other existing products in the market creating successful prototypes to mass production and into the hands of the consumer. Our consumers will always have something to look forward to with us as we strive to go where no one has gone before!
story_txt: KARACUS BRAND AS SEEN ON TV! KARACUS IS THE LATEST HOT TRENDING BRAND IN FASHION WEARABLES AND SMART DEVICES WITH MANY HAPPY CUSTOMERS WORLDWIDE BRINGING FORTH MOST EXCITING TECH INNOVATIONS WITH SUPERIOR CREATIVITY DESIGN AND FUNCTIONS AS WE GENERATE NEW TRENDS   OVERVIEWWHY JUST CHANGE STRAPS WHEN YOU CAN CHANGE ENTIRE SMART WATCH DESIGN!For some years wearables have been playing a key role in our lives in providing useful phone notification and fitness tracking data on our wrist. Though smart watches have become a trend, the growth rate is not what was initially projected to be since it all began. The major drawback issue with adaptability to an electronic smart watch as per the user has always been its form factor and aesthetics. To overcome this issue the concept of strap changing came into play which almost all brands followed. Though if we view a smart watch, the majority 70% of the onlookers vision falls on the bezel and not the strap, hence if we think about it, it does not really solve the problem. A watch is an important element of fashion and function in our daily lives. On different occasions, people wear different styles. If a suitable watch is needed for every occasion, it will be an economic burden for consumers and waste of resources. The proposed application of replaceable chassis lets the user have the ability to change not only the strap but also the bezel design in its entirety as one unit in terms of aesthetic, material, structural and mechanical design thereby completely changing its appearance. In terms of economic stand point it also lets the user switch to a completely new design watch reducing the cost to half as compared to purchasing a completely new design watch product.THE AMALGAM OF MODERNITY, TECHNOLOGY AND STYLE!  Besides being the world's first chassis switchable smart watch, the Karacus Switch is a featured packed smart watch latest in technology with many smart functions for the user providing various phone notifications and fitness tracking data on your wrist.   THIS IS JUST THE BEGINNING AS WE PLAN TO KEEP PRODUCING MANY AND WHOLE NEW COLLECTION OF EXQUISITE CHASSIS DESIGNS TO SWITCH YOUR STYLE! A REVOLUTION HAS BEGUN JOIN THE MOVEMENT! SOME CAD BEZEL DESIGNS CURRENTLY IN R&D FOR NEXT LINE OF CHASSIS PLANNING TO UTILIZE MATERIALS SUCH AS WOODEN, CERAMIC, TITANIUM, LEATHER AND MANY MORE!  HOW IT WORKSPart A of the product is the universal electronic module. It is made of matte finish metallic casing enclosing all electronic components of the smart watch. Part B are the various design chassis which are the bezel attached to straps as a single unit in its entirety. The universal module is taken and inserted into the chassis from the bottom end and pushed in upwards motion until its fixed. The inner walls of the chassis bezel consists of silicone strip padding. Due to the interference between the matte finish of the universal module and the silicone strip, compression and frictional forces come into play. Due to these forces the universal module is securely fastened and does not fall down and neither can it fall outwards due to the bezel material blockage at the top end. The universal module can be easily removed from the chassis by pressing the screen from the top side thereby ensuring easy insertion and extraction when changing the chassis.  EASILY INSERT ELECTRONIC MODULE INTO CHASSIS EASILY EXTRACT ELECTRONIC MODULE TO REPLACE CHASSIS DESIGN USER INTERACTIONThe Karacus Switch smart watch is sold as a sports edition base product as a complete unit with electronic module assembled with sports chassis. It all starts as a sports smart watch ensuring the user receives necessary functions at hand with black matte finish super sporty looking polycarbonate bezel and soft silicone straps with a design inspired from a sports car! repelling dust and sweat for sports activities, built for performance. For wearing the Switch smart watch on different occasions, the user may purchase various chassis designs as per their liking separately as individual products thereby ensuring the consumer has the right looking watch for the right occasion. Not just that, but at half the cost of purchasing a new design watch product!      HANDS ON DEMONSTRATION VIDEO  FUNCTIONSSTYLIZE WITH 25 WATCH FACES! RECEIVE INCOMING AND MAKE OUTGOING CALLS WHEN SWITCH SMART WATCH IS BLUETOOTH CONNECTED TO YOUR PHONE QUICK GLANCE READ SMS AND ALL PHONE APP NOTIFICATION MESSAGES LIKE WHATSAPP, FACEBOOK, SKYPE, ETC. PEDOMETER TRACKING STEPS, DISTANCE AND CALORIES BURNT ALL ON YOUR WRIST GIVING STATISTICS AND STORING DATA  HEART RATE MONITOR AND BLOOD PRESSURE READING FUNCTION ANYTIME ANYWHERE SLEEP MONITOR LETS YOU TRACK SLEEP PATTERNS WITH STATISTICAL DATA IN APP LISTEN TO YOUR QUICK CUSTOM PLAYLIST OF 100+ SONGS STORED IN TF CARD OF WATCH WITH ANY PAIRED BLUETOOTH HEADPHONES AND GO FOR A RUN OR SIMPLY PLAY MUSIC ON WATCH SPEAKER BLUETOOTH CONNECTED TO YOUR PHONE TALK TO SIRI OR GOOGLE ON YOUR WATCH WHEN BLUETOOTH CONNECTED TO YOUR PHONE, ASK TODAY'S WEATHER, NEWS, SPORTS OR ANY QUESTION IN YOUR MIND TO YOUR PERSONAL ASSISTANT ON YOUR WRIST MOUNT YOUR PHONE ON A TRIPOD OR SIMPLY LEAN IT AGAINST THE WALL AND REMOTE CAPTURE PHOTOS FROM YOUR WATCH  7 DAYS BATTERY LIFE ON SINGLE CHARGE IP65 RATING RESISTANT TO DUST, SWEAT AND WATER SPLASH PROVIDING PROTECTION TO DEVICE FROM EXTERNAL FACTORS   What is Karacus, what's the message and what makes it unique?"Bold", "innovative", "enterprising" & "determined" were the main traits we wanted in a brand name symbolizing what we stand for. We wanted to pursue a name of a celestial body, a world of smart technology smart future with such values. "KARACUS" is a fictitious name of such a world derived from Roman and Greek phonetic origins as most celestial bodies are. We are bold to try something new and do things differently, innovative to use our superior creativity and skills showcasing unique innovations with out of the box thinking, enterprising taking on new ventures with passion and zeal to set milestones in technological advancements and determined to push all the limits and boundaries in pursuit of innovation and trend generation. "Karacus is for all those people who posses such qualities, are bold enough to try something new , not afraid to do things differently and who are NOT a trend seeker BUT a trend generator! Together we set new trends and it all starts with you!" ABOUT USWe are developers of wearable technology, Bluetooth and smart device products and our sole USP is introduction of the most unique or world's first exclusive category type products ensuring smart innovation is the key to the benefit of the consumers and providing cost effective solutions. We try to solve the daily consumer issues with products that are never addressed by problem solving through product concept generation, industrial design and engineering and ensuring a perfect balance between strong creativity and essential technical possibility. story:
We welcome you on the page of our innovative idea of ​​a startup: accessories and clothes with elements from movies and comics known to all of us! I hope you will be interested in our project and our story will seem to you quite interesting.

This idea belongs to two friends living in the country of nomads - Kazakhstan. We love our country very much and proud to present our idea on the global platform through the site www.indiegogo.com. Our names are Damir and Darkhan, two friends whose friendship began from the university. We work in different areas, for example, I (Damir) work in the IT sphere, and Darkhan, in turn, worked in the cinema field for a long time and is now mastering the heights in the field of digital marketing. This encouraged us to use our skills as an advantage for the emergence of an idea, which we will try to tell you:

For your attention, we present clothing accessories (in the future it will be completely clothing itself) with the logos of characters from movies, TV shows, comics and all that we are interested in. Surely everyone knows the TV series "Game of Thrones", many admire the idea of ​​the series and all over the world millions of fans love this one. Why not buy a piece of 'Game of thrones'' as a stylish and fashionable tie clip (for your attention, we present a clip with a sign of the House).

The same can be said about the films studios of Marvel and DC. Many would be pleased to get a piece of the heroes of these comics as a gift. Then the plans are to launch a line of bags, hats and covers for your phone with logos and badges of the films. We also plan to start working with corporate clients, making accessories for them with the logos of their companies.

Our project takes into account all segments of the population and gender equality between people. Namely:

- Prices for accessories will be very affordable and our products will be able to buy each as a gift for their second half, for friends and relatives.

- Accessories will be designed for both men (in the form of clips, cufflinks, belts), and for women (brooch, hairpins, etc.).

We bring to your attention a brooch for women's clothing in the shape of the sign "Super Women".

A distinctive feature of our startup is that we put all our soul into the project, making these accessories really stylish, unusual, interesting (without violating copyrights). It seems to us that now everyone would want one accessory with a sign of their favorite character from a movie or TV series. No question, we will do it. We have so many ideas and potential that need a good start, a good capital that will make our fantasy a reality (yes, we believe in a miracle) .. Unfortunately, in our country, startups are not developing as efficiently as I would like, therefore, it is very difficult to find like-minded people, support, which pushed us, ordinary guys from Kazakhstan, to launch our project and show it to the whole world. And why not?

Our line of accessories will be called “Kiyal” (brand from nomads). The idea of ​​the name is very simple: the word Kiyal from our native Kazakh language translates as Fantasy, a dream. Because that is what we want to realize, our idea, our imagination to turn it into our life. And of course, we express great patriotism towards our country, which has a long history and is home to nomads. Therefore, our brand will be represented by us, the Kiyal team, who were born and live in the homeland of the original nomads.

At the initial stage, we are planning to collect $ 10,000, for a good start with a very large circulation of accessories (we will give all the products a set of any of the products absolutely free of charge for the first circulation) to all those who donate and believe in our idea. And also write in the comments your opinions, feedback, ideas (for us, every opinion is important). Our plans are very ambitious, manufacturers are waiting for our answer and after collecting the required amount, we immediately launch the sale of our line of accessories to the entire world market. The whole process will take 2-3 months taking into account all the formalities and quality check of products. We truly believe that we can achieve our goals, because together we are stronger. 

Below are preliminary sketches and samples of our future products:

story:
The Devil's Lake

Peren focus to emphasize the mystery behind its ethereal existence deeply rooted into the mythology of Transylvania. This concept is at the core of every perennial project. Peren Nera makes no exception to this rule. The Swiss Made Watch is inspired by the Devil's Lake from the Nera gorges in Transylvania.

 

Inspiration

The unique color of the Devil's Lake from the Nera gorges is reflected into the dial while the cave shape of the Lake's surroundings can be seen on the cases's bezel and the dial's rim. The three-tone execution of the case with the sandblasted base and the matte and brushed black PVD coated bezel, represent the fusion of the rugged cave-like environment with the Lake.

 

Born on crowdfunding

Peren is a brand that displayed its perennial state for the first time on crowdfunding platforms. All perennial products disposed by Peren are commercialized exclusively online. Only immaterial trading platforms are suitable to respect its ethereal existence.

 

Individual Design

Every perennial watch is in-house designed and conceived to promote the mystery and the mythology of Transylvania while telling a story of its own. The products are designed according to the Neo-Vintage design code.

 

Premium Quality

Only premium quality raw materials are used in order to achieve the ultimate perennial product. The elements that compose the timepieces are individually selected from different suppliers and tested to withstand the harshness of time.

 

Hand Assembled

Every Peren watch is manually assembled in Switzerland. Exercising control over all the aspects of the manufacturing process, confers us the possibility of producing unique products unmatched quality wise at the selected price level.

 

No Retail Markup

All Peren products are commercialized exclusively online. Only immaterial trading platforms are suitable to respect its ethereal existence. To obtain the unmatched price, we calculate the cost of the goods and multiply it by two.


Specifications

Swiss Made • Diameter: 39mm • Height: 13.50mm • Lug to Lug: 48.80mm • Case: Three tone 316L Stainless Steel • Bezel: Black PVD coated trapezoid • Bezel Functions: Rotating unidirectional • Crown: Screw-down • Caseback: Display back • Movement: Automatic ETA 2824-2 • Functions: Hour/Minute/Second, Date at 3H • Power reserve: 40 Hours • Crystal: Scratch resistant domed Sapphire • Dial: Metal with applied indexes, Nera blue color  • Hands: Brass, white • Lume: BGW9 Superluminova, dial and hands • Strap: 20mm Genuine Leather, steel buckle • Water resistance: 200M/20ATM • Limited Edition: 200 pieces • numbering: 01-200 -  Less than 100 pieces remaining.
 



Functions

Nera features a unique uni-directional trapezoid, rotating 60-click type bezel. The bezel is black PVD coated in a special execution to emphasize the polished embossed indexes on a smooth mate solid rim.



Night View

The BGW9 Superluminova available on the dial and hands, is the second in terms of brightness and the first when it comes to durability.

 

Packaging

The perennial package is composed of a black matte cardboard with the black polished Peren logo printed. The inner part is made of a special foam in the shape of the watch covered by a pad with Transylvania inscription.
      

Risks and challenges

At this point, we have overcome all our production stages and we are ready to ship. We have an amazing manufacturer partner and a professional Swiss team working alongside us. 
We don't expect any major problems, but we do understand that there is always the possibility of occurring some small delays.

story:
Hi my name is Natasha and im 17 yrs old living in Puerto Rico. Since i was 10 years old I have always wanted to open some kind of business, my mom always told me that I was too young but to never forget those crazy ideas, that in the future they might help me open a new business. Now that I have the support of my family and friends I can see how that goal is achievable. Since theres a lot of money involved in buying clothe and screen printing them I need the help of you, the contributor to help me achieve what I have always desired since I was little. It would be fantastic if you could be part in helping me achieve my goal.

Our goal is to get $500 to get that little kick that we need to start our business, of course it would be fantastic if we achieve more but $500 will do. As mentioned buying clothes and designing them into whatever our visions are is pricey, that's why we are asking for your help to help us in that process. I have the help of local artist that are friends of mine to help me in costumising the clothe to make it as unique as possible. 

If for some reason you can't contribute is all right! You can still help us by sharing the word and making some noise about our campaign. You can help us by using the indiegogo share tools!

story:
Immerse yourself in our new unisex timepiece - chapter by chapter. Uncover the thought behind the arching shape. Find out what powers the LAB. Explore the opportunity to customize your one of a kind watch and mark it with a personal engraving to match your personality and style.


Unisex size.

LAB is the most alterable watch you’ll ever encounter; nearly all components are customizable and in the infinite design expressions the watch comes to live. Explore all of your customizing options and test-drive your favorite design combinations with our customizing tool.

 

 

Nothing’s truly unique before you mark it with your own words. We’ve saved the full back side of the watch case for a personal engraving. The only restriction is the number of characters (up to 4 lines of each 25 characters) so let your imagination run wild. Your watch is delivered with your personal laser engraving at no extra charge – and alongside your message is your watch’s individual serial number. After all, you’re one of a kind. If you need inspiration on what to write, feel free to grab and modify one of these suggestions:

LAB is born out of a collaboration. We wanted to combine our years of expertise with the curled minds of 28 UCN design talents. To create a watch that would match current trends yet stay in vogue through times.

 

With a trained eye for graphic aesthetics, the group of selected students worked on both the logo and dial. And in the end, the most beautiful designs were presented to a group of opinioned people who made the final decision. Logo, dial, straps and hands took their form. LAB was born.

Selecting materials and movement has been one of the most essential tasks in the creation of LAB. And we are darn proud of the result. The precision of the Japanese quartz and the resilience of the surgical steel make LAB a timepiece that not only lasts a lifetime and beyond - but entails the aesthetic traits of true craft and diligence in every fiber.

 

The movement

If you want perfection you go to Japan. And so we did. The LAB by Miang Copenhagen is equipped with a VD78 quartz from Seiko - a battery-driven movement with superior precision and operational reliability.

Read on to discover the most significant details of the design. The watch case is designed by Jens Ole Miang who found a way to accentuate the organic sensation through transitions and shape; The slightly domed crystal creates a seamless transition to the prominently arching watch case of stainless steel, making the two materials - despite their vast differences - appear as one. No beginning. No end. Just like time.

 

Case, bezel and crown come in three sleek colors: Steel, PVD Gun and PVD Rose Gold that will all add a luxury feel to the watch. Mix them to create an expression that reflects your personality. With its 38 mm in diameter the size of the case makes LAB a unisex model – we won’t let gender dictate your choice.

The dial

In a classic watch you’ll find a 12-hour circle displaying time through the movement of centrally mounted hour-, minute- and second hands. In LAB we’ve split this function in two; seconds are separated from hours and minutes and placed in a small and elegant subdial located beneath the center. This detail is quite costly but it changes the whole dynamic of the design, demonstrating the beauty of eccentricity in a context of the classic. To complete the sensation, we decided to sculpt the 12-hour circle and subdial with oil pressing instead of just printing them on. The dial comes in 10 different color combinations – we’re sure you’ll find one you love.

The logo

The crown

The logo is also found on the crown. Once again subtle and discrete. And in great contrast to the crown that is twice the size of a regular crown - to highlight the functionality and edge up the design. The regular 3-4 mm has become 6.5 mm. Furthermore, we’ve created a contrast to the arching and seamless design language by slightly moving the crown away from the case and making the top flat. In this way, the crown interrupts the smooth sensation and gives character to the watch.

The Straps

LAB will empower you to express your personal style. Even when it changes. The many style combinations include 10 different types of straps that, with a quick-change system, allows you to alter your look within seconds, without any tools. Again and again. When seasons change. When occasion change. Or when you change.

You’ll find 2 straps made of Italian calf leather, 1 strap made of pure grey wool and 7 straps of Italian suede. All with a 316L stainless steel buckle that follows the color of the watch case – and thus follows your choice. All are sewn by hand with tone in tone stitching to support the organic, seamless feel of the watch and all are lined with a soft suede on the back for a luxurious feeling against the skin. When you purchase a LAB, one strap of your choice is included. But feel free to buy them all. Just add DKK 160 (approx. USD 25 / EUR 22) to your pledge for the extra strap including buckle - once the campaign is finished you can choose which extra strap(s) you want with your watch.

The color of time

The shape of the hands has been carefully chosen by our focus group. But it’s up to you to decide the colors. Choose between 9 different colors for the second hand and 5 different colors for hour- and minute hands.

And save money at the same time? We’ve build a reward system for the quickest and the most excited. There are two simple rules: #1 The more you buy, the more you save. #2 The sooner you buy the more you save. You can obtain a quantity discount on up to 61% and a super early bird discount of 51%. And remember that for 6 out the 7 rewards, we only got a limited amount of offerings, so we might run out before the campaign ends.

We are happy to deliver your reward as a gift certificate. This way, you can give the ultimate personal gift, as the receiver gets a code to customize his or her very own watch. 

Every LAB by Miang Copenhagen watch comes with a 2-year international warranty. In fact we believe so much in our product that we provide each watch with a 100-days money back guarantee – no questions asked! 

We created Miang Copenhagen with the goal of establishing a watch brand that gives the creative freedom and personal style choice back to the wearer. Personalized watches with the potential of many changing looks – essentially offering multiple watch designs in one. And we are offering it without expensive middlemen. Directly from us to you. This business model saves our customers more than 50% compared to the traditional retail model. And our concept works! We’ve had overwhelming success with our Flash Automatic and Bespoke - sold online to clients all over the world. With LAB we’ve made customizable watches even more accessible to our global fans. Expectations are high!
story_txt: Immerse yourself in our new unisex timepiece - chapter by chapter. Uncover the thought behind the arching shape. Find out what powers the LAB. Explore the opportunity to customize your one of a kind watch and mark it with a personal engraving to match your personality and style.Unisex size.LAB is the most alterable watch you’ll ever encounter; nearly all components are customizable and in the infinite design expressions the watch comes to live. Explore all of your customizing options and test-drive your favorite design combinations with our customizing tool.  Nothing’s truly unique before you mark it with your own words. We’ve saved the full back side of the watch case for a personal engraving. The only restriction is the number of characters (up to 4 lines of each 25 characters) so let your imagination run wild. Your watch is delivered with your personal laser engraving at no extra charge – and alongside your message is your watch’s individual serial number. After all, you’re one of a kind. If you need inspiration on what to write, feel free to grab and modify one of these suggestions:LAB is born out of a collaboration. We wanted to combine our years of expertise with the curled minds of 28 UCN design talents. To create a watch that would match current trends yet stay in vogue through times. With a trained eye for graphic aesthetics, the group of selected students worked on both the logo and dial. And in the end, the most beautiful designs were presented to a group of opinioned people who made the final decision. Logo, dial, straps and hands took their form. LAB was born.Selecting materials and movement has been one of the most essential tasks in the creation of LAB. And we are darn proud of the result. The precision of the Japanese quartz and the resilience of the surgical steel make LAB a timepiece that not only lasts a lifetime and beyond - but entails the aesthetic traits of true craft and diligence in every fiber. The movementIf you want perfection you go to Japan. And so we did. The LAB by Miang Copenhagen is equipped with a VD78 quartz from Seiko - a battery-driven movement with superior precision and operational reliability.Read on to discover the most significant details of the design. The watch case is designed by Jens Ole Miang who found a way to accentuate the organic sensation through transitions and shape; The slightly domed crystal creates a seamless transition to the prominently arching watch case of stainless steel, making the two materials - despite their vast differences - appear as one. No beginning. No end. Just like time. Case, bezel and crown come in three sleek colors: Steel, PVD Gun and PVD Rose Gold that will all add a luxury feel to the watch. Mix them to create an expression that reflects your personality. With its 38 mm in diameter the size of the case makes LAB a unisex model – we won’t let gender dictate your choice.The dialIn a classic watch you’ll find a 12-hour circle displaying time through the movement of centrally mounted hour-, minute- and second hands. In LAB we’ve split this function in two; seconds are separated from hours and minutes and placed in a small and elegant subdial located beneath the center. This detail is quite costly but it changes the whole dynamic of the design, demonstrating the beauty of eccentricity in a context of the classic. To complete the sensation, we decided to sculpt the 12-hour circle and subdial with oil pressing instead of just printing them on. The dial comes in 10 different color combinations – we’re sure you’ll find one you love.The logoThe crownThe logo is also found on the crown. Once again subtle and discrete. And in great contrast to the crown that is twice the size of a regular crown - to highlight the functionality and edge up the design. The regular 3-4 mm has become 6.5 mm. Furthermore, we’ve created a contrast to the arching and seamless design language by slightly moving the crown away from the case and making the top flat. In this way, the crown interrupts the smooth sensation and gives character to the watch.The StrapsLAB will empower you to express your personal style. Even when it changes. The many style combinations include 10 different types of straps that, with a quick-change system, allows you to alter your look within seconds, without any tools. Again and again. When seasons change. When occasion change. Or when you change.You’ll find 2 straps made of Italian calf leather, 1 strap made of pure grey wool and 7 straps of Italian suede. All with a 316L stainless steel buckle that follows the color of the watch case – and thus follows your choice. All are sewn by hand with tone in tone stitching to support the organic, seamless feel of the watch and all are lined with a soft suede on the back for a luxurious feeling against the skin. When you purchase a LAB, one strap of your choice is included. But feel free to buy them all. Just add DKK 160 (approx. USD 25 / EUR 22) to your pledge for the extra strap including buckle - once the campaign is finished you can choose which extra strap(s) you want with your watch.The color of timeThe shape of the hands has been carefully chosen by our focus group. But it’s up to you to decide the colors. Choose between 9 different colors for the second hand and 5 different colors for hour- and minute hands.And save money at the same time? We’ve build a reward system for the quickest and the most excited. There are two simple rules: #1 The more you buy, the more you save. #2 The sooner you buy the more you save. You can obtain a quantity discount on up to 61% and a super early bird discount of 51%. And remember that for 6 out the 7 rewards, we only got a limited amount of offerings, so we might run out before the campaign ends.We are happy to deliver your reward as a gift certificate. This way, you can give the ultimate personal gift, as the receiver gets a code to customize his or her very own watch. Every LAB by Miang Copenhagen watch comes with a 2-year international warranty. In fact we believe so much in our product that we provide each watch with a 100-days money back guarantee – no questions asked! We created Miang Copenhagen with the goal of establishing a watch brand that gives the creative freedom and personal style choice back to the wearer. Personalized watches with the potential of many changing looks – essentially offering multiple watch designs in one. And we are offering it without expensive middlemen. Directly from us to you. This business model saves our customers more than 50% compared to the traditional retail model. And our concept works! We’ve had overwhelming success with our Flash Automatic and Bespoke - sold online to clients all over the world. With LAB we’ve made customizable watches even more accessible to our global fans. Expectations are high!

story:
The Story

Hi, my name is Cammie and I would like to introduce to you, Bundié Fit!

Bundié Fit began when I was on the lookout for new workout apparel. I am somebody who spends a lot of time in activewear, as I am a college student and it is the most comfortable type of clothing to wear on a day-to-day basis. I am able to sit in my two hour classes comfortably, go workout in them once my classes are over, and lounge in them at home when my day ends. Being that I'm in my activewear nearly all day, I wanted to make sure that whatever I bought was high end; however, being a college student didn't give me a lot of spending power to do so. After searching endlessly, all I found were basic workout leggings priced at upwards of $100; I was blown away. I thought to myself, "There has to be a company that offers exactly what I'm looking for." That is when Bundié Fit was born.

⌯

About

Bundié Fit (pronounced BUN-DEE-AY FIT) is a women's athleisure wear company that specializes in high quality, simplistic, affordable clothing. Athleisure wear is a category of clothing that combines the functionality of activewear, with the comfort of everyday apparel. It is a perfect option for those who are always running errands, working out, lounging at home, or are just needing something versatile and comfortable to go about their day in.

Currently, we are in the prototype stage of production. This means that we only have the samples of the items and are awaiting the next move into bulk production. With the help of our backers, we will be able to make that next move and get Bundié Fit up and running.

⌯

The Collection

Both the sports bras and the leggings can be worn for low, medium, and high impact activities. This means that they will be great for yoga, sprinting, and everything in between.

Color Options Available at Launch

For the first collection, I wanted to start with four staple colors, black, white, navy, and light heather grey. These are all colors that can be interchanged with one another and mixed-and-matched to create different outfits. Because they are staple colors, they are great to pair with complementary colors to better fit your wardrobe.

Other color options will be available in future collections.

The Material

Both the sports bras and leggings are made out of the same material. It is a nylon-spandex blend that is soft and extremely stretchy. The softness ensures extra comfort when wearing either item and the stretch factor allows each size to fit multiple body shapes.

I also wanted to make sure that the items, specifically the leggings, were not see-through. I did this by increasing the weight of the fabric making it thicker and more opaque. However, I didn't want to make the material too thick because I wanted to keep the items light and breathable.

The material is also not shiny. Typically with activewear, the material will have a sheen due to the high percent of stretch material in it. Even though we have a good amount of elasticity in our sports bras and leggings, our material is matte, making it perfect for any kind of outfit.

Details

The sports bra has a deep, square neckline. It is at a perfect length where it is not too low and is flattering on every chest size.

⟡

The sports bra is in a racerback style. It has our "B" logo embroidered on the top-center of the racerback in matching stitching, which allows it to blend in easily with the material, yet still be noticeable.

⟡

All sports bras come with removable padding. This padding is made to be comfortable when worn. It is just the right thickness to where it gives a bit more coverage without creating an odd bump.

⟡

The leggings have a slight "V" style stitching on the back that helps to accentuate shape. It also has the "B" logo embroidered on the center-back of the waistband.

⟡

Both the sports bra and leggings do not have elastic bands, which allows them to lay completely flat against the skin without having that "too tight" feeling.

Sizes

All of the items come in four sizes, X-Small, Small, Medium, and Large. Below is a corresponding size chart for your reference.

Cost

The sports bras will retail for $30 each and the leggings will retail for $45 each. With the perks on the right, you'll be able to contribute to the campaign and receive either a sports bra, a pair of leggings, or both at a reduced price. As we continue to release different styles, the prices will adjust accordingly. For example, a pair of cropped leggings will be cheaper than a pair of full-length leggings.

⌯

The Future of Bundié Fit

The sports bras and leggings are only the beginning of Bundié Fit. Athleisure wear encompasses a wide array of different types of clothing and we are looking to cover all of our bases. From different colors to different styles, we want to expand our collection and make high quality, simplistic athleisure wear, accessible to more people.

⌯

Thank You!

If you choose to contribute to my campaign, I want to thank you. It has been a dream of mine to not only have a company like Bundié Fit but to make a company like this a reality for others.

For those who thought of contributing but decided not to contribute, I would also like to say thank you for consideration.

⌯

Feel free to share this campaign with friends and family or anyone you think will enjoy Bundié Fit. Thank you.

story:
The Minis 4 Me Makeup case is a unique, patent pending modular case that is designed to hold mini makeup, to address the issues of makeup expiration, customization, convenience and portability. 

In addition to the case, Minis 4 Me will also create a full range of cosmetics that are cruelty free with no harmful chemicals. Our cosmetic line will include a variety of products including lipsticks, lipgloss, mascara, eyeliner, foundation, eyeshadows, blush, finishing powder. As the company grows, our makeup selection will also grow based on the needs and desires of our clients.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Makeup that we have developed is cruelty free, paraben and talc free, with no harsh chemicals. Clients will be able to select the makeup that they want to place in their case and choose from the following colors:

 

Lipstick Colors

 

Lip Paint Colors

 

Lipgloss Colors

 

Foundation Colors

 

Eyeshadow Colors

 

Blush Colors

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

left to right: Reena Gajjar, Meghan Hebel, Ryan Hebel

 

Dr. Reena Gajjar, Founder

Hello Everyone! I am a Prosthodontist, Aesthetician and Entrepreneur. Throughout my career, I have owned and operated several successful businesses - a dental training company, a patient education software company, several dental practices and a skin clinic. I have always had a passion for education and facial aesthetics! I love working with people and although I have held a couple of corporate positions, I truly am an entrepreneur and I love creating something new.

This concept, Minis4Me, was inspired through my skin clinic years ago, when I became aware of the issues surrounding makeup and skin health. It remained an idea until a couple of years ago, when I finally decided to do something about it and start my company. During the past two years I have spent most of my time researching, designing and developing my product, sorting out manufacturing issues, creating my business plan,  and am now ready to bring it to market ... with your help!!

 

Meghan Hebel, Team Member

I am a Mechanical Engineer and Product Manager, who currently does product development and graphic design for Minis4Me. I am a huge advocate for creating products that have a positive impact on people’s lives and love pushing boundaries in traditional industries. 

What you need to know about me is that I refuse to have a normal life. I work incredibly hard, every day, to fill my life with experiences that are meaningful and impactful. Minis4Me is a revolutionary product that will change the way people use makeup - and I had to be a part of it!

 

Ryan Hebel, Team Member

I am currently a senior at Arizona State University studying Computer Systems Engineering and Finance. I have been involved with developing Minis4Me since its inception and am extremely excited  by the idea of revolutionizing the aesthetics industry! After our successful crowdfunding campaign, I plan on continuing to work with Minis4Me in order to improve on-the-go aesthetics for millions of people.

 

One of the biggest issues in the cosmetic industry is the expiration of makeup. Most makeup is sold in sizes too large to use up before it expires, especially considering that we all purchase multiple products and colors. Using expired makeup can cause skin irritations, eye infections and affect the health of our skin.

Another big issue with makeup is wastage and lack of customization. Many cosmetics are sold in large kits with multiple colors, even though the average user may only use several of those colors.

The last issue is one of portability. Most people carry their makeup around in large "makeup bags", which become bulky to carry. In addition, retrieving the item you want can be cumbersome and difficult.

Minis 4 Me plans to address these main issues surrounding makeup. The case offers customization and portability. The small sized makeup containers and natural cosmetic line, address the issues related to skin and eye health.

 

Cosmetics is a multi-billion dollar industry and the barrier to entry is high. It is very difficult for a small business owner to enter this industry and compete with the large companies. The cost of developing molds for components and the amount of inventory required can be a huge financial burden for a startup company ... in fact, it can cost hundreds of thousands of dollars.

I've already invested a lot of my money in research and development, and now we need your help to launch this company! With the funds that we raise, we will be able to start the manufacturing of the molds and the components, and will also be able to pay for an initial inventory of the makeup line we are creating.

 

Risks and Challenges

Our biggest challenge is the length of time of the manufacturing process. The molds are fabricated in China and can take up to 3 months to make. Once the molds are made, the components then take another 2 months to produce and shipping from China is another 4 to 6 weeks. Once the components arrive at the cosmetic manufacturer, we are then put in the "queue" to have our components filled. This "queue" can be another 6-8 weeks, and then having our components filled and packaged can take 2-4 weeks.

Our plan is to stagger the production so that the components are made and are being filled while the case is being manufactured. This should help prevent delays in production.

Our other challenge is the minimum quantities required by the cosmetic manufacturer. If we only get a few orders of a particular color, we still have to order the minimum quantity from the manufacturer. To help avoid this, we have decided to offer a limited selection of colors (although still offering enough variety), so we are able to control the amount of inventory we will need to order.

story:
Clothes today are made with no focus on quality or longevity. Planned obsolescence, unethical labor, and a concentration on profits has textile manufactures producing clothes that go straight into a landfill. The remaining factories that do it right, are facing an uphill battle and COVID has only made things worse. One U.S. Factory in particular is on the edge of closing its doors for good.

Create a premium shirt that this U.S. factory can produce, with a special focus on quality, fabric, sewing and construction.

 U.S. Backers - Free Shipping on all Orders

 International Backers - Free Shipping on all Orders over $100+

**All other international orders please reference estimated shipping cost chart below

Odor Resistant - By working with a North Carolina Mill, we were able to infuse silver threads in the weave of the fabric. This helps cut the half life of bacteria and germs that might be on the shirt. Reducing stink and odor, which allows you to be able to reuse your shirt multiple times before washing.

Moisture Wicking - Our fabric weave allows for breathability and helps wick away moisture. Excess sweat piling on top of your skin is the main reason for heat rash, chafing and feeling uncomfortable.  Not to mention it's extremely unsanitary.

Temperature Regulation - We tested multiple weights and weave structures to find the most optimal combination to give you the best temperature regulation. Not too thick and hot in the summer and not too thin and cold in the winter. Best for all climates.

Highly Breathable - Working with a mill to make a custom fabric allowed us the ability to create a fabric that was structurally strong but also airflow friendly. Incorporating recycled polyester, North Carolina cotton and silver threads we were able to get the best of all worlds. 

Wrinkle Resistant - Your shirt needs to be ready to go when you are. In a gym bag, on the go, or in a suitcase, the Maker shirt has you covered.

Quick Dry - The recycled polyester we chose to weave into our fabric blend helps to cut down drying time by one-third. After an intense workout if you don't have time to change you can always rest easy knowing your shirt will dry fast. 

Reinforced Seams - Reinforced 6-needle 6-thread seams make sure that this shirt will be able to handle any wear and tear. More threads means a longer lasting premium garment. 

UV Resistant - Protection from the sun is crucial. The Maker Shirt is rated up to UPF 40+ to ensure you're always protected. That means, only 1/40th of harmful UV radiation can penetrate our fabric.

Natural Dyes - Typical commercial dye-baths contain ammonia, alkali salts, and heavy metals, most of which are exceptionally toxic with health impacts on people and the environment. We use eco-friendly dyes, and have our fabric dyed in a Los Angeles dye house. It's more expensive this way but give us a far superior and safer product.

Itch Proof - What causes itching? Uncovered exposed thread ends, thread pilling and moisture being trapped between your skin and the fabric. We made sure to design a fabric that address all these issues and doesn't make you itch.

Hybrid Fabric - Our Hybrid Lux v2 fabric combines sustainable cotton from the Coastal Plains of North Carolina with silver and recycled polyester. We worked with fabric engineers and technicians to make sure we created the most comfortable fabric. 

4-Way Stretch - Our fabric has just enough stretch to ensure maximum comfort whether you're going about your daily life or exercising.   

Highly Durable - With reinforced seams, silver and polyester running through the weave structure of the shirt. The Maker shirt is more durable than our competitors.

Water Resistant - Our fabric is water resistant. The Maker shirt allows you to enjoy the weather and elements, without worrying about if your clothing will hold up.

Made in the USA - Our shirts are made in the U.S.A. with ethical labor. Each worker gets a sustainable living wage and the material inputs we use are of the highest quality.

Quality Control - Every Maker shirt is produced in lots of 25, not in lots of thousands. We quality check every single piece, so nothing slips through. This ensures you will get the most premium shirt you've ever had.

We believe customers have the right to know what their products cost to make and where the money is going.

All our proceeds go into supporting our U.S. Factory by paying the workers sustainable living wages. 85.64% of our product cost comes from materials & labor. We truly believe what you get out is what you put in. We use the highest quality fabric with makers that take pride in their quality & craftsmanship. 

 

As a brand, we take the minimal amount of profit that is needed for our business. In order to revitalize an industry, it’s going to take us to focus on the long-term goals and not just the short-term dollar signs.

5 different base patterns, countless adjustments, 1.5 years of R&D, 12 different prototypes, endless samples and 7 different fit tests and we finally arrived on a fit that we like. Tapered but not too tight. Breathable but not baggy. Perfection and premium products take time, dedication and perseverance to make..and that’s what we believe we have created with The Maker Shirt.

 U.S. Backers - Free Shipping on all Orders

 International Backers - Free Shipping on all Orders over $100+

**All other international orders please reference estimated shipping cost chart below

SHIPPING

U.S. Backers - All shipping is Free!
International Backers - All shipping is Free for Orders over $100+

After the campaign has ended, surveys will be sent out. Shipping costs will be calculated based on your survey answers and address. Unfortunately, shipping costs can't be calculated in advance as shipping costs vary by country and Kickstarter doesn't tell us where you are until after the funding period and campaign has closed. But for international shipping we've included an estimated shipping cost chart above.

DOMESTIC SHIPPING – United States: Continental US & Canadian orders will ship from our facility in Texas.

INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING – Rest of the World: Backers from all other countries (Rest of the world) may have to pay additional import duties and other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods, based on the import policies of their respective countries. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country and we are unable to help you determine that for your shipment. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authority of your country. From our experience, we have learned that most of the countries have higher thresholds for import duties and a majority of our international customers don't get charged any additional fees apart from the regular shipping fees on Kickstarter. We will not be making money on shipping and will be transparent about these cost.

RETURNS

Most Kickstarter campaigns do not have return policies. Because the majority of our funds are going toward keeping the Texas Factory open, we won’t be able to accept returns (see above cost breakdown). However, we will always do size exchanges and gift cards.

SIZE EXCHANGE POLICY

If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the shirts shall fit. Still, if you wish to exchange your shirts for any reason, we’ll happily do that, just ship us back the order with the original packing slip and follow the directions on the packing slip. We’ll contact you and see what size you need. You’ll have to pay for the shipping for the new exchanged order, so it’s very important to get your sizing correct the first time. Returned items must be in its original, unused, unaltered and unwashed condition, and must be returned with original tags and packaging. All Returns are subject to inspection before they are processed. We accept exchanges up to 30 days of you receiving the shirts(s).
story_txt: Clothes today are made with no focus on quality or longevity. Planned obsolescence, unethical labor, and a concentration on profits has textile manufactures producing clothes that go straight into a landfill. The remaining factories that do it right, are facing an uphill battle and COVID has only made things worse. One U.S. Factory in particular is on the edge of closing its doors for good.Create a premium shirt that this U.S. factory can produce, with a special focus on quality, fabric, sewing and construction. U.S. Backers - Free Shipping on all Orders International Backers - Free Shipping on all Orders over $100+**All other international orders please reference estimated shipping cost chart belowOdor Resistant - By working with a North Carolina Mill, we were able to infuse silver threads in the weave of the fabric. This helps cut the half life of bacteria and germs that might be on the shirt. Reducing stink and odor, which allows you to be able to reuse your shirt multiple times before washing.Moisture Wicking - Our fabric weave allows for breathability and helps wick away moisture. Excess sweat piling on top of your skin is the main reason for heat rash, chafing and feeling uncomfortable.  Not to mention it's extremely unsanitary.Temperature Regulation - We tested multiple weights and weave structures to find the most optimal combination to give you the best temperature regulation. Not too thick and hot in the summer and not too thin and cold in the winter. Best for all climates.Highly Breathable - Working with a mill to make a custom fabric allowed us the ability to create a fabric that was structurally strong but also airflow friendly. Incorporating recycled polyester, North Carolina cotton and silver threads we were able to get the best of all worlds. Wrinkle Resistant - Your shirt needs to be ready to go when you are. In a gym bag, on the go, or in a suitcase, the Maker shirt has you covered.Quick Dry - The recycled polyester we chose to weave into our fabric blend helps to cut down drying time by one-third. After an intense workout if you don't have time to change you can always rest easy knowing your shirt will dry fast. Reinforced Seams - Reinforced 6-needle 6-thread seams make sure that this shirt will be able to handle any wear and tear. More threads means a longer lasting premium garment. UV Resistant - Protection from the sun is crucial. The Maker Shirt is rated up to UPF 40+ to ensure you're always protected. That means, only 1/40th of harmful UV radiation can penetrate our fabric.Natural Dyes - Typical commercial dye-baths contain ammonia, alkali salts, and heavy metals, most of which are exceptionally toxic with health impacts on people and the environment. We use eco-friendly dyes, and have our fabric dyed in a Los Angeles dye house. It's more expensive this way but give us a far superior and safer product.Itch Proof - What causes itching? Uncovered exposed thread ends, thread pilling and moisture being trapped between your skin and the fabric. We made sure to design a fabric that address all these issues and doesn't make you itch.Hybrid Fabric - Our Hybrid Lux v2 fabric combines sustainable cotton from the Coastal Plains of North Carolina with silver and recycled polyester. We worked with fabric engineers and technicians to make sure we created the most comfortable fabric. 4-Way Stretch - Our fabric has just enough stretch to ensure maximum comfort whether you're going about your daily life or exercising.   Highly Durable - With reinforced seams, silver and polyester running through the weave structure of the shirt. The Maker shirt is more durable than our competitors.Water Resistant - Our fabric is water resistant. story:
Our Back Story 

My name is Lisa Cassidy and I have worked in the green sector for several decades. For as long as I can remember, I have always been recycling. I think it is because I am very practical and hate to see things wasted. And although, I have worked in several industries, I often sough out green companies.

When I first graduated college, my focus was on energy conservation (aka energy efficient light bulbs, smart homes), but it soon became much broader. I moved to Pratt & Whitney Power Systems, where we used aircraft engines to produce efficient, portable back-up power to countries all over the world.

Years later, I worked with manufacturers to promote recycling products and equipment. I found it very exciting to know that businesses all over the world, like McDonald's, Starbucks, Target, the Marriott and more were using our recycling equipment to redirect millions of cardboard boxes, plastic jugs and aluminum cans out of the landfill to create new products. As you might guess, I was not the one building the recycling equipment, I was the one marketing it. Little did I know back then, that someday I would be attempting to upcycle thousands of bicycle tubes into new eco products of my own creation, yet here we are.

What got me into upcycled bracelets began as a general interest in ecofashion. Back when I traveled a lot to trade shows and events all over the world, I became an avid collector of bags and fashion accessories made from repurposed or recycled materials. I loved to hear how they were made. I soon learned that there were a lot of people interested in fun, funky eco products and the stories behind them.

In March 2019, I started ecoimagine™, an online boutique of over 140 fashion accessories, apparel and yoga and cycling gear made from recycled, repurposed or biodegradable materials. I worked with over a dozen small US-based businesses to amass a collection of products made from 50% or more recycled plastic, recycled flip flops, recycled polyester, recycled vinyl, recycled bicycle tubes, bamboo, cork and more.

In June 2019, I opened a brick and mortar “micro store” in Lexington, Massachusetts. The first year was a lot of work, but it was also a great education on what people liked, didn't like and why. I learned that bracelets were by far the most popular category of my eco collection. I learned that people liked to buy eco items as gifts for hard to shop for people, Moms, girlfriends and daughters and I learned that people were much quicker to buy something for $25, then they were for $40. 

During the winter of 2020, I started tinkering with bicycle tubes. I had learned that bicycle tubes were not recycled as much as other materials and were often sent to the landfill once they were damaged. Due to the size of bicycle tubes, I instantly saw an opportunity for bracelets. I had tried a few designs, but the curve and the thickness of bicycle tubes made cutting very challenging. I had several starts and stops before I finally figured it out.

By the summer of 2020, I had a lot more time to do testing and to think through solutions thanks to Covid. After several hundred attempts to create a consistent, repeatable process throughout the year, I finally found a multi-step process of heating, flattening and cutting the tubes that worked! I tested several designs on Etsy, to see which were most popular. I landed on the top 6 you see today on ecoimagine.com.

The Impact

It is estimated that there are over 1 billion bikes on the planet and no good use for the inner tubes once damaged. I have set out a goal called the “Reuse the Tube Challenge” to upcycle 500 bicycle tubes by the end of this year, 2000 by next year.

There is no shortage of damaged tubes and shipping costs are minimal given that there are several local bike shops willing to donate.  

Current customers love our bicycle tube bracelets because they are light, soft, waterproof and stylish. They are also affordable ranging from $22 to $27 each. I often hear that the bracelets are the coolest thing they own and that they love the attention they get when people ask about them.

Now that I have a path to succeed, I can envision many ideas for expansion into other bracelet designs, necklaces, earrings and other types of bicycle tube products. I also want to reach out to other designers and artists, provide contests at the high school level and cross promote with other businesses. I am super excited about all the possibilities.

I have an MBA and over 30 years working in business. I understand what it would take to scale this business in order to have a real impact on people and the environment.  I also have a great network to tap into for additional resources. 

What We Need & What You Get

The cutting process is currently the most difficult and time-consuming part of the process.  After researching several options, I have learned that GlowForge laser cutters are extremely fast and accurate and work well with rubber.

To achieve the volume I am looking at, I would like to raise $6000 for a GlowForge Pro laser cutter.  I can manage with the GlowForge Plus at $4k, but will eventually need the Pro. My plan is to continue to invest the profits from the bracelets into upgrading/buying new equipment.

For every person that donates, you will receive 50% OFF Retail! If you donate $25, I will send you 2 zebra bicycle tube bracelets - one regular width, one wide. If you donate $50, you will get all 4 bracelets from the Paradise Collection (Almost Paradise, Tropical Paradise, Zebra and Pure Whimsy). For $75 you will get you the full collection! Keep them or give some away as gifts. People love them.

All bracelets are available on ecoimagine.com, my Shopify store. We use ShipStation for shipping orders. Shipping is always free.

Risks & Challenges

The main challenge is time lost. As you might guess, now is prime time for preparing for the holiday season. With a laser cutter, I could reach out to thousands of retailers by email well before the holidays, knowing that I could deliver on inventory in the fall. Without a laser cutter, my outreach would have to be much more conservative.

Also, when you sell to retailers, they generally buy at considerable discount because they are buying at a higher volume. In order to promote to retailers, you must be able to produce the bracelets at higher volumes in order to ship quickly in large quantities.

Then there is the cost associated with giving away hundreds of free samples to retailers and influencers. This is all worth it, if you can produce higher quantities. When you can only produce a limited number, you tend to give away less which makes the product less visible to your target audience.

I am now on my 3rd year as a retail business owner. During Covid, I worked on a market research project at Wayfair geared to 45k business owners. During that time, I learned a lot about what retailers need to succeed and strategies to sell product online. I am confident that I have the ability to do this. My goal is to do it faster.

If I do not raise enough funds to buy a laser printer through Indiegogo.com, I will continue to set aside a percentage of the profits I make through ecoimagine.com towards equipment. I will not be able to maximize the 2021 holiday season, but I will eventually reach my goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

Getting the word out is a huge help even if you cannot donate. Please share your favorite bracelet design through Instagram and Facebook. Our Instagram handle is @ecoimagineit and our Facebook page is: https://www.facebook.com/ecoimagineIt/. You can also tell your friends about our website, ecoimagine.com, on any other social media platform, by text or via Indiegogo share tools!
