story:
Over 5 years of relentless hard work and progress has led us to this moment. With your help, we can further push the boundaries of CaptoGlove and fund new features and capabilities. 

By getting the Captoglove months before retail consumers, you can help shape future development by providing real-world feedback. We saw this first hand at the CES and GDC trade shows as others instantly imagined new uses: “teaching sign language”, “creating a virtual keyboard”, “learning to play the piano”, “game controls for the limited mobility people”, “3D image control” – the list goes on and on!  

 

Our backers will have the possibility to exchange their configuration of CaptoGlove and benefit from others’ configurations and usage on a specific Capto cloud. A community of users will exchange best practice, lead new features to be implemented and shape development.
 

It’s been said that necessity is the mother of invention, and CaptoGlove is no exception. In 2011 our inventor’s father suffered a stroke and lost the use of several body’s part. 

After studying an advanced recovery method called “Motor Re-learning” in which movements such as bending and pushing were measured using “dumb objects”, the concept for CaptoGlove was born. He then created the first prototype of a glove fitted with sensors that connected to a PC, which provided a new quantifiable way to measure the recovery process. 

CaptoGlove rapidly enhanced his training sessions and the rehabilitation was a huge success. 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

As a wearable motion controller for video games, CaptoGlove delivers a unique and immersive experience on a wide variety of platforms and genres including first person shooters, ﬂight sims, virtual reality, augmented reality, mobile games and more!

PC Gaming

  • Compatible with all past, present, and future PC games right out of the box;
  • Use intuitive hand gestures to replace keyboard, mouse, and peripheral functions;
  • Fully customize one or a pair of CaptoGloves to control a wide variety of different inputs;
  • Download pre-set configuration profiles for immediate use or create your personal one;
  • More immersive, improves response time and adds unparalleled realism.

One CaptoGlove provides plenty of flexibility for most games. Generally, a right hand glove is preferred since it is the hand that controls the mouse for most players.

 

With a pair of CaptoGloves, players can leverage the use of both hands to obtain maximum flexibility. For example, in this DCS World 2 video, the player is using one hand to control the helicopter and the other to interact with cockpit switches.

 

Virtual & Augmented Reality

  • Compatible with all existing VR headsets, including Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, Samsung Gear VR, Google Cardboard and more;
  • Delivers new level of realism and immersion to VR & AR applications;
  • Supports use of additional ‘CaptoSensors’ for more advanced positional tracking of arms and hands;
  • CaptoGlove has been selected by HTC Vive for integration with the Vive Tracker delivering even more versatility to CaptoGlove!

 

Mobile Gaming  

  • Compatible with all iOS & Android smartphones and tablets;
  • Works with any mobile game that supports a game pad;
  • Will also control non-gaming functions such as making phone calls, etc.

Under Development - Bluetooth Gaming Consoles

 

CaptoGlove is immediately usable because it connects directly to the hardware it is controlling. No extra devices needed. It connects wirelessly and interprets natural hand movements as control gestures for a true plug & play experience.

  • Add-Ons: CaptoGlove requires no specifically developed contents and additional equipment such as cameras, tracking devices or expensive PC;
  • Connects to devices via Bluetooth Low Energy 4.0 (BTLE 4.0);
  • 3.7V Li-ion Polymer Battery delivers 10 hours of continuous gaming or use on a single charge via mini-USB cable;
  • Usable Everywhere: From the mall or the beach, to your desk or your living room, CaptoGlove can be used anywhere without the need for area preparation.

CaptoGlove has been designed to be as open as possible, allowing for an almost limitless number of potential uses and platform compatibilities.


Usage Applications  

  1. Gaming;
  2. Mobile device control;
  3. Professional training;
  4. Healthcare Rehabilitation;
  5. Digital development – 3D modeling etc.;
  6. Unmanned systems control;
  7. Smart home devices;
  8. Many more!   


Platform Compatibility  

  1. Microsoft Windows 8-10 via BTLE connection;
  2. Microsoft Windows 7 via non BTLE connection (Windows 7 do not support BTLE, Wi-Fi required);
  3. Microsoft Windows 7-8-10 via USB cable connection;
  4. iOS & 4th Generation and above Apple TV via BTLE connection;
  5. Android mobile devices via BTLE connection;
  6. Android Smart TV consoles via BTLE connection (coming soon);
  7. BTLE gaming consoles (coming soon);
  8. BTLE Raspberry Pi (Linux Support).

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

CaptoGlove’s textile was developed in Italy with the world-renowned sports glove maker Reusch. The design and manufacturing of the glove ensures a comfortable fit and long-lasting performance.  

  • Premium quality sensors & electronics;
  • Fully washable by removing a single easy-access sensor;
  • Breathable fabric, adjustable wrist strap and easy fit wrist opening ensure maximum comfort;
  • Capacitive thumb and index fingertips for an easy interaction with capacitive screens;
  • Easy undress rings add durability by providing stress-free removal.

 The Press

 
Global Trade Shows
 

 

Through our free proprietary software applications, CaptoGlove is 100% customizable supporting a wide variety of inputs/gestures. That's even more if you wear a pair! It’s plug & play design and user-friendly setup will ensure you are up and running in a matter of minutes.  


Free Software  

  • Windows PC compatible;
  • iOS & Android Apps (to be released between July & September);
  • SDKs (to be released between July & September) for independent development on Unity3D (Version 5+), Unreal Engine (Version 4), iOS framework (iOS 8.0), Android framework (Android 4.3, API level 18), Windows C# and Windows C++ library (Windows 8.1).

Setup  

Engineered for simplicity, CaptoGlove comes with preprogramed, customizable algorithms and a powerful GUI that makes setup simple and easy, in just a few basic steps:  

  1. Install preferred software (PC, iOS, Android);
  2. Connect CaptoGlove via Bluetooth;
  3. Import downloaded configuration profile, or create a custom one;
  4. Run calibration;
  5. Activate CaptoGlove with one-touch start/stop;
  6. Take Control.

CaptoGlove is made by an extremely advanced Attitude Heading Reference System (AHRS) with 10 Degrees of Freedom (10DoF).

Powered by a 3.7V Li-ion Polymer Battery and connected to a flexible and reliable sensors suite for finger bending positioning.

CaptoGlove can be coupled to additional CaptoSensor to provide an advanced dead reckoning positional tracking, therefore obtaining 10DoF+10DoF capability (20DoF). CaptoSensor can be extracted from the CaptoGlove endoskeleton or purchased separately as a single sensor.

 

 

Depending upon the reward tier selected, our backers will receive the following:  

  • One CaptoGlove or Pair of CaptoGloves (left & right);
  • Exclusive transport travel case – all tiers;
  • Mini USB charging cable – all tiers;
  • Two additional CaptoSensors – Indiegogo Exclusive tier only.

 

Indiegogo backer will have the opportunity to receive in their hands the Indiegogo CaptoGlove Suite (2 CaptoGlove + 2 CaptoSensor), months ahead compared to retail customers.

CaptoSensor will enable perception of arm’s movement on additional axis in order to obtain an advanced dead reckoning positional tracking for specific applications (for instance, when a distant object should be seized with the hand). CaptoSensor can be installed on any part of the body.

 

Shipping Information  

We will ship to backers in any country. We have worked very hard to keep shipping costs as low as possible, but you will be responsible for any additional duties, tariffs, taxes or fees that arise from your country of origin.    

 

Estimated Delivery

  • May for One CaptoGlove. Note: Due to manufacturing constraints, only orders for right-hand CaptoGlove in size Large will be received in May. All other CaptoGloves in these tiers will be received in June;
  • June for Medium right and Large-Medium Left CaptoGlove, CaptoGlove Pair;
  • September for Indiegogo Exclusive Suite.  

Delivery could be delayed in some cases if quantities are exceeded.


Sizing  

CaptoGlove can be used as either a left or right single unit, or together as a pair. Use the chart below to determine the best size for you. Please consider that CaptoGlove’s textile is very elastic and therefore offers flexibility. When the Indiegogo campaign ends, we will reach out to you for your choice in hand & size. The most common sizing requested is Large Right.

 

Warranty  

CaptoGlove comes with a 1 year limited warranty.  


Need Help?  

If you have questions, you can reach us info@captoglove.us.  


Why Order Now?  

By ordering now you will:  

  • Get exceptional discounts that won’t be offered again;
  • Receive CaptoGlove months ahead of retail customers;
  • Be part of our development brainstorming process;
  • Help shape the future of CaptoGlove.

 

We can’t do it without you! 

Please support us by sharing CaptoGlove to your friends, families and followers on social media.

 

 

Risks and Challenges

CaptoGlove has been under development for over 5 years by a tremendous team of diverse professionals including: Virtual Reality Experts, IT Developers, Hardware Engineers, Senior Executives, and Operations Managers.  This collective expertise has built a reliable product and company.  

We have planned and procured production agreements from component suppliers to manufacturers (Reusch for instance).  Software is inherently trickier.  A single bug can wreak havoc on even a stable library and cause disruption.  It is for this reason that we have spent a great deal of extra time and resources minimizing these risks.  

By leveraging research, we have been able to create comprehensive manufacturing plan for the proper roll-out of CaptoGloves needed in left/right and large or medium sizes.  However, delivery for some may be delayed if those estimates are exceeded by great numbers. 

We won't promise you amazing discounts or features that are only possible in fantasy.

Lastly, as previously stated, due to manufacturing constraints, only right-hand in size Large will be received by One CaptoGlove backers in May.  All other orders in these tiers will be received in June.

**This Campaign was set up to cater for additional demand and for those who missed out on our original campaign on Kickstarter.com. Stretch goals will be introduced once our priority goal is reached.**

IMPORTANT : All 2nd generation Street Slips will ship free worldwide, regardless of amount pledged.

For lower category perks, all Australians orders will also ship for free. For international orders, please add AUD7 for socks and AUD35 for 1st gen shoes. Shipping charges for international shipping is flat, regardless of the order quantity. 

In 2012, two friends and I grew frustrated by the lack of functional innovation, which was being showcased in the footwear industry. It seemed as though we all just got used to getting blisters, repetitive styles, and ill-fitting shoes. Our aim was to create a brand which offered the ultimate in forward-thinking footwear. It was from this thought, that HeavyTaste was born.  

We also wanted to celebrate Australia in our products, which is why we took inspiration from prominent Australian streets, in the design phase of our shoes.

What we have created is the Street Slip.

We work with smaller disadvantaged manufacturers to design and produce handmade shoes, using genuine leather. Mind you, we were surprised by how skilled these artisans were. We combined traditional skills with technology to reinforce our shoes with trademarked padding for comfort, and incorporating styles fit for both males and females. What we wanted was a truly functional footwear that comes without a loss of aesthetics.

A Few Words From The Artisan.


True innovation lies in the simplest of ideas. Our simple idea –change the cut of our shoes.

                 

                   Jump to: Top | Why Back Us | Perks | Referral Program | FAQs

By 2013, with a year of meticulous research and development, we were able to create a shoe cut unique to HeavyTaste. No other brand in the world has such a cut, as we developed a unique last which allows us to produce the ultimate slip-on style shoe.

Unlike oxford and brogues, the Street Slip’s ease of wear allows the wearer to put them on in a matter of seconds.

Unlike loafers, the cut allows the shoe to mould to the wearers’ feet to ensure a strong hold, and no slippage.

Our choice of materials have allowed for our slip, after a few wears, to mould like a glove to the wearer’s feet!

The Perfect Couple.

We have worked hard and long to make our slips genderless. If you are looking for a pair of trendy and comfortable kicks that would work great alone or even better in couples, then look no further!

                

                  Jump to: Top | Why Back Us | Perks | Referral Program | FAQs

Working with, and supporting, social enterprises are the cornerstones of HeavyTaste. With these in mind, we support our partners by purchasing their goods, which we then pass onto the customer at no additional cost. This innovative transactional relationship is the concept HeavyTaste champions.

We are proud to be partnering with STREAT, an Australian social enterprise, and supporting the work they do to improve the lives of the most disadvantaged youths in our local communities.

Picture & Video courtesy of Streat Ltd.

For more information on Streat please visit them at www.streat.com.au

NOTE : Due to the nature of the crowd-funding exercise and restrictions on air shipments, we are unable to supply coffee beans with Indiegogo's perks at this moment of time. The team at HeavyTaste is working on sustainable alternatives for a simple global solution in the near future.

We understand that a product like this may be ambiguous in response. Hence, we took our own initiative to launch our first batch of Street Slips. After 3 months in operation we are now confident that there is definite demand for our products. We have been truly thankful for the support our first batch of customers have given us.

Additionally, we have also garnered a significant amount of interest on our Kickstarter campaign.

Asia Pacific's Top Fashion Blogger: Cheesie @Cheeserland wearing our first generation Little Collins Slips:


With such success, we are aiming to champion our product and concept innovation to a global market with out 2nd generation Street Slips.

Our 2nd generation Street Slips will see numerous improvements in terms of comfort. The above image describes such changes visually. In a nutshell, the new and improved Street Slip will spot a more wearable cut with maximized comfort levels and uncompromising quality. Additionally, all new generation Street Slips will come with Memory Foam Insoles with trademarked Arch Support as part of our commitment to wearable fashion.

2nd Generation Street Slips

                

                     Jump to: Top | The Cut | Timeline | Referral Program | FAQs

The below is a visualization of the Perks offered.


How our invisible socks are different


DISTRIBUTOR PACKS

SIZING :

Heavytaste Footwear are EU sized. If you are unfamiliar or have never worn EU sized shoes before, we recommend downsizing by 1 size from your usual UK/US shoe size for the best possible experience. 

We however, do recommend you to take your usual UK/US size for our Street Sneaks due to a slightly different last used. 

If you are between sizes, always go for the lower end. Our StreetSlips are built to feel slightly tighter at the start but will mould to your feet like a glove, and expand after a wear or two. If there is preference for thicker socks feel free to take your original size.

Below are the conversion size charts we use on our shoes.

We always try our very best to assist with sizing. Feel free to email us at inquiries@heavytaste.com.au if needed or to leave us here a message on Kickstarter. We will reply to your needs as soon as we can! Alternatively we will be on live chat at www.heavytaste.com.au during Australian business hours.

Returns

We understand that sometimes, especially for footwear there is need to first try out the shoe before being able to determine the right sizing. 

We will accept all returns within 30 days of receipt of package as long as the package is returned to us in its original condition. 

Returned packages will be posted from us FREE Australia wide. A minimal fee of $30 will be charged for returned worldwide delivery.

               

                 Jump to: Top | The Cut | Why Back Us | Referral Program | FAQs

We have currently completed all our designs and technical details of the Street Slip. However, we will still be constantly testing for and improving on minor details of our product. Hence, if needed we will be updating the Indiegogo community and all our supporters on these changes.

Rest assured that we strive for perfection in everything we do and that all changes will improve the Street Slip experience.    

At the end of the Indiegogo campaign, a survey/email will be sent out where which backers will mark the shoe models and sizes they require. Updates via email will be consistently sent to all our backers on the progress of their orders. We expect to deliver 100% of our orders on the promised month. 

Good Things Deserve to go All Round!

Use the links provided below the video to share our Project Out! (It has to be shared via this link in order to qualify). We reward generous people with generous gifts.


FAQ

1). What is the width sizing of HeavyTaste Street Slips? Our Street Slips have standard width, in UK terms a standard D. That being said, we use extremely soft leather for the top, enabling our Street Slips to mould to wearer's feet after a few wears. Tried & tested by a few wide footed peeps!

2). Why HeavyTaste? Not only will you be one of the very first in the world to own a Street Slip (yes, this makes you a cool kid) but you will also be helping homeless/disadvantaged youth in obtaining a set of self-sustainable skills.

3). How are you sure that your cut is unique? We have done a whole load of R&D before rolling out our product. Rest assured that our shoes are constructed using a customized last built from scratch. We are pretty 101% sure of its uniqueness.

4). What is the difference between a 1st Gen Street Slip and a 2nd Gen Street Slip? Our 2nd Gen Slips have been improved in terms of aesthetics, comfort and cut. They hold better and is slightly more comfortable with the use of better materials and memory foam insoles albeit the slightly higher price. That being said, our 1st Gen Slips have been tried & tested (through our 3 month market trial) and have so far returned 100% satisfaction. You won't go wrong with either pair.

5). Are these Men's or Women's Shoes? Sizing Worries? All our shoes are unisex. They work perfectly well for both Men and Women (think TOMS / Converse). Our current range runs from EU35 up to EU 48. That is a huge range covered. We are always happy to help with sizing! Just send us an email over to inquiries@heavytaste.com.au

                

                 Jump to: Top | Why Back Us | Perks | Referral Program | FAQs

For Further Information about HeavyTaste & the work we have done in the past, feel free to look at the below. We invite you on this exciting journey with us. We look forward at serving you better at HeavyTaste Australia!

story:
WHY TAKE ON THE NIGHTDRESS?

If like me you love stylish, feminine and modern sleepwear - good luck finding good options at reasonable prices in sleepwear departments. I have literally searched everywhere.

When I got pregnant my desire for great sleep & loungewear became even stronger. As women we go through so many different stages in our lives when being comfortable is a number one priority. But why should comfortable mean boring or unflattering?

When I searched the market I could not find ANYONE making nightdresses or sleepwear that was remotely interesting to me or to any of the women I know. 

I started to think about how many women who could truly benefit from better designed sleep and loungewear made with super comfortable performance fabrics, including pregnant women, women in maternity leave, women who work from home and stay at home mums. 

This is when I decided that I wanted to make lounge and sleepwear, starting with beautiful nightdresses, for myself and every other modern woman out there wanting a better option than what is available in this category today.

ABOUT ME

My name is Anette Miwa Dimmen and I currently reside in Oslo, Norway. Having worked over 7 years in an international creative agency as a partner and consultant, I´m used to overseeing branding, design, product development and manufacturing processes. Over the years I have been in charge of creating products as diverse as homeware, personal accessories, stationary, hair & skincare, scented candles, jewellery and clothing for several private label clients. In fact, it was one of my most recent projects developing a line of active wear for a large cruise liner, that opened up my eyes to the amazing qualities of natural performance fabrics. 

COLLECTION

Our collection of five simple, flattering Nordic dress designs will make you feel comfortable, beautiful and effortlessly stylish - day and night.

COMFORT & EASY CARE

We use sustainable technical fabrics that are moisture wicking, highly breathable, crease and odour resistant - and machine washable. These easy to care for garments perfectly compliment busy, contemporary lifestyles reflecting women As We Are Now. 

STYLE

AW:AN dresses are both timeless and current. They don´t look at all like traditional sleepwear but rather like your favourite daywear dresses. The designs will flatter most body shapes, and are the perfect merger between sustainable technical fibers and Nordic minimalistic fashion aesthetics - in a product category ripe for modernisation.

 

SIZING

What size should you choose? AW:AN dresses follow standard European size charts. In other words your normal size applies. And should you  happen to choose a wrong size, there is a very good chance the dress will fit you perfectly anyway, as all of our styles are made in soft, non clingy knitted jersey fabrics that are easy to fit.

NOTE: Bust, waist & hip sizes are 1/2 sizes. For size incl. front and back you need to x2 :)

WE´VE GOT YOUR SHIPPING FEES COVERED! 

But backers from some countries may have to pay additional import duties and other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods, based on the import policies of their respective countries. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country and we are unable to help you determine that for your shipment. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authority of your country.

From our experience, we have learned that most of the countries have higher thresholds for import duties and a majority of our international customers don't get charged any additional fees.

RETURNS

If you follow the sizing chart and/or buy your usual size, then the dresses shall fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your dresses for any reason, we’ll happily do that but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. Because we are offering our dresses at highly discounted prices, we won’t be able to accept returns. Please make sure the items are unworn and unwashed. Also, all items must be in the condition you received them with all hangtags still attached. We accept exchanges up to 30 days of you receiving the dress(es).

COLOURS

We endevour to show the available dress colours as they are in real life. But please be aware that colors on mobile devices and computer monitors are not always 100% accurate. Unfortunately we can´t guarantee that your monitor’s display of colour, texture or detail will be accurate.

___________________

WHY WE NEED YOUR PLEDGE

We have come as far as we can on our own, and now we would love your support so we can:

- Get through this crucial start up phase

- Provide more colours and styles to you!  

- Produce new product lines 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

We believe there are very few risks involved with supporting our project and pre-ordering AW:AN lounge & nightdresses. Not only do we have 7 years experience with design and manufacturing, but we are already in production with our handpicked factory, working only with people that we have met and trust as a sound production partners.

WE´VE GOT YOUR SHIPPING FEES COVERED! 
But backers from some countries may have to pay additional import duties and other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods, based on the import policies of their respective countries. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country and we are unable to help you determine that for your shipment. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authority of your country.
From our experience, we have learned that most of the countries have higher thresholds for import duties and a majority of our international customers don't get charged any additional fees.
RETURNS
If you follow the sizing chart and/or buy your usual size, then the dresses shall fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your dresses for any reason, we’ll happily do that but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. Because we are offering our dresses at highly discounted prices, we won’t be able to accept returns. Please make sure the items are unworn and unwashed. Also, all items must be in the condition you received them with all hangtags still attached. We accept exchanges up to 30 days of you receiving the dress(es).
COLOURS
We endevour to show the available dress colours as they are in real life. But please be aware that colors on mobile devices and computer monitors are not always 100% accurate. Unfortunately we can´t guarantee that your monitor’s display of colour, texture or detail will be accurate.
___________________
WHY WE NEED YOUR PLEDGE
We have come as far as we can on our own, and now we would love your support so we can:
- Get through this crucial start up phase
- Provide more colours and styles to you!  
- Produce new product lines 
RISKS & CHALLENGES
We believe there are very few risks involved with supporting our project and pre-ordering AW:AN lounge & nightdresses. Not only do we have 7 years experience with design and manufacturing, but we are already in production with our handpicked factory, working only with people that we have met and trust as a sound production partners.

story: w.
story_txt: w.

story:
Finally!!! There is something every smart phone user will value.

What is JUST WaLLET?

Millions of people around the world wish the life of their smart phone’s battery was better. Are you one of those people? If you are, let us introduce you to JUST WaLLET, something you always wanted and never knew you had. It is the world’s most useful gadget when it comes to charging smart phones. What else, that you already have with you, could charge your mobile device?

JUST WaLLET: Key Features

Ordinary

It is just a normal-sized wallet, so it won’t take up any more space in your pocket/bag

Compatible

JUST WaLLET works with all Android and iOS mobile devices

Stylish

our goal is to create wallets in a variety of colours for him and for her and to offer you an attractive design

Helpful

JUST WaLLET will make your life a lot easier and better

Cool

with JUST WaLLET you will automatically become the center of attention regardless of your location or the people around you

More About JUST WaLLET: Product Details

Weight: 100 grams

Size: 3.5 x 5.0 inches

Capacity: 1900 mAh

It takes 180-210 minutes to charge the wallet and 150-180 minutes to recharge your phone.

JUST WaLLET is designed to charge mobile devices with the micro USB, 
30-pin or the Lightning connectors.

The JUST WaLLET story

It all started in September 2013. My wife asked me what I wanted for Christmas. It got me thinking about what I really needed. And I realized that my biggest wish was to solve the never-ending problem of my smart phone’s low battery life. So I started looking for different ways of solving that, but I didn’t succeed, because all the devices I found had an extra thing I had to buy and carry around with me and it took up too much space. Also, if I would forget to bring those things with me, I was screwed. And that bugged me. So I looked into my pockets and tried to figure out which one of the things I had with me could charge my phone. In my pockets there was nothing but a wallet. And than it hit me. I searched the internet for a wallet that could charge my phone. But unfortunately, I didn’t find anything. So I asked my friends around the world to help me find such thing. But of course, they didn’t find anything either. So I decided to create my own wallet and find out if there were any other people who had the same problem as me. I also did surveys and read questionnnaires. And that made me realize that this is the thing people all around the world hate the most. And so JUST WaLLET was created. From now on everybody can get one!  

Meet the JUST WaLLET Leadership Team

Ladislav Chaloupka, CEO

Bogdan Walek, CTO

Wendy Devodier, Assistant Manager

Jan Hlávka, Country Sales Manager

Jakub Hlávka, Export Sales Manager


You can choose your color and connectivity when the campaign is over. We'll communicate with all contributers via e-mail.


Risks and challenges

Regulatory Approvals: We are confident that we have a robust, reliable and safe product; however, the approvals process can be unpredictable and add time to a schedule. We have mitigated this risk by designing for certification and by hiring a specialist with many years of experience navigating this process with mobile phone adapter products.

Supply Chain: There are also inherent risks around establishing robust and repeatable manufacturing processes. We are projecting four months to set-up production because we know JUST WaLLET will use standard manufacturing processes as well as off-the-shelf electrical components. That means that every component in our system can be sourced reliably in volume today. However, manufacturing issues can easily delay delivery, so the supply chain effort will be a top priority for us in the months to come.

Fulfillment: We expect to fulfill the majority of our rewards directly from our contract manufacturing partner. We expect to finalize our third party logistics partner in December.

e-mail: justwallet@email.cz

We will be keeping all our backers fully informed as we finalize our manufacturing partner(s), receive regulatory approvals, and start production.

story:
We live in a world where everyone has a copy of something. A copy of a phone, watch, purse, dress, etc. Even luxury items are made in hundreds or thousands of copies. With all the technological advancements of our time, there is no way to have a unique product; you have to share it with millions of people. Not anymore! SecretBrand* changes that with your support. We desire to build a webshop where you can design your dresses and create your artwork or pick one from our designers/artist's collections.

SecretBrand * it's a startup about fashion, technology, marketing, branding, software, art and e-commerce.

We invested three years in solving this problem, and now we have the ideal solution. We are ready to implement the project.

After the research and market study were completed, a brand new user-friendly wireframe artwork editor was born. After we did the research, studied the market, and avoided unwanted influences we have created a friendly wireframe editor. This editor will be the core of our posh webshop experience and the central spot where you can buy a dress, a blouse, a skirt, a scarf or just design your own artwork. We use only high-quality materials certified for printing just to be sure that your unique artwork will look great and stand the test of time. (M.H.B.B)

You know it's posh because:

The artworks made by our designers took six months to complete. The finished product is manufactured exclusively for you and you alone.

- The amount of work put in by our artists and the fact that you have the original design makes the dress priceless. We call it "fabric art.”
- The dress, skirt, blouse or scarf are always unique.
- We produce “Made to Order” with the latest fabric printing technology, using only premium quality materials.
- Made in the USA and/or Europe.

How do we make sure your dress is unique?

If you don't want to buy a ready-made product from the standard part of our webshop  you have three unique options:

1. You have at your disposal a state of the art editor which allows you to modify a professional artwork to suit your needs.
2. If you feel creative, you can create your own artwork from scratch. (M.H.B.B)
3. Alternatively, you can just pick an existing unique design created by our artists.

Using these methods: "ready-made original artwork","do it yourself artwork", and "modify the original" will guarantee that the piece you buy from us will be unique in the whole wide world.

The editor is so easy to use that a kid can make stunning looking artworks? The price you pay for a unique dress is having fun. One design, one dress.

M.H.B.B = Make History, Build a Brand!

How do we make sure that one dress means one design?
The process goes something like this:

1. First, we paint on canvas or paper. 
2. We digitize the physical art. 
3. We add or modify features if needed.
4. In many cases we destroy the original. 
5. Only the emotion and memory remain, on your dress.

Disclaimer: We don't use this method for all our products. 


 

Jon Barack is the founder of SecretBrand*. He holds a master's degree in economics and developed niche markets in the last 25 years. A lot of accomplishments but also failures taught him valuable lessons that he brings to this project. He likes to say that you can have resources and a good idea, but the team makes or breaks a project. Ideas are one dime a dozen, but a good team is not.

Julien Priest is the co-founder of SecretBrand*. He holds a master's degree in architecture and coordinates the visual aspects of the brand. Most concerned with proportions, scale, color and UI/UX perfection he will make sure that you never feel out of place in the SecretBrand* ecosystem. He often says: "Good design makes you feel complete."

Chris Nastase, Co-founder. Engineer with a sharp mind and a mathematical approach to things. He always helps the team keep on track when the time is short. His fondness for order, perfection, and clear thinking brings out the best in each team member.

Michael T, Co-founder. A graduate of the University of Fine Arts with a BA in Graphic Arts. A well-rounded creator that isn't your typical artist as he is not looking to be eccentric. Many people try to shock and create buzz, not Michael. Michael lets his true self shine through his work. He does not want to impress the viewer by shocking him; real beauty is his goal. The kind of beauty that makes you stop and lose yourself in the intricate patterns with sublime proportions. With his talent, the team is able to produce the stunning art needed to make each dress unique.

In this project, we have a strong executive team as well as a board of advisors. It gives the project that mix of DNA, a plurality of minds that work seamlessly, giving the feeling that complex processes are just simple things.

Like always, the simple things are quite complicated.

We have a team of thirty people from all around the world, USA, Canada, Australia, Brasil, France, Ukraine, U.K, Russia, Germany, Romania, Italy and it's still growing!

Our team is specialized in every relevant domain: fashion design, graphic artist, A/V producer, architecture, art, entrepreneurship, software, e-commerce, intellectual property, branding, advertising, marketing, engineering and textile industry. Our combined experience is over 200 years.

 

SecretBrand * (*currently undisclosed brand luxury fashion) proudly presents the solution for a problem that tormented humanity for at least 100 years.

 

The Problem

You're at a party or meeting, and you see your dress cloned. Ouch! Now you'll be spending the whole night desperately avoiding your look-alike.

Hint: Just Google "same dress"


 

Why?

An ordinary dress is made from a pre-existing printed material, which either comes from a special store or a fabric store. These fabrics are produced in batches of 1000 to 1000000 sq. ft. Just imagine how many clones can come out of that! How do you feel about your beloved new dress now?

The Solution

A unique graphic design in a dress, skirt or blouse, tailored as the only one in the whole wide world.

Is this really possible?

Now, it is.


 

How?

We are offering you the opportunity to create your artwork either working alone or with our help. You start with an adjustable template and using our exclusive online editor let your imagination run wild.

Or,

You can use and adjust our designers' unique digital artwork. When your design is finished, we take care of everything for you. The dress will be ready to wear delivered at your doorsteps. Unique, only for you.

Are you ready? ( B.B.B.B)

Your unique dress can be on its way.



The Team

We are a multinational team. We spent over three long years of arduous research and creative development until we figured out all the nuts and bolts of the solution.

As a result, we have the necessary technology and the architecture for our online editor, the webshop wireframe and the brain power to make it all fall nicely into place.

Our team of designers and programmers are eager for the final development of this idea; we need to polish the website's design, raise a marketing budget and sort things out in matters of intellectual property. For that, we do need your help!

Will you give us the fuel we need to launch our project?

Join us in this endeavor of providing the unique dress that YOU deserve.

Support us, be a backer! Let’s make the world unique! Thank you!

 B.B.B.B = Be a Backer, Build a Brand!


 


 

1. We value your input.
2. You can leave your mark on an exceptional product, unique in the world.
3. You help build a brand; you don't just buy a gadget.
4. Your ideas matter; we put them into practice.
5. We already did the hard work; you now participate in the fun stuff.
6. You have the opportunity to see a new page in the clothing industry. A "State of the Arts" product for the 21st century. (tech, fashion, software, brand)
7. It's a unique idea aimed at disrupting the lifeless fashion market. A guaranteed success.
8. You can decide who will be our brand ambassador. Indeed, you choose!
9. A personal reason. So I can keep the promise I made to my dearest Mary, Francesca, and Katrina. I dedicate this project to them - they mean everything to me. Thank you for your patience, I've spent a lot of time away from home.
10. Promote young artists! We have seasoned designers on our team, but we strive to give young people a "wild card." Let them show us what they've got. You can support the best by choosing their artworks. You never know, some of them can end up big.
 

         

 

So far the project was funded via bootstrapping. From now on the project will be crowdfunded.

The goal is to launch the online webshop. In essence, it's a simple thing, but for a professional site with a proprietary design editor that aims at the best results, it can be tricky. We welcome all backers, women or men. The webshop is about: fashion, technology, software, and e-commerce.

The final client will be of course women, but men have proven to be exceptionally in tune with the ladies' needs and desires and also have a good eye for future business success. There is nothing a woman loves more than a man who buys her a unique dress just to show how much he loves her.

We need to raise money:

1. For software development, the online proprietary editor. We already have the basics, but we need more to make it perfect for a stellar consumer experience (UX/UI). If we make unique dresses, our editor needs to be unique as well.
2. For the intellectual property of the brand. (SecretBrand  is a temporary name)
3. To pay and reward the designers and other artists for exquisite artwork that you can wear and build image libraries.
4. For promotion and the launching event.

The minimum sum required is $80,000. This is only for the webshop; promoting it will require additional funds.


 

The image is the best representation of our present stage. We've built the foundation for a future in which SecretBrand will become a real force. And for that, we need your help.
 

We consider of utmost importance to have a generous marketing budget. Any business that does not take this into account will do badly. You can have an excellent product, a USP (unique selling proposition), and still hit the wall, because no one knows that the product exists.

We have the highest standards: we want to dress your soul not just your body.

All the money exceeding the campaign goal will be used for branding and marketing.

On the production side, we let the machines, tailors, and designers do their jobs as best they can. We are not interested in buying the means of production. As an order of magnitude, the printing/cutting equipment would cost around $700,000. All the research, development, and production must come together as seamlessly as possible. We have a lot to manage without the added complexity of production.

Because we are targeting the luxury segment of the market, we need to come up with a stunning UX and focused solutions for the needs of our clients. We will solve the biggest problem of a fashion webshop: "Will this product fit me well when I buy it?" The answer is”yes”.

In the unlikely case that our goals( $80,000) are not met, the money raised will be channeled in the final development of our proprietary design editor. We will keep you updated going forward!

 

 

We have a unique list of perks that you will love. If you like a perk, it means you love our project, better said our startup, because we're not in the project stage, we're already implementing.

We don't offer T-shirts or caps; we have some more exciting perks for you. Most importantly we value your advice and opinion, and this is what matters to us. You can steer the project with your vote and, therefore, we offer value for your contribution. For example, you can choose a brand ambassador or participate as a designer in the artwork of a dress.

We will also have some surprise perks.

They will pop-up from time to time, so stay tuned. 

Secret Burger

 

Get us a Cappuccino 

 

Anti-stress Colouring Book

 

Choose the Brand's Ambassador

 

Get BETA Access

 

Choose the First Dress Model

 

Find out the SecretBrand

 

VIP Pass

 

Limited Edition Scarf

 

Limited Edition Scarf (Sign.)

 

Markers of History

 

The Secret Perk

 

Unique, Forever

 

Home, sweet home!

 

Any woman knows the feeling when she goes out, and a look-alike appears out of the blue. To see another woman dressed like you, after all the effort you put in finding the perfect dress, it's maddening.

Every problem has a solution. You can build a premium brand together with us. Somewhere to go when every other fashion brand fails. Help us build a premium fashion brand that solves the problem of mass-produced dresses for you.

 

 

If you want to pledge $5, you are welcome to do so. Of course, we would be happy if you would pledge $1000.

If you don't have the money, but you want to help us, please share our Indiegogo campaign on facebook, twitter or Instagram! Help us spread the story.

If you've invested the time and read what we had to say, thank you! We already have something in common, determination.

 

Why?

The market is huge. The global apparel market is valued at 3 trillion dollars. The women’s wear industry is estimated at 621 billion dollars. The luxury segment is worth 339 billion dollars.

We are focused on a niche in the luxury segment. Quality, not quantity is important. Quality defined by the best materials and a unique artwork printed on only one dress or other clothing. So keep in mind that you can buy a unique artwork made by our designers, you can modify one, or even create one from scratch. This will solve the embarrassing, oops, “X” has the same dress as me.

The "unique" problem is huge in this market. The solution today is: use a personal tailor from a local fashion house (they still work with the same fabrics, high chance to look 90% the same). This method can be cumbersome as you have to spend a lot of time and mental energy searching for the tailor. You can still end up with a dress that is just a little bit different compared to a mass-produced one.

How?

We work with a well-trained team that has everything figured out with outstanding experience in their fields.

What?

A strong brand with organic growth. SecretBrand in 6 concepts:

- Easy.
- 100% original art
- Unique in world
- Get it all over the world with a click
- Smile guaranteed
- Handmade

 

 

 

We have a big team; the startup is made up of 30 people. Every one of them had a personal crisis in their lives, because of that, we are all here today. We have confidence in our experience and our skills.

What is the risk?

-To be overlooked by women that can afford a luxury product from SecretBrand because they don't know about us.

-To miss the "must buy" list of women who don't value an unique look.

-To be misunderstood as another fashion company if we can't explain all the innovations precisely.

-"Drive to action" is a strange cocktail of emotion and the brand's "wow" factor that can't be precisely predicted.

We must make sure that we have the "wow" factor; similar to quality jewelry. Dresses must be displayed. You must be proud to have one and others should want one too. Few people will pride themselves with a future SecretBrand item.

We have another say at SecretBrand: Everything can be done with enough will. We don't want to reinvent the wheel. We just improve the essential parts, get things working together with style and originality. We are doing this for you because we like freedom and choice.

It is a challenge to grow in the eyes of your future customers and get them to see, really see. A challenge that we enjoy; and that's why we need you to help us. With a team like ours, with the energy and vision, all we need is exposure. Once women see us, there will be no turning back! Do you start to see how this will change you?

Having a solid growing team will help us attract funding. However, the primary challenge is the future recognition and acceptance of our brand in a market dominated by big corporations with intense competition. This can only be tackled by our team if we maintain a clear and sharp focus on delivering unique luxury.

The final step is the online medium. People are naturally distrusting of webshops that sell clothes online. You can't touch the fabric; you can't try it on before you buy and there are some limitations faced by the online retailers. We will alleviate these fears once the first customers see that everything is just as pictured on the site.

At the same time, online orders bring a plethora of questions related to size and/or fabric texture/feel. Fortunately, we do have a solution to all of these issues.

We mitigate any risk by having a well-rounded and robust team. We can adapt and meet diverse and unpredictable challenges, as we did many times before. The fashion market is healthy, a lot of competition yet most of it is absent from this particular niche; this is why we will have the first mover advantage. We have the solutions, and now we hope your support.

 

 

This is a unique opportunity to be a SecretBrand ambassador, build with us and share! You can do this. We always encourage people to take action. If you like this project, please support it, with money or with personal involvement. Therefore, please share, spread the news or talk about it with your friends! If you want to show us how you promoted SecretBrand* send us a message on our official email, and maybe you will win a discount and a marketing recommendation for your portfolio!

 

 

Are you a graphic designer (Illustrator, Painter, Patternizer, Textile designer) with a unique portfolio?

Are you interested in becoming an artist/designer for SecretBrand? Drop us an email on design(at)uniqueintheworld.com  with your portfolio and we will get back to you as soon as our campaign has reached its goal!

Hint: Just Google "same dress"

 
Why?
An ordinary dress is made from a pre-existing printed material, which either comes from a special store or a fabric store. These fabrics are produced in batches of 1000 to 1000000 sq. ft. Just imagine how many clones can come out of that! How do you feel about your beloved new dress now?
The Solution
A unique graphic design in a dress, skirt or blouse, tailored as the only one in the whole wide world.
Is this really possible?
Now, it is.

 
How?
We are offering you the opportunity to create your artwork either working alone or with our help. You start with an adjustable template and using our exclusive online editor let your imagination run wild.
Or,
You can use and adjust our designers' unique digital artwork. When your design is finished, we take care of everything for you. The dress will be ready to wear delivered at your doorsteps. Unique, only for you.
Are you ready? ( B.B.B.B)
Your unique dress can be on its way.

The Team
We are a multinational team. We spent over three long years of arduous research and creative development until we figured out all the nuts and bolts of the solution.
As a result, we have the necessary technology and the architecture for our online editor, the webshop wireframe and the brain power to make it all fall nicely into place.
Our team of designers and programmers are eager for the final development of this idea; we need to polish the website's design, raise a marketing budget and sort things out in matters of intellectual property. For that, we do need your help!
Will you give us the fuel we need to launch our project?
Join us in this endeavor of providing the unique dress that YOU deserve.
Support us, be a backer! Let’s make the world unique! Thank you!
 B.B.B.B = Be a Backer, Build a Brand!

 
 
1. We value your input.2. You can leave your mark on an exceptional product, unique in the world.3. You help build a brand; you don't just buy a gadget.4. Your ideas matter; we put them into practice.5. We already did the hard work; you now participate in the fun stuff.6. You have the opportunity to see a new page in the clothing industry. A "State of the Arts" product for the 21st century. (tech, fashion, software, brand)7. It's a unique idea aimed at disrupting the lifeless fashion market. A guaranteed success.8. You can decide who will be our brand ambassador. Indeed, you choose!9. A personal reason. So I can keep the promise I made to my dearest Mary, Francesca, and Katrina. I dedicate this project to them - they mean everything to me. Thank you for your patience, I've spent a lot of time away from home.10. Promote young artists! We have seasoned designers on our team, but we strive to give young people a "wild card." Let them show us what they've got. You can support the best by choosing their artworks. You never know, some of them can end up big.           So far the project was funded via bootstrapping. From now on the project will be crowdfunded.The goal is to launch the online webshop. In essence, it's a simple thing, but for a professional site with a proprietary design editor that aims at the best results, it can be tricky. We welcome all backers, women or men. The webshop is about: fashion, technology, software, and e-commerce.The final client will be of course women, but men have proven to be exceptionally in tune with the ladies' needs and desires and also have a good eye for future business success. There is nothing a woman loves more than a man who buys her a unique dress just to show how much he loves her.We need to raise money:1. For software development, the online proprietary editor. We already have the basics, but we need more to make it perfect for a stellar consumer experience (UX/UI). If we make unique dresses, our editor needs to be unique as well.2. For the intellectual property of the brand. (SecretBrand  is a temporary name)3. To pay and reward the designers and other artists for exquisite artwork that you can wear and build image libraries.4. For promotion and the launching event.The minimum sum required is $80,000. This is only for the webshop; promoting it will require additional funds. The image is the best representation of our present stage. We've built the foundation for a future in which SecretBrand will become a real force. And for that, we need your help. We consider of utmost importance to have a generous marketing budget. Any business that does not take this into account will do badly. You can have an excellent product, a USP (unique selling proposition), and still hit the wall, because no one knows that the product exists.We have the highest standards: we want to dress your soul not just your body.All the money exceeding the campaign goal will be used for branding and marketing.On the production side, we let the machines, tailors, and designers do their jobs as best they can. We are not interested in buying the means of production. As an order of magnitude, the printing/cutting equipment would cost around $700,000. All the research, development, and production must come together as seamlessly as possible. We have a lot to manage without the added complexity of production.Because we are targeting the luxury segment of the market, we need to come up with a stunning UX and focused solutions for the needs of our clients. We will solve the biggest problem of a fashion webshop: "Will this product fit me well when I buy it?" The answer is”yes”.In the unlikely case that our goals( $80,000) are not met, the money raised will be channeled in the final development of our proprietary design editor. We will keep you updated going forward!  We have a unique list of perks that you will love. If you like a perk, it means you love our project, better said our startup, because we're not in the project stage, we're already implementing.We don't offer T-shirts or caps; we have some more exciting perks for you. Most importantly we value your advice and opinion, and this is what matters to us. You can steer the project with your vote and, therefore, we offer value for your contribution. For example, you can choose a brand ambassador or participate as a designer in the artwork of a dress.We will also have some surprise perks. They will pop-up from time to time, so stay tuned. Secret Burger Get us a Cappuccino  
Anti-stress Colouring Book

 
Choose the Brand's Ambassador

 
Get BETA Access

 
Choose the First Dress Model

 
Find out the SecretBrand

 
VIP Pass

 
Limited Edition Scarf

 
Limited Edition Scarf (Sign.)

 

Markers of History

 
The Secret Perk

 
Unique, Forever

 
Home, sweet home!


 
Any woman knows the feeling when she goes out, and a look-alike appears out of the blue. To see another woman dressed like you, after all the effort you put in finding the perfect dress, it's maddening.Every problem has a solution. You can build a premium brand together with us. Somewhere to go when every other fashion brand fails. Help us build a premium fashion brand that solves the problem of mass-produced dresses for you.  If you want to pledge $5, you are welcome to do so. Of course, we would be happy if you would pledge $1000.If you don't have the money, but you want to help us, please share our Indiegogo campaign on facebook, twitter or Instagram! Help us spread the story.If you've invested the time and read what we had to say, thank you! We already have something in common, determination. Why?The market is huge. The global apparel market is valued at 3 trillion dollars. The women’s wear industry is estimated at 621 billion dollars. The luxury segment is worth 339 billion dollars.We are focused on a niche in the luxury segment. Quality, not quantity is important. Quality defined by the best materials and a unique artwork printed on only one dress or other clothing. So keep in mind that you can buy a unique artwork made by our designers, you can modify one, or even create one from scratch. This will solve the embarrassing, oops, “X” has the same dress as me.The "unique" problem is huge in this market. The solution today is: use a personal tailor from a local fashion house (they still work with the same fabrics, high chance to look 90% the same). This method can be cumbersome as you have to spend a lot of time and mental energy searching for the tailor. You can still end up with a dress that is just a little bit different compared to a mass-produced one.How?We work with a well-trained team that has everything figured out with outstanding experience in their fields.What?A strong brand with organic growth. SecretBrand in 6 concepts:- Easy.- 100% original art- Unique in world- Get it all over the world with a click- Smile guaranteed- Handmade   We have a big team; the startup is made up of 30 people. Every one of them had a personal crisis in their lives, because of that, we are all here today. We have confidence in our experience and our skills.What is the risk?-To be overlooked by women that can afford a luxury product from SecretBrand because they don't know about us.-To miss the "must buy" list of women who don't value an unique look.-To be misunderstood as another fashion company if we can't explain all the innovations precisely.-"Drive to action" is a strange cocktail of emotion and the brand's "wow" factor that can't be precisely predicted.We must make sure that we have the "wow" factor; similar to quality jewelry. Dresses must be displayed. You must be proud to have one and others should want one too. Few people will pride themselves with a future SecretBrand item.We have another say at SecretBrand: Everything can be done with enough will. We don't want to reinvent the wheel. We just improve the essential parts, get things working together with style and originality. We are doing this for you because we like freedom and choice.It is a challenge to grow in the eyes of your future customers and get them to see, really see. A challenge that we enjoy; and that's why we need you to help us. With a team like ours, with the energy and vision, all we need is exposure. Once women see us, there will be no turning back! Do you start to see how this will change you?Having a solid growing team will help us attract funding. However, the primary challenge is the future recognition and acceptance of our brand in a market dominated by big corporations with intense competition. This can only be tackled by our team if we maintain a clear and sharp focus on delivering unique luxury.The final step is the online medium. People are naturally distrusting of webshops that sell clothes online. You can't touch the fabric; you can't try it on before you buy and there are some limitations faced by the online retailers. We will alleviate these fears once the first customers see that everything is just as pictured on the site.At the same time, online orders bring a plethora of questions related to size and/or fabric texture/feel. Fortunately, we do have a solution to all of these issues.We mitigate any risk by having a well-rounded and robust team. We can adapt and meet diverse and unpredictable challenges, as we did many times before. The fashion market is healthy, a lot of competition yet most of it is absent from this particular niche; this is why we will have the first mover advantage. We have the solutions, and now we hope your support.  This is a unique opportunity to be a SecretBrand ambassador, build with us and share! You can do this. We always encourage people to take action. If you like this project, please support it, with money or with personal involvement. Therefore, please share, spread the news or talk about it with your friends! If you want to show us how you promoted SecretBrand* send us a message on our official email, and maybe you will win a discount and a marketing recommendation for your portfolio!  Are you a graphic designer (Illustrator, Painter, Patternizer, Textile designer) with a unique portfolio?Are you interested in becoming an artist/designer for SecretBrand? Drop us an email on design(at)uniqueintheworld.com  with your portfolio and we will get back to you as soon as our campaign has reached its goal!

story:
WatchIsThis - "So Willis Judd is raising the bar on all fronts, by offering what might be the best affordable, oversized quartz watch in the current market."

The Wrist Watch Review - "The face is quite pretty – the numerals seem to float over the fiber – and the case is bold and fun."

WatchuSeek - "What’s striking is the incredibly low starting price, considering the watch is made from carbon fiber and has a sapphire crystal lens."

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Who are we?

Having worked in the family jewellery business growing up, we learnt a lot about design and manufacturing, especially producing quality items at a reasonable cost - Skills in finding the right suppliers for each individual part, building relationships and negotiating skills proved to be exceptionally necessary here for our high requirements.

Pair this with a love for watches, and it was only a matter of time before we made one of our own. Kickstarter has make this possible for us so we stepped aside from the family business and focused on creating way to bring our product to life.

Our design inspiration came from the love for all things Carbon Fiber. Living on the Central Coast in Australia, we wanted something to also fit that lifestyle. We wanted it to not look over the top but at the same time we did not want it to look too minimalistic. Making the watch at 45mm and with a nice clean look works really well.

It took over a year to see our first sketches transform into a prototype we are proud of, and a watch we are happy with putting on the market. 

We're happy to say that our prototype has filled us with immense confidence and we're sure that this will be a hit - especially considering the package we offer for the price.

If you have a look around the watch market, for our watch specification, we are surprisingly competitive. Even comparing our watch to over new entries who claim to be removing the middle man and passing on the savings.

We have a huge passion for watches. We hope this is the first of many watch projects for us. Please pledge to show your support and share our campaign. We'd really like to bring this project to life. We want to thank you all for being a part of this journey.

Daniel and Thomas 

Feel free to contact us using the comments or at team@willisjuddwatches.com

story:
Welcome

Hello, my name is Sarah.  For a few years I have been making clothes for myself & some close friends, people like what I made so I created an Etsy & occasionally receive an order from someone to create a unique, one off garment for them.  I'd love to quit my day job & sew every day, creating things I love for people who will love them as equally, currently however this cannot happen, for a few reasons:

  • A website - I use etsy which isn't the best for reaching people specific to my demographic.
  • An overlocker - I am limited to what I can sew at the minute due to only having a sewing machine
  • A brief sewing/design course. There is only so much the internet & trial and error can teach me.

Help me & be rewarded in return

If I receive my goal, I can sort out the things above, and thanks to you - my dream will becme closer than I could imagine.

If you want to help, your donation will be rewarded with an item crafted by me or with a discount for a larger custom piece.

If I don't reach my goal - Indiegogo will return your money - I won't keep it.

Further

I think my designs speak volumes for this, please have a look at my facebook & tumblr for past works & current in progress makes.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DecimateFashion

Tumblr: http://decimatefashionblog.tumblr.com/

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help, please share my fundraiser with your friends & people who may appreciate my works.  It would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks!

 

**PLEASE NOTE DATES TO RECEIVE ARE APPROXIMATE - I WILL KEEP YOU UP TO DATE ON YOUR GARMENT PROGRESS**

 

DONATIONS DO NOT INCLUDE POSTAGE

story:
Short Summary

Moment is the creation of one man's passion to create performance apparel with a culture never to be broken down by corporate America, along with another man's incredible talent in textiles who moved his family to America to escape the violence of his home country.  

Brought together by the grace of God, they created an incredible product that has been praised by local retailers, trainers and athletes.  

Along the way talented people volunteered their expertise, time and energy to be part of something special.  Now they are the foundation of everything needed to be a successful brand while being committed to bringing you the coolest, high quality products in the athletic arena. Our resume of companies speaks for itself..but more importantly our products and our moral compass speak louder.

 

Now is the time for the world to be exposed to Moment.  We are asking you to take part and BE a part of the movement.

Introducing Phase II of our acclaimed Calm-n-Cool fabric in our signature Low Pressure Tee and our initial offering of the new Po-Low Pressure shirt. We want you to try the shirt that started it all while giving you the option to be the first to own the newest addition to our line and save some money in the process.  Professionally designed, engineered and created to provide the best fit, the softest feel and to drastically reduce odor, we feel like it is the best performance shirt on the market and we think you will agree. 

But don't just wear Moment!  Be a part of Moment through our incredible social media platform that allows you to be our ambassador!

With your help we can continue as a brand that you not only help grow, but one that you can be a part of for the rest of your life.

Embrace the Pressure!!

 

 

Joe Eberly Owner – Legacy Fitness-

“The first time I wore Moment to train in I knew that they had found the missing ingredient that separates them from the large brands we all know.” 

www.legacyfitnessusa.com

Betsy Huges Owner – Track Shack-

“Your shirt is my favorite shirt. The feel is so soft. It’s just a great performance fabric”

www.trackshack.com

John Collingwood Mental Strength Expert-

“I’ve competed on 5 different continents and I’m always on the look out for new gear and technology. Your low pressure shirt is the best fabric I’ve ever worn.” 

Risks & Challenges

Risks and challenges

As with any apparel production process, there are always risks that are out of our control. (Natural disasters, untimely accidents, zombie apocalypse, etc). All those fancy jackets and pants with 104 different pockets and accessories provide 104 different problems and customer complaints. You don't have that worry with Moment. 
Our team's experience with major brands and production should calm your nerves. Plus we've produced an initial line already with success and many other orders for our existing customer base so our quality in fit and function have been solidified. 
Our textile genius has 25 years of experience and a personal and professional relationship with our manufacturer that's lasted over 10 years. 
Our biggest challenge will be man hours to ship your products on a timely fashion. This is the primary reason to offer only one color in each shirt at this time. We will keep you updated on delivery dates but we do ask for your patience as the man hours to receive, warehouse, input inventory into the system, pull orders and ship is quite large and we want to set the right expectations. Believe me, we've read all the comments both positive and negative with these kind of projects. 
It's not guaranteed like death and taxes but we feel like we have minimized the challenges so that you can have the utmost mental confidence that we deliver what we promise.

Other Ways You Can Help

Sometimes extra money is not available or our product doesn't fit your needs.  But if you love our brand and our platform, please consider visiting our social media pages and follow or like.  It would mean a lot to our growth and we can't thank you enough.

 

SYMBOL OF CLARITY

Throughout time, “Clarity” has been universally represented symbolically by the circle and triangle.

The Symbol of Clarity represents what every athlete needs to perform at the highest level. Athletes often refer to clarity as “the zone”. But it’s more than just a physical feeling. It’s a feeling that all the human senses are working together to “slow things down”, and the brain is processing those thoughts and feelings with ease.

When the senses perform at this level, then so too does the athlete. A confidence and calmness takes over that is….. ”CLARITY”.
