story:
Issue #1: 22 million kgs of plastic enters our oceans every day.

Issue #2: 25% of all ocean plastic pollution is flip flops and sandals*. Most are made from plastic and they are often poorly fitting, break easily and every pair made is a threat to marine life.

Our idea: Transform the flip flop market; move away from plastic (including recycled) and deliver an eco-friendly product with comfort, style, and durability whilst also providing a simple way for everyone to stop ocean-bound plastic.

* Source: Biological Sciences Department, University of California San Diego.

​After a year in the making, we have:

  • Sourced eco-friendly materials
  • Designed a great range of flip flops alongside Havaianas' former Head of Research and Development
  • Selected incredible grassroots organisations that we will be supporting; Plastic Bank, Plastic Oceans International, Ocean Sole Africa and Blue Crew
  • Undertaken a successful trial release

Our flip flops are completely earth-friendly. If you lose your flip flops at sea or they end up buried in your garden, or even in landfill, they will break down and not have a negative effect on that environment. They are made from Biodegradable Natural Rubber. No plastic, no pollution, no harm to our planet. 

 

In 2021, through the sales of our flip flops, we will collect the equivalent of one million ocean-bound plastic bottles (20,000kg of plastic) from rivers and coastlines, with this target increasing year on year as we grow. 

How? Plastic pollution is a result of the lack of incentives to recycle where they are needed most. We will use profits to fund a network of grassroots organisations, in developing countries; offering cash, food vouchers, education materials and medical supplies in exchange for collected plastic. This system helps protect our oceans, as well as providing vital support to those in need. This a truly unique way of using fashion for good.

If we could produce a truly desirable flip flop, then we had a real chance of making change happen. So, naturally, we called Brazil, the "home of the flip flop", and enlisted the help of the former Havaianas' Head of Research and Development, Alexandre Coelho. 

We examined over 30 flip flop brands, read product reviews and conducted countless consumer interviews to understand your needs and develop a fantastic product.

We wanted to come up with solutions to all of the flip flop issues that drive you crazy, and we have delivered on the issues most important to you!

 

 

 

It was important enough for many of you to tell us about, so as requested, we will also offer our flip flops with the option of:

  • Contrasting logos, so you can be loud and proud about your Sea Sense flip flops (blue logo on our white flip flops, white on other colours)
  • The logo the same colour as the flip flop, if you're looking for that more subtle, formal look 

Our small trial release tested our manufacturing and shipping systems. We offered blue, black and white flip flops. Immediately it became apparent that you wanted colour! Our original colours are still available here, but we are so excited about the new colour options we have for you. 

Our flip flops are completely inspired by our oceans; whether it be the bold colours we have used and the materials we have made the flip flops from, or the unique wave pattern we have designed on the sole. They are unlike any other flip flops out there. 

Our flip flops follow three simple principles: sustainability, design, and fair price. We asked ourselves the question, what use are sustainable products if they’re ugly and unaffordable for most people? So we have worked hard to make a beautiful flip flop and ensure that sustainability is accessible to all.     

Based on the classic, much loved, thong flip flop, but vastly improved. With detailed styling including our unique wave design on the strap, our men's flip flops have a masculine yet refined look. 

They are comfortable, long-lasting, and up for whatever challenge you throw at them, at the beach or in the city. Bold and stylish, we have made a flip flop for all occasions.

We have a wonderful selection of colours, as bold as you want to be. From our Orca Black, Deep Ocean Blue and Iceberg White, through to our brighter Fire Coral Red, Sea Grass Green and Sea Breeze Green. 

Simple and chic were the buzzwords for us when designing our women's flip flop. With a slightly thinner sole and a more elegant strap, our women's flip flops are as sleek and beautiful as they are durable.

We didn't want to compromise on style just because we are using sustainable products, so we designed this range especially for women who want both. The perfect shoe for daytime or evening, we are really proud of this design.

We wanted to mix the formal with the summery in our collection. We have our staples of Orca Black, Deep Ocean Blue and Iceberg White, as well as the dazzling Coral Pink, Parrotfish Green and Sandy Gold.   

If you back the project, our team will reach out when the campaign has ended, sending you the full pdf. catalogue of sizes and colours (including logo variations) to help you choose your preference. We will offer women’s sizing in UK 3-7 and men's UK 8-12. We will be growing the range of sizes, but as a start up we had to follow the market research. For the ladies, the size 8UK men's flip flop may be an option if you are looking for something slightly larger than a 7UK and you still want to support our project.

    

 

 

 

Our priority was to never use plastic, even if it was recycled. We do not endorse plastic as a material, and we didn't want to add to the plastic pollution problem. From early on we made the decision to make our flip flops from natural rubber and we had no idea how the natural rubber would feel once we were wearing it. What we found out, when we had the flip flops on our feet (literally every day for the last 6 months), was really exciting!

Our flip flops provide a supportive, soft, and comfortable fit. Natural rubber moulds to your feet. It feels like you're walking on a cloud, and that reduced impact when you walk, is great for your joints. 

            

As well as comfort, our flip-flips are designed to last. Even under extreme tension, they do not buckle and fold, as regular flip flops do. Often when flip flops get bent once, they lose their shape and are more likely to break or be uncomfortable.

            

Natural Rubber is incredibly elastic, which ensures our flip flops are super durable. We have walked more miles than we can remember wearing these, without any failure, and we have pulled and twisted the straps without them snapping, including testing for those dreaded "toe-plug blowouts".

            

If you've suffered from flip flops pinching across the top of your foot, or if you're prone to blisters from the toe peg, you no longer have to worry about that, natural rubber is incredibly soft!

In shops our flip flops will retail at £24 (not including postage). Through Indiegogo, you have the opportunity to save 22% per pair. Don't let their affordability make you question their durability; we want as many of you as possible to have the chance make a difference, to do that, we will always choose impact over profit.

Our Reward prices are inclusive of UK postage, which means you are actually saving even more! Unfortunately, we cannot provide free international postage, but we offer it at a much reduced rate; we want the whole world to have access to our flip flops. 

After extensive research, we started talking to rubber tree farmers in Vietnam and found the farmer that paid the staff a good wage and worked in the most environmentally friendly way. No trees are cut down, rubber is simply "tapped" from them. This can be done throughout the life cycle of the tree.

    

We love the way they work, in the traditional way, by hand; whether collecting the rubber in the same way it has been done for centuries or hand-cutting the rubber sheets ready for our flip flops.

We were recently recognised and approved by PETA (People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals) as being 100% vegan, giving you peace of mind that we source materials and manufacture our flip flops in the most ethical way possible.

Our Founder, Luke, has worked in marine conservation for the last 10 years. After seeing first hand the damage that we are doing to our oceans, through our use and improper disposal of plastics, he has relentlessly campaigned for change.

By using the world's most popular shoe, and building a network of incredible grassroots organisations, he set out to help solve one of the world's biggest environmental problems.

Since then, we have grown our multinational team, and are proud to have a great product that we truly believe can transform the current plastic-driven flip flop market.

This is just the beginning for Sea Sense; there is an opportunity for people around the world to make a difference to our oceans, and it is so exciting to have already received incredible support and good wishes.

If successful, we can serve as a blueprint for other sustainable fashion start-ups, which can only be good for our planet.

The core team hail from the UK, South Africa, and Brazil, and we share a common interest in the environment and a desire to make a  change in the world. We bring a diverse skill set to the project, including marine biology, conservation, design, financial technology, media production, and web design.

We chose to support the organisations through which you, the consumer, could achieve the greatest impact, every time you bought a pair of Sea Sense flip flops. We cannot wait to grow this network of organisations in the years to come.

Plastic Bank has been able to monetise plastic in a number of developing countries, meaning that collectors are able to exchange plastic for vouchers that help buy food and medical supplies as well as pay for education. They operate in Haiti, Brazil, Indonesia, the Philippines, and Egypt. We cannot wait to see the impact we can achieve alongside them.

Plastic Oceans International is a non-profit organisation whose goal is to end plastic pollution and to foster sustainable communities worldwide. They operate to create change globally, and they have branches in the USA, Canada, Europe, Mexico, and Chile. They believe that education and awareness are key in preventing plastics from entering our oceans, and we are delighted to be able to support an organisation that is doing this across the world.

Ocean Sole is a social enterprise, that up-cycle flip flops found along the beaches and waterways in Kenya into beautiful pieces of art. Ocean Sole provides a steady income to nearly 100 low-income Kenyan families, help facilitate payments for educating their children, and recycle over a million flip flops each year, preventing them from polluting our oceans. We are proud to help support their incredible work!

The Blue Crew, a team of local female entrepreneurs in South Africa, hope to address both the environmental and social challenges linked to waste accumulating along coastlines. These ambassadors for the blue-economy clean up coasts daily and inspire others to do the same. The Blue Crew also barter the waste they collect with the WILDTRUST (who then recycle it) in exchange for cash, and thus generate livelihood support for themselves whilst cleaning up critical ecosystems.

* Indegogo guidelines state we cannot directly donate any funds we receive from this campaign. Instead, we will donate all future proceeds from sales following the Indiegogo Campaign, until we collect the equivalent of at least 500 plastic bottles per pair of flip flops sold in this campaign (which is more than the average person will use in three years!). That is our promise to you. Transparency is important to us, so we will keep in touch after campaign to update you on our progress, and also send you our annual impact report.

We have brought on-board quality and reliable partners to make the perfect flip flop. We also have fantastic shipping and logistics partners that we’ve put to the test with numerous sample runs. With our supply chain tested and complete, the only missing element to the chain is you! 


Summer is coming and your orders will be ready to post in May 2021 (if not before). To ensure a completely sustainable experience, we will deliver in a way that limits the strain on our planet as much as possible, with all packaging recycled or recyclable.

We want to give you the tools to squeeze a bit more awesome out of every step because we know that when our feet are comfortable, we can all do and be more.

We're committed to transparency around our impact. We have defined the impact of our product which is non-negotiable; with the realistic target of at least 1 million bottles in 2021. We will grow this target each year and by 2030 we want to prevent 10 million plastic bottles from entering our oceans.

Join us as a backer and you will be making affordable, accessible sustainable footwear a reality. 

This project has been our life for over a year, and honestly, it has not been easy, but we believe we have achieved something amazing and we are very grateful to all the people who have made it possible for us to get here.

Join our community today, and show the world that it's time to Sea Sense.

Sharing the link to this page will be extremely beneficial and helpful to our campaign!

#seasenseflipflops

Video credits to Ocean Sole Africa, Blue Crew, Project Butterfly and The Great Big Story. All promotional footage is of the organisations that you will be supporting, 

Risks and challenges

The hard work is done. We’ve spent nearly a year sourcing, developing and perfecting Sea Sense Flip Flops and now we are launching the Indiegogo Campaign to go into bulk production.

We’ve overcome the developmental hurdles, have a beautiful, ethical product, and we can't wait to see them on your feet!

How we are removing risk:

- We have vetted our manufacturer and they were approved by PETA

- We have tested numerous prototypes and will be testing even more before fulfilment

- We will maintain constant communication with our manufacturer to ensure on-time delivery

Whilst we don’t expect any bumps in the road, we’ll be closely monitoring all aspects of production with regular updates for our Indiegogo backers. Your orders will be sent out in May (if not before). International orders might take ever so slightly longer to arrive.

Simultaneously, we’ll be working on our packaging and marketing strategies to be ready to launch Sea Sense Flip Flops with priority delivery to our backers. A huge thank you for stopping by and helping Sea Sense Flip Flops come to life.

We love questions and feedback, so please don't hesitate to contact us.

e: luke@seasenseflipflops.com

Long-lasting design

Natural Rubber is incredibly elastic and, when mixed with the right balance of other natural ingredients to make the perfect latex compound, it becomes super spongy. It’s this sponginess that allows it to maintain its structure and remain strong.

Sustainable materials

By using 100% natural rubber straight from the rubber tree, we found a sustainable material from which our flip flops can be produced, and also a product that is 100% biodegradable.

Sustainable Distribution

All of our packaging will be recycled or at the very least recyclable. We will never use plastics.
story_txt:
Issue #1: 22 million kgs of plastic enters our oceans every day.Issue #2: 25% of all ocean plastic pollution is flip flops and sandals*. Most are made from plastic and they are often poorly fitting, break easily and every pair made is a threat to marine life.Our idea: Transform the flip flop market; move away from plastic (including recycled) and deliver an eco-friendly product with comfort, style, and durability whilst also providing a simple way for everyone to stop ocean-bound plastic.* Source: Biological Sciences Department, University of California San Diego.​After a year in the making, we have:
Sourced eco-friendly materials
Designed a great range of flip flops alongside Havaianas' former Head of Research and Development
Selected incredible grassroots organisations that we will be supporting; Plastic Bank, Plastic Oceans International, Ocean Sole Africa and Blue Crew
Undertaken a successful trial release
Our flip flops are completely earth-friendly. If you lose your flip flops at sea or they end up buried in your garden, or even in landfill, they will break down and not have a negative effect on that environment. They are made from Biodegradable Natural Rubber. No plastic, no pollution, no harm to our planet.  In 2021, through the sales of our flip flops, we will collect the equivalent of one million ocean-bound plastic bottles (20,000kg of plastic) from rivers and coastlines, with this target increasing year on year as we grow. How? Plastic pollution is a result of the lack of incentives to recycle where they are needed most. We will use profits to fund a network of grassroots organisations, in developing countries; offering cash, food vouchers, education materials and medical supplies in exchange for collected plastic. This system helps protect our oceans, as well as providing vital support to those in need. This a truly unique way of using fashion for good.If we could produce a truly desirable flip flop, then we had a real chance of making change happen. So, naturally, we called Brazil, the "home of the flip flop", and enlisted the help of the former Havaianas' Head of Research and Development, Alexandre Coelho. We examined over 30 flip flop brands, read product reviews and conducted countless consumer interviews to understand your needs and develop a fantastic product.We wanted to come up with solutions to all of the flip flop issues that drive you crazy, and we have delivered on the issues most important to you!   It was important enough for many of you to tell us about, so as requested, we will also offer our flip flops with the option of:
Contrasting logos, so you can be loud and proud about your Sea Sense flip flops (blue logo on our white flip flops, white on other colours)
The logo the same colour as the flip flop, if you're looking for that more subtle, formal look 
Our small trial release tested our manufacturing and shipping systems. We offered blue, black and white flip flops. Immediately it became apparent that you wanted colour! Our original colours are still available here, but we are so excited about the new colour options we have for you. Our flip flops are completely inspired by our oceans; whether it be the bold colours we have used and the materials we have made the flip flops from, or the unique wave pattern we have designed on the sole. They are unlike any other flip flops out there. Our flip flops follow three simple principles: sustainability, design, and fair price. We asked ourselves the question, what use are sustainable products if they’re ugly and unaffordable for most people? So we have worked hard to make a beautiful flip flop and ensure that sustainability is accessible to all.     Based on the classic, much loved, thong flip flop, but vastly improved. With detailed styling including our unique wave design on the strap, our men's flip flops have a masculine yet refined look. They are comfortable, long-lasting, and up for whatever challenge you throw at them, at the beach or in the city. Bold and stylish, we have made a flip flop for all occasions.We have a wonderful selection of colours, as bold as you want to be. From our Orca Black, Deep Ocean Blue and Iceberg White, through to our brighter Fire Coral Red, Sea Grass Green and Sea Breeze Green. Simple and chic were the buzzwords for us when designing our women's flip flop. With a slightly thinner sole and a more elegant strap, our women's flip flops are as sleek and beautiful as they are durable.We didn't want to compromise on style just because we are using sustainable products, so we designed this range especially for women who want both. story:
INTRODUCING CORE TEE: 
THE INCREDIBLE EVERYDAY CORE LAYER

Core Tee is designed to keep you warm but feel invisible under any layer. That means your arms are free, your body is comfortable and YOU are feeling good.


Check out all the amazing features Core Tee has to offer! We set out to create an undershirt you can wear under any layer for any activity. While the rest of the world is layering up, you can layer down with Core Tee.



How does it work? What makes Core Tee the best base layer ever? Thermoregulation! It's a process that allows your body to maintain its core internal temperature. Check out the video to learn more!

Core Tee materials have been carefully selected to keep you warm while maintaining comfort and dryness. Looking closely at the materials, you'll observe that most of the area consists of one or two layers of thin, moisture wicking thermal material similar to a Polartec base layer. Then, in strategic areas, a mesh vent encourages fresh air exchange in order to maximize breathability.


One of the most powerful features of Core Tee is the kidney Power Pocket system. Slip in a couple hand warmers and enjoy hours of turbo-charged core heat.


Any season, any outer layer. Core Tee is the ultimate base layer for body heat and comfort.

With Core Tee, you can layer down while everybody else is layering up. ​

Thinking about rocking a vest instead? Think again, chief. You look like a jackass.


Core Tee is sized for men, but perfectly wearable by all.


Choose the Core Tee perk that best suits you!


Core Tee was created by three guys in New England, tired of the erratic weather and wanting to find a way to keep the winter coats in the closet for as long as possible. Michael Graney, a retail lifer looking to break away from brick and mortar and try something new, left his job of 20 years and joined friends Jake Epstein and Joe Lemay (founders of Rocketbook and no strangers to crowdfunding) to bring this product to life. We all believed it could be as simple as an amazing undershirt. Instead of adding layers, why not better utilize the layers we're already wearing? Through countless designs, re-designs, prototypes and hand warmer purchases, the Core Tee was born.

We aim to deliver by late-fall/early-winter of 2018. Feel free to reach out with any questions to michael@getcoretee.com.  


Q: What is the Core Tee made of?
A: The warmth layers consist of a proprietary blend of micro-poly, spandex and nylon designed to maximize warmth while providing stretch, moisture wicking and breathability. The ventilation system is composed of a 193GSM nylon/spandex activewear mesh.

Q: Do the hand warmers in the Power Pockets really work?
A: They do!  They actually feel pretty incredible on your lower back while helping keep your core warm in the process.  

More questions?  Send them along to michael@getcoretee.com!

story:
Inspired by the minimalist traveler, Calibabas merge comfort with versatility

Calibabas are...  

1) Designed to be Unisex. Our unisex size range scales every body type and height. We offer four unisex sizes, which will fit anyone whether you're 4'11" or 6'11". See sizing chart below.

2) Comfortable. We hate wearing things that aren't comfortable.

3) Multi-functional. Calibabas will be the most frequently rotated item in your collection. They are designed to be the only pant you need throughout whatever your day holds. From morning coffee, to yoga, to class, to four-hour nap, Calibabas can do it all.

4) Ethically produced. After searching far and wide, we teamed up with a California-based manufacturer that meets our ethical standards and provides good-paying jobs for employees in its factory in Peru. This gives us the ability to offer these pants at a reasonable price, in a way we feel good about.

5) Adjustable Length. Depending on weather, mood, astrological sign, and personal preference, these pants can be worn down to the ankle like a jogger or raised up to the mid-calf for more of a harem style. This versatile design feature also enables one size of Calibabas to fit people of vastly different heights.

Cooling Space Fabric Crafted from our unique nylon/spandex blend, Calibabas are your year-round, indoor-outdoor pant. They'll keep you cool under the covers, regulating the perfect temperature even with body heat. Air circulation is uninhibited in the hip area, making them great for physical activity or lounging horizontally*.

*Our favorite

Deep pockets Hidden pockets can hold all of your belongings on-the-go, making Calibabas your go-to travel pant. The style of the pants and discreet placement of the pockets keep the contents hidden.

Sold Direct At Calibabas, we coordinate everything from design conception to order fulfillment. This model allows us to cut out the middle man and thus offer you quality and comfort, without the retail markup.

As a guide, we recommend you choose by waist size, referencing your usual pant inseam (measured from crotch seam to bottom hem) if you fall between sizes. Calibabas are created to be worn at various lengths, so focus on the waist measurement when selecting your size!

Due to the elasticity of the fabric and the versatility of the style, we've found most people can wear two sizes. If you find yourself between sizes, anticipate that the smaller of the two will fit closer to a jogger style, while the larger option will have more fabric, emphasizing the harem aspect. This versatility in fit and style makes these pants incredibly easy to borrow.

She won't be giving these back. Get her a pair too.

We plan to begin production as soon as the project becomes fully funded. Building in sufficient time to process orders, we expect to begin filling orders at the end of May 2017, with all orders expected to be filled by the end of June. We will be sure to keep you updated throughout the production process or if we foresee any delays.

We love our logo. We call him Tim. Tim is just like us. Tim likes to exercise but also likes to relax. Our logo combines those two things at the same time. Tim is not afraid to go full nap mid-yoga session. These are high quality shirts with a lived-in feel. 

The Love our Logo Tank in Peacock Heather (left), The Love our Logo Ladies Tank in Peacock Heather (center) and Soft Black (right)

Calibabas look great on Instagram. Click here to make sure.
story_txt: Inspired by the minimalist traveler, Calibabas merge comfort with versatilityCalibabas are...  1) Designed to be Unisex. Our unisex size range scales every body type and height. We offer four unisex sizes, which will fit anyone whether you're 4'11" or 6'11". See sizing chart below.2) Comfortable. We hate wearing things that aren't comfortable.3) Multi-functional. Calibabas will be the most frequently rotated item in your collection. They are designed to be the only pant you need throughout whatever your day holds. From morning coffee, to yoga, to class, to four-hour nap, Calibabas can do it all.4) Ethically produced. After searching far and wide, we teamed up with a California-based manufacturer that meets our ethical standards and provides good-paying jobs for employees in its factory in Peru. This gives us the ability to offer these pants at a reasonable price, in a way we feel good about.5) Adjustable Length. Depending on weather, mood, astrological sign, and personal preference, these pants can be worn down to the ankle like a jogger or raised up to the mid-calf for more of a harem style. This versatile design feature also enables one size of Calibabas to fit people of vastly different heights.Cooling Space Fabric Crafted from our unique nylon/spandex blend, Calibabas are your year-round, indoor-outdoor pant. They'll keep you cool under the covers, regulating the perfect temperature even with body heat. Air circulation is uninhibited in the hip area, making them great for physical activity or lounging horizontally*.*Our favoriteDeep pockets Hidden pockets can hold all of your belongings on-the-go, making Calibabas your go-to travel pant. The style of the pants and discreet placement of the pockets keep the contents hidden.Sold Direct At Calibabas, we coordinate everything from design conception to order fulfillment. This model allows us to cut out the middle man and thus offer you quality and comfort, without the retail markup.As a guide, we recommend you choose by waist size, referencing your usual pant inseam (measured from crotch seam to bottom hem) if you fall between sizes. Calibabas are created to be worn at various lengths, so focus on the waist measurement when selecting your size!Due to the elasticity of the fabric and the versatility of the style, we've found most people can wear two sizes. If you find yourself between sizes, anticipate that the smaller of the two will fit closer to a jogger style, while the larger option will have more fabric, emphasizing the harem aspect. This versatility in fit and style makes these pants incredibly easy to borrow.She won't be giving these back. Get her a pair too.We plan to begin production as soon as the project becomes fully funded. Building in sufficient time to process orders, we expect to begin filling orders at the end of May 2017, with all orders expected to be filled by the end of June. We will be sure to keep you updated throughout the production process or if we foresee any delays.We love our logo. We call him Tim. Tim is just like us. Tim likes to exercise but also likes to relax. Our logo combines those two things at the same time. Tim is not afraid to go full nap mid-yoga session. These are high quality shirts with a lived-in feel. The Love our Logo Tank in Peacock Heather (left), The Love our Logo Ladies Tank in Peacock Heather (center) and Soft Black (right)Calibabas look great on Instagram. Click here to make sure.

story:
Who We Are

We are McCown Technology Corporation.  We create solutions, and products, normally for the telecommunications world.  40 years of product development brings us to this point of experience and qualifications.  We are very passionate about protecting our loved ones.  A sentiment that spans all of humanity.  Politicians,  pundits and talking heads throw out lots of ideas but nothing as concrete and obvious as this solution has been suggested.  Until now. 

Now we you can help us take action - do something about school shootings.  

While no solution is perfect this is practical, it exists, it works and can be deployed today. 

This is not an insert.  It is a fully functional bullet proof * vest incorporated into a normal backpack.   

Can you imagine your joy of hugging a loved one who's life you saved with this backpack?

But the need goes beyond schools:  Journalists often face dangerous working conditions around the world, tourists accidentally find themselves in sketchy neighborhoods, hunters face friendly fire (and idiot hunter fire) continually.  

 

We need seed

The prototypes have been built, they work.  But they are very costly.  Your contribution will be used for these specific activities:

  1. Importation of a large quantity of the Ultra High Molecular Weight PolyEthylene (UHMWPE) ballistic material that is stronger and lighter than Kevlar so that the product can be made affordable for most families.  
  2. National Institute of Justice (NIJ) Body Armor Compliance Testing and Certification  
  3. Development of a range of sizes so that all, but especially school children,  can be protected.
  4. Development of a range of colors, patterns and prints.  We may have colors, patterns and prints available prior to shipment.  If we do we will give you the opportunity to select what you like.  

Perks:  If you contribute $250, you receive one of the bullet proof backpacks.  Fully functional and ready to protect.  

If we don't reach our goal:  We don't receive any of the funds.  We don't want to take any money unless we know we can deliver.  So, if the goal is not met, the contributions will be returned.  

 

If this is successful, specialty versions will be immediately created for Journalists, Sportsmen, and all sizes for all members of the family.  

The Impact

We believe the impact of this solution is obvious, your contribution can make a huge difference in the availability of actual solutions that work.  

  • We have a very successful track record of developing and bringing to market hundreds of unique products.  Our production partner, Game Gear, is expert in the production of stitched and sewed products.  
  • It exists now, help us make it affordable and available for everyone.

Risks & Challenges

Overwhelming demand and delay in order fulfillment is a real risk.  Our production partner

Game Gear  is a large manufacturer (three generations of family ownership) of stitched and sewn product.  They can quickly scale.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • It is just as important to get the word out.  Share our campaign on social media please. 
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools.  That is just as important as contributing money. 

* Why the asterisk?  Almost nothing you can wear is truly "Bullet Proof".  The material we use will stop certain bullets up to certain calibers fired from most angles.  While the term "Bullet Proof" is used for things like this it is technically inaccurate and a bit misleading.  However when people search, those are the terms they use.  And it is certainly instantly recognizable as a word couplet.

story:
What’s The Problem With Todays Hoodie?

  • Cotton & Polyester Fabric - Lack the ability to breathe, fight odor, regulate your body temperature, wick away sweat, and defend against stains.
  • Woven Fabric - Restrictive, can make seams susceptible to tearing
  • Storage & Security - Pockets lack size and ability to store your valuables securely.
  • Versatility - Lack of design means poor fit and an unflattering look, limiting your ability to wear it on different occasions.

What’s The Solution?

Introducing: 'The Miracle Merino Hoodie' by Grunard

Merino - Natures Miracle Fabric

Specifications

  • Source - Our 100% Merino fiber is sourced from both Australia and New Zealand, regarded as the finest Merino producers in the world.
  • Weight - 255 gsm, specifically chosen to feel light but provide significant warmth when needed.
  • Fineness - 19 Micron (ultra fine) 
  • Properties - Water-repellent, stain resistive, fire retardant and self-extinguishing, durable, extremely breathable, temperature regulating, moisture wicking, warm even when wet (heat retentive), uv-resistive, antimicrobial (unmatched at fighting odor), super soft, organic, sustainable...

Our Non-Restictive, Ultra Flexible Knit Merino Fabric


Storage and Security

               Quick Draw Chest Pocket                   Huge Zip Pockets Built Into Side Seams 

Design Detail

Custom Logo and Zipper Pulls

Versatile 

  • With a clean look, subtle seam lines, striking zipper, and modern fit, our hoodie can be worn out to dinner, to the gym, on a hike, or even on a hot date.


Cost

  • The value of Merino is found in it's extensive list of properties and the skilled labor it takes to produce this amazing fabric.  

Price

  • World class fabric and thoughtful design carry a hefty price tag.   But we are offering our backers an amazing discount exclusive to this campaign.


Fit

  • Our Unisex hoodie has a slimmer fit, without being overly tight on men or too loose on women.  If you do you prefer a looser fit, we suggest ordering one size up from your normal.

Color Options

  • The hoodie will be offered in black.  As we reach funding goals new colors will be unlocked.  If we reach 40k, backers will be able to vote on the next color.

Why Grunard?

Because we believe in quality fabric, versatility, and attention to detail.  No other fabric on the market can match the overwhelming capabilities of Merino, giving it an unmatched versatility that we here at Grunard apply to our design philosophy.  We tirelessly scrutinize everything from the placement, size, and usability of the pockets, to the tiny details like our custom zipper pulls and logo.  Finally, we focus on our products, not our profit.


Why Crowdfunding?

We have spent a lot of our own money on creating the pattern, sourcing the materials, making samples, and securing a manufacturing quote to produce our Merino hoodie.  In order to move forward with production we need to meet their minimum garment quote, which in monetary value comes out to $10,000.  This is where the power of the crowd is key, as pre-orders allow us to meet this minimum.



FAQ

What sizes are the models wearing?

Male model: 6'1'', slim athletic, wearing size M

Female model: 6'1", slim athletic, wearing size M

What colors are offered?

The hoodie is available in Black, and as we reach campaign goals more color options will be unlocked.

When do I give you my size and color?

After the campaign has ended, we will send out an email requesting your size info, color, and shipping details.

What's the shipping cost? 

Free shipping for US backers.

INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: Shipping will vary by weight and country.  Let us know where you live and how many you are ordering so we can give you an exact amount. Typically it's $25 for each parcel.

How do I clean my awesome new hoodie? 

Our Merino Hoodie is machine washable. Cold temperature, delicate cycle recommended, but not required.  Hang dry.  Do not bleach.  Because of Merino's natural ability to fight odor and resist stains, the best thing to do is to simply air it out every few days and it will stay fresh and looking great for a very long time.

Where did you get the music for your hilarious video?

Off an awesome site for free music: www.bensound.com.  You can get royalty free music as long as you tell people where you got it from.

story:
Like us on Facebook!

Like us on Instagram!

Like us on Twitter!

Like us on YouTube!






Our Story.

  We have created a way of taking some of the most commonly used resources and giving them a whole new healthier purpose. In many ways our company is the first of its kind; We Market, Create, and Use Salvaged Materials to make our Shoes. Our Goal is to reduce the Percentage of wasted Plastic on this Planet.


How, You ask?

  100% Recycled Shoes. Our shoes are made of a Canvas like material that is 100% completely made from Recycled Plastic Bottles. When you purchase our shoes, you Wear them Till' you Tear them. Return them to Us to be Recycled into other Shoes. As a "Thank You" from us, you will be given a 30% discount on your next pair of shoes!  

  • 100% Recycled Shoes
  • We are not just trying to make shoes, We are trying to turn this company into a world wide project
  • Our company could Change the World, and every Donation counts!
  • If you can't Contribute, all we ask is to please share with 2 people to spread the word.



What We Need & What You Get

Here's some more detail:

We need $35,000 to start this company.

  • $28,000 - Minimum order of shoes. Material & Inventory - Most material is special order with higher than usual minimums.
  • $2,000 - Product Packaging, The "Extra" Rewards - aside from the shoes, funding will cover Embarq branded recycled rubber bracelets, tote bags, and promotional t-shirts.
  • $1,000 - Shipping & Handling
  • $2,450 - Kickstarter Fees - Kickstarter charges a 4% service fee and Amazon Payments charges 2% for credit card processing. ($4,200)
  • $1,000 - My Father always says "It's better to have More than enough, then Not enough"
  • $35,000 - (fee) $2,450 = $32,550
  • If you Donate for a pair of shoes at Full price we will lock you in with a contributors discount of 50% OFF your future orders!
  • You will be the First of the First to always see what new products are showcased!

Sizes we offer

Mens- U.S. 7 - 13

Womens- U.S. 5 - 10

  • When you make your donation, please notify if you are choosing to order a man/men’s or woman/women’s shoe and specify in what U.S. size
  • We are still in between designs, so we would like to hear your input! We will be taking a vote to see which is going to be our first design! Stay Tuned!

PERKS for Donating Today!

   Your donations mean everything to us!Lets talk about What You GET! 

 Our Shoes retail for $50 USD, But we want you to be happy and know it didn't go to waste. When you Donate $25 You have earned yourself a pair of our shoes!

  Our Company is all about Recycling and we Want YOU to be Apart of that. When you Recycle a pair of our shoes you will receive a 30% discount on your next pair. By Donating $50 or more Today you will be locked in at 50% discount when ever you recycle our shoes with us!

all $50 donations or more will receive "Ask Me About My Shoes" T-Shirt

WOMEN

MEN



  • $1 - Thanks-A-lot! - Every Dollar Counts! Thank You very much for your donation.
  • $5 - Website Thanks-A-lot! - Every Dollar Counts! Thank You very much for your donation. Your name will be listed on our supporters page of our website.
  • $10 - Recycled Rubber Bracelet - For $10 We will send you a thank you card with Recycled Rubber Bracelet!
  • $25 - 1 Pair of Shoes - Be the First to get New Pair of Shoes 50%OFF!!
  • $50 - 1 Pair of Shoes - 1 Pair of Shoes + Locked in 50% Discount
  • $100 - 2 Pair of Shoes - 2 Pair of Shoes + Locked in 50% Discount


The Impact

  There's more to just cool shoes that are made from plastic bottles. When you contribute to our campaign you become a part of the pioneers that are making a difference in our world:

  • I'm Excited to start this program because not only will we be able to sell comfortable shoes made from recycled materials, but Together we can decrease the percentage of wasted materials in this world.
  • Not only will we focus on using 100% recycled material, but we want to spread the word of how recycling can change the world.
  • We want to find ways to keep upcycling and using recycled materials in all our products.


Other Ways You Can Help

Just because you can't pitch in doesn't mean you can't help:

  • !!!!!!!!!!!!!PLEASE SHARE THIS WITH 2 PEOPLE YOU KNOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
  • No hard feelings if you can't donate, just do your part to reduce the amount of waste going on in your house and your world!

story:
OUR MISSION
  • Design and develop an exclusive fashion range by Anna Perra

  • Combine Italian design with UK and European production using the highest quality fabrics.

  • Promote Anna’s concept, bringing elegance and style to ‘Real Women’ – target audience 30+

  • Develop personal styling advice to encourage new self-esteem and confidence for women.

  • Engage with textiles and fashion design students to create work and training opportunities.

Anna Perra moved from Rome to England in 1996. Her love for fashion started when very young. Today she is pursuing her dream – ‘I have a passion for dressing women to look great – no matter their size or age. I love to see a transformation that influences self-esteem and confidence – ultimately having a wider impact on lives and relationships!’

Anna established her brand through passion and tenacity but it was her loyalty and care for customers that gave Anna direction for her fashion concept. Encouraging women to feel good and rediscover themselves through the clothes they wear, has made her brand more than fashion. Customers – ‘Real Women’ - are also modelling for Anna’s ready to wear collections at her fashion shows set in gorgeous destinations. They are very much part of her brand as the clothes she selects.


Why are we Crowdfunding?

Anna has devoted the last two years to developing her fashion concept while nurturing a strong desire to design her own collection. The Anna Perra Fashion collection will start with winter coats, a proven idea – she has already trialled two designs and showcased them at one of her fashion shows, where they received a very positive response.

Since then, she has been constantly asked to create more of her own style. The inevitable Italian touch of elegance colour & detail is what characterize Anna’s style – customers are waiting for her exclusive designs to be available in the near future.

Anna’s business plan is to raise money to design and produce the Anna Perra Fashion range, and promote her collection using a highly professional standard of marketing techniques

What we currently offer

  • Ready to wear women’s clothing – special occasion & casual elegant

  • Hand bags

  • Costume jewellery

  • Scarves and general accessories


.

OUR GOAL is to raise £25,000. The business plan will work in 3 stages:

      STAGE 1  - The Anna Perra Collection

  • Design and develop the Anna Perra Collection.  Initially, winter coats, followed by summer coats and scarves.

  • Invest in stock for Anna Perra own range and main range

  • Invest in product marketing (woven labels/ swing tags etc.) The Anna Perra new branding concept is in place (Trade Mark registered )

  • Needs:  

  • 1 employee/student/Apprentice to assist with design and production, pattern creation and prototyping

    STAGE 2  - Marketing

  • Develop a new website with E commerce

  • Develop forward thinking marketing techniques, using video

  • Advertising campaign

  • Needs:

  • 1 employee/student to assist in Marketing / online & social media marketing

       STAGE 3 -  Retail Location

Find a NEW retail location to generate a much higher level of turnover.


Needs:

Initial capital expenditure on new lease, legal costs, shop fitting and marketing

1 shop manager and 2 junior sales assistants/apprentices


Social Media Activities already in place:

Twitter /Pinterest /Google+ /Linkedin /Facebook /Instagram. Anna’s knowledge of social media and PR activities is remarkable. She has been successfully trading in the small Somerset town of Shepton Mallet (population c.10,000) thanks to her ability to maintain a constant and sustainable message about her concept and what she believes.

Other services

  • Personal styling consultation and advice

  • Styling information via social media

  • Fashion shows - Anna promotes Spring/Summer & Autumn/Winter ranges at two main fashion shows per year, using real women to model her collections. These raise significant funds for charity and the local community. Having developed a good reputation for successful events, Anna also organises mid-season Fashion shows upon request.

Other events:

  • Pop up shops at hotels and other venues
  • Special seasonal events at the shop
story_txt:
OUR MISSION
Design and develop an exclusive fashion range by Anna Perra
Combine Italian design with UK and European production using the highest quality fabrics.
Promote Anna’s concept, bringing elegance and style to ‘Real Women’ – target audience 30+ 
Develop personal styling advice to encourage new self-esteem and confidence for women.
Engage with textiles and fashion design students to create work and training opportunities.

Anna Perra moved from Rome to England in 1996. Her love for fashion started when very young. Today she is pursuing her dream – ‘I have a passion for dressing women to look great – no matter their size or age. I love to see a transformation that influences self-esteem and confidence – ultimately having a wider impact on lives and relationships!’ Anna established her brand through passion and tenacity but it was her loyalty and care for customers that gave Anna direction for her fashion concept. Encouraging women to feel good and rediscover themselves through the clothes they wear, has made her brand more than fashion. Customers – ‘Real Women’ - are also modelling for Anna’s ready to wear collections at her fashion shows set in gorgeous destinations. They are very much part of her brand as the clothes she selects.Why are we Crowdfunding?

Anna has devoted the last two years to developing her fashion concept while nurturing a strong desire to design her own collection. The Anna Perra Fashion collection will start with winter coats, a proven idea – she has already trialled two designs and showcased them at one of her fashion shows, where they received a very positive response. Since then, she has been constantly asked to create more of her own style. The inevitable Italian touch of elegance colour & detail is what characterize Anna’s style – customers are waiting for her exclusive designs to be available in the near future. Anna’s business plan is to raise money to design and produce the Anna Perra Fashion range, and promote her collection using a highly professional standard of marketing techniquesWhat we currently offer
Ready to wear women’s clothing – special occasion & casual elegant
Hand bags
Costume jewellery
Scarves and general accessories

. 
OUR GOAL is to raise £25,000. The business plan will work in 3 stages:      STAGE 1  - The Anna Perra Collection
Design and develop the Anna Perra Collection.  Initially, winter coats, followed by summer coats and scarves. 
Invest in stock for Anna Perra own range and main range

Invest in product marketing (woven labels/ swing tags etc.) The Anna Perra new branding concept is in place (Trade Mark registered )

Needs:   

1 employee/student/Apprentice to assist with design and production, pattern creation and prototyping
STAGE 2  - Marketing


Develop a new website with E commerce
Develop forward thinking marketing techniques, using video

Advertising campaign




Needs: 

1 employee/student to assist in Marketing / online
& social media marketing

       STAGE 3 -  Retail Location

Find a NEW retail location to generate a much higher level of turnover.
Needs:
Initial capital expenditure on
new lease, legal costs, shop fitting and marketing
1 shop manager and 2 junior
sales assistants/apprentices

Social Media Activities already in place:Twitter /Pinterest /Google+ /Linkedin /Facebook /Instagram. Anna’s knowledge of social media and PR activities is remarkable. She has been successfully trading in the small Somerset town of Shepton Mallet (population c.10,000) thanks to her ability to maintain a constant and sustainable message about her concept and what she believes.
Other services 


Personal styling consultation and advice
Styling information via social media
Fashion shows - Anna promotes Spring/Summer
& Autumn/Winter ranges at two main fashion shows per year, using real women
to model her collections. These raise significant funds for charity and the local community. Having
developed a good reputation for successful events, Anna also organises
mid-season Fashion shows upon request. 
Other events:
Pop up shops at hotels and other venues
Special seasonal events at the shop

story:
Your sunglasses are the ultimate go-anywhere accessory– making them hard to keep safe and hard to keep track of. Past solutions to this problem left you with two choices:

  • Clutter your expensive glasses with uncomfortable and unflattering "sunglass straps" 
  • Resort to the endless cycles of cheaply made "disposable" sunglasses that risk not providing your eyes with the true benefits of protection 

After he lost his most expensive pair of sunglasses, our co-founder Nate Justiss was fed up and finally had an a-ha moment. And with that, we set out to design an elegant solution made to satisfy the picky minimalist. We've spent 6 years in development to get it right, and now we want to share it with you. 

 

Falling-Sunglasses Fail vs. Secure with MagLock

 

How did we solve dropped and lost sunglasses? Magnets hidden in the arms secure your glasses to your shirt, bag, and any magnetic surface. And with flexible, unbreakable shape-memory frames, and our super strong, anti-scratch lenses, you don't have to worry about breaking your MagLock Sunglasses. Finally you can feel as carefree not wearing your sunglasses as you do wearing them.  

 

 

MagLock Sunglasses are built for comfort and made to last. Take them with you everywhere– from your daily commute to your next outdoor adventure. 

 

Actual Hammer and Flex Test
 

 


 

MagLock™ is our all new patent-pending design with neodymium magnets incorporated into the arms of the frame. The magnets are completely integrated so that no surface meets your skin (safe for those with nickel allergies), and the magnets themselves will be free of surface wear, scratching or corrosion. 


 

Frame Features: 

  • MagLock™ secures your glasses to your shirt or bag, and will stay in place any magnetic surface
  • Face friendly soft-touch materials for comfort and non-slip fit
  • Lightweight, flexible frame comfortably hugs your head 
  • Durable high-performance material with shape memory: MagLock Sunglasses are made to last 

Lens Features:

  • 100% UVA and UVB protection 
  • Polarized core reduces glare and eye strain 
  • Anti-reflective interior 
  • Scratch-resistant exterior and interior

PSA: Sunglasses are good for you! 

The American Academy of Ophthalmology has designated July as "UV Safety Awareness Month." Protecting your eyes isn’t just for the summer months– UV light contributes to macular degeneration, cataracts, and other eye complications. Cheap sunglasses falsely claiming to protect against UV let even more of the harmful UV rays into your dilated pupils, potentially causing more damage than not wearing sunglasses at all.

We've sourced premium UV400 lenses, which block 100% of UVA and UVB rays, plus a polarized core and anti-reflective coating to further reduce glare and eye strain. Lightweight, FDA approved impact-resistant lenses are in a neutral gray color to ease eye strain and allow for truest color perception. 

 

Sunnies are notoriously difficult to keep track of, and the best pair really are the ones you have with you. That’s why we’ve designed these sunglasses to be the most comfortable sunglasses to wear and the most difficult to lose. 

 

 

  • ON THE LIGHT SWITCH for grab-and-go convenience.
  • ON THE FRIDGE so you always know where your sunglasses are.
  • ON THE REAR-VIEW MIRROR because polarized glasses protect against road glare.
    Pro Tip: Don't keep sunglasses in the car during the summer! Heat damages the lenses.
  • ON YOUR BAG for scratch-free storage on the go (instead of on your head).


Folly: The Laidback Seafarer in a classic wayfarer-style with keyhole bridge. Named after Folly Beach, Charleston’s surf-haven at the “Edge of America.” After the campaign, you can choose from 4 matte colors: Black, Gray, Kelp (Dark Green) and Surf (Turquoise). 

 



 

Sullivan: The Modern Aviator in a lightweight with iconic double bridge. Named after Sullivan’s Island, home of Charleston’s surprisingly modern lighthouse. After the campaign, you can choose from 4 matte colors: Black, Gray, Marine (Dark Blue) and Sand (Warm Tan).

Sunglasses are an essential part of your everyday carry, and MagLock Sunglasses are ready for any adventure!



 

We've considered the entire package, down to... well, the package! ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ We designed a collapsible hard case and soft lens-cleaning cloth sleeve, included with every pair to help keep your Distil Sunglasses protected and scratch-free.

Instead of a box that will just be thrown away, all MagLock Sunglasses are packaged in an innovative hardshell case that folds completely flat. Based on the original design by Tom Davies (British bespoke-glasses creator and all-around swell guy), our take is inspired by the Apple iPad Cover: Durable fabric case with soft-touch lining, finished with heat-sealed edges for a clean, modern look. 

These cases are so useful and unique, we've made them available as a separate pledge level to use with any glasses up to 142mm x 55mm. Keep your other sunglasses or prescription glasses scratch-free and protected in your bag. 

 

 

In 2011, Nate lost the most expensive pair of sunglasses he’d ever bought. He was determined never to lose a pair of glasses again. It was the year we founded Distil Union, and Nate disappeared into the workshop and hacked together a simple fix using a pair of shades he didn’t really care about messing up.... and guess what? He hasn't lost that DIY pair, 6 years later. The tweak worked. His determination paid off. 

A huge perk about having a workshop is that we can create hacks that make a difference in our own lives #makersgonnamake. Beyond making and hacking, we have over a decade of experience in actual large scale mass-market manufacturing. So we've been working hard to develop a manufacturing technique to produce these problem-solving shades on a larger scale. And the best thing for us about crowd-funding is the chance to bring those life-simplifying products to other people’s lives! 

How does this simple, integrated solution not already exist?! We've asked ourselves the same question– and one reason they haven’t been made yet is because it’s not easy (as we've learned). Other attempts have been made to solve this problem, of course, but for us they all miss the mark. Each and every one requires that you use something in addition to the glasses, which goes against one of our fundamental beliefs:

 

The Distil Union mission is to simplify your life and distil your everyday. Our products are simply functional, and made to satisfy the picky minimalist. Only an elegant, integrated solution will do– so we’ve spent years in development to get it right:

  • MANUFACTURING TECHNIQUES We learned different methods of how glasses are manufactured by going straight to the sources. Then, because we’re designing for a new functionality in sunglasses, we took a completely fresh approach to the materials and construction. We asked ourselves: What materials or construction methods might not be considered "standard" but actually work better to solve the problem? 
  • MATERIAL SELECTION It was important to us that we understand the material properties best suited not just for functionality, but also for ideal comfort and fit. Lightweight and durable, made of face-friendly soft touch materials for comfort and non-slip wearing. Instead of hard frames that hurt your head or slide off your nose, we've designed them to be the most comfy frames to grace your face. 
  • FUNCTION + FIT FOR ALL Rather than producing a bunch of seasonal frames, we are focused on the optimum fit in two shapes: The wayfarer-style and the aviator are timeless, unisex styles that suit all faces. 

Xiexie 谢谢 and mhgoi 唔該 to our Asia team! From Hong Kong to Shenzhen– Anson, Tracy, Karen, Tim, Eunice, Simon, Fong, Sandy and Leon!

Our manufacturing partners know their craft. Lindsay and Nate toured their facilities earlier this year and worked with them face-to-face to develop our unique frames. They produce eyeglasses for premium brands and are one of the world's largest manufacturers of high-end acetate frames. We wish we could take you on a tour of their place (so large it takes a golf cart to get around). It is one of the most pristine and highest-tech, vertically integrated factories we've ever been to. With their backing, we're confident we can deliver an on-time and quality product. 

 

Wearing 3D-printed glasses makes you feel like you're in the future...

PROTOTYPE GALLERY: 3D-prints in various materials to test size, fit and function of our designs



Universally flattering frame shapes, and they flex to comfortably fit heads of nearly every size

 


 

 

Seeing how people react when they try our prototypes has been oh so satisfying, and we’re ready to go from prototype into production. Our goal is to deliver the most comfortable, long-lasting sunglasses you’ve ever owned. And with your help, we can finally get our patent-pending design out into the world. 

Please keep in mind that Indiegogo is not a traditional store. Backing us means you're pledging your support because you believe in our design and our ability to deliver (as we have on all our previous 6 crowd-funding campaigns on Kickstarter). As a way to say thank you! for believing in us, you get a massive discount and first access to the new product, as well as updates along the way as our production journey continues beyond this campaign. 

 



Distil Union is a micro-collective of designers and design-lovers in Charleston, SC who are having fun (and working hard) creating solutions to real-life problems. Our incentive to innovate comes from a deep desire to create helpful objects that people love. 

In 2011, we joined together (Union, get it?) to create the products we want to see on the shelves. Selfish? Perhaps. Exciting? You bet your pants it is! Entirely self-funded on a bootstrap budget, we launched our first product on Kickstarter in 2012. After working in the “big-box retail” industry for so long, it was a rush being part of the dynamic crowdfunding community that allowed us as designers to connect directly with customers, users, backers – you. And that was it, we were hooked. 

 

Since our first Kickstarter in 2012, thousands of Distil Union goods have been shipped to 101 countries, including 5,141 on-time pledges. We’re lucky to have been on our life-simplifying mission now for six years, and with six successful campaigns under our belt, this will be our 7th Kickstarter. Our company and products have been featured in:

 

To bring these sunglasses to life, we're seeking the funding needed to pay for tooling. We’ve come so far, but we can’t do this alone– will you pledge your support, or help us spread the word? 

Credits: With so much gratitude to all who made this possible 

Video and Editing Gavin Shelton
Portrait Photography Leslie Ryann McKellar
3D Printing Meadors, Shapeways, MakerBot
Nate Justiss Co-Founder and Industrial Designer
Lindsay Windham Co-Founder and Art Director
Mary Streeter Design and Marketing
Julia Simpson Community Manager
Rebecca Pollett Customer Support
Matilda Four-Legged Modeling 
David Rosenblatt Business Strategist
Troy Jackson Licensing Advisor 
Josh Goldstein Sales Support
Dr. Wes Shealy Optometrist
Role Models Joel Sadler, Allyson Sutton, Ryan Cockrell, Graham Wimberly, Julie Wimberly, Ivan Lima, Zach Aument, Karen Ann Myers, Rhiannon Bode, Tori Rosenblatt, Lauren Johnston, Paul Rich, Greg Finch, Thomas Sweeney, and Riki Matsuda. 

 

When we're not at the beach or riding roller coasters, we're here to answer any questions you might have– please message us, we're here to help!

story:
Join us in creating a wood-handled precision blade for artists, designers, painters and everyone!

Why I designed the WoodFa LTD05

My fascination with this project began with one of the world's best precision cutting tools - the LTD-05 from the Japanese artisans at the firm OLFA. They designed the ultra-slim, stainless steel knife which remains one of the the top cutting tools for graphic artists, fashion designers and sign makers around the world. It's 30 degree cutting angle and snap off blades can handle intricate cutting patterns on all kinds of materials. 

The problem is that this high quality precision tool comes with a low tech user interface. The industrial grade plastic that holds the blades just isn't comfortable for long term use, can become hard to grip and tends to crack with heavy use.

I decided that it was time this precision instrument needed a better handle, so I built one the the old-fashioned way – I carved a handle out of wood. I've been using my new blade for over a year now. It provides so much more control and comfort, I want others artists to see what they can achieve with the perfect cutter.

I call my new invention the WoodFa LTD05.

What We Need & What You Get

I'd like to bring my WoodFa into mass production using the absolute precision of Computer Numerical Control (CNC) manufacturing.

  • I will be ordering mass quantities of OLFA blades directly from Japan
  • Machining custom handles made from the wood of Zelkova and Pheasant wood. 

Exquisite chamfer surrounding the grip for super great and comfortable fell while you are holding it (similar to iPhone5).

Once you experience the soft and supple wood the Pheasant, you can never forget it. Through repeat use, the wood handle of the WoodFa conforms to the shape of your hand, as if it had be manufactured just for you.

To start our CNC manufacturing, we have to meet Minimum Order Quantities for both the blades and the wood, and that's why we need your help.

 

Perks

For a contribution of just $25, you can have your own first run issue WoodFa LTD05. Right now, Zelkova and Pheasant wood are the options.

Join us in giving artists the control they need to create the next generation of professional grade arts and crafts.

story:
Short Summary

We've designed a new shirt and kept the message simple and impactful: SLUMS MATTER. We're not branding it with our logo as we believe the issue is bigger than any person or organization.   

What We Need & The Impact

We are aiming to pre-sell 100 shirts at $20 each before we put up the cost for production.  100% of our net profit (~40%) will go towards our World Slum Day awareness push (see below).

Other Ways You Can Help

April 20th is World Slum Day, our 2nd year holding this holiday (yes, we created it). Our gameplan for that day is to make sure people hear about the urban slums. We're asking for additional pledges and funding, to support our $1 per hashtag campaign to ensure that the word gets out to the masses. How this will work: every pledge that comes in, we'll add it to the pool of pledged funds; last year, we received a 1000 tweets with the #worldslumday hashtag as a result of $1000 of pledged funds (this year, our hashtag will be #slumsmatter).

So, if you're feeling generous, feel free to add an extra contribution to the shirt purchase! If you can't support financially, be on the lookout the next couple weeks on social media by following us @thesupply to help us tweet and re-tweet on World Slum Day!
story_txt:
Short Summary We've designed a new shirt and kept the message simple and impactful: SLUMS MATTER. We're not branding it with our logo as we believe the issue is bigger than any person or organization.      What We Need & The Impact We are aiming to pre-sell 100 shirts at $20 each before we put up the cost for production.  100% of our net profit (~40%) will go towards our World Slum Day awareness push (see below).

    Other Ways You Can Help April 20th is World Slum Day, our 2nd year holding this holiday (yes, we created it). Our gameplan for that day is to make sure people hear about the urban slums. We're asking for additional pledges and funding, to support our $1 per hashtag campaign to ensure that the word gets out to the masses. How this will work: every pledge that comes in, we'll add it to the pool of pledged funds; last year, we received a 1000 tweets with the #worldslumday hashtag as a result of $1000 of pledged funds (this year, our hashtag will be #slumsmatter).
So, if you're feeling generous, feel free to add an extra contribution to the shirt purchase! If you can't support financially, be on the lookout the next couple weeks on social media by following us @thesupply to help us tweet and re-tweet on World Slum Day!

story:
The Story

I have been plus sized since I was a kid.  Finding cool clothes was always a struggle. I had to settle for a lot of clothes that I didn't really love. Like a lot of women, I bought more shoes or better accessories because my clothing options weren't great. The plus size market has changed only slightly over my lifetime.  There are a few more stores, a few more lines but there are still far too few options for a growing number of women in the US and around the world.  There is also no cool/bohemian brand or store for plus size. 

I started this line because I wanted better clothing options and was not finding them in plus size stores and got tired of buying clothes in stores that flat out refuse to carry plus sizes.  The quality and style for many plus size brands were not what I wanted and with my apple shape, I couldn't/didn't want to wear items that were very structured or fitted at the waist, which reduced my already few options.  

I don't have a background in fashion design but I knew how to sew and had a strong eye (and strong opinions).  I started by buying fabrics (especially from Mood of Project Runway fame here in New York because they get their fabrics from luxury fashion houses and the quality was really good) and I experimented with styles and cuts until I found ones that worked for my body.  I sewed my own samples and tried them on on several other plus sized women to see how they worked on different sizes and shapes and was able to ensure that the clothes worked on any body/shape. 

This is just the beginning! A successful round of funding will allow us to produce this collection as well as add even more options for sale on our website. We already have more lovely items in the pipeline, included Chanel style jackets, more dresses and different color options for the jersey dress and others.  We can all have a closet full of clothes we love! 

Production 

In my other business, I sell ethically handmade accessories and home goods, from India. I was able to use my networks in India to find factories that produce ethically and were willing to do small batches, which is essential for a start-up brand.  We also use New York and Los Angeles for aspects of production of the garments.   Garment making has a long history as a way for women to enter the job market.  It also has a history of exploitation.  This is why ethically made is so essential.  By providing jobs to women (especially in the developing world) that pay a good wage. This allows them to educate their children, upgrade their homes and pay for healthcare.   

Sizes 

Proud to offer sizes 14 - 30.  Inquire about sizes larger than 30.  We can do it!  Our items run large and fit comfortably. If you are looking for a size that is smaller than 14, please add $35 to your order and we will accommodate. 

For your order, we ask that you include measurements (though it is optional). Measurements help us give you the correct size because as we all know, sizes can vary a lot from brand to brand and we want to get it right the first time.

story:
What is S Square?

S Square is a fashion App specially designed for women. Our mission is to…

'create a co-creation fashion platform where users can share and get inspiration of different styles from others of similar body size. On S Square, all looks are appreciated and celebrated!'


What S Square Can Do For People

Have you ever had difficulties finding and mastering different fashion looks at your size?


Are you excited about sharing or getting inspiration from a community and trying new styles?


The S Square App uses matching technologies to pair up users with peers having similar body size. By using S Square, users will be able to show their confidence, or picture how they can dress differently based on the style inspiration from other users. 

Discover and try more different styles!



How S Square Works

(sample images of S Square App interface)









What We Need & How You Can Help

We need £20,000 to develop the App with the basic structure and features demonstrated in the above sample interface.  All your donation will be used for App development. If we raised more than the target amount, the extra funds will be used for online advertising before official launch.

Apart from funding S Square for the App development, there are other ways you can offer your support!

Like us, follow and share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and to your friends!



Timeline



The Team Behind S Square

We are 5 entrepreneurs from Cass Business School. Having come from different Asian countries (China, Sri Lanka, and Taiwan), we met and formed this business idea out of our shared passion for fashion as well as the common issue we all faced about finding varied styles suitable for our sizes after coming to the UK. We want to help and encourage people to share, discover, and try various looks and to embrace the beauty of their body shape no matter they are tall, tiny, round, medium or skinny. We hope you like the concept of celebrating the beauty of diversity. Your help could make S Square come true!

story:
Muscles Love Denim Too

In 2012 CrossFit coach and jeans lover, Malinda Zehner, decided she was tired of not being able to find jeans that fit her new muscled legs.  No matter the brand they were all too big in the waist if the legs fit, and even then is was a squeeze.  It seemed the fitter she got, the harder it was to find jeans.  That just wasn't right! Muscular bodies deserve to look and feel great in denim too.  And this was becoming a common complaint among all her athletic friends. Cycling, soccer, gymnastics, running - no sport was safe.  The solution was simple, she set out to design a line of jeans that would fit an athlete's body.  So began a 2 year quest to design a great pair of jeans for athletes, made in America of real American denim.  Zayne Apparel was born.


The Campaign

Now it's time to share them with you.  I designed Zayne jeans with more room in the quads, round butts and smaller waists so you no longer have to go up, up, up in waist size to fit your legs comfortably into denim.  No more having to wear belts to keep your waist tight while your legs look like sausages.  No more gaps and sags in the wrong places.  And no more jeggings!  Premium denim sourced from the same mills as your favorite designer jeans, but tailored to fit muscular legs!

Funding our campaign will allow Zayne to bring our first run of jeans to market, and allow you to claim your first pair as a perk.  Regular retail will be $150 so getting in early will get you a great discount.  The first 50 pairs picked as a perk will be $100 and then $120 per pair for the duration of the campaign.  Don't snooze on this great savings!

If you are picking your first pair of Zayne jeans as a perk and are wondering what size to order simply measure your natural waist.  Then order that size in the jeans.  It's probably the size that you would buy regular jeans in, except that the legs would be too tight.  Because Zayne Jeans are specially cut to have more room in the quads you can order the right waist size.  But never fear, we know you are training hard all the time.  If your size changes by the time we deliver in August we will exchange your jeans for a new size.

Zayne Jeans come in sizes 24-34 for women in a bootcut or skinny jean, and 28-33, 34, 36, 38 & 40 for men in either bootcut or straight leg.  Inseams are 34" or 36".  All styles are available in a light or dark wash.  (When you select your perk you will not be asked for you size and style information at checkout.  We will send an order form later with more information on how to select your proper size). 


But Why Stop There?

Zayne Apparel is not just about jeans.  The more athletes I spoke with the more I heard about the need for better fitting casual wear.  Not everyone gets to wear jeans to work, and business wear can be just as harsh and unflattering.  Snug shoulders, buttons that pull and more tight legs. No one wants to Hulk out at a meeting, flying buttons hitting your boss in the eye!! So I began creating a line of business casual wear as well.  Additional funding past the goal will help launch the full line in 2014.

The Zayne Apparel Philosophy

The way the world looks at beauty, health and fitness is changing.  More and more people are embracing fitness as a lifestyle.  Changing their bodies and their lives for the better.  But it can be defeating when you don't feel as good in your clothes outside the gym as in it.  Fashion is slow to come around to embracing our new muscles and mindsets, but Zayne is here as a catalyst for that change.  Supporting our new independent line is a way to show the fashion industry that fit is here to stay.

The change starts with You.  Contributing to our campaign, wearing Zayne and spreading the word about our unique product will allow us to continue to revolutionize the fashion industry one well muscled body at a time.

You work hard.  You've built a great body.  You wear Zayne Apparel.

The Revolution Begins

Sharing Zayne's story is invaluable as well.  The campaign is fixed funding so promoting the campaign to your teams, leagues and boxes will assure that your jeans arrive in August.  Like our facebook,twitter and instagram to follow our progress and get fan only discounts as the line expands!

And thank you from the bottom of my little denim heart!!

MZ
