story:
Introducing CleKee - Clever Key

Everybody knows this frustrating experience, when you are doubtful about locking the door. A few seconds of uncertainty could force you to return home just to check it. In the worst case, your home could be burgled.

CleKee Project in the Press

                                  

                                                     
"We’ve all been there.  Driving to work and simply CANNOT remember if you locked your door on the way out.  Worry no more. CleKee allows you to be certain that your door is locked..." - Cool Things Addict

"In the worst case, your home could be burgled." - Mother Joint Magazine for Apple Devices

"Finally, nobody wants to share information about their homes with hackers or criminals." - Mother Joint Magazine for Android Devices

"...緑の表示であれば「OK。鍵しまってるよ」." - EtiWO Blog - CleKee

"CleKee works without the need to access your mobile device, the Internet, never needs a charge, and most importantly? No monthly fee is required." - Dustin Wright - CPC Magazine



Key Features

This small unique device directly mounted on your key gives you an answer to your doubts and you will feel safe again - anytime and everywhere.

CleKee is using a newly developed unique precise mechanism, which allows him to work independently without any connection to your smartphone or even to the internet, so your personal privacy stays completely untouched.

Moreover, you will never need to recharge CleKee or to pay monthly fees.

What is Included?

  • CleKee Device
  • CleKee Home Sign Ring


How to Use CleKee?

You can use CleKee the same way as your key before.



  • CleKee Green Indicator - door is locked
  • CleKee Red Indicator - door is open
  • CleKee White Indicator - service position or you are at home (option)
Be certain that your door is locked. Do not give the housebreakers any opportunity to visit your home.

Stop asking yourself if you locked the door. Don’t return home to check it anymore. Just have a look at your CleKee and you will immediately feel safe about your home – anywhere and anytime.

Due to the sophisticated design and construction, it is very simple to join your key to the CleKee.

When you also use the key to lock the door from inside, the CleKee is able to recognize it. We developed “Home Sign Ring”, which is attached directly to the lock from inside for this purpose.

The first generation of the CleKee could be used for the most common lock and key systems with vertical keyhole orientation. You can easily measure, if this newly developed unique device fits for your key. The length is measured from the point where the key is touching the lock surface. As the picture below shows, the maximum length of the key should not be longer than 36 mm or 1.42 in and the width could vary up to 30 mm or 1.18 in.




How Does it Work?

The CleKee is equipped with a sophisticated and precise mechanism, which is able to recognize and store information needed to analyze the key-lock interactions during opening and closing your home front door.

The CleKee unique precise mechanism is based on following forces and movements:

  • Force of Gravity
  • Rotation (provides the information about locking or unlocking the door)
  • Mechanical Touch Sensor (gives the fact if the key is in the door)


Restrictions

The CleKee could not operate in the space now (due to the missing gravity), however we are also working at this issue.

                                   

Vision

We think, that the useful functions of the CleKee should be accessible and affordable for everybody. Our vision is to integrate these functions into every key.

About Us

We are a team of highly qualified technicians with the idea to make the life more enjoyable and less stressful. We started to work at this project already in 2012, when some of our friends always return home to check if they really locked the door.


Why Do We Need Your Support?

Since 2012, we have passed from the “Problem” into the functional CleKee Prototypes. Now it is time to start the mass production. We need your support to finance the first production batch in the factory.

Moreover, we would be more than happy to receive your ideas for the next development and product upgrades, as well your wishes for additional features. We are very thankful for every feedback you provide us.

Timeline


Shipping

We ship perks to our supporter without any additional shipping costs – worldwide for free. This price does not include the customs fees, duties and/or taxes you might incur when importing products into your state or country.

story:
Product

Well turned out and free from stains 

Everyone sweats. But others don’t need to see it. Who you are is what counts. What you can do. What you achieve every day. At home, in business and with your friends. Distracting, embarrassing stains have no place in life or under the arms of active people. KOOLDRY Underarm Pads protect you and your clothing from sweat and deodorant stains. Discreet, hygienic and fresh – 24 hours a day. 

Active round the clock 

  • 24 hour protection 
  • Ultra-thin and extremely absorbent 
  • Dermatologically harmless 
  • Hypoallergenic and unscented 
  • Comfortable to wear 
  • Simple to use


Heat-stress-physical activity-being nervous, there are many reasons for this natural reaction of the human body and everyone copes with it differently. 

But we all want to avoid sweat stains and body odor. Pure deodorants just cover up body odor, but do nothing about sweat stains on your shirts. Anti-transpirants – which are included in many deodorants today – block the natural function of the skin. The stronger the anti-transpirant, the higher the risk of skin irritation. Both products – deodorants and anti-transpirants – also cause another problem, as the chemicals involved tend to affect and discolor fabrics.


KOOLDRY Underarm Pads are totally different. Heat-stress-physical activity-being nervous, there are many reasons for this natural reaction of the human body and everyone copes with it differently. But we all want to avoid sweat stains and body odor. Pure deodorants just cover up body odor, but do nothing about sweat stains on your shirts. Anti-transpirants – which are included in many deodorants today – block the natural function of the skin. The stronger the anti-transpirant, the higher the risk of skin irritation. Both products – deodorants and anti-transpirants – also cause another problem, as the chemicals involved tend to affect and discolor fabrics.

The Inspiration behind KoolDry

After years of trying to solve the SMS (Sweat Mark Syndrome), I had accumulated a large pile of flimsy mismatched handmade pieces of fabrics.  They are all different shapes and sizes, weak and easily warped.  Getting a proper fitting pair of stays was always a challenge.  And on many occasions the under arms of my shirts still looked wet.  But the biggest problem of all was the time and effort wasted. 


The Innovation

As a Financial Economics and a Bioengineering student we had no past experience on design or production. We wanted to develop a high quality product that would represent a superior option for dress shirt, shirt, dress etc. wears around the globe.  So We dedicated our self over the last year to making the world’s best Anti-Sweat System.  It had to solve the sizing problem, save valuable time, enhance a shirt’s appearance, block the odor and help it stay strong during windy and active days. 

The path was extremely difficult but thru passion and perseverance, KoolDry became a reality.

(The picture below shows how the KoolDry underarm pad can also be adjusted for sleeveless shirts. )





Engineered to be the instant and permanent solution to the odor and sweat marks , KoolDry's precision interlocking geometry gives you one powerful solution for all of your clothes.

No more time consuming searches, KoolDry's one size fit all will get you in your way in no time. 

It's Simple and Fast!



Indiegogo Capital Plan

KoolDry is ready to be manufactured.  All of the design specifications have been approved.  Final prototype samples have been received and evaluated.  And a detailed quality control program has been implemented.  KoolDry has met and exceeded all of my expectations and I can't wait to send you your very own set!

We are honored to have you support the KoolDry campaign.  And as an indiegogo launch team member, your participation will allow the following things to happen:

  • Finalize acquisition of full production tooling
  • Acquire sufficient raw materials to expand our initial production run
  • Design, develop and finalize retail packaging
  • Expedite our shipping and delivery schedules 

                       Estimated Ship Date: November-December 2013  

   Just in Time for the Holidays! 

Risks and challenges:

So here is where you come in. Trying to simplify everyday life and designing a cool product is what we do day-in and day-out either in our head or on paper. But like most designers our dream is to eventually make a product that can change solve a big problem. But funding, manufacturing and distributing a new product is a whole other story. Indiegogo is a great way for us to realize many of the ideas that we have in our small studio that we know people will love but big companies are scared to do. We love creating cool stuff without the big company politics and indecision. We believe in the emerging power of community and the individual to bring ideas to life and we hope that this is just the beginning.
story_txt:
Product
Well turned out and free from stains 
Everyone sweats. But others don’t need to see it. Who you are is what counts. What you can do. What you achieve every day. At home, in business and with your friends. Distracting, embarrassing stains have no place in life or under the arms of active people. KOOLDRY Underarm Pads protect you and your clothing from sweat and deodorant stains. Discreet, hygienic and fresh – 24 hours a day. 
Active round the clock 

24 hour protection 
Ultra-thin and extremely absorbent 
Dermatologically harmless 
Hypoallergenic and unscented 
Comfortable to wear 
Simple to use




Heat-stress-physical activity-being nervous, there are many reasons for this natural reaction of the human body and everyone copes with it differently. 
But we all want to avoid sweat stains and body odor. Pure deodorants just cover up body odor, but do nothing about sweat stains on your shirts. Anti-transpirants – which are included in many deodorants today – block the natural function of the skin. The stronger the anti-transpirant, the higher the risk of skin irritation. Both products – deodorants and anti-transpirants – also cause another problem, as the chemicals involved tend to affect and discolor fabrics.





KOOLDRY Underarm Pads are totally different. Heat-stress-physical activity-being nervous, there are many reasons for this natural reaction of the human body and everyone copes with it differently. But we all want to avoid sweat stains and body odor. Pure deodorants just cover up body odor, but do nothing about sweat stains on your shirts. Anti-transpirants – which are included in many deodorants today – block the natural function of the skin. The stronger the anti-transpirant, the higher the risk of skin irritation. Both products – deodorants and anti-transpirants – also cause another problem, as the chemicals involved tend to affect and discolor fabrics.
The Inspiration behind KoolDry
After years of trying to solve the SMS (Sweat Mark Syndrome), I had accumulated a large pile of flimsy mismatched handmade pieces of fabrics.  They are all different shapes and sizes, weak and easily warped.  Getting a proper fitting pair of stays was always a challenge.  And on many occasions the under arms of my shirts still looked wet.  But the biggest problem of all was the time and effort wasted. 


The Innovation
As a Financial Economics and a Bioengineering student we had no past experience on design or production. We wanted to develop a high quality product that would represent a superior option for dress shirt, shirt, dress etc. wears around the globe.  So We dedicated our self over the last year to making the world’s best Anti-Sweat System.  It had to solve the sizing problem, save valuable time, enhance a shirt’s appearance, block the odor and help it stay strong during windy and active days. 
The path was extremely difficult but thru passion and perseverance, KoolDry became a reality.
(The picture below shows how the KoolDry underarm pad can also be adjusted for sleeveless shirts. )










Engineered to be the instant and permanent solution to the odor and sweat marks , KoolDry's precision interlocking geometry gives you one powerful solution for all of your clothes.
No more time consuming searches, KoolDry's one size fit all will get you in your way in no time. 
It's Simple and Fast!










Indiegogo Capital Plan
KoolDry is ready to be manufactured.  All of the design specifications have been approved.  Final prototype samples have been received and evaluated.  And a detailed quality control program has been implemented.  KoolDry has met and exceeded all of my expectations and I can't wait to send you your very own set!
We are honored to have you support the KoolDry campaign.  And as an indiegogo launch team member, your participation will allow the following things to happen:

Finalize acquisition of full production tooling
Acquire sufficient raw materials to expand our initial production run
Design, develop and finalize retail packaging
Expedite our shipping and delivery schedules 

                       Estimated Ship Date: November-December 2013  
   Just in Time for the Holidays! 




Risks and challenges:
So here is where you come in. Trying to simplify everyday life and designing a cool product is what we do day-in and day-out either in our head or on paper. But like most designers our dream is to eventually make a product that can change solve a big problem. But funding, manufacturing and distributing a new product is a whole other story. Indiegogo is a great way for us to realize many of the ideas that we have in our small studio that we know people will love but big companies are scared to do. We love creating cool stuff without the big company politics and indecision. We believe in the emerging power of community and the individual to bring ideas to life and we hope that this is just the beginning.

story:
Ahoy Fellow Viners,

I'm back and Better than Ezra! 

For years I've been dreaming of jumping on the JNCO train like many famous stars before me! e.g.  Hulk Hogan, of Gawker Stardom.

As 2016 is coming to a close, I feel that there is no better time than now for me to order my first pair. Unfortunately, I am but a meager college student with little money. 

If you choose to donate to my gofundme then I promise every penny you send will go to the greater good of fashion. At the very least, I thank you immensely for considering it and spending your time reading this.

Maybe I'll even wear a visor or a bucket hat with my special new pants! ;)

story: ​

------Cliquez ici pour la version française------

What the press is saying about us:


Kenh 14 (Vietnam): "Strange & Cool Vintage Soda watch : unique watch with a classic style!"


Noir Magazine (Mexico) : "Thirsty Watch®: the first fun and original concept of a bottled watch. Always innovating!"


Eveswatch.com (Uk): "The concept behind this fun, funky brand was to create something with a sense of humor, that was also a quality product."




The watch

Vintage Soda by Thirsty Watch  is a "retro" watch meticulously designed to be ergonomic and comfortable to wear.

Click here to pre-order your watch
We designed a watch in the pure tradition of the fine sports watch of the fifties.

Click here to pre-order your watch

The iconic soda bottle cap graphics are now reborn as our central second hand disks.

Click here to pre-order your watch

A unisex watch...

Click here to pre-order your watch

To fit whatever you'll be wearing for the day...

Click here to pre-order your watch

Its slightly barrel-shaped case emphasises the vintage spirit of the watch

Click here to pre-order your watch

Watch size:

Click here to pre-order your watch



Key features



FUN ROTATING SODA CAPS

Click here to pre-order your watch

The cap rotates by 6 degrees every second. A nod to the identity ofThirsty Watch, for which movement is born of desire, and therefore life.


INTERCHANGEABLE STRAP SYSTEM

A button placed at the back of the strap allows you to change straps easily.


FUN RE-USABLE SIGNATURE PACKAGING


The project

Sometimes it all starts with the story about how people meet...

My name is David Attias, I am a French watch designer and founder of Thirsty Watch. I love graphic design and pop culture. Anything cool from the 50s to the 80s makes me feel nostalgic.

Vintage Soda  is definitely the most personal watch I have ever designed. I had this idea in the back of my head for several years but did not have the funds or support needed to release it. That was until I met my very good friend Alejandra Soriano, who is an expert in Social Media.


Based on a common passion for creative design, (as well as for fine Mexican food), we decided to join forces to make the Vintage Soda watch a reality. 

Concept & Inspiration

The 1950s were major creative years in the visual world of American sodas. 

Click here to pre-order your watch

The cap and label reflected the taste and spirit of the drink. I believe the creativity shown during those years influenced the evolution of today's graphic arts. 

Click here to pre-order your watch


The Collection

With Vintage Soda, you can be classic, sporty or glam. It's up to you :-)

After ordering any given watch, we will specify with you the name of your watch head and the name of your strap.

THE WATCH HEADS


THE LEATHER STRAPS

THE NATO STRAPS

 


THE METAL BRACELETS



*When choosing a Perk, the watch head and strap are not yet defined. But don't worry about it!  We will get in touch with you as soon as possible by e-mail so you can make your choice.


Every contribution is worth gold to us! Let us know that you love our project by selecting the perk of your dreams.



Timeline


The family behind the watch

My father, René Attias, started manufacturing watches in Paris in 1975. He was considered a true pioneer in his time.

Inspired by his craft and creativity, I joined him at the age of 24. He taught me everything I know about watches. 

From designing, to conception, prototyping, testing, quality control and so on...

Our family used to own a watch case factory in Besançon (well known for being an historical region for watch manufacturing) as well as our own assembly unit. In the 80s, the birth of quartz movements revolutionized the industry. French factories back then were only making mechanical watches. They closed down one by one. Ours was no exception.

In early 90s, we transferred our knowledge to Hong Kong, where we developed strong bonds with some of the best manufacturers in the region.  There we learned that professionalism and care do not necessarily depend on nationalities or countries. While we always keep close control of the whole manufacturing process, we know for sure that our watches are being very well taken care of by our suppliers.


Where do we produce the watch?

Just as for the majority of watch brands, one cannot make each and every part of a watch oneself. A good watch manufacturer builds a network of excellency through years of relationships with professional suppliers, efficient in the art of making their component.  I was lucky to inherit these suppliers and friends through my father.
The design and final quality control is handled in Paris, near Arts et Métier, a well known parisian district for fashion accessories, craftmanship and watches.

The making of our movement, the heart of a watch, is handled in Japan by our long term supplier Miyota.

The assembly and making of the watch case, is handled by our supplier and friend of many years in Hong Kong.

He has handled the production of our watches for many years. There is no one else I would trust to do this job.

The Team




Why your support is so important.

The idea behind the fun and quirky concept of bottled watches arose from the 2008 economic crisis, which led us to want to diversify our production and stay independent as a watch manufacturing company.


Today, I want to persevere in creation and innovation, like my father before me. This requires significant investment in research and development, which is leading the company to reorient its strategy towards new business models.


Why crowdfunding?

For a small company, to successfully launch a new watch, you have to know how to innovate in every area. It is somewhat akin to launching a start-up. Crowdfunding is a unique, accessible and very interesting opportunity when you are short on funding but not short on ideas. "For the first time in forty years of family watchmaking history, a watch will be launched using crowdfunding from fans of design products. This way, we wish to harness the full potential of the Web, while developing strong, important links with new communities. "

Where will the funds go ?
The money raised on this project will go to production cost, prototyping and tooling cost, as well as the marketing cost of this campaign.

Risks and Challenges

We are well experienced in the art of conceiving and manufacturing watches. However, a watch is made out of many specific parts such as the movement, the dial, the hand set, the glass, the straps etc…. A delay during the manufacturing process of any of these parts could potentially delay the entire process. For instance, in 2011, the Fukushima incident caused delays in the production of our Japanese quartz movements. Having built steady relationship with our suppliers helps smooth out these situations, to minimize any delays.

This is our first crowdfunding campaign ever and quite a challenging one. We chose to go for a fixed campaign, meaning it’s all or nothing. We did not want our contributors to feel uncertain about being charged even if we don’t reach our goal.

So if we don’t pull this off, you won’t get charged for your perk.


It's Vintage Soda time !


CLICK HERE FOR OUR PRESS KIT

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Version Française

Ce que la presse dit sur nous:

Equation du Temps: "un style fun et décontracté à la portée de tous.."

Kenh 14 (Vietnam): "A la fois cool, étrange, unique et classique."

Noir Magazine (Mexique) : "Thirsty W
atch®:  Le premier concept de montre en bouteille (toujours en train d'innover!)"

Eveswatch.com (Royaume Uni): "Derrière son concept original et amusant, il s'agit pour la marque de créer des produits de qualité avec une pointe d'humour."





La montre

Vintage Soda by Thirsty Watch  est une montre "vintage" créée pour être à la fois
ergonomique et confortable.

cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre

Un design dans la lignée des montres sportives des années cinquante...

cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre

Le graphisme des fameuses capsules de soda servent d’ aiguille centrale au
cadran.

cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre


Une montre unisexe...

cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre

Assortie à ce que vous portez...

cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre

La tête de montre légèrement en forme tonneau souligne l'état d’esprit "Vintage".

cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre

Taille de la montre.

cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre


Principales caractéristiques


CAPSULES QUI TOURNENT

La capsule tourne de 6 degrés toutes les secondes. Un clin d’œil à l’identité de Thirsty Watch, pour qui "du désir naît le mouvement et donc la vie."



SYSTEME DE BRACELETS INTERCHANGEABLES

Un bouton placé à l'arrière de nos bracelets permet de facilement les changer.

ECRIN ORIGINAL RÉUTILISABLE


Le Projet 

Parfois, tout commence par l'histoire d'une rencontre...

Je m'appelle David Attias, je suis créateur et fondateur des montres Thirsty Watch. J'adore le graphisme et la culture pop. Tout ce qui touche aux années 50 à 80 me rend nostalgique.

Vintage Soda est sans l'ombre d'un doute, la montre la plus personnelle qui m'ait
été donnée de dessiner. J'avais d'ailleurs cette idée dans la tête depuis quelques
années sans jamais oser la lancer, faute de moyens financiers et humains. C'est en
rencontrant mon amie Alejandra Soriano, experte des réseaux sociaux, que la
solution du financement collectif est apparue.



Poussés par une passion commune pour le design et la créativité (mais aussi pour la cuisine mexicaine de qualité), nous avons décidé de collaborer ensemble pour faire du projet Vintage Soda une réalité .


Concept et Inspiration

Les années 50 ont été des millésimes créatifs majeurs dans l’univers visuel des sodas américains.

cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre

La capsule et l’étiquette traduisaient le goût et l’état d’esprit de la boisson. Cette créativité a, je pense, influencé l’évolution de l’art graphique d’aujourd’hui.

cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre


La Collection



Avec Vintage Soda, vous pouvez être classique, "sporty" ou glamour. C'est vous qui décidez ;-)

Pour commander votre montre vous devez specifier le nom de votre tête de montre et celui de votre bracelet.


TETES DE MONTRES


BRACELETS CUIR.

BRACELETS "NATO"


BRACELETS ACIER



*Quand vous choisissez une contribution (Perk), la tête de montre et le bracelet ne sont pas encore définis. Mais pas d’inquiétude, nous vous contacterons par email afin de noter votre choix.

Vos contributions valent de l'or pour nous! Faites-nous savoir que vous aimez le
projet et selectionnez le "PERK" (contribution) de vos rêves.



Agenda du projet


La famille derrière la montre

Mon père, René Attias, a commencé la fabrication de montres en 1975. Il était
considéré comme l'un des pionniers des montres "fashion".

Inspiré par son talent de créateur, je le rejoins à l'age de 24 ans. Dès lors, il
m'enseigne tout sur les montres..

..des règles de design à la fabrication, en passant par le prototypage, les tests et
contrôles qualités.

Notre famille possédait sa propre usine de boitiers de montre ainsi que sa propre
unité d'assemblage, près de Besançon (la Franche Comté est une région connue
pour son savoir-faire dans l'horlogerie, depuis des siècles) . Dans les années 80, les
premières montres à quartz révolutionnent l'industrie horlogère. Les usines françaises, qui ne fabriquaient à l'époque que des montres mécaniques, ferment une à une. La nôtre ne fera pas exception.

Au début des années 90, nous transférons notre savoir-faire à Hong Kong, où nous
développons des liens de partenariat avec les meilleurs fabricants de la région. Nous apprenons ainsi que le professionnalisme et l'exigence dépendent des hommes plus que des nationalités. Nous suivons de près les processus de fabrication, ne doutant pas que le plus grand soin sera apporté à la fabrication de nos montres.

Où sont fabriqué nos montres ?

Comme pour la majorité des marques horlogères, on ne peut pas fabriquer la totalité des composants d'une montre à partir de matériaux bruts. Un bon fabriquant de montre est en fait un maitre d'oeuvre, qui a constitué un réseau d'excellence avec des professionels compétants, experts dans l'art de fabriquer leurs composants. Ce réseau et ce savoir-faire ne peuvent s'improviser, et prennent des années à se construire. J'ai eu la chance d'hériter ceux-ci de mon père.

Le design et le contrôle qualité final ont lieu à Paris, près du quartier des Arts et
Métier, connu pour être un centre d'activité dynamique en horlogerie et en
accessoires de mode.

La fabrication du mouvement, le coeur de la montre, est pris en charge par notre patenaire de longue date au Japon, Miyota.

L'assemblage et la fabrication du boitier sont pris en charge par notre fournisseur et ami depuis de nombreuses années à Hong Kong.

Nous collaborons depuis très longtemps et je ne confierais nos montres à personne
d'autre que lui.

The Team



Pourquoi votre soutien est si important.

L'idée du concept fun et décallé des montres en bouteilles est survenue après la
crise économique de 2008. Il devenait en effet nécessaire de se diversifier pour
rester une fabrique de montre indépendante.


Aujourd'hui je souhaite, tout comme mon père avant moi, persévérer dans la création et l’innovation. Cela nécessite d’importants investissements de recherche et de développement, qui poussent l’entreprise à réorienter sa stratégie vers de nouveaux modèles économiques.



Pourquoi le crowdfunding?

Afin de réussir le lancement d’un nouveau projet horloger, il faut savoir innover dans
tous les domaines. Cela équivaut parfois à lancer une startup. Le crowdfunding
représente une opportunité unique, accessible et très intéressante, quand on est à
cours de budget mais pas à cours d’idées. « Pour la première fois en quarante ans
d’horlogerie familiale, une montre sera lancée en faisant appel au financement
participatif de fans de produits design. Nous souhaitons ainsi exploiter pleinement le potentiel du web, tout en développant des liens d’intérêts forts avec de nouvelles
communautés. »

Où iront les fonds ?
Les fonds collectés pendant cette campagne financeront les coûts de production, de prototypage et d'outillage, ainsi que les frais marketing de la campagne.


Risques et défis.

Nous sommes expérimentés dans l'art de concevoir et de fabriquer des montres.
Une montre est constituée de nombreux éléments comme le mouvement, le cadran, les aiguilles, le bracelet etc.... Tout retard dans la fabrication de l'un de ces
composants entraine un retard général. Par exemple, l'accident de Fukushima de
2011 avait fortement perturbé la livraison des mouvements japonais. Il est vrai que
dans de telles situations, l'expérience et le relationnel, développés au fil des années
avec nos fournisseurs, aident à minimiser ces retards.

C'est notre première campagne de financement collectif et c'est véritablement un
challenge. Nous avons choisi une campagne fixe. Cela veut dire que les fonds nous
seront versés uniquement si nous atteignons notre objectif. Nous ne souhaitions
pas, que nos contributeurs soient incertains de ce que nous ferions avec vos
contributions, en cas d’échec.

Donc en un mot, si nous n'atteignons pas notre objectif, vous ne serez pas débités
du montant de votre Perk.


A présent,

It's Vintage Soda time !


CLIQUEZ ICI POUR NOTRE DOSSIER DE PRESSE

Ce que la presse dit sur nous:
Equation du Temps: "un style fun et décontracté à la portée de tous.."
Kenh 14 (Vietnam): "A la fois cool, étrange, unique et classique."
Noir Magazine (Mexique) : "Thirsty Watch®:  Le premier concept de montre en bouteille (toujours en train d'innover!)"Eveswatch.com (Royaume Uni): "Derrière son concept original et amusant, il s'agit pour la marque de créer des produits de qualité avec une pointe d'humour."
 

La montre

Vintage Soda by Thirsty Watch  est une montre "vintage" créée pour être à la foisergonomique et confortable.

cliquez ici pour réserver votre montreUn design dans la lignée des montres sportives des années cinquante...

cliquez ici pour réserver votre montreLe graphisme des fameuses capsules de soda servent d’ aiguille centrale aucadran.
cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre

Une montre unisexe...

cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre
Assortie à ce que vous portez...

cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre
La tête de montre légèrement en forme tonneau souligne l'état d’esprit "Vintage".

cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre
Taille de la montre.
cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre
Principales caractéristiques


CAPSULES QUI TOURNENT





La capsule tourne de 6 degrés toutes les secondes. Un clin d’œil à 
l’identité de Thirsty Watch, pour qui "du désir naît le mouvement et
 donc la vie." 

 
SYSTEME DE BRACELETS INTERCHANGEABLES

Un bouton placé à l'arrière de nos bracelets permet de facilement les changer.


ECRIN ORIGINAL RÉUTILISABLE

 


Le Projet 

Parfois, tout commence par l'histoire d'une rencontre...
Je m'appelle David Attias, je suis créateur et fondateur des montres Thirsty Watch. J'adore le graphisme et la culture pop. Tout ce qui touche aux années 50 à 80 me rend nostalgique. 
Vintage Soda est sans l'ombre d'un doute, la montre la plus personnelle qui m'aitété donnée de dessiner. J'avais d'ailleurs cette idée dans la tête depuis quelquesannées sans jamais oser la lancer, faute de moyens financiers et humains. C'est enrencontrant mon amie Alejandra Soriano, experte des réseaux sociaux, que lasolution du financement collectif est apparue. 



Poussés par une passion commune pour le design et la créativité (mais aussi pour la cuisine mexicaine de qualité), nous avons décidé de collaborer ensemble pour faire du projet Vintage Soda une réalité .

Concept et Inspiration


Les
années 50 ont été des millésimes créatifs majeurs dans l’univers visuel des sodas
américains. 



cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre
La
capsule et l’étiquette traduisaient le goût et l’état d’esprit de la boisson. Cette
créativité a, je pense, influencé l’évolution de l’art graphique d’aujourd’hui.



cliquez ici pour réserver votre montre
La Collection




Avec Vintage Soda, vous pouvez être classique, "sporty" ou glamour. C'est vous qui décidez ;-)
Pour commander votre montre vous devez specifier le nom de votre tête de montre et celui de votre bracelet. 

TETES DE MONTRES

 
BRACELETS CUIR.
BRACELETS "NATO"

BRACELETS ACIER




*Quand vous choisissez une contribution (Perk), la tête de montre et le bracelet ne sont pas encore définis. Mais pas d’inquiétude, nous vous contacterons par email afin de noter votre choix.Vos contributions valent de l'or pour nous! Faites-nous savoir que vous aimez leprojet et selectionnez le "PERK" (contribution) de vos rêves.







Agenda du projet



La famille derrière la montre


Mon père, René Attias, a commencé la fabrication de montres en 1975. Il étaitconsidéré comme l'un des pionniers des montres "fashion".



Inspiré par son talent de créateur, je le rejoins à l'age de 24 ans. Dès lors, ilm'enseigne tout sur les montres..
..des règles de design à la fabrication, en passant par le prototypage, les tests etcontrôles qualités.

Notre famille possédait sa propre usine de boitiers de montre ainsi que sa propreunité d'assemblage, près de Besançon (la Franche Comté est une région connuepour son savoir-faire dans l'horlogerie, depuis des siècles) . Dans les années 80, lespremières montres à quartz révolutionnent l'industrie horlogère. Les usines françaises, qui ne fabriquaient à l'époque que des montres mécaniques, ferment une à une. La nôtre ne fera pas exception.Au début des années 90, nous transférons notre savoir-faire à Hong Kong, où nousdéveloppons des liens de partenariat avec les meilleurs fabricants de la région. Nous apprenons ainsi que le professionnalisme et l'exigence dépendent des hommes plus que des nationalités. Nous suivons de près les processus de fabrication, ne doutant pas que le plus grand soin sera apporté à la fabrication de nos montres.


Où sont fabriqué nos montres ?
Comme pour la majorité des marques horlogères, on ne peut pas fabriquer la totalité des composants d'une montre à partir de matériaux bruts. Un bon fabriquant de montre est en fait un maitre d'oeuvre, qui a constitué un réseau d'excellence avec des professionels compétants, experts dans l'art de fabriquer leurs composants. Ce réseau et ce savoir-faire ne peuvent s'improviser, et prennent des années à se construire. J'ai eu la chance d'hériter ceux-ci de mon père.Le design et le contrôle qualité final ont lieu à Paris, près du quartier des Arts etMétier, connu pour être un centre d'activité dynamique en horlogerie et enaccessoires de mode.

La fabrication du mouvement, le coeur de la montre, est pris en charge par notre patenaire de longue date au Japon, Miyota.



L'assemblage et la fabrication du boitier sont pris en charge par notre fournisseur et ami depuis de nombreuses années à Hong Kong.

Nous collaborons depuis très longtemps et je ne confierais nos montres à personned'autre que lui.The Team


Pourquoi votre soutien est si important.
L'idée du concept fun et décallé des montres en bouteilles est survenue après lacrise économique de 2008. Il devenait en effet nécessaire de se diversifier pourrester une fabrique de montre indépendante.



Aujourd'hui je souhaite, tout comme mon père avant moi, persévérer dans la
création et l’innovation. Cela nécessite d’importants investissements de recherche et de développement, qui poussent l’entreprise à réorienter sa stratégie vers de nouveaux modèles économiques.


Pourquoi le crowdfunding?Afin de réussir le lancement d’un nouveau projet horloger, il faut savoir innover danstous les domaines. Cela équivaut parfois à lancer une startup. Le crowdfundingreprésente une opportunité unique, accessible et très intéressante, quand on est àcours de budget mais pas à cours d’idées. « Pour la première fois en quarante ansd’horlogerie familiale, une montre sera lancée en faisant appel au financementparticipatif de fans de produits design. Nous souhaitons ainsi exploiter pleinement le potentiel du web, tout en développant des liens d’intérêts forts avec de nouvellescommunautés. »Où iront les fonds ?Les fonds collectés pendant cette campagne financeront les coûts de production, de prototypage et d'outillage, ainsi que les frais marketing de la campagne.


Risques et défis.

Nous sommes expérimentés dans l'art de concevoir et de fabriquer des montres.Une montre est constituée de nombreux éléments comme le mouvement, le cadran, les aiguilles, le bracelet etc.... Tout retard dans la fabrication de l'un de cescomposants entraine un retard général. Par exemple, l'accident de Fukushima de2011 avait fortement perturbé la livraison des mouvements japonais. Il est vrai quedans de telles situations, l'expérience et le relationnel, développés au fil des annéesavec nos fournisseurs, aident à minimiser ces retards.C'est notre première campagne de financement collectif et c'est véritablement unchallenge. Nous avons choisi une campagne fixe. Cela veut dire que les fonds nousseront versés uniquement si nous atteignons notre objectif. Nous ne souhaitionspas, que nos contributeurs soient incertains de ce que nous ferions avec voscontributions, en cas d’échec.Donc en un mot, si nous n'atteignons pas notre objectif, vous ne serez pas débitésdu montant de votre Perk.A présent,It's Vintage Soda time !

CLIQUEZ ICI POUR NOTRE DOSSIER DE PRESSE

story:
Overview

Customized, 3D Printed Flip Flops that are customized to fit your feet and also help fight COVID-19 in the process.  They are also better for the environment and perform great in the wet.  Want to know more?  Then read on...

 

You say they are 3D Printed?

Yup!  We have a small army of  highly modified 3D Printers set up in our high tech facility in Melbourne, Australia.  "But why should I care that they are 3D Printed?" In a word, Customization.  We can made 1000's of different combinations so they fit your foot perfectly.  We customize to your foot's width, arch height and length.  We also customise to the amount support within each pair to get the optimum cushioning with our Advanced Air Cushioning System.

Advanced Air Cushioning System

So what's the Advanced Air Cushioning System?  Put simply, its hundreds of air pockets embedded within each pair to give you the feeling of walking on air.  What's more, we actually modify the size of these air pockets to give you the perfect mixture of cushioning and support based on your weight and foot size.  That's pretty revolutionary in any shoe, let alone a flip flop!

Environmentally Sustainable too?

Our flip flops are even environmentally friendly.  Here's why:

  • Our flip flops are made from fully recycleable materials.  In fact if you let us know (email us at hows.it.going@retractionfootwear.com), we'll send you a reply paid satchel for you to return your thongs to us and we'll recycle them for you!  We'll turn them into new filament for new pairs to try to limit our environmental impact.
  • We've tweaked our manufacturing process so that each 3D Printer only uses about 50W of energy - about what it takes to run a standard light bulb!  We're working towards getting this supplied from renewable sources as well!
  • 3D Printing is an Additive Manufacturing Technology which only uses material where it is needed.  No offcuts.  No waste.  
  • We print our thongs on demand, meaning we never have surplus stock that has to be sent to the tip - surprisingly common with most retail brands.

How are they in the Wet?

We’ve all been there.  In a traditional pair of flip flops, we’ve been caught out by unexpected shower of rain and now we’re on a smooth surface such as tiles or polished concrete and we’re feeling decidedly unstable.  Its positively dangerous!  It happens because the foam sole readily absorbs water and each step causes the water to be squeezed out and an aquaplaning effect results, removing the friction between us and the ground that we normally rely upon.  This is NOT an issue in our flip flops.  They are not made using foam so they behave more like a pair of regular shoes in the wet rather than traditional thongs.  Our flip flops also incorporate tread to increase your traction even further.

Meanings of the colour combination selected

The flip flops feature a red sole and strap to represent the virus and a black footbed to represent the dark impact it has had on so many people.  COVID-19 is inscribed on the strap and the sole.

How to they look after me?

No-one wants to get COVID-19.  We're all doing our best to physically distance ourselves however after months of isolation, its inevitable that we need to go out for food and supplies, to work and for other essentials.  This is where we have your back with our COVID Key.  

Need to press a button or a switch?  No dramas.  Instead of using your finger, use the point on the end of the COVID Key.  Need to open a door?  The COVID Key has you covered.  The COVID Key is 3D Printed from carbon fibre filament so it is strong but only weighs 15g or about 1/2oz.

How is my purchase helping fight COVID-19?

We will donate $10AUD (about $7USD) from each pair purchased to the following COVID-19 charity.  This supports front line healthcare workers along with research into finding a vaccine for COVID-19.

https://www.thermh.org.au/foundation/coronaviru...

In Production Now

You bet.  Our production facility in Melbourne, Australia is geared up with a small army of heavily modified 3D Printers ready to print your pair.  We aim to have then printed and assembled within 2 weeks of ordering.  That's right, they aren't coming from some factory located in some place you've never heard of.  We sterilize the raw materials, make them, assemble them, check them and ship them direct to you!  From there we will get them to you as soon as we can given the disruption to global shipping networks. 

Why are you doing this?

We wanted to be a force for good in this global pandemic.  For a while we produced face shields to help with the shortage for our frontline healthcare workers but when traditional supply chains caught up in Australia we wondered what else we could do.  Raising money for healthcare workers and finding a vaccine was what we landed on.

 

What if I want something other than COVID-19 on my flip flops?

No problems.  We have a full range of 3D Printed Flip Flops with all the same design advantages available at www.retractionfootwear.com.  You can also pick from a range of colors.  What if I want something else specific on my flip flops?  Can do.  Just email us with the details at hows.it.going@retractionfootwear.com and we'll sort it out.

story:
My Name is Aline Dazogbo. I'm a fashion designer and I'm the owner of Aline's Closet, a boutique located at 101 Pierce street, in San Francisco.

In june 2016 it will be 6 years since I'm part of the beautiful village of the Lower Haight.

THE STORE

My store is called Aline's Closet.

THE PROJECT 

My project is called the Perfect Cardigan.

I created The Perfect Cardigan because it's not always sunny in San Francisco...

      I flew from Sao Paulo, Brazil to San Francisco in February 2009 and re-discovered a lovely city filled with great art, amazing people and beautiful victorian houses, however I didn't realized it will be that cold...I had only visited San Francisco in the past during September and October, witch means summer here with temperature as high as 75°F (23 °C.).

So San Francisco is California, just a colder version of what I have imagined it to be! Most of the time it's in the 50s°F (10 °C). I didn't  know how to dress when in a single day I was experiencing pretty much 3 seasons...if not 4 ! Even on nice days the steep hills can change the weather pretty drastically after just few blocks. In fact, some hills can be quite windy all year round while at the bottom it can get pretty warm. In one neighborhood you can wear a t-shirt, but in another you may need...a cardigan.

Once in a while there are few heat waves, but these only happen a few times a year. On these strange occasions everywhere is t-shirt and flip-flop weather, like the California I had pictured in my mind... But don’t let this fool you. Once the evening fog rolls in you’ll be wishing for your cardigan and scarf again, so always be prepared.

      I remembered my sister's advice telling me to "layer"...which I did ! I ended up wearing a lot of regular cardigans which most of the time did the job in keeping me warm but was either making me look way too young or way too old and ended up being boring...

I also tried wearing simple coats ! (the same ones that I wear in winter in Paris) again it did the job, I was warm but as the day went by, walking around the city, I kept on removing the coat, putting it back, removing it again, putting it back...and having to carry it all around was frustrating...

       My everyday outfits left me with the feeling that I was compromising style to stay warm...It was not fun to bundle myself up as if I was back in Montreal during fall...Annoying as well to carry a big coat around and overall too much effort into looking great just to cover it all as soon as I walked out the door ! 

I remembered putting in a lot of effort into my "Californian" new way of dressing. Up ? Down ? Too warm ? Too light ? I needed to find a balance.

 So I decided to create something I wish existed.

The first prototype of The Perfect Cardigan came into life in 2012.

Since then, I work with my seamstress Olga, right at the store and we have made 10 prototypes of The Perfect Cardigan, in different fabrics, length, finitions and functionality options.

THE STYLE

The Perfect Cardigan is a classic idea with a twist ! 

So it's not just a cardigan. It falls beautifully almost like if a crop top meets a draped dress, pull it over your head or...Completely flip it upside down and create a pick a boo back, (remember we want to show our outfit !)

 It also transforms into a complete new piece depending on how you pin it... 

 belt it...

 or play with it !

As a shawl it will lay on your shoulders and if it gets misty or windy the excess fabric is the perfect hoodie to cover up your hair! Et Voilà ! 

Convertible Playful Effortlessly Chic

Every woman should have a few statement items in her collection, and The Perfect Cardigan is the perfect piece item to own! Not only is this piece extremely versatile, but it will keep you warm when the wind suddenly picks up and is also going to compliment any look.

During the daytime, If you opt to wear The Perfect Cardigan with a white tee shirt.

Over a floral dress, for a ladylike look.

 In silk + leather used as a lovely and stylish wrap.

For nursing moms it's the ideal cover up and The Perfect Cardigan will reveal, pregnant or not, the super stylish woman in you !  No effort necessary...

And as soon as our indian summer comes out linen is my favorite !

I believe you deserve to put a face to the maker of your purchases. On the picture right above it's me looking at my master piece. Below it's my seamstress Olga and I, after a day at the store.

I hope you will enjoy The Perfect Cardigan as much as we do.

WHY KICKSTARTER ?

We cut according to every clients measurements and requirements right at the store. They get to select the fabric and take part of the design process. It's a lot of fun and the experience is as unique as the piece they get!

We have cut and sewn more than 200 Perfect Cardigans on a custom made basis right at the store and made 200 happy costumers ! 

WE WOULD LIKE TO RESPOND TO A DEMAND

Many of our costumers have expressed the wish to see The Perfect Cardigan ready to wear in multiple colors ! We are now ready to respond to that demand and want to produce in cotton, bamboo + cotton, linen and wool but most importantly in different colors and sizes ! It may look like it could be a "one size fits most", but we beleive in sizes and want to give everybody something that works with their bodies.

Hopefully we'll reach our goal and if we go even beyond our goal, we'll be able to offer more colors ! Currently we are producing The Perfect Cardigan in black, ivory, grey and navy.

 One day we are hoping to offer The Perfect Cardigan in every color of the rainbow !

Our first ready to wear production was a success !

The Perfect Cardigan came into 95 pieces of one fabric (bamboo + cotton blend) in 2 colors (charcoal grey+ black) sold in stores in San Francisco and shipped in the USA, Canada and Europe.

THE REWARDS

The cards 

The totes bags

The infinity scarf

 The Perfect Cardigan Production 

 Sizes XS, S, M, L

Please note that we will only offer XL if we exceed our goal sufficiently.

Colors Jetblack, Frostgray, Navyblazer, Cloudcream

We can make more happen with your help !

Fabrics textures

Wool 

 Cotton

 Bamboo + cotton blend

Linen

EXPERIENCE CUSTOM MADE : REVERSIBLE CARDIGAN 

 optional adds on:

1. pockets

2. front+back buttons panel 

3. infinity scarf

4. belt 

EXPERIENCE CUSTOM MADE : 4 SEASONS

Spring

Summer 

 Fall

 Winter

Risks and challenges

As with any large production we run the risk of delays in receiving materials and meeting the production deadline. However, since all of our suppliers and our factory are domestic, the risks are much lower. Furthermore, Aline has been working in the fashion industry, in production management and logistics for 10 years so she's prepared to problem-solve, if any happens, she's ready to find a solution to make sure all backers get their rewards. 

We're looking forward to building a new Indiegogo family with this project and would keep our communication transparent updating all our backers here, now and moving forward, so currently :

The materials: Our most important "ingredient" is the fabric ! In the effort to keep all our fabric sourcing local, we will only buy local. We have been working with 4 fabrics suppliers all based in San Francisco for 5 years and are always reviewing swatches for potential fabrics.

Production: We have built a strong relationship with a great factory in San Francisco and have produced 95 cardigans with them last year. It worked out great : Aline is still behind every pieces for quality control and their quality was outstanding! Due to the nature of custom made we will keep all our custom orders in house. 

Time: Good things takes time and we believe in a slow fashion zero waste business model. Our timeframe is set along the line that we have enough time to be able to focus on making-then-packing your rewards starting as early as July 2016. We work with love and care, and will treat your rewards as if we are sending a gift to our best friend.

Shipping: Eventhough we wish to offer a free shipping anywhere in the world, we are only able to offer a free shipping to US backers. All rewards will ship via USPS for domestic and DHL for international to insure the safest and most efficient delivery. We will contact all international backers with shipping and VAT details when applicable, as soon as ready to ship.

MERCI !

Special Thank you to:

The Lower Haight residents 
Olga Wilson, seamstress 
Chad Berwald, artist 

The San Francisco Film School 
Filming crew: 
Anna Shen 
Ash Wing 
Audrey Haas

Actresses 
Amber Lee 
Audrey Haas 
Elnara Peri

THE STYLE
The Perfect Cardigan is a classic idea with a twist ! 
So it's not just a cardigan. It falls beautifully almost like if a crop top meets a draped dress, pull it over your head or...Completely flip it upside down and create a pick a boo back, (remember we want to show our outfit !)


 It also transforms into a complete new piece depending on how you pin it... 


 belt it...


 or play with it !


As a shawl it will lay on your shoulders and if it gets misty or windy the excess fabric is the perfect hoodie to cover up your hair! Et Voilà ! 
Convertible Playful Effortlessly Chic
Every woman should have a few statement items in her collection, and The Perfect Cardigan is the perfect piece item to own! Not only is this piece extremely versatile, but it will keep you warm when the wind suddenly picks up and is also going to compliment any look.
During the daytime, If you opt to wear The Perfect Cardigan with a white tee shirt.


Over a floral dress, for a ladylike look.


 In silk + leather used as a lovely and stylish wrap.




For nursing moms it's the ideal cover up and The Perfect Cardigan will reveal, pregnant or not, the super stylish woman in you !  No effort necessary...


And as soon as our indian summer comes out linen is my favorite !


I believe you deserve to put a face to the maker of your purchases. On the picture right above it's me looking at my master piece. Below it's my seamstress Olga and I, after a day at the store.


I hope you will enjoy The Perfect Cardigan as much as we do.
WHY KICKSTARTER ?
We cut according to every clients measurements and requirements right at the store. They get to select the fabric and take part of the design process. It's a lot of fun and the experience is as unique as the piece they get!
We have cut and sewn more than 200 Perfect Cardigans on a custom made basis right at the store and made 200 happy costumers ! 





















WE WOULD LIKE TO RESPOND TO A DEMAND
Many of our costumers have expressed the wish to see The Perfect Cardigan ready to wear in multiple colors ! We are now ready to respond to that demand and want to produce in cotton, bamboo + cotton, linen and wool but most importantly in different colors and sizes ! It may look like it could be a "one size fits most", but we beleive in sizes and want to give everybody something that works with their bodies.
Hopefully we'll reach our goal and if we go even beyond our goal, we'll be able to offer more colors ! Currently we are producing The Perfect Cardigan in black, ivory, grey and navy.
 One day we are hoping to offer The Perfect Cardigan in every color of the rainbow !

The Perfect Cardigan illustrated by artist Chad Berwald
Our first ready to wear production was a success !
The Perfect Cardigan came into 95 pieces of one fabric (bamboo + cotton blend) in 2 colors (charcoal grey+ black) sold in stores in San Francisco and shipped in the USA, Canada and Europe.












THE REWARDS
The cards 


The totes bags

The cowrie logo tote bag, front | back

The Eiffel Tower + The Golden Gate Bridge tote bag, front | back

You're Perfect tote bag, front | back
The infinity scarf

one of a kind, made of of past cardigans.
 The Perfect Cardigan Production 
 Sizes XS, S, M, L
Please note that we will only offer XL if we exceed our goal sufficiently.

Our size guide
Colors Jetblack, Frostgray, Navyblazer, Cloudcream
We can make more happen with your help !








Fabrics textures
Wool 

light weight wool suiting
 Cotton

 Bamboo + cotton blend

EXPERIENCE CUSTOM MADE : REVERSIBLE CARDIGAN 


 optional adds on:
1. pockets
2. front+back buttons panel 
3. infinity scarf
4. belt 









reversible

reversible

cowrie logo
EXPERIENCE CUSTOM MADE : 4 SEASONS
Spring


Summer 


 Fall


 Winter



Pont de Bir-hakeim

Paris, Place de la Concorde
Risks and challengesAs with any large production we run the risk of delays in receiving materials and meeting the production deadline. However, since all of our suppliers and our factory are domestic, the risks are much lower. Furthermore, Aline has been working in the fashion industry, in production management and logistics for 10 years so she's prepared to problem-solve, if any happens, she's ready to find a solution to make sure all backers get their rewards. We're looking forward to building a new Indiegogo family with this project and would keep our communication transparent updating all our backers here, now and moving forward, so currently :The materials: Our most important "ingredient" is the fabric ! In the effort to keep all our fabric sourcing local, we will only buy local. We have been working with 4 fabrics suppliers all based in San Francisco for 5 years and are always reviewing swatches for potential fabrics.Production: We have built a strong relationship with a great factory in San Francisco and have produced 95 cardigans with them last year. It worked out great : Aline is still behind every pieces for quality control and their quality was outstanding! Due to the nature of custom made we will keep all our custom orders in house. Time: Good things takes time and we believe in a slow fashion zero waste business model. Our timeframe is set along the line that we have enough time to be able to focus on making-then-packing your rewards starting as early as July 2016. We work with love and care, and will treat your rewards as if we are sending a gift to our best friend.Shipping: Eventhough we wish to offer a free shipping anywhere in the world, we are only able to offer a free shipping to US backers. All rewards will ship via USPS for domestic and DHL for international to insure the safest and most efficient delivery. We will contact all international backers with shipping and VAT details when applicable, as soon as ready to ship.MERCI !Special Thank you to:The Lower Haight residents Olga Wilson, seamstress Chad Berwald, artist The San Francisco Film School Filming crew: Anna Shen Ash Wing Audrey HaasActresses Amber Lee Audrey Haas Elnara Peri

story:
Hi, Indiegogo! Plan Watches are back with the new watch series called Genoa. Our timepieces are even more interesting, complicated, conceptual and simply better in every aspect now! We're currently preparing for the production stage, so you don't need to wait for the campaign to end — we're going to start shipping this November (or even earlier, as we're expecting)! So now's the best chance to get the Genoa watch with the huge discount and don't wait extra time as well.  

 

 

 

 

 

Our first campaign attracted a lot of backers and made us believe that there are people out there, all over the world, who are interested in the watches produced by our team. After a successful beginning, we were inspired to move further and started working on a new series called Genoa.

The primary sources of inspiration for the Genoa series are retro dashboards of vintage scooters from the middle of the 20th century, the period of their rise to glory, the time of leisure living, easygoing and upbeat youth finding their stand in views, life and, of course, incredible style.

Our debut Edmonton series attracted a significant portion of attention, with people supporting us during and after the campaign. We have plenty of customers in every corner of the globe and both design and watch-oriented media. Now, we're sure that our Genoa series is more interesting in concept, has better looks, and you'll love it even more than our Edmonton watch.

 

Plan Watches have a quirk for vintage-inspired timepieces. Our previous project drew inspiration from luxury timepieces of the first part of the 20th century combined with the sophistication of a preppy style. The Genoa series still reaches back to this period but takes its design from an entirely new inspiration.

The Genoa collection's look is based on several distinctive design features which reflect different retro aspects, assembling into one piece of ultimate retro manifestation.

The main source of inspiration for this series are dashboards and measurement tools from vintage scooters which were produced by such prominent brands and factories as Piaggio, Lambretta, and Cushman. The dials bear resemblance with Vespa and Lambretta scooter dashboard elements, as well as in overall aesthetics with a love of details, which is our signature. :)

The shape of the watch case and the dial both resemble typical rounded measurement tools of vintage scooter vehicles.

The layout on the dial also serves as an homage. The date window not only refers to a mileage counter but also has retro type applied to the disc. On the bottom of the face of the watch lies an extra 24-hour dial (which can also be used as a dual time function — perfect for travelling!) with the shape and hand referring to vintage speedometers, and the red color of the hand is typical to the dashboards of the middle of the 20th century.

Each watch, traditionally, comes with two straps. One is of perforated leather which is standard for retro automotive watches. The other is a textile strap resembling a livery and the paintwork of specific old scooter models.

Every time we start creating the watch, we want it not only to find inspiration in different cultures and stylistics, but also, to bring this aesthetic into the personal style of its wearer. That's why we always choose something interesting, unexplored, and challenging. This time we want to express in our design a very interesting blend of attractive retro vehicle design of the middle of the 20th century with notes of Art Deco elegance, a portion of easygoing Italian lifestyle, and the incredibly stylish boldness of British Mod culture.

Each part of the Genoa watch is created with love for details and sources of inspiration. The watch will become a precious addition to any wardrobe and a worthy decoration to every wrist. We develop our timepieces to be sophisticated, elegant, and graceful with some space left for interesting design elements. We strive to create watches that you'll want to wear every day.

Our vital goal is to create a new atmosphere with our watches, let them emanate this unique feeling of time travel, and give an opportunity to own that which looks like something from the distant past. We want our watches to become a part of your lifestyle, not only to be an accessory. It's a watch that makes you stand out. It's the watch for you.

The aspect that defines all Plan watches is their absolute universality. We create timepieces that feel comfortable on any wrist but at the same time, make their wearers feel unique.

All watches traditionally come with an extra strap in the packaging, so you won’t have any problems wondering whether your watch suits your style.

When you open the box, you’ll find a leather strap and a two-piece nylon strap along with a removal tool for quick 'n' easy strap changes.

The first is inspired by straps that you can find on luxury retro timepieces with an automotive design concept, while the textile strap makes reference to racing liveries with a colorwork of iconic retro scooter models in its design.

The unique blend of retro touch and contemporary design will accommodate your style. You can wear the Genoa watch with a perforated leather strap on formal occasions while a textile strap is perfect for a more relaxed day.

If you have followed us since the first campaign, then you probably know that we favor small details and conceptual features in our watches. We always add both obvious and hidden points of interest that will be admired by modern watch aficionados.

The dial is a retro industrial gem inspired by dashboards and construction elements of vintage scooters. It's nested in our signature case that was reworked for the aesthetic needs of this project. The overall shape of the watch refers to a scooter headlight, most recognizable in models such as Vespa. The Cromo model has a chrome finishing that makes such comparison more obvious. The slightly transparent polymer disc on the dial can also be seen on the old dashboards as a part of their design.

The lower 24-hour dial is a jump hour reference to old scooter speedometers, both in the design and the layout. The Bronzo and Nero watches' extra hand is red as it was with scooters in the middle of the 20th century. It can also serve you as a dual time dial for different time zones to keep you always updated on time difference. 

Once more, we use our favorite method with several steel finishings. You will find polished, brushed, and mat surfaces looking perfect next to each other in a single model. We also use two different retro fonts for the main and extra dial that can be seen on vintage speedometers. The date window refers to old mileage counters.

We always take the development process very seriously. The designs of our watches are based on different areas of retro stylistics, and it takes a lot of time and effort to study the subject as precisely as possible.

Our team tries to find the perfect harmony between finding our own style and exploiting the best features of vintage wristwatches, creating unique, attractive timepieces that appeal to the tastes of modern watch enthusiasts.

The Genoa collection is more advanced in every aspect. We use the new retrograde multi-functional Miyota GP00, reliable and precise movement made in Japan. The cases and dial elements have a high-quality, durable coating, and the watch faces are made of several layers to maintain a carefully crafted feel.

Plan Watches are developing continually, not only in good taste and design but also in technical and production aspects. We improve our methods, materials, manufacturing, and even the smallest details and nuances that are not visible to the eyes of our supporters and customers.

Case Diameter: 42 mm 
Case Thickness: 9 mm
Band Material: Perforated leather strap + textile NATO strap 
Band Max/Min Length: 230 mm / 145 mm 
Band Width: 20 mm 
Total Weight: 55 g
Case / Backcase Material : 316L Stainless steel 
Strap buckle: 316L Stainless steel 
Crystal: Domed Sapphire Coated 
Water Resistant: 5 ATM
Movement: Retrograde Miyota GP00 Japan with 24-h extra dial / dual time function

Our first crowdfunding experience was amazing! We realized that working with our customers directly without any mediators and distribution network benefits all. We can offer you the best price possible on our watches. Forget about retail markups, shipping, and preserving costs, and all those things that heavily influence the final price to you. You simply pledge for the required reward, save big off the future retail price, and all that's left is to wait for your watch which you'll get one of the first!

You don't need to wait for the campaign to end! The production is going to start in the beginning of July and we scheduled the shipping for this Fall. So you basically need to wait a couple of months and receive your new timepiece! We planned the latest delivery date on November, but we expect our watches to be manufactured much sooner and believe that you may receive them earlier! 

We live in an era of social media when even your voice means much. If you like our watches, please, tell your friends about the Genoa series, share some pics, and spread the word. It will help our project to improve even further!

instagram.com/planwatches/

facebook.com/planwatches/

twitter.com/planwatches/

 

Dear writers, journalists, and bloggers! If you want to cover our project and need some info or high-resolution images, feel free to reach us via email: info@plan-time.co or visit our Dropbox page.

story:
As she walks deep in the woods near a lake, a peculiar flower pot appears. The pot breaks suddenly becoming a mini herb plant USB drive. Enjoy nature’s presence and its harmonic design at your desk.

Eco-friendly / Natural Fragrance / Idealistic

Fragrance will last for approximately 3 months.

Slight fragrance will remain following initial period. 

Natural fragrance will leave a pleasant feeling and function as a decorative ornament in your house or office.

Suitable to leave at your desk or take with you.

User Convenience – Hard to lose, Shock prevention, Waterproof when kept in its pot. Also, cork does not corrode.

Great for gift giving.

Herb USB is convenient and adds a special element to your home or office desk.


Size : Ø25 (Ø15) x H51


<Special Edition>

Smaco Herb USB 1 + Pencil Case & USB Cradle + Premium Case

story:
Hello, welcome to My Leather Key Fob

 

We have designed a beautiful handmade leather key holder that stops your keys from wearing holes in your trouser pockets, catching on the lining of your handbag and prevents your keys from scratching your mobile phone.

Our aim is to produce a beautiful product that you'll love and which you can gift to your friends and family and know that they'll love it too.

 

 

Colour Options 

Initial Feedback 

Dimensions

The key fob is similar in size to a mobile phone and fits comfortably into your handbag or trouser pocket. The fob can easily hold between 8 - 10 keys which can be up to 10cm in length.

 

The Full Grain Leather

The key fobs are handmade from specially selected full-grain leather which has been prepared using a semi vegetable tanning process. This type of leather has a stunning oil and wax finish which makes it durable and provides lasting strength. As the fob ages, the leather will soften, develop a beautifully rich earthy tone and acquire a lovely patina. The inner liner is a heat bonded layer that has a soft velvet-like finish.

The tanneries which produce this fantastic full-grain leather are based in Europe and the Middle East.

 

Product Supplier

The key fobs are designed in Great Britain and manufactured by a premium leather goods manufacturer in India. This manufacturer is an expert in high-end leather goods and produces items for a number of top Swiss Watch manufacturers and other Internationally recognised premium brands.

They are committed to environmental stewardship through their LWG Membership, are an SA8000 certified company and adhere to International Standards ISO - 9001:2015.

 

Trusted Partners

From the outset of this project, we have only wanted to work with trusted partners to produce an affordable luxury product. It is important to us that the people who we work with receive a fair price for their work and that the customer receives a premium product which is fantastic value for money.

 

Reward Options

 

Why I Created My Leather Key Fob? 

When it came time to replace my own leather key fob, I looked at the available options and was disappointed to find that the only options were very high-end brands that cost hundreds of pounds, or poor quality fobs made of cheap materials which were too small to function properly.

Having worked with Swiss watch manufacturers and their leather suppliers in the past, I knew that there must be an option to produce a high-quality key fob at an honest price that would not break the bank, so I decided to create My Leather Key Fob.

 

Warranty

We are proud to include a one year warranty on the key fob, from the date of invoice. This warranty covers any possible defects in the materials and workmanship, although we are confident that you won't need to use it. The warranty does not include any naturally occurring variations in the leather or its colour, this is a natural product and, as such, variations do occur. The key fob must have been used as described for its intended purposes and with a duty of care. Validated warranty claims are at first repaired, and failing that, replaced at no charge. The cost of return shipping for warranty claims is paid by the customer.

 

Image Gallery

 

 

Risks and challenges

As highlighted in the campaign presentation, the products shown in the video are pre-production working samples. The finished product will be made of higher quality full-grain leather so will look slightly different from the presented key fobs. Within the leather there are always natural variations in colour, finish, feel and minor markings. These are not defects but the natural quality of the leather. 

 

Long-lasting design

We specifically selected a full-grain leather as it is durable, robust and provides lasting strength. We anticipate that the product will last for a number of years.

 

Reusability and recyclability

Our packaging will be 100% recyclable.
