story:
Who We Are

Hello Indiegogo! We are Julie Mai and Karissa Cook, two senior Stanford engineers majoring in Product Design who are ready to bridge the fashion and engineering worlds to liberate women from a problem we have all experienced: painful heels! As Product Design majors in the Mechanical Engineering department, we have mastered the skills in creative probelm solving to make heels that will change the way you think about going out.

  • No more cramped arches.
  • No more carrying an extra pair of flats in your bag.
  • No more changing your shoes to drive or walk long distances.
  • All you'll need is just your new favorite Alterra heels!

What We Need & What You Get

We need your support to make this vision real.

By supporting our campaign through purchasing any of our perks, you are helping us to establish our manufacturing, assembly, and distribution chains to get Alterras into your closet. We want to build Alterra into a quliaty brand of reliable, sleek, and gorgeous shoes so that Alterras will be the only shoes that you need. 

We can only make Alterras real and get them on your feet if we are able to fully fund our first round of manufacturing, so spread the word! The Alterra Movement is here and women can kick painful heels to the curb!

Our Vision

Our vision is for every woman to have a pair of Alterras in her closet so that she never has to worry about painful heels again. We want to create a whole line of different style and color shoes, in addition to a line of different style and color heels so women can change thier look and express themselves as they see fit so that eventually they turn their Alterras into 100 shoes in one.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are ways to help our cause even if you don't wear heels! Buy them for a special someone and share our campaign site on Facebook and Twitter, and be sure to visit our website at alterraheels.com!
story_txt:
Who We Are
Hello Indiegogo! We are Julie Mai and Karissa Cook, two senior Stanford engineers majoring in Product Design who are ready to bridge the fashion and engineering worlds to liberate women from a problem we have all experienced: painful heels! As Product Design majors in the Mechanical Engineering department, we have mastered the skills in creative probelm solving to make heels that will change the way you think about going out.

No more cramped arches.
No more carrying an extra pair of flats in your bag.
No more changing your shoes to drive or walk long distances.
All you'll need is just your new favorite Alterra heels!


What We Need & What You Get


We need your support to make this vision real.
By supporting our campaign through purchasing any of our perks, you are helping us to establish our manufacturing, assembly, and distribution chains to get Alterras into your closet. We want to build Alterra into a quliaty brand of reliable, sleek, and gorgeous shoes so that Alterras will be the only shoes that you need. 
We can only make Alterras real and get them on your feet if we are able to fully fund our first round of manufacturing, so spread the word! The Alterra Movement is here and women can kick painful heels to the curb!



Our Vision
Our vision is for every woman to have a pair of Alterras in her closet so that she never has to worry about painful heels again. We want to create a whole line of different style and color shoes, in addition to a line of different style and color heels so women can change thier look and express themselves as they see fit so that eventually they turn their Alterras into 100 shoes in one.

 
Other Ways You Can Help
There are ways to help our cause even if you don't wear heels! Buy them for a special someone and share our campaign site on Facebook and Twitter, and be sure to visit our website at alterraheels.com!

story:
Are you tired of carrying large

and boring backpacks?

So are we! This is why, we decided to re-design drawstring bags to make it more functional, comfortable and unique. There are plenty occasions when you need to take only couple thinks with you, like phone, wallet, keys, sunglasses and a water THIS IS WHAT MARCO VENETO BAG IS MADE FOR - to carry your essentials everywhere.

 

But wait... Why our bags are so special? 

Marco Vento team offer the best possible products for you Indiegogo community. Each of our bags went through a long process of design and quality check to make sure you will be happy with your purchase. Our bags have 5 key features which make them outstanding in the industry.

 

1. Quality materials and attention to the details.

Marco Veneto team really take care about quality. That is why we use materials like 100% Cotton Canvas, Natural Jute and Eco-Friendly leather to produce our bags. 

Small details always matters! Metal logo on the bottom of each bag, zip puller or aluminium ring are small elements which make huge difference. 

2. Functional pocket system. 

Our bags do not have hundreds of unused pockets. One small zip pocket made for your mobile phone, wallet or keys and one snap fastener pocket to put anything else. Functional and Simple!

 

3. Lightweight and durable.

Materials like Natural Jute and 6oz Cotton Canvas are very light, but at the same time, structure of those fabrics will allow you to use the bags for years without any problems. 

4. Comfortable strings. 

Thicker strings made from soft cotton will make yours experience with Marco Veneto bags much more carefree and comfortable. Strings which we are using are 2x times wider then classic ones, this prevents shoulder pain so you can even forget that you carring the bag on. 

5. Easy pull/open system.

Despite thicker strings, bags are easy to open and close thanks to intuitive and practical system. 

 

Choose your bag from 4 different styles!

 

 

PRODUCT:

What is the size of Marco Veneto Bag?

All our bags have the sime dimensions: 45cm/17.7in x 34cm/13.4in with capacity of 12 liters.

How many styles are available?

You can choose your bag from 4 different styles: Money, Flowery, Beach and Classic. 

How can I select which style I want? 

When our campaign finishes, our loyal supporters will receive a survey to indicate their style preference.

Do use real leather in the bags? 

No, we use eco-friendly pu leather. There is no need to sacrifice animals to use real leather, pu leather looks as good and as stays as long. 

What does it mean 6oz cotton canvas? 

Cotton canvas is the most durable kind of cotton. It stays for ages and it is easy to clean. 6oz is the lightest version suitable for drawstring bags. 

What fits in Marco Veneto Bag?

Our bags are made to carry the most important thinks with you like: mobile phone, wallet, keys, powerbank, water, pack of tissues etc. I would fits as well portable speaker, hoodie or second pair of shoes.

How long are the strings and can I adjust them?

The strings length is standard 95cm, however if you need to make it shorter, you just need to tie a knot on both sides with preferred length and voilà, quick and simple.

SHIPPING:

How much does the shipping cost?

Delivery fee cost is as low as 5$. It doesn't matter how many bags you order. 

I live in the end of the world. Can you send the bags to me? 

Yes! We ship our bags worldwide. In the very unlikely scenario when we will not be able to send bags to you, full refund is guaranteed.

When will I get my Marco Veneto bag?

Shipping to the customers is planned for november 2018. However, As with any product, unforeseen delays can happen.  We promise to keep our backers updated throughout the process and let you know if we foresee any updates to the delivery timeline.

I still can't find the answer to my question! 

Please do not hesitate to send us an e-mail: info.marcoveneto@gmail.com

story:
Volcanxx® is a revolutionary fabric that uses the best technology and natural materials to adapt to your body temperature and your environment.

Why? When your body isn't trying to warm you or cool you down you save energy and are more comfortable and capable. You just feel better all the time!

 

One performance shirt that works for every season and every activity

  • helps cool you down when you are hot and warm you up when you are cold
  • helps you maintain a comfortable personal micro climate of 37.5 degrees
  • removes sweat in the vapor stage before liquid sweat forms
  • traps odors and releases them when washed and dried
  • active particles are derived from nature
  • works for the life of the garment
     

How is this better than any other shirt?

You have more energy to put toward the work at hand when your clothing is keeping your body at optimal temperature.

•  responds to your body to provide a wider range of comfort in fluctuating temperatures and at varied activity levels. 

•  delays the onset of sweat by pulling moisture out of the system.

 

Notable Tester Comments:

By far, this shirt will become my favorite shirt. Excellent feel while keeping me dry."

"Much more comfortable than other performance shirts"

"Far superior to any other shirts I have."

"This shirt is extremely comfortable, helps you stay dry even on the hottest day." 

 

The 37.5® Technology volcanic sand particles embedded in the fabric reacts to the infrared heat signals coming from your body to either disperse heat when you start to overheat or reflect heat when you are cold. This process helps you maintain a core, comfortable temperature longer in both cold and warm climates.

How We Know It Works.

 

We are working with 37.5® Technologies patented active volcanic sand embedded thread. This thread has gone through multiple lab tests on next to skin fabrics, tailored clothing, insulated jackets and footwear at the University of Colorado Boulder, the Munich-based lab Inside Climate and product testing company Mesh01. The overall evidence from these tests is that products with the 37.5® Technology volcanic sand particles increase comfort and performance.

 

Volcanxx® fabric is the result of years of fabric development and experience using natural and technologically superior processes to maximize performance and comfort. We have consulted with leading edge fabric developers 37.5®Technology  and Lenzing to create this best-of-the-best fabric.

The fabric is a blend of 37.5 ® Technology 400+ API volcanic sand embedded recycled polyester, Lenzing® beech wood pulp derived Modal® and spandex. This unique combination offers the best integrated characteristics in a fabric to maximize temperature regulation, superior performance and comfort.

 

Rewards:

Timeline:

Our Supply Chain:

  • Fabric development in Taiwan
  • Manufacturing in Canada
  • Distribution in USA

Shipping:

We will be manufacturing our shirts in Canada and then shipping with a partner warehouse in the USA. Shipping will be charged after the project successfully ends. We are doing this because it means you will save on money on shipping. If we added shipping into your rewards we would pay extra fees(Kickstarter fees) on shipping. To see the costs for shipping please refer below to the chart. 

Our Mission:

Our mission at Modernature is to outfit you with the most advanced adaptable clothing on the planet so you can be more comfortable in changing temperatures and environments and perform at your best whether that is at your home, office, the gym or the great outdoors.

The Volcanxx® t-shirt is the first garment we want to make but we would like to make a full line of adaptable clothing. If successful, this project will launch our company and we will start working on the next great temperature regulation garments. As a transparently run company we will keep you in the loop with what we are doing and ask for your opinions and advice. As a supporter, you will get an inside look at how we will grow this brand and you will get some great deals too – welcome to the team!

Sustainability:

At Modernature, everything we do is about innovation, sustainability, quality and integrity. To us, it's all about progress towards balance. We are dedicated to developing innovative products that are natural, sustainably sourced, locally produced and delivered. Our supply partners are important people to us; we want them to be free, to be paid a living wage, and to be happy working with us. We are committed to using recycled materials, reducing our carbon footprint and up-cycling our garments and waste. With the help of our team, customers, suppliers and our community, we can help create a cleaner world for all of us.

Founder Bio:

Steven Sal Debus is an award winning clothing designer, fabric developer and entrepreneur. After 20 years of experience and multiple successful crowdfunding campaigns his mission is to build the most adaptive clothing on the planet. Below are a few of the past products and projects he has helped design and deliver.

"I guarantee that you will love these shirts or I will give your money back!"

-Steven Sal Debus

How you can help beyond just backing us..?

Know someone who would be just as stoked as you about Volcanxx®. Share our campaign with them through the "Share this project" button at the top or these buttons below. Sharing is Caring!

story:
Our lightweight premium satin shorts, a first in India, are unisex, designed for comfort & meant to be worn anywhere. Let’s break the confines of the briefs!

What’s special about our shorts? Well, that’s THE INSIDE STORY... :)

Our specially designed ‘A’ line cut ensures that while you get a comfortable fit around your waist, there’s plenty of breathing room for your unmentionables (we meant the extra muscle on your bottoms and thighs, get your mind out of the gutter!)

Our SATIN is not just premium, it’s super premium! We don’t do anything by halves. Even our whites are outdoor-friendly in bright sunlight so you don’t land up showing someone more than they bargained for.

HASSLE FREE ! If you’re prim & proper, you can iron on them. If you’re lazy, you can machine wash them. Win-win!

Now if our shorts were your girlfriend/boyfriend, you’d love them because they would be hassle-free, zero-maintenance and their looks wouldn’t fade over the years!

They even make great gifts! ('cause they are unisex!) Now, you can gift your partner a pair of shorts that you can share (and then later claim, them for yourself! The more, the better...) 

Did we mention that the prints are fused into the fabric? This means that if you close your eyes, we bet you wouldn't be able to pin-point the print by touch!

Since the shorts come in contact with your most intimate skin, we ensure that they are completely smooth and soft. Best of all, if you workout really hard and sweat in them, they won't stick to your skin!

We're sexy and we know it...

Necessity is the mother of invention and The Inside Story is a classic case. Satin shorts are a rare breed in the Indian loungewear industry and women-centric designs are even more so. Hence, our three musketeers – two experienced musketeers and one in the making – decided to slay this dragon.

We, Nadeem Ahmed and Ayushi Garg, have been running a wedding planning company called Kisses By Candlelight for the last seven years. Aditya Garg is a 19-year-old entrepreneur in the making. Each of us brings to the table a wide array of capabilities and qualities to make the perfect blend that is The Inside Story.

Many moons ago, we discovered the comfort that was SATIN shorts ! A few moons later, we outgrew them. But despite our microscopic search of the world wide web, we couldn’t find a replacement pair. So we decided to make our own and The Inside Story was born.

We're in love with the shape of you. And size. 

Choose the designs that define you from these 10 funky styles! 

Risks and challenges

The quality of our product lies the materials we use and the manpower involved. However, due to unforeseen circumstances like strikes, mother nature's fury, acts of God or the government, we might experiences delays. If any of the aforementioned does happen we will be sure to keep all of you in the loop via the Updates tab on the campaign page. 

 

PS: Unless, of course, our owls can't fly that night and the pigeons are on strike too!

story:
The Lunithe is thoughtfully designed in accordance to strict criterias. Style meets Function, creating a NEO VINTAGE eyeframe with touches of old-school and modern functional shapes.

 ADVICE 

We can help you choose your shapes (using photomontage). Send us your picture at : contact@lunithe.com (full-face portrait ratio)

 Taking Nature as a model, for its perfect balance between efficiency and energy saving, LUNITHE finds its inspiration in the structure of a tree-leaf, light and flexible thanks to its veined anatomy.

No screws or other small parts likely to be lost. Age-old technique, used in carpentry and in antique architectures.

 

 

 

 

Rigel 4 - A delicate model, an alternative to the pierced glass spectacles. Higher nose-bridge, a nod to old pince-nez glasses.

 

Rigel 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 - 2018

 

 Dirakh 5 - A timeless model classic and elegant, with twisted tenon-joints.​

Dirakh 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 - 2018​

  Altaïr 2 - A retro model Neo Retro look, with a touch of the old-school style of the past acetate eye-frame rivets.

Altaïr 1, 2, 3, 4 - 2018

Although the 2016 Lunithes are already highly efficient, improvements have been made to better satisfy your needs.

4 MONTHS

MATERIALS STAINLESS STEEL + silicone comfort parts

 

Stainless steel sheet from 0.3 to 0.8 mm thick​

 

 

No need to overstate things, the product speaks for itself. 

The shapes of the new collection were designed by Guillaume and Jeanne. The detailed technical drawings were made by Guillaume, in charge of all the technological and engineering aspects of the product.

 

Lunithe is an industrial-handmade product that uses both industrial engraving and cutting techniques, as well as in-house forming and hand finishing.

 

THE STORY 

Creative siblings, concerned with the crafting of high-end and well-designed products.Guillaume, the brother, is an engineer-designer. His industrial design studies, has brought him to perfect his skills at a Parisian based eyewear-design company, paving the way to an innovative patent deposit and bringing his ideas to life. Jeanne, the sister, is artistically trained. She’s exploring fashion with a poetic subtleness, through design and styling.

All the shapes are mounted with high-end solar lenses and set with an eyeglass case , a cleaning microfiber cloth , and a plier to change the lenses.

You can order corrective lenses according to your correction with your frame. We need your prescription and your pupil distance (PD).

We are not opticians but eyewear creators, this service is outsourced to a workshop which works with high-standing Swiss lenses.

  

 

LUNITHE 2018

Altaïr 2 - steel grey   /   Avior - golden satin

 

 

LUNITHE 2016

Paon - paladium / Flèche 2 - black

 

 

In recent years, while taking time to think, create and prepare their success story, Guillaume and Jeanne have built a solid foundation for a rapid and sustainable development.

 

 We learned a lot from our first crowdfunding campaign. 
Today, our process is well established. According to your tastes, your remarks and the opticians', we improved our products.

Jeanne, the sister, is artistically trained. She’s exploring fashion with a poetic subtleness, through design and styling.All the shapes are mounted with high-end solar lenses and set with an eyeglass case , a cleaning microfiber cloth , and a plier to change the lenses.You can order corrective lenses according to your correction with your frame. We need your prescription and your pupil distance (PD).We are not opticians but eyewear creators, this service is outsourced to a workshop which works with high-standing Swiss lenses.   LUNITHE 2018Altaïr 2 - steel grey   /   Avior - golden satin     LUNITHE 2016Paon - paladium / Flèche 2 - black     In recent years, while taking time to think, create and prepare their success story, Guillaume and Jeanne have built a solid foundation for a rapid and sustainable development.  We learned a lot from our first crowdfunding campaign. Today, our process is well established. According to your tastes, your remarks and the opticians', we improved our products.

story:
What is The Project? 

Hi! my name is Rebecca Jansen, I am fashion business student who always interested in any eco-friendly and handcrafted things. 

I am introducing WOODECO, eco-friendly wooden watch with a fashionable and unique design for both male and female. Presenting the finest results of the natural wealth that had been wasted to become a new fashion accessory with least impact on our environment.  

Started from a big number of factories and household production of wood-based that generate so much wood waste that actually still can be utilized. Using the materials efficiently and effectively is the keyword of this project. 

We collect the remaining timber that has been selected to the craftsman in Indonesia to do the production. Indonesia is popular with its traditional art and culture. Wooden craving is one of their art forms of culture in this developing country. It still widely becomes a livelihood job for local people in some provinces. By partnering with artisans in Indonesia, we support the art communities and their creativity to grow in a better economic condition. 

Our goal is to be a better sustainable product that may reduce the environmental pollution and slowly bring good impact for our environment and develop creative art products by artisans to become wider, so then people can get to know more about the process behind a handcrafted product. 

We generated the idea into a fashion accessory, a wooden watch that comes with a unisex design for both male and female. it is made from the finest wood that from the wood workshop, furniture production, and some is from local carpenter as well.

Started with few models using natural color of the woods, it is suitable for everyone in every occasion. Meet our product and the reason why you should get it! 

 

The funds would be mostly used for the marketing campaigns and its promotion, so then it would increase the awareness of the product and get wider people to know more about a sustainable product. In addition, every fund that has been used would be informed to our contributors and if the funds were more than the stated goal, I would use the additional funds to support artisans in order to develop their creativity. 

Risks & Challenges

As this is a handcrafted product, the main challenge and risk are managing the consistency of the product production. Recognising this, we’ve partnered up with more artisans to handle various situations that can hamper the production process.

Thank you for your support!

story:
Short Summary

Expressing myself has always been a big part of my life and so has my sisters. We love to get dressed up to go out but our styles always clash, so people wonder how we're related or how we get a long so well. That's what inspired this clothing line, to show how opposites do attract while they can sometimes repel. I wanna create this brand, Rebel the Rebel, as a way to unify people and their choice of fashion, because too many people get excluded just by the way they dress.

What We Need & What You Get

Now most people know that creating a clothing line just doesn't happen over night, and being fresh out of high school and in college means I don't have a lot of money. What this campaign will do is fund all the supplies and materials I will need to make my first batch of designs. I've posted more images to show that not only will Rebel the Rebel be apparel, but jewelry as well, I am very into metal working. I considered $500 to be a good start, as I will be selling these clothes on etsy and hopefully be able to make profit to make my brand grow.

The Impact

I feel that too many times kids, teens, and even adults get excluded by the way that they dress or present themselves. Rebel the Rebel has a way of allowing self expression while also passing that border to allow open communication amongst different type of people. Everyone gets judged at first glance, but with the right style, you can allow for that door to stay open, even if it's just a crack.
Rebel the Rebel will also have clothes that will favor one extreme over another, so when a store opens up, shoppers don't have to think "That store isn't my taste/That isn't for me", they can walk in and step next to someone who looks completely different from them. The opposites will attract to the same place.
I also hope that if Rebel the Rebel can become something, that I can donate money to help fund anti-bullying campaigns.

Risks & Challenges

I don't expect for people to right away get on this idea, but I hope to be as persuasive as possible. I've been dying to create my own business one day, and being an entrepreneur is in my bones. If this fund fails, I will still trying to create Rebel the Rebel as best as I can, because as they say; the show must go on!
I don't expect any of this to be a cake walk if I do get the funding though, I am going to create a LinkedIn account to get talking to manufactures or other investors to get Rebel the Rebel started. This is my dream.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even If you can't donate any money, it would help me the most if you would like my facebook page for Rebel the Rebel here. My etsy shop also has one time available for purchase so far in case you are interested to direct start getting the snow ball rolling.
And pass this on to anyone who loves fashion or would be interested in this idea and would want to fund it.
Help someone who just wants to bring people together in the name of fashion. To end bullying or feeling left out just because of what they wear.

story:
Meet VITALI, the first smart garment that is stylish and intuitive.

Life is stressful. While you can't escape it till the next vacation, you might as well live well in the moment. Take control back with VITALI. We've integrated fabric sensors around the upper torso into a stylish bra to track and monitor your breathing, posture and heart rate variability. 

The Smart Bra is built with 4 skin-friendly fabric sensors that track your breathing and HRV, with higher accuracy than traditional wrist-based wearables. It has two colours and two closure systems to choose from, body-tested for comfort and support with women ranging from size 30AA to 40DD. 

The GEM is the mind behind VITALI. The powerful processor collects data from all sensors to understand your pattern to give you bio-feedback by gentle taps. When your body reacts, GEM notices it immediately. 

 

The idea for VITALI first came from yoga. Good breathing and posture are not only vital to the practice, but also everyday wellbeing. With biofeedback, we are bring the benefit of yoga into everyday healthy habits, so you feel zen regardless what you do. 

When VITALI notices signs of imbalance it guides you to take action by breathing deeply, then breathe to your hearts natural rhythms. Doing so can help you take control at the right time, every time.

 

Good breathing doesn't happen without good posture. VITALI has got your back, no matter how many hours you have to work, stand or drive. See how your breath quality improve with posture. 

Whatever you do to stay well, VITALI integrates easily into your existing mindfulness practice. The My VITALI app tracks your practice and shows the exact before and after effect. Whether you use it to see how your meditation session went or for a guided breathing exercise, you are in good hands!

 

 

VITALI goes whenever you are, and doesn't need your smart phone to work. Take a personalized breathing exercise is just as simple as getting dressed. Overtime we can effectively train our natural stress response to be more resilient, even you are not wearing it!

 

 

HRV (Heart Rate Variability) is a key physiological indicator of stress. When we start to get stressed, our HRV changes pattern. The GEM captures that pattern and reminds you at the right time, every time, to prevent you from stress. 

 

VITALI coaches you to breathe in sync with your heart's natural rhythm. Doing so puts your mind and body in tune. 

In order to guide you to breathe, we have to correct your posture first: a sedentary lifestyle greatly affects our posture and the quality of our breath. No matter what you do, working, walking or driving, whenever you are slouched over, it's hard to take a deep breath. The GEM reminds you to maintain good posture, so you are ready to take a deep breath when you need!   

  

Not sure what size to get? Measure the band first (the area directly under your bust). Make sure measuring tape is level and snug to get the best read. This reading is your band size, which is the top row of the chart. Next measure the bust (the fullest part of your chest). The different between the band and the bust measurement is your cup size. 1'' difference: A cup, 2'' difference: B cup, 3'' difference: C cup, etc.

We know our backers don't have a chance to try on VITALI before pledging, so we want you to have a peace of mind. It's simple, try it on at home, if you think you could use a different size, ship it back to us and we will make it right!  

 

"I have really wide shoulders and heavier bust. I was pleasantly surprised how it’s not pulling on my shoulders, the seams are really comfortable. There's no points that's uncomfortable."

- Deidre, personal coach and yoga instructor

"My first impression is: it’s so comfortable. I love that all the seams are really smooth. I feel really snug and together, but nothing is too tight”

-Genieve, Chiropractor and mamapreneur

“Amazingly comfortable. I have worked out in it - it is amazing”

-Lyndsay, Dental assistant

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We've created 12 iterations of prototypes. Over the last 18 months, we went from a rough cut-out bra with wires sticking out to a fully designed smart garment. Countless late nights and weekends were dedicated to bring this product to life. We have a track record of involving early adopters in the development process. As a backer, we want to hear what you think of the design before it hits the product line. We value your opinion as a kickstarter backer and welcome you on board our journey to bring VITALI to live!

We couldn’t have done this alone! Thank you to our families and friends for supporting us since day one. We’ve crossed path with some of the most amazing people on this journey of searching for intuitive wellness. First and foremost, thank you HAX accelerator and The Next Big Thing for all your guidance and mentorship along the way. To Hootsuite and e@UBC for an environment to learn and grow in. We are so grateful to have a strong health and wellness community in Vancouver. A special thank you to Health in Alignment (Dr. Genieve Burley), Karma Teachers, the Hotbox Yoga, Dharma Movement Company and Moment Meditation for the support and inspiration. A special thank you to our amazing video crew Antony Bui, Dalton, Jin, and brand ambassadors Cassandra, Morgan and Rochelle for embodying VITALI. Thank you to our Structural Engineers Laura Hu and Peter Wang for the many iterations of design, Firmware Engineer Karl Edler, Biomechanical Engineer Louise Thomas, Software Engineer Marco Brieden, Electronics Consultant Donny, Industrial Designer Inder Sanchdev. To our PR team at Proper Propaganda, digital marketing team at Profile Studio, and to our direct response advertising agency Jellop Crowdfunding. Thank you to Raybaby, Mindset, VUE, Iris Automation, AVA, CARV, Boulder Denim, Kokoon, and many other startup founders for the moral support while running this campaign!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Hi indiegogo!


We are a team of enthusiasts, we do not pursue the goal of enrichment on this project, we just want to do our favorite thing even better, add the fact that we think there is not enough. And also to share with you our device! This project is SECOND SKIN, is the case for your Iphone with glowing logo! Made of genuine leather stitched strong thread! At the moment, we have created a prototype in black only, but we plan to release case in three colors (black, white, brown)


What you get in return for support? 

We will give a series awards!

1) 2$ we will send you a keychain logos project and place your signature or name on your site and thanks for your support! Worldwide delivery free of charge

2) Over 55$ you get our case, in their original packaging and, if you can leave your name or signature on the cover! Also we will be grateful to you online, publish your name! Choose the color of the cover in advance (black, white, brown) Worldwide delivery free of charge

3) Over 100$ you get a set of two covers with the individual engraving each! And also thanks to the site! Choose the color of the cover in advance (black, white, brown) Worldwide delivery free of charge

4) Over 120$ original packaging! And you make one hundred percent prepayment to cover for iphone 6! Choose the color of the cover in advance (black, white, brown) Worldwide delivery free of charge

5) For 190$  you get 4 sets for iphone5/5s, in its original packaging, and you can leave your engraved on each of the covers! Yet we will publish your name on the site! Choose a color beforehand (black, white, brown) Worldwide delivery free of charge

6) Over 870$ you get a batch of 20 cases for iphone5/5s, in the original packaging! So we will publish your name on the site! Choose a color beforehand (black, white, brown)

Worldwide delivery free of charge

7) Over 30$ you get our case, in their original packaging and, if you can leave your name or signature on the cover! Also we will be grateful to you online, publish your name! Regard to the proposal is limited to only 10 covers. Choose the color of the cover in advance (black, white, brown) Worldwide delivery free of charge

8) 60$ Covers a limited number of 20 Exclusive version of the cover for iphone5/5s made ​​out of red leather and stitched with black thread! Worldwide delivery free of charge


Technology

Thanks that LED illuminated an apple in a cover charged from iPhone directly we can avoid secondary battery and make SECONDE SCIN very thin.Lightning apple need just a 1% from iPhone battery. Can you agree it is not so much?An electric device of our product is very simple. It is just a LED, short wire and a connection. That is wye our cover do not need special care. Just as a normal one.


Driver (Software)

To control SACOND SKIN you have to upload a special driver in appstore.It would automatically integrate in iPhone.Illuminated apple has some practical function two, for example an indication of a missed call or message.After you upload a driver on iPhone you can fit brightness of LED in manual mode.Or establish synchronization with the screen brightness, and last but not least to make you apple brightening aver time or just at special cases.We tried not to overload driver with various function and to make it easy for user.



We did it for ourselves!

We are fans of Apple Company, and with admiration relate to the design of each product! But sometimes it seems that some of the devices miss something! In our cover we have collected the best of the two devices in terms of design! Compactness, and fine lines and luminous thread stitched logo from his elder brother MacBook! So the iphone appeared glowing logo is welcome in a lovely leather-framed! In the past, our professions were closely associated with the design, I why we are sure that you will like our product!



Our plans!

First 40 days: 

Fundraising for the project,

Completion of the prototype

Next 20 days:

Search the factory, 

Purchase of material, 

Start of production

Next 14 days:

    Serial production 

    Models, testing 

    Production models

    and Finally 7 days:

    delivery of the first devices


    Objectives and most important task! 

    The main objective of the project is to start the product into production, but there are also problems over! 

    1) $ 15,000 of these funds will be used to start the first production batch of covers, writing software 

    2) $ 17,950 to develop an improved version of the cover, adding new features! 

    3) $ 28,500 change in the type of production, order a larger party! Thus, we can reduce the cost of the finished product!

    Our team 

    Alexei Boitchenko 

    Idea, Design, El.nachinka 

    Doing the Motion design for over 3 years, before that was closely associated with video-TV production! Recently interested in industrial design and all that it involves, in consequence of which appeared this project! 

    Bondarenko Liubove



    Selection of materials, assembly (sewing) 

    My hobby is to create a copyright knitted toys, I love doing different veshi hands, purses, knit blankets and much more! On this project improve my skills with the skin! 

    Koch Dmitri 


    Sprinkler layout drawing 

    I tried many professions somehow connected with the work, such as a programmer, an advertising designer, printer, laser cutter operator, had a shop selling products for needlework! And so I can not imagine my life without creative activity.


    We are in social networks, follow the news!
    https://twitter.com/CASESECONDSKIN
    http://instagram.com/casesecondskin
    https://www.facebook.com/CASESECONDSKIN



    Thanks for your support!


    Friends, we are very grateful for what you have spent your time trying to read it! We look forward to your assistance conditional, even if you can not help us with money, share us to your friends! This pomosh very important to us! 

    Thanks for your support!

2) Over 55$ you get our case, in their original packaging and, if you can leave your name or signature on the cover! Also we will be grateful to you online, publish your name! Choose the color of the cover in advance (black, white, brown) Worldwide delivery free of charge
3) Over 100$ you get a set of two covers with the individual engraving each! And also thanks to the site! Choose the color of the cover in advance (black, white, brown) Worldwide delivery free of charge
4) Over 120$ original packaging! And you make one hundred percent prepayment to cover for iphone 6! Choose the color of the cover in advance (black, white, brown) Worldwide delivery free of charge
5) For 190$  you get 4 sets for iphone5/5s, in its original packaging, and you can leave your engraved on each of the covers! Yet we will publish your name on the site! Choose a color beforehand (black, white, brown) Worldwide delivery free of charge
6) Over 870$ you get a batch of 20 cases for iphone5/5s, in the original packaging! So we will publish your name on the site! Choose a color beforehand (black, white, brown) 
Worldwide delivery free of charge

7) Over 30$ you get our case, in their original packaging and, if you can leave your name or signature on the cover! Also we will be grateful to you online, publish your name! Regard to the proposal is limited to only 10 covers. Choose the color of the cover in advance (black, white, brown) Worldwide delivery free of charge
8) 60$ Covers a limited number of 20 Exclusive version of the cover for iphone5/5s made ​​out of red leather and stitched with black thread! Worldwide delivery free of charge


Technology
Thanks that LED illuminated an apple in a cover charged from iPhone directly we can avoid secondary battery and make SECONDE SCIN very thin.Lightning apple need just a 1% from iPhone battery. Can you agree it is not so much?An electric device of our product is very simple. It is just a LED, short wire and a connection. That is wye our cover do not need special care. Just as a normal one.




Driver (Software)
To control SACOND SKIN you have to upload a special driver in appstore.It would automatically integrate in iPhone.Illuminated apple has some practical function two, for example an indication of a missed call or message.After you upload a driver on iPhone you can fit brightness of LED in manual mode.Or establish synchronization with the screen brightness, and last but not least to make you apple brightening aver time or just at special cases.We tried not to overload driver with various function and to make it easy for user.


  We did it for ourselves!

We are fans of Apple Company, and with admiration relate to the design of each product! But sometimes it seems that some of the devices miss something! In our cover we have collected the best of the two devices in terms of design! Compactness, and fine lines and luminous thread stitched logo from his elder brother MacBook! So the iphone appeared glowing logo is welcome in a lovely leather-framed! In the past, our professions were closely associated with the design, I why we are sure that you will like our product!



Our plans! First 40 days: 
Fundraising for the project,
Completion of the prototype
Next 20 days:

Search the factory, 
Purchase of material, 
Start of productionNext 14 days:



Serial production 
Models, testing 
Production models
and Finally 7 days:
delivery of the first devices


Objectives and most important task! 
The main objective of the project is to start the product into production, but there are also problems over! 
1) $ 15,000 of these funds will be used to start the first production batch of covers, writing software 
2) $ 17,950 to develop an improved version of the cover, adding new features! 
3) $ 28,500 change in the type of production, order a larger party! Thus, we can reduce the cost of the finished product!
Our team 
Alexei Boitchenko 


Idea, Design, El.nachinka 
Doing the Motion design for over 3 years, before that was closely associated with video-TV production! Recently interested in industrial design and all that it involves, in consequence of which appeared this project! 
Bondarenko Liubove



Selection of materials, assembly (sewing) 
My hobby is to create a copyright knitted toys, I love doing different veshi hands, purses, knit blankets and much more! On this project improve my skills with the skin! 
Koch Dmitri 


Sprinkler layout drawing 
I tried many professions somehow connected with the work, such as a programmer, an advertising designer, printer, laser cutter operator, had a shop selling products for needlework! And so I can not imagine my life without creative activity.


We are in social networks, follow the news!
https://twitter.com/CASESECONDSKIN

http://instagram.com/casesecondskin
https://www.facebook.com/CASESECONDSKIN



  Thanks for your support!




 

Friends, we are very grateful for what you have spent your time trying to read it! We look forward to your assistance conditional, even if you can not help us with money, share us to your friends! This pomosh very important to us! 
Thanks for your support!

story:
INSPIRED BY THE AMAZON RAINFOREST AND PANAMA HAT WEAVERS, WE CREATE AMAZING ECO, SUSTAINABLE AND ORGANIC SHOES!!


                                          

                                             


 


Hello everyone! Thank you for stopping by in our ETHICAL STEPS project by The Andes Fashion® 

My name is Mirta Evi,  I'm a sustainable fashion designer from Ecuador specialize in natural materials resources, creating new and unique designs, all handmade by our very skilled artisans from Amazon Rainforest communities and panama hats weavers communities from Ecuador. One of our goals at moment of creating a product, is to preserve the identity of Ecuador, but at same time create a fashionable product, so easy to carry and wear in any place of the world, creating new eco trends!

Beside these activities, I have a full time job as mom, very proud of my 2 lovely boys, also a singer, artist, illustrator and I give consultancy for sustainable material projects & handcrafts apply into the fashion business. We have been working for international organizations as the UNDP (United National Development Programme) for Tokyo, Japan and Quito, Ecuador offices.



                                              

   Waorani women weaving chambira bags, jewellery and shoes in our  training workshop in Coca city, Ecuador.

Waorani woman with typical feather and bejuco (lianas) crown, preparing the chambira fiber to become threads, this must be done before start to weave any product. Children go with their mothers and learn how to weave since a very early age.

Waorani women making the threads. At below, chambira fiber drying under the sun.  With more sunlight, the chambira become whiter. At right, final product AMAZON    CHAMBIRA SANDALS in natural and brown color

The ETHICAL STEPS idea began when I had one of the best experiences in my life, working with the WAORANI COMMUNITY. They live far away from the cities in Ecuador, deep in the Amazon Rainforest, more exact at the YASUNI NATIONAL PARK.  


Amazing PROMO VIDEO about Yasuni ITT , Waorani territory in Ecuador and why is so important to preserve the nature in it and the cultures that live in it.

  

Simply the idea to work with these fantastic group of women (there are more than 1000 weavers in Azuay province and 450 families of Waorani community) made me think of how can we develop a new product never done before, preserving their ancestral technics, but in the application of something different from a hat or jewellery?. We all in the communities (near to Cuenca and Puyo) and at the brand started to give ideas, back and forward... and then... Bingo! the answer was at our own feet! and then the ETHICAL STEPS born. 

Being a shoes lover, but above all, an eco-fashion and fair trade defender, made me decide to start this iniciative with all these amazing women in their amazon and high mountain communities.

Here we are working for the UNDP, THE ANDES FASHION and MUJI STORES JAPAN new product development of Chambira bags project in our first workshop. Yasuni, Ecuador 

WATCH THIS VIDEO WHERE THE WAORANI STORE MANAGER, TALKS ABOUT CHAMBIRA AND HOW WOMEN CREATE PRODUCTS IN GENERAL Source: New Forest Earth        

 

Panama hats weavers, they also weave our "planchas" which is a long and solid piece made of toquilla straw to create our ETHICAL STEPS. Toquilla straw drying under the sun, and toquilla weaver choosing the straw to create a new hat, at the below photos. 

  

     

These are enough reasons to help us to change our women's lives and empowering their communities!

With ETHICAL STEPS we empowering women to have a stronger position in our society, to generate better opportunities to their communities, to be a better support of their families and make them feel proud about their skills and cultural heritage identity!

These women associations are gonna be the direct beneficiaries from the project.


Thank you for reaching this far! Is at this point, where we really need your support to make our project come true. How can you do it?

Well, there are some options with which you can help us, but we also want to reward you becoming our PARTNER RESELLER!


ALL THESE PRICES ARE INCLUDING WORLDWIDE SHIPPING
ORIGIN COUNTRY: ECUADOR, SOUTH AMERICA.
Found amazing packages with promotions as free gifts in every pledges package. 
If you support us with our $27300 DIAMOND EMINENCE PARTNER RESELLER PACK we bring you to Ecuador in a round trip full paid for 5 days!!! we will take you to our communities, you could have the chance to live with them, talk to them, know more about materials and how to run the eco fashion business in a big scale with us!!

With every pre-order you are helping us to create more opportunities for their lives, also, we are getting better chances to create new and unique models, colors, combinations, and launch the product into the global markets!

                Pre-order, contribute, help the ETHICAL STEPS project come true!

    You can choose between the 2 models we present at following:

in 3 available color combinations:


in 6 available colors:

SIZES


DEVELOPMENT TIME

                We want you to have our product for the next SS2015 collection! (SPRING/SUMMER). We recept orders during the campaigne and for all the people, boutiques, retailers, wholesalers and importers that send us the orders during this period, we will offer same price for a whole calendar year since Dec 2014, to Dec                                                                                     2015!

To make ETHICAL STEPS come true we need to count with a massive production. Only in this way, we can start helping all women associations at same time and give                                       them a real positive change into their lives!

    We want to work with enough time in advance to avoid loosing a good weather season, that can make possible to harvest the fibers in the different parts of the country and let us have a reliable production.
    The time here is very important. Since these are natural materials and are not harvest from a plantation, but direct from the Amazon Rainforest of small organic fields, the climate plays an important role. The weather in Ecuador is divide it into the 3 natural regions at same time.
    -Coast: Pacific coast. Very hot, part of the toquilla straw is coming from this side of the country. From november to april the weather become moist and floods can destroy part of the  toquilla straw fields. How can we avoid this?
    Of course, this is not happened in all the places where toquilla is harvest, but to have a minimun impact is better for our artisans to harvest between october and january. Also we need lot of sun to get the toquilla softer, whiter with better conditions to 
    -Mountain: In the middle of the country. Cold and dry, the toquilla straw is coming also from this part of the country. From november to may, weather become cold and we can have many rains around this geographical area, but this is not an impediment to stop a toquilla production, however, our goal would be to recept all the orders from november to december 2014.
    -Jungle (Amazon Rainforest): At the east side of Ecuador, the primary and secondary rainforest is all year long warm, moist and rainy. Is in here were our Waorani partners harvest the chambira fiber direct from the heart of the palm, they don't felled the palms. Everything is very sustainable as the toquilla harvest. To get chambira, we need to let the palms to recover, the chambira trees get recover very quick. To get a faster production we need a lot of sunlight. Chambira as toquilla, must get dry under the sun before becoming a weave product.
    With your pre-orders until december 2014 we can start working and giving the chance to our women to show to the world their skills, in an innovating and eco-chic product.We love to see more and more people around the world helping to create a new green global awareness. Some celebs are our favorites and great inspiration for us. We would love to recruit some of them to become our AMBASSADORS! Like them you can help becoming our AMBASSADOR, give a voice to our women and help us to spread the word! OUR WOMEN NEED YOUR VOICE!
        

                     You carry the stories of the people that make your clothes. 
                                                          Source: Eco-Age, UK

Everyday is becoming more and more easy to have access to green, organic and natural products of any kind. Therefore, support our project, become part of the world's solution, avoid contamination and above all, help people who really need it.


                                     Thank you!

    We would like to thank every PARTNER for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. 

Please share our project through Facebook, Linkedin, E-mail, Blog, Exposure, Pinterest, Instagram and Twitter, our communities and us are gonna be very happy for your support!

If you have any question, need more information, want an extra order or just want to say HELLO!! please send a message at: sales@theandesfashion.com
mirta@theandesfashion.com
FOR PRESS: press@theandesfashion.com
